349 #define MIN_BRIGHT 10
350 #define MAX_BRIGHT 100
351 
352 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
353 // ChartCanvas Implementation
354 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
355 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(ChartCanvas, wxWindow)
356 EVT_PAINT(ChartCanvas::OnPaint)
357 EVT_ACTIVATE(ChartCanvas::OnActivate)
358 EVT_SIZE(ChartCanvas::OnSize)
359 #ifndef HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS
360 EVT_MOUSE_EVENTS(ChartCanvas::MouseEvent)
361 #endif
362 EVT_TIMER(DBLCLICK_TIMER, ChartCanvas::MouseTimedEvent)
363 EVT_TIMER(PAN_TIMER, ChartCanvas::PanTimerEvent)
364 EVT_TIMER(MOVEMENT_TIMER, ChartCanvas::MovementTimerEvent)
365 EVT_TIMER(MOVEMENT_STOP_TIMER, ChartCanvas::MovementStopTimerEvent)
366 EVT_TIMER(CURTRACK_TIMER, ChartCanvas::OnCursorTrackTimerEvent)
367 EVT_TIMER(ROT_TIMER, ChartCanvas::RotateTimerEvent)
368 EVT_TIMER(ROPOPUP_TIMER, ChartCanvas::OnRolloverPopupTimerEvent)
369 EVT_TIMER(ROUTEFINISH_TIMER, ChartCanvas::OnRouteFinishTimerEvent)
370 EVT_KEY_DOWN(ChartCanvas::OnKeyDown)
371 EVT_KEY_UP(ChartCanvas::OnKeyUp)
372 EVT_CHAR(ChartCanvas::OnKeyChar)
373 EVT_MOUSE_CAPTURE_LOST(ChartCanvas::LostMouseCapture)
374 EVT_KILL_FOCUS(ChartCanvas::OnKillFocus)
375 EVT_SET_FOCUS(ChartCanvas::OnSetFocus)
376 EVT_MENU(-1, ChartCanvas::OnToolLeftClick)
377 EVT_TIMER(DEFERRED_FOCUS_TIMER, ChartCanvas::OnDeferredFocusTimerEvent)
378 
379 END_EVENT_TABLE()
380 
381 // Define a constructor for my canvas
382 ChartCanvas::ChartCanvas(wxFrame *frame, int canvasIndex)
383  : wxWindow(frame, wxID_ANY, wxPoint(20, 20), wxSize(5, 5), wxNO_BORDER) {
384  parent_frame = (MyFrame *)frame; // save a pointer to parent
385  m_canvasIndex = canvasIndex;
386 
387  pscratch_bm = NULL;
388 
389  SetBackgroundColour(wxColour(0, 0, 0));
390  SetBackgroundStyle(wxBG_STYLE_CUSTOM); // on WXMSW, this prevents flashing on
391  // color scheme change
392 
393  m_groupIndex = 0;
394  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
395  m_bRouteEditing = false;
396  m_bMarkEditing = false;
397  m_bRoutePoinDragging = false;
398  m_bIsInRadius = false;
399  m_bMayToggleMenuBar = true;
400 
401  m_bFollow = false;
402  m_bShowNavobjects = true;
403  m_bTCupdate = false;
404  m_bAppendingRoute = false; // was true in MSW, why??
405  pThumbDIBShow = NULL;
406  m_bShowCurrent = false;
407  m_bShowTide = false;
408  bShowingCurrent = false;
409  pCwin = NULL;
410  warp_flag = false;
411  m_bzooming = false;
412  m_b_paint_enable = true;
413  m_routeState = 0;
414 
415  pss_overlay_bmp = NULL;
416  pss_overlay_mask = NULL;
417  m_bChartDragging = false;
418  m_bMeasure_Active = false;
419  m_bMeasure_DistCircle = false;
420  m_pMeasureRoute = NULL;
421  m_pTrackRolloverWin = NULL;
422  m_pRouteRolloverWin = NULL;
423  m_pAISRolloverWin = NULL;
424  m_bedge_pan = false;
425  m_disable_edge_pan = false;
426  m_dragoffsetSet = false;
427  m_bautofind = false;
428  m_bFirstAuto = true;
429  m_groupIndex = 0;
430  m_singleChart = NULL;
431  m_upMode = NORTH_UP_MODE;
432  m_bShowAIS = true;
433  m_bShowAISScaled = false;
434 
435  m_vLat = 0.;
436  m_vLon = 0.;
437 
438  m_pCIWin = NULL;
439 
440  m_pSelectedRoute = NULL;
441  m_pSelectedTrack = NULL;
442  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
443  m_pFoundPoint = NULL;
444  m_pMouseRoute = NULL;
445  m_prev_pMousePoint = NULL;
446  m_pEditRouteArray = NULL;
447  m_pFoundRoutePoint = NULL;
448  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
449 
450  m_pRolloverRouteSeg = NULL;
451  m_pRolloverTrackSeg = NULL;
452  m_bsectors_shown = false;
453 
454  m_bbrightdir = false;
455  r_gamma_mult = 1;
456  g_gamma_mult = 1;
457  b_gamma_mult = 1;
458 
459  m_pos_image_user_day = NULL;
460  m_pos_image_user_dusk = NULL;
461  m_pos_image_user_night = NULL;
462  m_pos_image_user_grey_day = NULL;
463  m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk = NULL;
464  m_pos_image_user_grey_night = NULL;
465 
466  m_zoom_factor = 1;
467  m_rotation_speed = 0;
468  m_mustmove = 0;
469 
470  m_OSoffsetx = 0.;
471  m_OSoffsety = 0.;
472 
473  m_pos_image_user_yellow_day = NULL;
474  m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk = NULL;
475  m_pos_image_user_yellow_night = NULL;
476 
477  SetOwnShipState(SHIP_INVALID);
478 
479  undo = new Undo(this);
480 
481  VPoint.Invalidate();
482 
483  m_glcc = NULL;
484 
485  m_toolBar = NULL;
486  m_toolbar_scalefactor = 1.0;
487  m_toolbarOrientation = wxTB_HORIZONTAL;
488  m_focus_indicator_pix = 1;
489 
490  m_pCurrentStack = NULL;
491  m_bpersistent_quilt = false;
492  m_piano_ctx_menu = NULL;
493  m_Compass = NULL;
494 
495  g_ChartNotRenderScaleFactor = 2.0;
496  m_bShowScaleInStatusBar = true;
497 
498  m_muiBar = NULL;
499  m_bShowScaleInStatusBar = false;
500 
501  m_bShowOutlines = false;
502  m_bDisplayGrid = false;
503  m_bShowDepthUnits = true;
504  m_encDisplayCategory = (int)STANDARD;
505 
506  m_encShowLights = true;
507  m_encShowAnchor = true;
508  m_encShowDataQual = false;
509  m_bShowGPS = true;
510  m_pQuilt = new Quilt(this);
511  SetQuiltMode(true);
512  SetAlertString(_T(""));
513  m_sector_glat = 0;
514  m_sector_glon = 0;
515 
516 #ifdef HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS
517  m_oldVPSScale = -1.0;
518  m_popupWanted = false;
519  m_leftdown = false;
520 #endif /* HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS */
521 
522  SetupGlCanvas();
523  /*
524  #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
525  if ( !g_bdisable_opengl )
526  {
527  if(g_bopengl){
528  wxLogMessage( _T("Creating glChartCanvas") );
529  m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(this);
530 
531  // We use one context for all GL windows, so that textures etc will be
532  automatically shared if(IsPrimaryCanvas()){ wxGLContext *pctx = new
533  wxGLContext(m_glcc); m_glcc->SetContext(pctx); g_pGLcontext = pctx; // Save a
534  copy of the common context
535  }
536  else{
537  #ifdef __WXOSX__
538  m_glcc->SetContext(new wxGLContext(m_glcc, g_pGLcontext));
539  #else
540  m_glcc->SetContext(g_pGLcontext); // If not primary canvas,
541  use the saved common context #endif
542  }
543  }
544  }
545  #endif
546  */
547  singleClickEventIsValid = false;
548 
549  // Build the cursors
550 
551  pCursorLeft = NULL;
552  pCursorRight = NULL;
553  pCursorUp = NULL;
554  pCursorDown = NULL;
555  pCursorArrow = NULL;
556  pCursorPencil = NULL;
557  pCursorCross = NULL;
558 
559  RebuildCursors();
560 
561  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
562 
563  pPanTimer = new wxTimer(this, m_MouseDragging);
564  pPanTimer->Stop();
565 
566  pMovementTimer = new wxTimer(this, MOVEMENT_TIMER);
567  pMovementTimer->Stop();
568 
569  pMovementStopTimer = new wxTimer(this, MOVEMENT_STOP_TIMER);
570  pMovementStopTimer->Stop();
571 
572  pRotDefTimer = new wxTimer(this, ROT_TIMER);
573  pRotDefTimer->Stop();
574 
575  m_DoubleClickTimer = new wxTimer(this, DBLCLICK_TIMER);
576  m_DoubleClickTimer->Stop();
577 
578  m_panx = m_pany = 0;
579  m_panspeed = 0;
580 
581  pCurTrackTimer = new wxTimer(this, CURTRACK_TIMER);
582  pCurTrackTimer->Stop();
583  m_curtrack_timer_msec = 10;
584 
585  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot = 0;
586  m_last_wheel_dir = 0;
587 
588  m_RolloverPopupTimer.SetOwner(this, ROPOPUP_TIMER);
589 
590  m_deferredFocusTimer.SetOwner(this, DEFERRED_FOCUS_TIMER);
591 
592  m_rollover_popup_timer_msec = 20;
593 
594  m_routeFinishTimer.SetOwner(this, ROUTEFINISH_TIMER);
595 
596  m_b_rot_hidef = true;
597 
598  proute_bm = NULL;
599  m_prot_bm = NULL;
600 
601  m_upMode = NORTH_UP_MODE;
602  m_bLookAhead = false;
603  m_VPRotate = 0;
604 
605  // Set some benign initial values
606 
607  m_cs = GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY;
608  VPoint.clat = 0;
609  VPoint.clon = 0;
610  VPoint.view_scale_ppm = 1;
611  VPoint.Invalidate();
612  m_nMeasureState = 0;
613 
614  m_canvas_scale_factor = 1.;
615 
616  m_canvas_width = 1000;
617 
618  m_overzoomTextWidth = 0;
619  m_overzoomTextHeight = 0;
620 
621  // Create the default world chart
622  pWorldBackgroundChart = new GSHHSChart;
623 
624  // Create the default depth unit emboss maps
625  m_pEM_Feet = NULL;
626  m_pEM_Meters = NULL;
627  m_pEM_Fathoms = NULL;
628 
629  CreateDepthUnitEmbossMaps(GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY);
630 
631  m_pEM_OverZoom = NULL;
632  SetOverzoomFont();
633  CreateOZEmbossMapData(GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY);
634 
635  // Build icons for tide/current points
636  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
637  m_bmTideDay = style->GetIconScaled(_T("tidesml"), 1. / g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this));
638 
639  // Dusk
640  m_bmTideDusk = CreateDimBitmap(m_bmTideDay, .50);
641 
642  // Night
643  m_bmTideNight = CreateDimBitmap(m_bmTideDay, .20);
644 
645  // Build Dusk/Night ownship icons
646  double factor_dusk = 0.5;
647  double factor_night = 0.25;
648 
649  // Red
650  m_os_image_red_day = style->GetIcon(_T("ship-red")).ConvertToImage();
651 
652  int rimg_width = m_os_image_red_day.GetWidth();
653  int rimg_height = m_os_image_red_day.GetHeight();
654 
655  m_os_image_red_dusk = m_os_image_red_day.Copy();
656  m_os_image_red_night = m_os_image_red_day.Copy();
657 
658  for (int iy = 0; iy < rimg_height; iy++) {
659  for (int ix = 0; ix < rimg_width; ix++) {
660  if (!m_os_image_red_day.IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
661  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_os_image_red_day.GetRed(ix, iy),
662  m_os_image_red_day.GetGreen(ix, iy),
663  m_os_image_red_day.GetBlue(ix, iy));
664  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
665  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
666  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
667  m_os_image_red_dusk.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
668 
669  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
670  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
671  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
672  m_os_image_red_night.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
673  }
674  }
675  }
676 
677  // Grey
678  m_os_image_grey_day =
679  style->GetIcon(_T("ship-red")).ConvertToImage().ConvertToGreyscale();
680 
681  int gimg_width = m_os_image_grey_day.GetWidth();
682  int gimg_height = m_os_image_grey_day.GetHeight();
683 
684  m_os_image_grey_dusk = m_os_image_grey_day.Copy();
685  m_os_image_grey_night = m_os_image_grey_day.Copy();
686 
687  for (int iy = 0; iy < gimg_height; iy++) {
688  for (int ix = 0; ix < gimg_width; ix++) {
689  if (!m_os_image_grey_day.IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
690  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_os_image_grey_day.GetRed(ix, iy),
691  m_os_image_grey_day.GetGreen(ix, iy),
692  m_os_image_grey_day.GetBlue(ix, iy));
693  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
694  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
695  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
696  m_os_image_grey_dusk.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
697 
698  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
699  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
700  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
701  m_os_image_grey_night.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
702  }
703  }
704  }
705 
706  // Yellow
707  m_os_image_yellow_day = m_os_image_red_day.Copy();
708 
709  gimg_width = m_os_image_yellow_day.GetWidth();
710  gimg_height = m_os_image_yellow_day.GetHeight();
711 
712  m_os_image_yellow_dusk = m_os_image_red_day.Copy();
713  m_os_image_yellow_night = m_os_image_red_day.Copy();
714 
715  for (int iy = 0; iy < gimg_height; iy++) {
716  for (int ix = 0; ix < gimg_width; ix++) {
717  if (!m_os_image_yellow_day.IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
718  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_os_image_yellow_day.GetRed(ix, iy),
719  m_os_image_yellow_day.GetGreen(ix, iy),
720  m_os_image_yellow_day.GetBlue(ix, iy));
721  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
722  hsv.hue += 60. / 360.; // shift to yellow
723  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
724  m_os_image_yellow_day.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
725 
726  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
727  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
728  hsv.hue += 60. / 360.; // shift to yellow
729  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
730  m_os_image_yellow_dusk.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
731 
732  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
733  hsv.hue += 60. / 360.; // shift to yellow
734  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
735  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
736  m_os_image_yellow_night.SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, nrgb.blue);
737  }
738  }
739  }
740 
741  // Set initial pointers to ownship images
742  m_pos_image_red = &m_os_image_red_day;
743  m_pos_image_yellow = &m_os_image_yellow_day;
744  m_pos_image_grey = &m_os_image_grey_day;
745 
746  SetUserOwnship();
747 
748  m_pBrightPopup = NULL;
749 
750 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
751  if (!g_bdisable_opengl) m_pQuilt->EnableHighDefinitionZoom(true);
752 #endif
753 
754  int gridFontSize = 8;
755 #if defined(__WXOSX__) || defined(__WXGTK3__)
756  // Support scaled HDPI displays.
757  gridFontSize *= GetContentScaleFactor();
758 #endif
759 
760  m_pgridFont = FontMgr::Get().FindOrCreateFont(
761  gridFontSize, wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, FALSE,
762  wxString(_T ( "Arial" )));
763 
764  m_Piano = new Piano(this);
765 
766  m_bShowCompassWin = g_bShowCompassWin;
767 
768  m_Compass = new ocpnCompass(this);
769  m_Compass->SetScaleFactor(g_compass_scalefactor);
770  m_Compass->Show(m_bShowCompassWin);
771 
772  m_bToolbarEnable = false;
773  m_pianoFrozen = false;
774 
775  SetMinSize(wxSize(200, 200));
776 
777  m_displayScale = 1.0;
778 #if defined(__WXOSX__) || defined(__WXGTK3__)
779  // Support scaled HDPI displays.
780  m_displayScale = GetContentScaleFactor();
781 #endif
782 
783 
784 #ifdef HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS
785  if (!EnableTouchEvents(wxTOUCH_ZOOM_GESTURE |
786  wxTOUCH_PRESS_GESTURES)) {
787  wxLogError("Failed to enable touch events");
788  }
789 
790  Bind(wxEVT_GESTURE_ZOOM, &ChartCanvas::OnZoom, this);
791 
792  Bind(wxEVT_LONG_PRESS, &ChartCanvas::OnLongPress, this);
793  Bind(wxEVT_PRESS_AND_TAP, &ChartCanvas::OnPressAndTap, this);
794 
795  Bind(wxEVT_RIGHT_UP, &ChartCanvas::OnRightUp, this);
796  Bind(wxEVT_RIGHT_DOWN, &ChartCanvas::OnRightDown, this);
797 
798  Bind(wxEVT_LEFT_UP, &ChartCanvas::OnLeftUp, this);
799  Bind(wxEVT_LEFT_DOWN, &ChartCanvas::OnLeftDown, this);
800 
801  Bind(wxEVT_MOUSEWHEEL, &ChartCanvas::OnWheel, this);
802  Bind(wxEVT_MOTION, &ChartCanvas::OnMotion, this);
803 #endif
804 }
805 
806 ChartCanvas::~ChartCanvas() {
807  delete pThumbDIBShow;
808 
809  // Delete Cursors
810  delete pCursorLeft;
811  delete pCursorRight;
812  delete pCursorUp;
813  delete pCursorDown;
814  delete pCursorArrow;
815  delete pCursorPencil;
816  delete pCursorCross;
817 
818  delete pPanTimer;
819  delete pMovementTimer;
820  delete pMovementStopTimer;
821  delete pCurTrackTimer;
822  delete pRotDefTimer;
823  delete m_DoubleClickTimer;
824 
825  delete m_pTrackRolloverWin;
826  delete m_pRouteRolloverWin;
827  delete m_pAISRolloverWin;
828  delete m_pBrightPopup;
829 
830  delete m_pCIWin;
831 
832  delete pscratch_bm;
833 
834  m_dc_route.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
835  delete proute_bm;
836 
837  delete pWorldBackgroundChart;
838  delete pss_overlay_bmp;
839 
840  delete m_pEM_Feet;
841  delete m_pEM_Meters;
842  delete m_pEM_Fathoms;
843 
844  delete m_pEM_OverZoom;
845  // delete m_pEM_CM93Offset;
846 
847  delete m_prot_bm;
848 
849  delete m_pos_image_user_day;
850  delete m_pos_image_user_dusk;
851  delete m_pos_image_user_night;
852  delete m_pos_image_user_grey_day;
853  delete m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk;
854  delete m_pos_image_user_grey_night;
855  delete m_pos_image_user_yellow_day;
856  delete m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk;
857  delete m_pos_image_user_yellow_night;
858 
859  delete undo;
860 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
861  if (!g_bdisable_opengl) {
862  delete m_glcc;
863 
864 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 9, 0)
865  if (IsPrimaryCanvas() && g_bopengl) delete g_pGLcontext;
866 #endif
867  }
868 #endif
869 
870  // Delete the MUI bar, but make sure there is no pointer to it during destroy.
871  // wx tries to deliver events to this canvas during destroy.
872  MUIBar *muiBar = m_muiBar;
873  m_muiBar = 0;
874  delete muiBar;
875  delete m_pQuilt;
876  delete m_pCurrentStack;
877  delete m_Compass;
878  delete m_Piano;
879 }
880 
881 void ChartCanvas::RebuildCursors() {
882  delete pCursorLeft;
883  delete pCursorRight;
884  delete pCursorUp;
885  delete pCursorDown;
886  delete pCursorArrow;
887  delete pCursorPencil;
888  delete pCursorCross;
889 
890  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
891  double cursorScale = exp(g_GUIScaleFactor * (0.693 / 5.0));
892 
893  double pencilScale = 1.0 / g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(gFrame);
894 
895  wxImage ICursorLeft = style->GetIcon(_T("left")).ConvertToImage();
896  wxImage ICursorRight = style->GetIcon(_T("right")).ConvertToImage();
897  wxImage ICursorUp = style->GetIcon(_T("up")).ConvertToImage();
898  wxImage ICursorDown = style->GetIcon(_T("down")).ConvertToImage();
899  wxImage ICursorPencil = style->GetIconScaled(_T("pencil"), pencilScale).ConvertToImage();
900  wxImage ICursorCross = style->GetIcon(_T("cross")).ConvertToImage();
901 
902 #if !defined(__WXMSW__) && !defined(__WXQT__)
903  ICursorLeft.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
904  ICursorRight.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
905  ICursorUp.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
906  ICursorDown.ConvertAlphaToMask(128);
907  ICursorPencil.ConvertAlphaToMask(10);
908  ICursorCross.ConvertAlphaToMask(10);
909 #endif
910 
911  if (ICursorLeft.Ok()) {
912  ICursorLeft.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 0);
913  ICursorLeft.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 15);
914  pCursorLeft = new wxCursor(ICursorLeft);
915  } else
916  pCursorLeft = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
917 
918  if (ICursorRight.Ok()) {
919  ICursorRight.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 31);
920  ICursorRight.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 15);
921  pCursorRight = new wxCursor(ICursorRight);
922  } else
923  pCursorRight = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
924 
925  if (ICursorUp.Ok()) {
926  ICursorUp.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 15);
927  ICursorUp.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 0);
928  pCursorUp = new wxCursor(ICursorUp);
929  } else
930  pCursorUp = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
931 
932  if (ICursorDown.Ok()) {
933  ICursorDown.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 15);
934  ICursorDown.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 31);
935  pCursorDown = new wxCursor(ICursorDown);
936  } else
937  pCursorDown = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
938 
939  if (ICursorPencil.Ok()) {
940  ICursorPencil.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 0 * pencilScale);
941  ICursorPencil.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 16 * pencilScale);
942  pCursorPencil = new wxCursor(ICursorPencil);
943  } else
944  pCursorPencil = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
945 
946  if (ICursorCross.Ok()) {
947  ICursorCross.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_X, 13);
948  ICursorCross.SetOption(wxIMAGE_OPTION_CUR_HOTSPOT_Y, 12);
949  pCursorCross = new wxCursor(ICursorCross);
950  } else
951  pCursorCross = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
952 
953  pCursorArrow = new wxCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
954  pPlugIn_Cursor = NULL;
955 }
956 
957 void ChartCanvas::CanvasApplyLocale() {
958  CreateDepthUnitEmbossMaps(m_cs);
959  CreateOZEmbossMapData(m_cs);
960 }
961 
962 void ChartCanvas::SetupGlCanvas() {
963 #ifndef __OCPN__ANDROID__
964 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
965  if (!g_bdisable_opengl) {
966  if (g_bopengl) {
967  wxLogMessage(_T("Creating glChartCanvas"));
968  m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(this);
969 
970  // We use one context for all GL windows, so that textures etc will be
971  // automatically shared
972  if (IsPrimaryCanvas()) {
973  // qDebug() << "Creating Primary Context";
974 
975  // wxGLContextAttrs ctxAttr;
976  // ctxAttr.PlatformDefaults().CoreProfile().OGLVersion(3,
977  // 2).EndList(); wxGLContext *pctx = new wxGLContext(m_glcc,
978  // NULL, &ctxAttr);
979  wxGLContext *pctx = new wxGLContext(m_glcc);
980  m_glcc->SetContext(pctx);
981  g_pGLcontext = pctx; // Save a copy of the common context
982  } else {
983 #ifdef __WXOSX__
984  m_glcc->SetContext(new wxGLContext(m_glcc, g_pGLcontext));
985 #else
986  m_glcc->SetContext(g_pGLcontext); // If not primary canvas, use the
987  // saved common context
988 #endif
989  }
990  }
991  }
992 #endif
993 #endif
994 
995 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__ // ocpnUSE_GL
996  if (!g_bdisable_opengl) {
997  if (g_bopengl) {
998  // qDebug() << "SetupGlCanvas";
999  wxLogMessage(_T("Creating glChartCanvas"));
1000 
1001  // We use one context for all GL windows, so that textures etc will be
1002  // automatically shared
1003  if (IsPrimaryCanvas()) {
1004  qDebug() << "Creating Primary glChartCanvas";
1005 
1006  // wxGLContextAttrs ctxAttr;
1007  // ctxAttr.PlatformDefaults().CoreProfile().OGLVersion(3,
1008  // 2).EndList(); wxGLContext *pctx = new wxGLContext(m_glcc,
1009  // NULL, &ctxAttr);
1010  m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(this);
1011 
1012  wxGLContext *pctx = new wxGLContext(m_glcc);
1013  m_glcc->SetContext(pctx);
1014  g_pGLcontext = pctx; // Save a copy of the common context
1015  m_glcc->m_pParentCanvas = this;
1016  // m_glcc->Reparent(this);
1017  } else {
1018  qDebug() << "Creating Secondary glChartCanvas";
1019  // QGLContext *pctx =
1020  // gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()->GetQGLContext(); qDebug()
1021  // << "pctx: " << pctx;
1022 
1023  m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(
1024  gFrame, gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas()); // Shared
1025  // m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(this, pctx); //Shared
1026  // m_glcc = new glChartCanvas(this, wxPoint(900, 0));
1027  wxGLContext *pwxctx = new wxGLContext(m_glcc);
1028  m_glcc->SetContext(pwxctx);
1029  m_glcc->m_pParentCanvas = this;
1030  // m_glcc->Reparent(this);
1031  }
1032  }
1033  }
1034 #endif
1035 }
1036 
1037 void ChartCanvas::OnKillFocus(wxFocusEvent &WXUNUSED(event)) {
1038  RefreshRect(wxRect(0, 0, GetClientSize().x, m_focus_indicator_pix), false);
1039 
1040  // On Android, we get a KillFocus on just about every keystroke.
1041  // Why?
1042 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
1043  return;
1044 #endif
1045 
1046  // Special logic:
1047  // On OSX in GL mode, each mouse click causes a kill and immediate regain of
1048  // canvas focus. Why??? Who knows... So, we provide for this case by
1049  // starting a timer if required to actually Finish() a route on a legitimate
1050  // focus change, but not if the focus is quickly regained ( <20 msec.) on
1051  // this canvas.
1052 #ifdef __WXOSX__
1053  if (m_routeState && m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus)
1054  m_routeFinishTimer.Start(20, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
1055 #else
1056  if (m_routeState && m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus) FinishRoute();
1057 #endif
1058 }
1059 
1060 void ChartCanvas::OnSetFocus(wxFocusEvent &WXUNUSED(event)) {
1061  m_routeFinishTimer.Stop();
1062 
1063  // Try to keep the global top-line menubar selections up to date with the
1064  // current "focus" canvas
1065  gFrame->UpdateGlobalMenuItems(this);
1066 
1067  RefreshRect(wxRect(0, 0, GetClientSize().x, m_focus_indicator_pix), false);
1068 }
1069 
1070 void ChartCanvas::OnRouteFinishTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
1071  if (m_routeState && m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus) FinishRoute();
1072 }
1073 
1074 #ifdef HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS
1075 void ChartCanvas::OnLongPress(wxLongPressEvent &event) {
1076  /* we defer the popup menu call upon the leftup event
1077  else the menu disappears immediately,
1078  (see
1079  http://wxwidgets.10942.n7.nabble.com/Popupmenu-disappears-immediately-if-called-from-QueueEvent-td92572.html)
1080  */
1081  m_popupWanted = true;
1082 }
1083 
1084 void ChartCanvas::OnPressAndTap(wxPressAndTapEvent &event) {
1085  // not implemented yet
1086 }
1087 
1088 void ChartCanvas::OnRightUp(wxMouseEvent &event) { MouseEvent(event); }
1089 
1090 void ChartCanvas::OnRightDown(wxMouseEvent &event) { MouseEvent(event); }
1091 
1092 void ChartCanvas::OnLeftUp(wxMouseEvent &event) {
1093  wxPoint pos = event.GetPosition();
1094 
1095  m_leftdown = false;
1096 
1097  if (!m_popupWanted) {
1098  wxMouseEvent ev(wxEVT_LEFT_UP);
1099  ev.m_x = pos.x;
1100  ev.m_y = pos.y;
1101  MouseEvent(ev);
1102  return;
1103  }
1104 
1105  m_popupWanted = false;
1106 
1107  wxMouseEvent ev(wxEVT_RIGHT_DOWN);
1108  ev.m_x = pos.x;
1109  ev.m_y = pos.y;
1110 
1111  MouseEvent(ev);
1112 }
1113 
1114 void ChartCanvas::OnLeftDown(wxMouseEvent &event) {
1115  m_leftdown = true;
1116 
1117  wxPoint pos = event.GetPosition();
1118  MouseEvent(event);
1119 }
1120 
1121 void ChartCanvas::OnMotion(wxMouseEvent &event) {
1122  /* This is a workaround, to the fact that on touchscreen, OnMotion comes with
1123  dragging, upon simple click, and without the OnLeftDown event before Thus,
1124  this consists in skiping it, and setting the leftdown bit according to a
1125  status that we trust */
1126  event.m_leftDown = m_leftdown;
1127  MouseEvent(event);
1128 }
1129 
1130 void ChartCanvas::OnZoom(wxZoomGestureEvent &event) {
1131  /* there are spurious end zoom events upon right-click */
1132  if (event.IsGestureEnd()) return;
1133 
1134  double factor = event.GetZoomFactor();
1135 
1136  if (event.IsGestureStart() || m_oldVPSScale < 0) {
1137  m_oldVPSScale = GetVPScale();
1138  }
1139 
1140  double current_vps = GetVPScale();
1141  double wanted_factor = m_oldVPSScale / current_vps * factor;
1142 
1143  ZoomCanvas(wanted_factor, true, false);
1144 
1145  // Allow combined zoom/pan operation
1146  if (event.IsGestureStart()) {
1147  m_zoomStartPoint = event.GetPosition();
1148  } else {
1149  wxPoint delta = event.GetPosition() - m_zoomStartPoint;
1150  PanCanvas(-delta.x, -delta.y);
1151  m_zoomStartPoint = event.GetPosition();
1152  }
1153 }
1154 
1155 void ChartCanvas::OnWheel(wxMouseEvent &event) { MouseEvent(event); }
1156 
1157 void ChartCanvas::OnDoubleLeftClick(wxMouseEvent &event) {
1158  DoRotateCanvas(0.0);
1159 }
1160 #endif /* HAVE_WX_GESTURE_EVENTS */
1161 
1162 void ChartCanvas::ApplyCanvasConfig(canvasConfig *pcc) {
1163  SetViewPoint(pcc->iLat, pcc->iLon, pcc->iScale, 0., pcc->iRotation);
1164  m_vLat = pcc->iLat;
1165  m_vLon = pcc->iLon;
1166 
1167  m_restore_dbindex = pcc->DBindex;
1168  m_bFollow = pcc->bFollow;
1169  if (pcc->GroupID < 0) pcc->GroupID = 0;
1170 
1171  if (pcc->GroupID > (int)g_pGroupArray->GetCount())
1172  m_groupIndex = 0;
1173  else
1174  m_groupIndex = pcc->GroupID;
1175 
1176  if (pcc->bQuilt != GetQuiltMode()) ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
1177 
1178  ShowTides(pcc->bShowTides);
1179  ShowCurrents(pcc->bShowCurrents);
1180 
1181  SetShowDepthUnits(pcc->bShowDepthUnits);
1182  SetShowGrid(pcc->bShowGrid);
1183  SetShowOutlines(pcc->bShowOutlines);
1184 
1185  SetShowAIS(pcc->bShowAIS);
1186  SetAttenAIS(pcc->bAttenAIS);
1187 
1188  // ENC options
1189  SetShowENCText(pcc->bShowENCText);
1190  m_encDisplayCategory = pcc->nENCDisplayCategory;
1191  m_encShowDepth = pcc->bShowENCDepths;
1192  m_encShowLightDesc = pcc->bShowENCLightDescriptions;
1193  m_encShowBuoyLabels = pcc->bShowENCBuoyLabels;
1194  m_encShowLights = pcc->bShowENCLights;
1195  m_bShowVisibleSectors = pcc->bShowENCVisibleSectorLights;
1196  m_encShowAnchor = pcc->bShowENCAnchorInfo;
1197  m_encShowDataQual = pcc->bShowENCDataQuality;
1198 
1199  bool courseUp = pcc->bCourseUp;
1200  bool headUp = pcc->bHeadUp;
1201  m_upMode = NORTH_UP_MODE;
1202  if (courseUp)
1203  m_upMode = COURSE_UP_MODE;
1204  else if (headUp)
1205  m_upMode = HEAD_UP_MODE;
1206 
1207  m_bLookAhead = pcc->bLookahead;
1208 
1209  m_singleChart = NULL;
1210 }
1211 
1212 void ChartCanvas::ApplyGlobalSettings() {
1213  // GPS compas window
1214  m_bShowCompassWin = g_bShowCompassWin;
1215  if (m_Compass) {
1216  m_Compass->Show(m_bShowCompassWin);
1217  if (m_bShowCompassWin) m_Compass->UpdateStatus();
1218  }
1219 }
1220 
1221 void ChartCanvas::CheckGroupValid(bool showMessage, bool switchGroup0) {
1222  bool groupOK = CheckGroup(m_groupIndex);
1223 
1224  if (!groupOK) {
1225  SetGroupIndex(m_groupIndex, true);
1226  }
1227 }
1228 
1229 void ChartCanvas::SetShowGPS(bool bshow) {
1230  if (m_bShowGPS != bshow) {
1231  delete m_Compass;
1232  m_Compass = new ocpnCompass(this, bshow);
1233  m_Compass->SetScaleFactor(g_compass_scalefactor);
1234  m_Compass->Show(m_bShowCompassWin);
1235  }
1236  m_bShowGPS = bshow;
1237 }
1238 
1239 void ChartCanvas::SetShowGPSCompassWindow(bool bshow) {
1240  if (m_Compass) {
1241  m_Compass->Show(m_bShowCompassWin);
1242  if (m_bShowCompassWin) m_Compass->UpdateStatus();
1243  }
1244 }
1245 
1246 void ChartCanvas::SetToolbarEnable(bool bShow) {
1247  return;
1248 
1249  // if(GetToolbarEnable() != bShow)
1250  {
1251  m_bToolbarEnable = bShow;
1252  // if(!m_toolBar)
1253  // RequestNewCanvasToolbar( true );
1254  if (GetToolbar()) GetToolbar()->Show(bShow);
1255  }
1256 }
1257 
1258 int ChartCanvas::GetPianoHeight() {
1259  int height = 0;
1260  if (g_bShowChartBar && GetPiano()) height = m_Piano->GetHeight();
1261 
1262  return height;
1263 }
1264 
1265 void ChartCanvas::ConfigureChartBar() {
1266  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
1267 
1268  m_Piano->SetVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("viz"))));
1269  m_Piano->SetInVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("redX"))));
1270 
1271  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
1272  m_Piano->SetRoundedRectangles(true);
1273  }
1274  m_Piano->SetTMercIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("tmercprj"))));
1275  m_Piano->SetPolyIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("polyprj"))));
1276  m_Piano->SetSkewIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("skewprj"))));
1277 }
1278 
1279 void ChartCanvas::ShowTides(bool bShow) {
1280  gFrame->LoadHarmonics();
1281 
1282  if (ptcmgr->IsReady()) {
1283  SetbShowTide(bShow);
1284  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_TIDE, bShow);
1285  wxString tip = _("Show Tides");
1286  if (bShow) tip = _("Hide Tides");
1287  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->SetToolShortHelp(ID_TIDE, tip);
1288 
1289  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_SHOW_TIDES, bShow);
1290  } else {
1291  wxLogMessage(_T("Chart1::Event...TCMgr Not Available"));
1292  SetbShowTide(false);
1293  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_TIDE, false);
1294  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_SHOW_TIDES, false);
1295  }
1296 
1297  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
1298  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
1299 
1300  // TODO
1301  // if( GetbShowTide() ) {
1302  // FrameTCTimer.Start( TIMER_TC_VALUE_SECONDS * 1000,
1303  // wxTIMER_CONTINUOUS ); SetbTCUpdate( true ); // force immediate
1304  // update
1305  // } else
1306  // FrameTCTimer.Stop();
1307 }
1308 
1309 void ChartCanvas::ShowCurrents(bool bShow) {
1310  gFrame->LoadHarmonics();
1311 
1312  if (ptcmgr->IsReady()) {
1313  SetbShowCurrent(bShow);
1314  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_CURRENT, bShow);
1315  wxString tip = _("Show Currents");
1316  if (bShow) tip = _("Hide Currents");
1317  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->SetToolShortHelp(ID_CURRENT, tip);
1318 
1319  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_SHOW_CURRENTS, bShow);
1320  } else {
1321  wxLogMessage(_T("Chart1::Event...TCMgr Not Available"));
1322  SetbShowCurrent(false);
1323  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_CURRENT, false);
1324  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_SHOW_CURRENTS, false);
1325  }
1326 
1327  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
1328  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
1329 
1330  // TODO
1331  // if( GetbShowCurrent() ) {
1332  // FrameTCTimer.Start( TIMER_TC_VALUE_SECONDS * 1000,
1333  // wxTIMER_CONTINUOUS ); SetbTCUpdate( true ); // force immediate
1334  // update
1335  // } else
1336  // FrameTCTimer.Stop();
1337 }
1338 
1339 // TODO
1340 extern bool g_bPreserveScaleOnX;
1341 extern ChartDummy *pDummyChart;
1342 extern int g_sticky_chart;
1343 
1344 void ChartCanvas::canvasRefreshGroupIndex(void) { SetGroupIndex(m_groupIndex); }
1345 
1346 void ChartCanvas::SetGroupIndex(int index, bool autoSwitch) {
1347  SetAlertString(_T(""));
1348 
1349  int new_index = index;
1350  if (index > (int)g_pGroupArray->GetCount()) new_index = 0;
1351 
1352  bool bgroup_override = false;
1353  int old_group_index = new_index;
1354 
1355  if (!CheckGroup(new_index)) {
1356  new_index = 0;
1357  bgroup_override = true;
1358  }
1359 
1360  if (!autoSwitch && (index <= (int)g_pGroupArray->GetCount()))
1361  new_index = index;
1362 
1363  // Get the currently displayed chart native scale, and the current ViewPort
1364  int current_chart_native_scale = GetCanvasChartNativeScale();
1365  ViewPort vp = GetVP();
1366 
1367  m_groupIndex = new_index;
1368 
1369  // Are there ENCs in this group
1370  if (ChartData) m_bENCGroup = ChartData->IsENCInGroup(m_groupIndex);
1371 
1372  // Update the MUIBar for ENC availability
1373  if (m_muiBar) m_muiBar->SetCanvasENCAvailable(m_bENCGroup);
1374 
1375  // Allow the chart database to pre-calculate the MBTile inclusion test
1376  // boolean...
1377  ChartData->CheckExclusiveTileGroup(m_canvasIndex);
1378 
1379  // Invalidate the "sticky" chart on group change, since it might not be in
1380  // the new group
1381  g_sticky_chart = -1;
1382 
1383  // We need a chartstack and quilt to figure out which chart to open in the
1384  // new group
1385  UpdateCanvasOnGroupChange();
1386 
1387  int dbi_now = -1;
1388  if (GetQuiltMode()) dbi_now = GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex();
1389 
1390  int dbi_hint = FindClosestCanvasChartdbIndex(current_chart_native_scale);
1391 
1392  // If a new reference chart is indicated, set a good scale for it.
1393  if ((dbi_now != dbi_hint) || !GetQuiltMode()) {
1394  double best_scale = GetBestStartScale(dbi_hint, vp);
1395  SetVPScale(best_scale);
1396  }
1397 
1398  if (GetQuiltMode()) dbi_hint = GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex();
1399 
1400  // Refresh the canvas, selecting the "best" chart,
1401  // applying the prior ViewPort exactly
1402  canvasChartsRefresh(dbi_hint);
1403 
1404  if (!autoSwitch && bgroup_override) {
1405  // show a short timed message box
1406  wxString msg(_("Group \""));
1407 
1408  ChartGroup *pGroup = g_pGroupArray->Item(new_index - 1);
1409  msg += pGroup->m_group_name;
1410 
1411  msg += _("\" is empty.");
1412 
1413  OCPNMessageBox(this, msg, _("OpenCPN Group Notice"), wxICON_INFORMATION, 2);
1414 
1415  return;
1416  }
1417 
1418  // Message box is deferred so that canvas refresh occurs properly before
1419  // dialog
1420  if (bgroup_override) {
1421  wxString msg(_("Group \""));
1422 
1423  ChartGroup *pGroup = g_pGroupArray->Item(old_group_index - 1);
1424  msg += pGroup->m_group_name;
1425 
1426  msg += _("\" is empty, switching to \"All Active Charts\" group.");
1427 
1428  OCPNMessageBox(this, msg, _("OpenCPN Group Notice"), wxOK, 5);
1429  }
1430 }
1431 
1432 bool ChartCanvas::CheckGroup(int igroup) {
1433  if (!ChartData) return true; // Not known yet...
1434 
1435  if (igroup == 0) return true; // "all charts" is always OK
1436 
1437  if (igroup < 0) // negative group is an error
1438  return false;
1439 
1440  ChartGroup *pGroup = g_pGroupArray->Item(igroup - 1);
1441 
1442  if (pGroup->m_element_array.empty()) // truly empty group prompts a warning,
1443  // and auto-shift to group 0
1444  return false;
1445 
1446  for (const auto &elem : pGroup->m_element_array) {
1447  for (unsigned int ic = 0;
1448  ic < (unsigned int)ChartData->GetChartTableEntries(); ic++) {
1449  ChartTableEntry *pcte = ChartData->GetpChartTableEntry(ic);
1450  wxString chart_full_path(pcte->GetpFullPath(), wxConvUTF8);
1451 
1452  if (chart_full_path.StartsWith(elem.m_element_name)) return true;
1453  }
1454  }
1455 
1456  // If necessary, check for GSHHS
1457  for (const auto &elem : pGroup->m_element_array) {
1458  const wxString &element_root = elem.m_element_name;
1459  wxString test_string = _T("GSHH");
1460  if (element_root.Upper().Contains(test_string)) return true;
1461  }
1462 
1463  return false;
1464 }
1465 
1466 void ChartCanvas::canvasChartsRefresh(int dbi_hint) {
1467  if (!ChartData) return;
1468 
1469  AbstractPlatform::ShowBusySpinner();
1470 
1471  double old_scale = GetVPScale();
1472  InvalidateQuilt();
1473  SetQuiltRefChart(-1);
1474 
1475  m_singleChart = NULL;
1476 
1477  // delete m_pCurrentStack;
1478  // m_pCurrentStack = NULL;
1479 
1480  // Build a new ChartStack
1481  if (!m_pCurrentStack) {
1482  m_pCurrentStack = new ChartStack;
1483  ChartData->BuildChartStack(m_pCurrentStack, m_vLat, m_vLon, m_groupIndex);
1484  }
1485 
1486  if (-1 != dbi_hint) {
1487  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
1488  GetpCurrentStack()->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(dbi_hint);
1489  SetQuiltRefChart(dbi_hint);
1490  } else {
1491  // Open the saved chart
1492  ChartBase *pTentative_Chart;
1493  pTentative_Chart = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(dbi_hint, FULL_INIT);
1494 
1495  if (pTentative_Chart) {
1496  /* m_singleChart is always NULL here, (set above) should this go before
1497  * that? */
1498  if (m_singleChart) m_singleChart->Deactivate();
1499 
1500  m_singleChart = pTentative_Chart;
1501  m_singleChart->Activate();
1502 
1503  GetpCurrentStack()->CurrentStackEntry = ChartData->GetStackEntry(
1504  GetpCurrentStack(), m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
1505  }
1506  }
1507 
1508  // refresh_Piano();
1509  } else {
1510  // Select reference chart from the stack, as though clicked by user
1511  // Make it the smallest scale chart on the stack
1512  GetpCurrentStack()->CurrentStackEntry = GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry - 1;
1513  int selected_index = GetpCurrentStack()->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex();
1514  SetQuiltRefChart(selected_index);
1515  }
1516 
1517  // Validate the correct single chart, or set the quilt mode as appropriate
1518  SetupCanvasQuiltMode();
1519  if (!GetQuiltMode() && m_singleChart == 0) {
1520  // use a dummy like in DoChartUpdate
1521  if (NULL == pDummyChart) pDummyChart = new ChartDummy;
1522  m_singleChart = pDummyChart;
1523  SetVPScale(old_scale);
1524  }
1525 
1526  ReloadVP();
1527 
1528  UpdateCanvasControlBar();
1529  UpdateGPSCompassStatusBox(true);
1530 
1531  SetCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
1532 
1533  AbstractPlatform::HideBusySpinner();
1534 }
1535 
1536 bool ChartCanvas::DoCanvasUpdate(void) {
1537  double tLat, tLon; // Chart Stack location
1538  double vpLat, vpLon; // ViewPort location
1539 
1540  bool bNewChart = false;
1541  bool bNewView = false;
1542  bool bCanvasChartAutoOpen = true; // debugging
1543 
1544  bool bNewPiano = false;
1545  bool bOpenSpecified;
1546  ChartStack LastStack;
1547  ChartBase *pLast_Ch;
1548 
1549  ChartStack WorkStack;
1550 
1551  if (bDBUpdateInProgress) return false;
1552  if (!ChartData) return false;
1553 
1554  if (ChartData->IsBusy()) return false;
1555 
1556  // Startup case:
1557  // Quilting is enabled, but the last chart seen was not quiltable
1558  // In this case, drop to single chart mode, set persistence flag,
1559  // And open the specified chart
1560  // TODO implement this
1561  // if( m_bFirstAuto && ( g_restore_dbindex >= 0 ) ) {
1562  // if( GetQuiltMode() ) {
1563  // if( !IsChartQuiltableRef( g_restore_dbindex ) ) {
1564  // gFrame->ToggleQuiltMode();
1565  // m_bpersistent_quilt = true;
1566  // m_singleChart = NULL;
1567  // }
1568  // }
1569  // }
1570 
1571  // If in auto-follow mode, use the current glat,glon to build chart
1572  // stack. Otherwise, use vLat, vLon gotten from click on chart canvas, or
1573  // other means
1574 
1575  if (m_bFollow) {
1576  tLat = gLat;
1577  tLon = gLon;
1578 
1579  // Set the ViewPort center based on the OWNSHIP offset
1580  double dx = m_OSoffsetx;
1581  double dy = m_OSoffsety;
1582  double d_east = dx / GetVP().view_scale_ppm;
1583  double d_north = dy / GetVP().view_scale_ppm;
1584 
1585  if (GetUpMode() == NORTH_UP_MODE) {
1586  fromSM(d_east, d_north, gLat, gLon, &vpLat, &vpLon);
1587  } else {
1588  double offset_angle = atan2(d_north, d_east);
1589  double offset_distance = sqrt((d_north * d_north) + (d_east * d_east));
1590  double chart_angle = GetVPRotation();
1591  double target_angle = chart_angle + offset_angle;
1592  double d_east_mod = offset_distance * cos(target_angle);
1593  double d_north_mod = offset_distance * sin(target_angle);
1594  fromSM(d_east_mod, d_north_mod, gLat, gLon, &vpLat, &vpLon);
1595  }
1596 
1597  // on lookahead mode, adjust the vp center point
1598  if (m_bLookAhead && bGPSValid && !m_MouseDragging) {
1599  double angle = g_COGAvg + (GetVPRotation() * 180. / PI);
1600 
1601  double pixel_deltay =
1602  fabs(cos(angle * PI / 180.)) * GetCanvasHeight() / 4;
1603  double pixel_deltax = fabs(sin(angle * PI / 180.)) * GetCanvasWidth() / 4;
1604 
1605  double pixel_delta_tent =
1606  sqrt((pixel_deltay * pixel_deltay) + (pixel_deltax * pixel_deltax));
1607 
1608  double pixel_delta = 0;
1609 
1610  // The idea here is to cancel the effect of LookAhead for slow gSog, to
1611  // avoid jumping of the vp center point during slow maneuvering, or at
1612  // anchor....
1613  if (!std::isnan(gSog)) {
1614  if (gSog < 1.0)
1615  pixel_delta = 0.;
1616  else if (gSog >= 3.0)
1617  pixel_delta = pixel_delta_tent;
1618  else
1619  pixel_delta = pixel_delta_tent * (gSog - 1.0) / 2.0;
1620  }
1621 
1622  double meters_to_shift =
1623  cos(gLat * PI / 180.) * pixel_delta / GetVPScale();
1624 
1625  double dir_to_shift = g_COGAvg;
1626 
1627  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, dir_to_shift, meters_to_shift / 1852., &vpLat,
1628  &vpLon);
1629  } else if (m_bLookAhead && !bGPSValid) {
1630  m_OSoffsetx = 0; // center ownship on loss of GPS
1631  m_OSoffsety = 0;
1632  vpLat = gLat;
1633  vpLon = gLon;
1634  }
1635 
1636  } else {
1637  tLat = m_vLat;
1638  tLon = m_vLon;
1639  vpLat = m_vLat;
1640  vpLon = m_vLon;
1641  }
1642 
1643  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
1644  int current_db_index = -1;
1645  if (m_pCurrentStack)
1646  current_db_index =
1647  m_pCurrentStack
1648  ->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex(); // capture the currently selected Ref
1649  // chart dbIndex
1650  else
1651  m_pCurrentStack = new ChartStack;
1652 
1653  // This logic added to enable opening a chart when there is no
1654  // previous chart indication, either from inital startup, or from adding
1655  // new chart directory
1656  if (m_bautofind && (-1 == GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex()) &&
1657  m_pCurrentStack) {
1658  if (m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) {
1659  int new_dbIndex = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(m_pCurrentStack->nEntry -
1660  1); // smallest scale
1661  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(new_dbIndex, true);
1662  m_bautofind = false;
1663  }
1664  }
1665 
1666  ChartData->BuildChartStack(m_pCurrentStack, tLat, tLon, m_groupIndex);
1667  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(current_db_index);
1668 
1669  if (m_bFirstAuto) {
1670  // Allow the chart database to pre-calculate the MBTile inclusion test
1671  // boolean...
1672  ChartData->CheckExclusiveTileGroup(m_canvasIndex);
1673 
1674  double proposed_scale_onscreen =
1675  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / GetVPScale(); // as set from config load
1676 
1677  int initial_db_index = m_restore_dbindex;
1678  if (initial_db_index < 0) {
1679  if (m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) {
1680  initial_db_index =
1681  m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1);
1682  } else
1683  m_bautofind = true; // initial_db_index = 0;
1684  }
1685 
1686  if (m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) {
1687  int initial_type = ChartData->GetDBChartType(initial_db_index);
1688 
1689  // Check to see if the target new chart is quiltable as a reference
1690  // chart
1691 
1692  if (!IsChartQuiltableRef(initial_db_index)) {
1693  // If it is not quiltable, then walk the stack up looking for a
1694  // satisfactory chart i.e. one that is quiltable and of the same type
1695  // XXX if there's none?
1696  int stack_index = 0;
1697 
1698  if (stack_index >= 0) {
1699  while ((stack_index < m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1)) {
1700  int test_db_index = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(stack_index);
1701  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(test_db_index) &&
1702  (initial_type ==
1703  ChartData->GetDBChartType(initial_db_index))) {
1704  initial_db_index = test_db_index;
1705  break;
1706  }
1707  stack_index++;
1708  }
1709  }
1710  }
1711 
1712  ChartBase *pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(initial_db_index, FULL_INIT);
1713  if (pc) {
1714  SetQuiltRefChart(initial_db_index);
1715  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(initial_db_index);
1716  }
1717 
1718  // Check proposed scale, see how much underzoom results
1719  // Adjust as necessary to prevent slow loading on initial startup
1720  // For MBTILES we skip this test because they are always shown in
1721  // reasonable range of scale
1722  if (pc) {
1723  if (pc->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_MBTILES)
1724  proposed_scale_onscreen =
1725  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen, 4.0 * pc->GetNativeScale());
1726  else
1727  proposed_scale_onscreen =
1728  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen, 32.0 * pc->GetNativeScale());
1729  }
1730  }
1731 
1732  bNewView |= SetViewPoint(vpLat, vpLon,
1733  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen,
1734  0, GetVPRotation());
1735  }
1736  // else
1737  bNewView |= SetViewPoint(vpLat, vpLon, GetVPScale(), 0, GetVPRotation());
1738 
1739  goto update_finish;
1740  }
1741 
1742  // Single Chart Mode from here....
1743  pLast_Ch = m_singleChart;
1744  ChartTypeEnum new_open_type;
1745  ChartFamilyEnum new_open_family;
1746  if (pLast_Ch) {
1747  new_open_type = pLast_Ch->GetChartType();
1748  new_open_family = pLast_Ch->GetChartFamily();
1749  } else {
1750  new_open_type = CHART_TYPE_KAP;
1751  new_open_family = CHART_FAMILY_RASTER;
1752  }
1753 
1754  bOpenSpecified = m_bFirstAuto;
1755 
1756  // Make sure the target stack is valid
1757  if (NULL == m_pCurrentStack) m_pCurrentStack = new ChartStack;
1758 
1759  // Build a chart stack based on tLat, tLon
1760  if (0 == ChartData->BuildChartStack(&WorkStack, tLat, tLon, g_sticky_chart,
1761  m_groupIndex)) { // Bogus Lat, Lon?
1762  if (NULL == pDummyChart) {
1763  pDummyChart = new ChartDummy;
1764  bNewChart = true;
1765  }
1766 
1767  if (m_singleChart)
1768  if (m_singleChart->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_DUMMY) bNewChart = true;
1769 
1770  m_singleChart = pDummyChart;
1771 
1772  // If the current viewpoint is invalid, set the default scale to
1773  // something reasonable.
1774  double set_scale = GetVPScale();
1775  if (!GetVP().IsValid()) set_scale = 1. / 20000.;
1776 
1777  bNewView |= SetViewPoint(tLat, tLon, set_scale, 0, GetVPRotation());
1778 
1779  // If the chart stack has just changed, there is new status
1780  if (WorkStack.nEntry && m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) {
1781  if (!ChartData->EqualStacks(&WorkStack, m_pCurrentStack)) {
1782  bNewPiano = true;
1783  bNewChart = true;
1784  }
1785  }
1786 
1787  // Copy the new (by definition empty) stack into the target stack
1788  ChartData->CopyStack(m_pCurrentStack, &WorkStack);
1789 
1790  goto update_finish;
1791  }
1792 
1793  // Check to see if Chart Stack has changed
1794  if (!ChartData->EqualStacks(&WorkStack, m_pCurrentStack)) {
1795  // New chart stack, so...
1796  bNewPiano = true;
1797 
1798  // Save a copy of the current stack
1799  ChartData->CopyStack(&LastStack, m_pCurrentStack);
1800 
1801  // Copy the new stack into the target stack
1802  ChartData->CopyStack(m_pCurrentStack, &WorkStack);
1803 
1804  // Is Current Chart in new stack?
1805 
1806  int tEntry = -1;
1807  if (NULL != m_singleChart) // this handles startup case
1808  tEntry = ChartData->GetStackEntry(m_pCurrentStack,
1809  m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
1810 
1811  if (tEntry != -1) { // m_singleChart is in the new stack
1812  m_pCurrentStack->CurrentStackEntry = tEntry;
1813  bNewChart = false;
1814  }
1815 
1816  else // m_singleChart is NOT in new stack
1817  { // So, need to open a new chart
1818  // Find the largest scale raster chart that opens OK
1819 
1820  ChartBase *pProposed = NULL;
1821 
1822  if (bCanvasChartAutoOpen) {
1823  bool search_direction =
1824  false; // default is to search from lowest to highest
1825  int start_index = 0;
1826 
1827  // A special case: If panning at high scale, open largest scale
1828  // chart first
1829  if ((LastStack.CurrentStackEntry == LastStack.nEntry - 1) ||
1830  (LastStack.nEntry == 0)) {
1831  search_direction = true;
1832  start_index = m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1;
1833  }
1834 
1835  // Another special case, open specified index on program start
1836  if (bOpenSpecified) {
1837  search_direction = false;
1838  start_index = 0;
1839  if ((start_index < 0) | (start_index >= m_pCurrentStack->nEntry))
1840  start_index = 0;
1841 
1842  new_open_type = CHART_TYPE_DONTCARE;
1843  }
1844 
1845  pProposed = ChartData->OpenStackChartConditional(
1846  m_pCurrentStack, start_index, search_direction, new_open_type,
1847  new_open_family);
1848 
1849  // Try to open other types/families of chart in some priority
1850  if (NULL == pProposed)
1851  pProposed = ChartData->OpenStackChartConditional(
1852  m_pCurrentStack, start_index, search_direction,
1853  CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP, CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR);
1854 
1855  if (NULL == pProposed)
1856  pProposed = ChartData->OpenStackChartConditional(
1857  m_pCurrentStack, start_index, search_direction,
1858  CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP, CHART_FAMILY_RASTER);
1859 
1860  bNewChart = true;
1861 
1862  } // bCanvasChartAutoOpen
1863 
1864  else
1865  pProposed = NULL;
1866 
1867  // If no go, then
1868  // Open a Dummy Chart
1869  if (NULL == pProposed) {
1870  if (NULL == pDummyChart) {
1871  pDummyChart = new ChartDummy;
1872  bNewChart = true;
1873  }
1874 
1875  if (pLast_Ch)
1876  if (pLast_Ch->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_DUMMY) bNewChart = true;
1877 
1878  pProposed = pDummyChart;
1879  }
1880 
1881  // Arriving here, pProposed points to an opened chart, or NULL.
1882  if (m_singleChart) m_singleChart->Deactivate();
1883  m_singleChart = pProposed;
1884 
1885  if (m_singleChart) {
1886  m_singleChart->Activate();
1887  m_pCurrentStack->CurrentStackEntry = ChartData->GetStackEntry(
1888  m_pCurrentStack, m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
1889  }
1890  } // need new chart
1891 
1892  // Arriving here, m_singleChart is opened and OK, or NULL
1893  if (NULL != m_singleChart) {
1894  // Setup the view using the current scale
1895  double set_scale = GetVPScale();
1896 
1897  // If the current viewpoint is invalid, set the default scale to
1898  // something reasonable.
1899  if (!GetVP().IsValid())
1900  set_scale = 1. / 20000.;
1901  else { // otherwise, match scale if elected.
1902  double proposed_scale_onscreen;
1903 
1904  if (m_bFollow) { // autoset the scale only if in autofollow
1905  double new_scale_ppm =
1906  m_singleChart->GetNearestPreferredScalePPM(GetVPScale());
1907  proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / new_scale_ppm;
1908  } else
1909  proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / set_scale;
1910 
1911  // This logic will bring a new chart onscreen at roughly twice the true
1912  // paper scale equivalent. Note that first chart opened on application
1913  // startup (bOpenSpecified = true) will open at the config saved scale
1914  if (bNewChart && !g_bPreserveScaleOnX && !bOpenSpecified) {
1915  proposed_scale_onscreen = m_singleChart->GetNativeScale() / 2;
1916  double equivalent_vp_scale =
1917  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen;
1918  double new_scale_ppm =
1919  m_singleChart->GetNearestPreferredScalePPM(equivalent_vp_scale);
1920  proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / new_scale_ppm;
1921  }
1922 
1923  if (m_bFollow) { // bounds-check the scale only if in autofollow
1924  proposed_scale_onscreen =
1925  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen,
1926  m_singleChart->GetNormalScaleMax(GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
1927  GetCanvasWidth()));
1928  proposed_scale_onscreen =
1929  wxMax(proposed_scale_onscreen,
1930  m_singleChart->GetNormalScaleMin(GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
1931  g_b_overzoom_x));
1932  }
1933 
1934  set_scale = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen;
1935  }
1936 
1937  bNewView |= SetViewPoint(vpLat, vpLon, set_scale,
1938  m_singleChart->GetChartSkew() * PI / 180.,
1939  GetVPRotation());
1940  }
1941  } // new stack
1942 
1943  else // No change in Chart Stack
1944  {
1945  if ((m_bFollow) && m_singleChart)
1946  bNewView |= SetViewPoint(vpLat, vpLon, GetVPScale(),
1947  m_singleChart->GetChartSkew() * PI / 180.,
1948  GetVPRotation());
1949  }
1950 
1951 update_finish:
1952 
1953  // TODO
1954  // if( bNewPiano ) UpdateControlBar();
1955 
1956  // Update the ownship position on thumbnail chart, if shown
1957  if (pthumbwin && pthumbwin->IsShown()) {
1958  if (pthumbwin->pThumbChart) {
1959  if (pthumbwin->pThumbChart->UpdateThumbData(gLat, gLon))
1960  pthumbwin->Refresh(TRUE);
1961  }
1962  }
1963 
1964  m_bFirstAuto = false; // Auto open on program start
1965 
1966  // If we need a Refresh(), do it here...
1967  // But don't duplicate a Refresh() done by SetViewPoint()
1968  if (bNewChart && !bNewView) Refresh(false);
1969 
1970 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
1971  // If a new chart, need to invalidate gl viewport for refresh
1972  // so the fbo gets flushed
1973  if (m_glcc && g_bopengl && bNewChart) GetglCanvas()->Invalidate();
1974 #endif
1975 
1976  return bNewChart | bNewView;
1977 }
1978 
1979 void ChartCanvas::SelectQuiltRefdbChart(int db_index, bool b_autoscale) {
1980  if (m_pCurrentStack) m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(db_index);
1981 
1982  SetQuiltRefChart(db_index);
1983  if (ChartData) {
1984  ChartBase *pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(db_index, FULL_INIT);
1985  if (pc) {
1986  if (b_autoscale) {
1987  double best_scale_ppm = GetBestVPScale(pc);
1988  SetVPScale(best_scale_ppm);
1989  }
1990  } else
1991  SetQuiltRefChart(-1);
1992  } else
1993  SetQuiltRefChart(-1);
1994 }
1995 
1996 void ChartCanvas::SelectQuiltRefChart(int selected_index) {
1997  std::vector<int> piano_chart_index_array =
1998  GetQuiltExtendedStackdbIndexArray();
1999  int current_db_index = piano_chart_index_array[selected_index];
2000 
2001  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(current_db_index);
2002 }
2003 
2004 double ChartCanvas::GetBestVPScale(ChartBase *pchart) {
2005  if (pchart) {
2006  double proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / GetVPScale();
2007 
2008  if ((g_bPreserveScaleOnX) ||
2009  (CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP == pchart->GetChartType())) {
2010  double new_scale_ppm = GetVPScale();
2011  proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / new_scale_ppm;
2012  } else {
2013  // This logic will bring the new chart onscreen at roughly twice the true
2014  // paper scale equivalent.
2015  proposed_scale_onscreen = pchart->GetNativeScale() / 2;
2016  double equivalent_vp_scale =
2017  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen;
2018  double new_scale_ppm =
2019  pchart->GetNearestPreferredScalePPM(equivalent_vp_scale);
2020  proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / new_scale_ppm;
2021  }
2022 
2023  // Do not allow excessive underzoom, even if the g_bPreserveScaleOnX flag is
2024  // set. Otherwise, we get severe performance problems on all platforms
2025 
2026  double max_underzoom_multiplier = 2.0;
2027  if (GetVP().b_quilt) {
2028  double scale_max = m_pQuilt->GetNomScaleMin(pchart->GetNativeScale(),
2029  pchart->GetChartType(),
2030  pchart->GetChartFamily());
2031  max_underzoom_multiplier = scale_max / pchart->GetNativeScale();
2032  }
2033 
2034  proposed_scale_onscreen = wxMin(
2035  proposed_scale_onscreen,
2036  pchart->GetNormalScaleMax(GetCanvasScaleFactor(), GetCanvasWidth()) *
2037  max_underzoom_multiplier);
2038 
2039  // And, do not allow excessive overzoom either
2040  proposed_scale_onscreen =
2041  wxMax(proposed_scale_onscreen,
2042  pchart->GetNormalScaleMin(GetCanvasScaleFactor(), false));
2043 
2044  return GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen;
2045  } else
2046  return 1.0;
2047 }
2048 
2049 void ChartCanvas::SetupCanvasQuiltMode(void) {
2050  if (GetQuiltMode()) // going to quilt mode
2051  {
2052  ChartData->LockCache();
2053 
2054  m_Piano->SetNoshowIndexArray(m_quilt_noshow_index_array);
2055 
2056  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
2057 
2058  m_Piano->SetVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("viz"))));
2059  m_Piano->SetInVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("redX"))));
2060  m_Piano->SetTMercIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("tmercprj"))));
2061  m_Piano->SetSkewIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("skewprj"))));
2062 
2063  m_Piano->SetRoundedRectangles(true);
2064 
2065  // Select the proper Ref chart
2066  int target_new_dbindex = -1;
2067  if (m_pCurrentStack) {
2068  target_new_dbindex =
2069  GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex(); // m_pCurrentStack->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex();
2070 
2071  if (-1 != target_new_dbindex) {
2072  if (!IsChartQuiltableRef(target_new_dbindex)) {
2073  int proj = ChartData->GetDBChartProj(target_new_dbindex);
2074  int type = ChartData->GetDBChartType(target_new_dbindex);
2075 
2076  // walk the stack up looking for a satisfactory chart
2077  int stack_index = m_pCurrentStack->CurrentStackEntry;
2078 
2079  while ((stack_index < m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1) &&
2080  (stack_index >= 0)) {
2081  int proj_tent = ChartData->GetDBChartProj(
2082  m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(stack_index));
2083  int type_tent = ChartData->GetDBChartType(
2084  m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(stack_index));
2085 
2086  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(stack_index))) {
2087  if ((proj == proj_tent) && (type_tent == type)) {
2088  target_new_dbindex = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(stack_index);
2089  break;
2090  }
2091  }
2092  stack_index++;
2093  }
2094  }
2095  }
2096  }
2097 
2098  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(target_new_dbindex))
2099  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(target_new_dbindex,
2100  false); // Try not to allow a scale change
2101  else
2102  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(-1, false);
2103 
2104  m_singleChart = NULL; // Bye....
2105 
2106  // Re-qualify the quilt reference chart selection
2107  AdjustQuiltRefChart();
2108 
2109  // Restore projection type saved on last quilt mode toggle
2110  // TODO
2111  // if(g_sticky_projection != -1)
2112  // GetVP().SetProjectionType(g_sticky_projection);
2113  // else
2114  // GetVP().SetProjectionType(PROJECTION_MERCATOR);
2115  GetVP().SetProjectionType(PROJECTION_UNKNOWN);
2116 
2117  } else // going to SC Mode
2118  {
2119  std::vector<int> empty_array;
2120  m_Piano->SetActiveKeyArray(empty_array);
2121  m_Piano->SetNoshowIndexArray(empty_array);
2122  m_Piano->SetEclipsedIndexArray(empty_array);
2123 
2124  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
2125  m_Piano->SetVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("viz"))));
2126  m_Piano->SetInVizIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("redX"))));
2127  m_Piano->SetTMercIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("tmercprj"))));
2128  m_Piano->SetSkewIcon(new wxBitmap(style->GetIcon(_T("skewprj"))));
2129 
2130  m_Piano->SetRoundedRectangles(false);
2131  // TODO Make this a member g_sticky_projection = GetVP().m_projection_type;
2132  }
2133 
2134  // When shifting from quilt to single chart mode, select the "best" single
2135  // chart to show
2136  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
2137  if (ChartData && ChartData->IsValid()) {
2138  UnlockQuilt();
2139 
2140  double tLat, tLon;
2141  if (m_bFollow == true) {
2142  tLat = gLat;
2143  tLon = gLon;
2144  } else {
2145  tLat = m_vLat;
2146  tLon = m_vLon;
2147  }
2148 
2149  if (!m_singleChart) {
2150  // Build a temporary chart stack based on tLat, tLon
2151  ChartStack TempStack;
2152  ChartData->BuildChartStack(&TempStack, tLat, tLon, g_sticky_chart,
2153  m_groupIndex);
2154 
2155  // Iterate over the quilt charts actually shown, looking for the
2156  // largest scale chart that will be in the new chartstack.... This
2157  // will (almost?) always be the reference chart....
2158 
2159  ChartBase *Candidate_Chart = NULL;
2160  int cur_max_scale = (int)1e8;
2161 
2162  ChartBase *pChart = GetFirstQuiltChart();
2163  while (pChart) {
2164  // Is this pChart in new stack?
2165  int tEntry =
2166  ChartData->GetStackEntry(&TempStack, pChart->GetFullPath());
2167  if (tEntry != -1) {
2168  if (pChart->GetNativeScale() < cur_max_scale) {
2169  Candidate_Chart = pChart;
2170  cur_max_scale = pChart->GetNativeScale();
2171  }
2172  }
2173  pChart = GetNextQuiltChart();
2174  }
2175 
2176  m_singleChart = Candidate_Chart;
2177 
2178  // If the quilt is empty, there is no "best" chart.
2179  // So, open the smallest scale chart in the current stack
2180  if (NULL == m_singleChart) {
2181  m_singleChart = ChartData->OpenStackChartConditional(
2182  &TempStack, TempStack.nEntry - 1, true, CHART_TYPE_DONTCARE,
2183  CHART_FAMILY_DONTCARE);
2184  }
2185  }
2186 
2187  // Invalidate all the charts in the quilt,
2188  // as any cached data may be region based and not have fullscreen coverage
2189  InvalidateAllQuiltPatchs();
2190 
2191  if (m_singleChart) {
2192  int dbi = ChartData->FinddbIndex(m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
2193  std::vector<int> one_array;
2194  one_array.push_back(dbi);
2195  m_Piano->SetActiveKeyArray(one_array);
2196  }
2197 
2198  if (m_singleChart) {
2199  GetVP().SetProjectionType(m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType());
2200  }
2201  }
2202  // Invalidate the current stack so that it will be rebuilt on next tick
2203  if (m_pCurrentStack) m_pCurrentStack->b_valid = false;
2204  }
2205 }
2206 
2207 bool ChartCanvas::IsTempMenuBarEnabled() {
2208 #ifdef __WXMSW__
2209  int major;
2210  wxGetOsVersion(&major);
2211  return (major >
2212  5); // For Windows, function is only available on Vista and above
2213 #else
2214  return true;
2215 #endif
2216 }
2217 
2218 double ChartCanvas::GetCanvasRangeMeters() {
2219  int width, height;
2220  GetSize(&width, &height);
2221  int minDimension = wxMin(width, height);
2222 
2223  double range = (minDimension / GetVP().view_scale_ppm) / 2;
2224  range *= cos(GetVP().clat * PI / 180.);
2225  return range;
2226 }
2227 
2228 void ChartCanvas::SetCanvasRangeMeters(double range) {
2229  int width, height;
2230  GetSize(&width, &height);
2231  int minDimension = wxMin(width, height);
2232 
2233  double scale_ppm = minDimension / (range / cos(GetVP().clat * PI / 180.));
2234  SetVPScale(scale_ppm / 2);
2235 }
2236 
2237 bool ChartCanvas::SetUserOwnship() {
2238  // Look for user defined ownship image
2239  // This may be found in the shared data location along with other user
2240  // defined icons. and will be called "ownship.xpm" or "ownship.png"
2241  if (pWayPointMan && pWayPointMan->DoesIconExist(_T("ownship"))) {
2242  double factor_dusk = 0.5;
2243  double factor_night = 0.25;
2244 
2245  wxBitmap *pbmp = pWayPointMan->GetIconBitmap(_T("ownship"));
2246  m_pos_image_user_day = new wxImage;
2247  *m_pos_image_user_day = pbmp->ConvertToImage();
2248  if (!m_pos_image_user_day->HasAlpha()) m_pos_image_user_day->InitAlpha();
2249 
2250  int gimg_width = m_pos_image_user_day->GetWidth();
2251  int gimg_height = m_pos_image_user_day->GetHeight();
2252 
2253  // Make dusk and night images
2254  m_pos_image_user_dusk = new wxImage;
2255  m_pos_image_user_night = new wxImage;
2256 
2257  *m_pos_image_user_dusk = m_pos_image_user_day->Copy();
2258  *m_pos_image_user_night = m_pos_image_user_day->Copy();
2259 
2260  for (int iy = 0; iy < gimg_height; iy++) {
2261  for (int ix = 0; ix < gimg_width; ix++) {
2262  if (!m_pos_image_user_day->IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
2263  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_pos_image_user_day->GetRed(ix, iy),
2264  m_pos_image_user_day->GetGreen(ix, iy),
2265  m_pos_image_user_day->GetBlue(ix, iy));
2266  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2267  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
2268  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2269  m_pos_image_user_dusk->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green,
2270  nrgb.blue);
2271 
2272  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2273  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
2274  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2275  m_pos_image_user_night->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green,
2276  nrgb.blue);
2277  }
2278  }
2279  }
2280 
2281  // Make some alternate greyed out day/dusk/night images
2282  m_pos_image_user_grey_day = new wxImage;
2283  *m_pos_image_user_grey_day = m_pos_image_user_day->ConvertToGreyscale();
2284 
2285  m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk = new wxImage;
2286  m_pos_image_user_grey_night = new wxImage;
2287 
2288  *m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk = m_pos_image_user_grey_day->Copy();
2289  *m_pos_image_user_grey_night = m_pos_image_user_grey_day->Copy();
2290 
2291  for (int iy = 0; iy < gimg_height; iy++) {
2292  for (int ix = 0; ix < gimg_width; ix++) {
2293  if (!m_pos_image_user_grey_day->IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
2294  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetRed(ix, iy),
2295  m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetGreen(ix, iy),
2296  m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetBlue(ix, iy));
2297  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2298  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
2299  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2300  m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green,
2301  nrgb.blue);
2302 
2303  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2304  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
2305  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2306  m_pos_image_user_grey_night->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green,
2307  nrgb.blue);
2308  }
2309  }
2310  }
2311 
2312  // Make a yellow image for rendering under low accuracy chart conditions
2313  m_pos_image_user_yellow_day = new wxImage;
2314  m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk = new wxImage;
2315  m_pos_image_user_yellow_night = new wxImage;
2316 
2317  *m_pos_image_user_yellow_day = m_pos_image_user_grey_day->Copy();
2318  *m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk = m_pos_image_user_grey_day->Copy();
2319  *m_pos_image_user_yellow_night = m_pos_image_user_grey_day->Copy();
2320 
2321  for (int iy = 0; iy < gimg_height; iy++) {
2322  for (int ix = 0; ix < gimg_width; ix++) {
2323  if (!m_pos_image_user_grey_day->IsTransparent(ix, iy)) {
2324  wxImage::RGBValue rgb(m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetRed(ix, iy),
2325  m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetGreen(ix, iy),
2326  m_pos_image_user_grey_day->GetBlue(ix, iy));
2327 
2328  // Simply remove all "blue" from the greyscaled image...
2329  // so, what is not black becomes yellow.
2330  wxImage::HSVValue hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2331  wxImage::RGBValue nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2332  m_pos_image_user_yellow_day->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, 0);
2333 
2334  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2335  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_dusk;
2336  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2337  m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green, 0);
2338 
2339  hsv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(rgb);
2340  hsv.value = hsv.value * factor_night;
2341  nrgb = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hsv);
2342  m_pos_image_user_yellow_night->SetRGB(ix, iy, nrgb.red, nrgb.green,
2343  0);
2344  }
2345  }
2346  }
2347 
2348  return true;
2349  } else
2350  return false;
2351 }
2352 
2353 void ChartCanvas::SetDisplaySizeMM(double size) {
2354  m_display_size_mm = size;
2355 
2356  // int sx, sy;
2357  // wxDisplaySize( &sx, &sy );
2358 
2359  // Calculate pixels per mm for later reference
2360  wxSize sd = g_Platform->getDisplaySize();
2361  double horizontal = sd.x;
2362  // Set DPI (Win) scale factor
2363  g_scaler = g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
2364 
2365  m_pix_per_mm = (horizontal) / ((double)m_display_size_mm);
2366  m_canvas_scale_factor = (horizontal) / (m_display_size_mm / 1000.);
2367 
2368  if (ps52plib) ps52plib->SetPPMM(m_pix_per_mm);
2369 
2370  wxString msg;
2371  msg.Printf(
2372  _T("Metrics: m_display_size_mm: %g g_Platform->getDisplaySize(): ")
2373  _T("%d:%d "),
2374  m_display_size_mm, sd.x, sd.y);
2375  wxLogMessage(msg);
2376 
2377  int ssx, ssy;
2378  ::wxDisplaySize(&ssx, &ssy);
2379  msg.Printf(_T("wxDisplaySize(): %d %d"), ssx, ssy);
2380  wxLogMessage(msg);
2381 
2382  m_focus_indicator_pix = /*std::round*/ wxRound(1 * GetPixPerMM());
2383 }
2384 #if 0
2385 void ChartCanvas::OnEvtCompressProgress( OCPN_CompressProgressEvent & event )
2386 {
2387  wxString msg(event.m_string.c_str(), wxConvUTF8);
2388  // if cpus are removed between runs
2389  if(pprog_threads > 0 && compress_msg_array.GetCount() > (unsigned int)pprog_threads) {
2390  compress_msg_array.RemoveAt(pprog_threads, compress_msg_array.GetCount() - pprog_threads);
2391  }
2392 
2393  if(compress_msg_array.GetCount() > (unsigned int)event.thread )
2394  {
2395  compress_msg_array.RemoveAt(event.thread);
2396  compress_msg_array.Insert( msg, event.thread);
2397  }
2398  else
2399  compress_msg_array.Add(msg);
2400 
2401 
2402  wxString combined_msg;
2403  for(unsigned int i=0 ; i < compress_msg_array.GetCount() ; i++) {
2404  combined_msg += compress_msg_array[i];
2405  combined_msg += _T("\n");
2406  }
2407 
2408  bool skip = false;
2409  pprog->Update(pprog_count, combined_msg, &skip );
2410  pprog->SetSize(pprog_size);
2411  if(skip)
2412  b_skipout = skip;
2413 }
2414 #endif
2415 void ChartCanvas::InvalidateGL() {
2416  if (!m_glcc) return;
2417 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
2418  if (g_bopengl) m_glcc->Invalidate();
2419 #endif
2420  if (m_Compass) m_Compass->UpdateStatus(true);
2421 }
2422 
2423 int ChartCanvas::GetCanvasChartNativeScale() {
2424  int ret = 1;
2425  if (!VPoint.b_quilt) {
2426  if (m_singleChart) ret = m_singleChart->GetNativeScale();
2427  } else
2428  ret = (int)m_pQuilt->GetRefNativeScale();
2429 
2430  return ret;
2431 }
2432 
2433 ChartBase *ChartCanvas::GetChartAtCursor() {
2434  ChartBase *target_chart;
2435  if (m_singleChart && (m_singleChart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR))
2436  target_chart = m_singleChart;
2437  else if (VPoint.b_quilt)
2438  target_chart = m_pQuilt->GetChartAtPix(VPoint, wxPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y));
2439  else
2440  target_chart = NULL;
2441  return target_chart;
2442 }
2443 
2444 ChartBase *ChartCanvas::GetOverlayChartAtCursor() {
2445  ChartBase *target_chart;
2446  if (VPoint.b_quilt)
2447  target_chart =
2448  m_pQuilt->GetOverlayChartAtPix(VPoint, wxPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y));
2449  else
2450  target_chart = NULL;
2451  return target_chart;
2452 }
2453 
2454 int ChartCanvas::FindClosestCanvasChartdbIndex(int scale) {
2455  int new_dbIndex = -1;
2456  if (!VPoint.b_quilt) {
2457  if (m_pCurrentStack) {
2458  for (int i = 0; i < m_pCurrentStack->nEntry; i++) {
2459  int sc = ChartData->GetStackChartScale(m_pCurrentStack, i, NULL, 0);
2460  if (sc >= scale) {
2461  new_dbIndex = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(i);
2462  break;
2463  }
2464  }
2465  }
2466  } else {
2467  // Using the current quilt, select a useable reference chart
2468  // Said chart will be in the extended (possibly full-screen) stack,
2469  // And will have a scale equal to or just greater than the stipulated
2470  // value
2471  unsigned int im = m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray().size();
2472  if (im > 0) {
2473  for (unsigned int is = 0; is < im; is++) {
2474  const ChartTableEntry &m = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(
2475  m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray()[is]);
2476  if ((m.Scale_ge(
2477  scale)) /* && (m_reference_family == m.GetChartFamily())*/) {
2478  new_dbIndex = m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray()[is];
2479  break;
2480  }
2481  }
2482  }
2483  }
2484 
2485  return new_dbIndex;
2486 }
2487 
2488 void ChartCanvas::EnablePaint(bool b_enable) {
2489  m_b_paint_enable = b_enable;
2490 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
2491  if (m_glcc) m_glcc->EnablePaint(b_enable);
2492 #endif
2493 }
2494

2496 
2497 void ChartCanvas::UnlockQuilt() { m_pQuilt->UnlockQuilt(); }
2498 
2499 std::vector<int> ChartCanvas::GetQuiltIndexArray(void) {
2500  return m_pQuilt->GetQuiltIndexArray();
2501  ;
2502 }

2506  VPoint.b_FullScreenQuilt = g_bFullScreenQuilt;
2507 }

2561 
2562 bool ChartCanvas::IsChartLargeEnoughToRender(ChartBase *chart, ViewPort &vp) {
2563  double chartMaxScale =
2564  chart->GetNormalScaleMax(GetCanvasScaleFactor(), GetCanvasWidth());
2565  return (chartMaxScale * g_ChartNotRenderScaleFactor > vp.chart_scale);
2566 }
2567 
2568 void ChartCanvas::StartMeasureRoute() {
2569  if (!m_routeState) { // no measure tool if currently creating route
2570  if (m_bMeasure_Active) {
2571  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(m_pMeasureRoute,
2572  NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
2573  m_pMeasureRoute = NULL;
2574  }
2575 
2576  m_bMeasure_Active = true;
2577  m_nMeasureState = 1;
2578  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
2579 
2580  SetCursor(*pCursorPencil);
2581  Refresh();
2582  }
2583 }
2584 
2585 void ChartCanvas::CancelMeasureRoute() {
2586  m_bMeasure_Active = false;
2587  m_nMeasureState = 0;
2588  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
2589 
2590  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(m_pMeasureRoute, NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
2591  m_pMeasureRoute = NULL;
2592 
2593  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
2594 }
2595 
2596 ViewPort &ChartCanvas::GetVP() { return VPoint; }
2597 
2598 void ChartCanvas::SetVP(ViewPort &vp) { VPoint = vp; }
2599 
2600 // void ChartCanvas::SetFocus()
2601 // {
2602 // printf("set %d\n", m_canvasIndex);
2603 // //wxWindow:SetFocus();
2604 // }
2605 
2606 void ChartCanvas::TriggerDeferredFocus() {
2607  //#if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXOSX__)
2608 
2609  m_deferredFocusTimer.Start(20, true);
2610 
2611 #if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXOSX__)
2612  gFrame->Raise();
2613 #endif
2614 
2615  // gFrame->Raise();
2616  //#else
2617  // SetFocus();
2618  // Refresh(true);
2619  //#endif
2620 }
2621 
2622 void ChartCanvas::OnDeferredFocusTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
2623  SetFocus();
2624  Refresh(true);
2625 }
2626 
2627 void ChartCanvas::OnKeyChar(wxKeyEvent &event) {
2628  if (g_pi_manager)
2629  if (g_pi_manager->SendKeyEventToPlugins(event))
2630  return; // PlugIn did something, and does not want the canvas to do
2631  // anything else
2632 
2633  int key_char = event.GetKeyCode();
2634 
2635  if (g_benable_rotate) {
2636  switch (key_char) {
2637  case ']':
2638  RotateCanvas(1);
2639  Refresh();
2640  break;
2641 
2642  case '[':
2643  RotateCanvas(-1);
2644  Refresh();
2645  break;
2646 
2647  case '\\':
2648  DoRotateCanvas(0);
2649  break;
2650  }
2651  }
2652 
2653  event.Skip();
2654 }
2655 
2656 void ChartCanvas::OnKeyDown(wxKeyEvent &event) {
2657  if (g_pi_manager)
2658  if (g_pi_manager->SendKeyEventToPlugins(event))
2659  return; // PlugIn did something, and does not want the canvas to do
2660  // anything else
2661 
2662  bool b_handled = false;
2663 
2664  m_modkeys = event.GetModifiers();
2665 
2666  int panspeed = m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT ? 1 : 100;
2667 
2668 #ifdef OCPN_ALT_MENUBAR
2669 #ifndef __WXOSX__
2670  // If the permanent menubar is disabled, we show it temporarily when Alt is
2671  // pressed or when Alt + a letter is presssed (for the top-menu-level
2672  // hotkeys). The toggling normally takes place in OnKeyUp, but here we handle
2673  // some special cases.
2674  if (IsTempMenuBarEnabled() && event.AltDown() && !g_bShowMenuBar) {
2675  // If Alt + a letter is pressed, and the menubar is hidden, show it now
2676  if (event.GetKeyCode() >= 'A' && event.GetKeyCode() <= 'Z') {
2677  if (!g_bTempShowMenuBar) {
2678  g_bTempShowMenuBar = true;
2679  parent_frame->ApplyGlobalSettings(false);
2680  }
2681  m_bMayToggleMenuBar = false; // don't hide it again when we release Alt
2682  event.Skip();
2683  return;
2684  }
2685  // If another key is pressed while Alt is down, do NOT toggle the menus when
2686  // Alt is released
2687  if (event.GetKeyCode() != WXK_ALT) {
2688  m_bMayToggleMenuBar = false;
2689  }
2690  }
2691 #endif
2692 #endif
2693 
2694  // HOTKEYS
2695  switch (event.GetKeyCode()) {
2696  case WXK_TAB:
2697  // parent_frame->SwitchKBFocus( this );
2698  break;
2699 
2700  case WXK_MENU:
2701  int x, y;
2702  event.GetPosition(&x, &y);
2703  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
2704  CallPopupMenu(x, y);
2705  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
2706  break;
2707 
2708  case WXK_ALT:
2709  m_modkeys |= wxMOD_ALT;
2710  break;
2711 
2712  case WXK_CONTROL:
2713  m_modkeys |= wxMOD_CONTROL;
2714  break;
2715 
2716  case WXK_LEFT:
2717  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_CONTROL)
2718  parent_frame->DoStackDown(this);
2719  else if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
2720  StartTimedMovement();
2721  m_panx = -1;
2722  } else {
2723  PanCanvas(-panspeed, 0);
2724  }
2725  b_handled = true;
2726  break;
2727 
2728  case WXK_UP:
2729  if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
2730  StartTimedMovement();
2731  m_pany = -1;
2732  } else
2733  PanCanvas(0, -panspeed);
2734  b_handled = true;
2735  break;
2736 
2737  case WXK_RIGHT:
2738  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_CONTROL)
2739  parent_frame->DoStackUp(this);
2740  else if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
2741  StartTimedMovement();
2742  m_panx = 1;
2743  } else
2744  PanCanvas(panspeed, 0);
2745  b_handled = true;
2746 
2747  break;
2748 
2749  case WXK_DOWN:
2750  if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
2751  StartTimedMovement();
2752  m_pany = 1;
2753  } else
2754  PanCanvas(0, panspeed);
2755  b_handled = true;
2756  break;
2757 
2758  case WXK_F2:
2759  TogglebFollow();
2760  break;
2761 
2762  case WXK_F3: {
2763  SetShowENCText(!GetShowENCText());
2764  Refresh(true);
2765  InvalidateGL();
2766  break;
2767  }
2768  case WXK_F4:
2769  if (!m_bMeasure_Active) {
2770  if (event.ShiftDown())
2771  m_bMeasure_DistCircle = true;
2772  else
2773  m_bMeasure_DistCircle = false;
2774 
2775  StartMeasureRoute();
2776  } else {
2777  CancelMeasureRoute();
2778 
2779  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
2780 
2781  SurfaceToolbar();
2782  InvalidateGL();
2783  Refresh(false);
2784  }
2785 
2786  break;
2787 
2788  case WXK_F5:
2789  parent_frame->ToggleColorScheme();
2790  gFrame->Raise();
2791  TriggerDeferredFocus();
2792  break;
2793 
2794  case WXK_F6: {
2795  int mod = m_modkeys & wxMOD_SHIFT;
2796  if (mod != m_brightmod) {
2797  m_brightmod = mod;
2798  m_bbrightdir = !m_bbrightdir;
2799  }
2800 
2801  if (!m_bbrightdir) {
2802  g_nbrightness -= 10;
2803  if (g_nbrightness <= MIN_BRIGHT) {
2804  g_nbrightness = MIN_BRIGHT;
2805  m_bbrightdir = true;
2806  }
2807  } else {
2808  g_nbrightness += 10;
2809  if (g_nbrightness >= MAX_BRIGHT) {
2810  g_nbrightness = MAX_BRIGHT;
2811  m_bbrightdir = false;
2812  }
2813  }
2814 
2815  SetScreenBrightness(g_nbrightness);
2816  ShowBrightnessLevelTimedPopup(g_nbrightness / 10, 1, 10);
2817 
2818  SetFocus(); // just in case the external program steals it....
2819  gFrame->Raise(); // And reactivate the application main
2820 
2821  break;
2822  }
2823 
2824  case WXK_F7:
2825  parent_frame->DoStackDown(this);
2826  break;
2827 
2828  case WXK_F8:
2829  parent_frame->DoStackUp(this);
2830  break;
2831 
2832 #ifndef __WXOSX__
2833  case WXK_F9:
2834  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
2835  break;
2836 #endif
2837 
2838  case WXK_F11:
2839  parent_frame->ToggleFullScreen();
2840  b_handled = true;
2841  break;
2842 
2843  case WXK_F12: {
2844  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT)
2845  m_nMeasureState = *(volatile int *)(0); // generate a fault for testing
2846 
2847  ToggleChartOutlines();
2848  break;
2849  }
2850 
2851  case WXK_PAUSE: // Drop MOB
2852  parent_frame->ActivateMOB();
2853  break;
2854 
2855  // NUMERIC PAD
2856  case WXK_NUMPAD_ADD: // '+' on NUM PAD
2857  case WXK_PAGEUP: {
2858  ZoomCanvas(g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2859  break;
2860  }
2861  case WXK_NUMPAD_SUBTRACT: // '-' on NUM PAD
2862  case WXK_PAGEDOWN: {
2863  ZoomCanvas(1.0 / g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2864  break;
2865  }
2866  case WXK_DELETE:
2867  case WXK_BACK:
2868  if (m_bMeasure_Active) {
2869  if (m_nMeasureState > 2) {
2870  m_pMeasureRoute->DeletePoint(m_pMeasureRoute->GetLastPoint());
2871  m_pMeasureRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex =
2872  m_pMeasureRoute->GetnPoints();
2873  m_nMeasureState--;
2874  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
2875  } else {
2876  CancelMeasureRoute();
2877  StartMeasureRoute();
2878  }
2879  }
2880  break;
2881  default:
2882  break;
2883  }
2884 
2885  if (event.GetKeyCode() < 128) // ascii
2886  {
2887  int key_char = event.GetKeyCode();
2888 
2889  // Handle both QWERTY and AZERTY keyboard separately for a few control
2890  // codes
2891  if (!g_b_assume_azerty) {
2892  switch (key_char) {
2893  case '+':
2894  case '=':
2895  ZoomCanvas(g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2896  break;
2897 
2898  case '-':
2899  case '_':
2900  ZoomCanvas(1.0 / g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2901  break;
2902  }
2903 
2904 #ifdef __WXMAC__
2905  if (g_benable_rotate) {
2906  switch (key_char) {
2907  // On other platforms these are handled in OnKeyChar, which
2908  // (apparently) works better in some locales. On OS X it is better
