2909  // to handle them here, since pressing Alt (which should change the
2910  // rotation speed) changes the key char and so prevents the keys
2911  // from working.
2912  case ']':
2913  RotateCanvas(1);
2914  break;
2915 
2916  case '[':
2917  RotateCanvas(-1);
2918  break;
2919 
2920  case '\\':
2921  DoRotateCanvas(0);
2922  break;
2923  }
2924  }
2925 #endif
2926  } else { // AZERTY
2927  switch (key_char) {
2928  case 43:
2929  ZoomCanvas(g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2930  break;
2931 
2932  case 54: // '-' alpha/num pad
2933  // case 56: // '_' alpha/num pad
2934  ZoomCanvas(1.0 / g_plus_minus_zoom_factor, false);
2935  break;
2936  }
2937  }
2938 
2939  if (event.ControlDown()) key_char -= 64;
2940 
2941  if (key_char >= '0' && key_char <= '9')
2942  SetGroupIndex(key_char - '0');
2943  else
2944 
2945  switch (key_char) {
2946  case 'A':
2947  SetShowENCAnchor(!GetShowENCAnchor());
2948  ReloadVP();
2949 
2950  break;
2951 
2952  case 'C':
2953  parent_frame->ToggleColorScheme();
2954  break;
2955 
2956  case 'D': {
2957  int x, y;
2958  event.GetPosition(&x, &y);
2959  ChartTypeEnum ChartType = CHART_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
2960  ChartFamilyEnum ChartFam = CHART_FAMILY_UNKNOWN;
2961  // First find out what kind of chart is being used
2962  if (!pPopupDetailSlider) {
2963  if (VPoint.b_quilt) {
2964  if (m_pQuilt) {
2965  if (m_pQuilt->GetChartAtPix(
2966  VPoint,
2967  wxPoint(
2968  x, y))) // = null if no chart loaded for this point
2969  {
2970  ChartType = m_pQuilt->GetChartAtPix(VPoint, wxPoint(x, y))
2971  ->GetChartType();
2972  ChartFam = m_pQuilt->GetChartAtPix(VPoint, wxPoint(x, y))
2973  ->GetChartFamily();
2974  }
2975  }
2976  } else {
2977  if (m_singleChart) {
2978  ChartType = m_singleChart->GetChartType();
2979  ChartFam = m_singleChart->GetChartFamily();
2980  }
2981  }
2982  // If a charttype is found show the popupslider
2983  if ((ChartType != CHART_TYPE_UNKNOWN) ||
2984  (ChartFam != CHART_FAMILY_UNKNOWN)) {
2985  pPopupDetailSlider = new PopUpDSlide(
2986  this, -1, ChartType, ChartFam,
2987  wxPoint(g_detailslider_dialog_x, g_detailslider_dialog_y),
2988  wxDefaultSize, wxSIMPLE_BORDER, _T(""));
2989  if (pPopupDetailSlider) pPopupDetailSlider->Show();
2990  }
2991  } else //( !pPopupDetailSlider ) close popupslider
2992  {
2993  if (pPopupDetailSlider) pPopupDetailSlider->Close();
2994  pPopupDetailSlider = NULL;
2995  }
2996  break;
2997  }
2998 
2999  case 'L':
3000  SetShowENCLights(!GetShowENCLights());
3001  ReloadVP();
3002 
3003  break;
3004 
3005  case 'M':
3006  if (event.ShiftDown())
3007  m_bMeasure_DistCircle = true;
3008  else
3009  m_bMeasure_DistCircle = false;
3010 
3011  StartMeasureRoute();
3012  break;
3013 
3014  case 'N':
3015  if (g_bInlandEcdis && ps52plib) {
3016  SetENCDisplayCategory((_DisCat)STANDARD);
3017  }
3018  break;
3019 
3020  case 'O':
3021  ToggleChartOutlines();
3022  break;
3023 
3024  case 'Q':
3025  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
3026  break;
3027 
3028  case 'P':
3029  parent_frame->ToggleTestPause();
3030  break;
3031 #if 0
3032  case 'R':
3033  parent_frame->ToggleRocks();
3034  break;
3035 #endif
3036  case 'S':
3037  SetShowENCDepth(!m_encShowDepth);
3038  ReloadVP();
3039  break;
3040 
3041  case 'T':
3042  SetShowENCText(!GetShowENCText());
3043  ReloadVP();
3044  break;
3045 
3046  case 'U':
3047  SetShowENCDataQual(!GetShowENCDataQual());
3048  ReloadVP();
3049  break;
3050 
3051  case 'V':
3052  m_bShowNavobjects = !m_bShowNavobjects;
3053  Refresh(true);
3054  break;
3055 
3056  case 'W': // W Toggle CPA alarm
3057  ToggleCPAWarn();
3058 
3059  break;
3060 
3061  case 1: // Ctrl A
3062  TogglebFollow();
3063 
3064  break;
3065 
3066  case 2: // Ctrl B
3067  if (g_bShowMenuBar == false) parent_frame->ToggleChartBar(this);
3068  break;
3069 
3070  case 13: // Ctrl M // Drop Marker at cursor
3071  {
3072  if (event.ControlDown()) gFrame->DropMarker(false);
3073  break;
3074  }
3075 
3076  case 14: // Ctrl N - Activate next waypoint in a route
3077  {
3078  if (Route *r = g_pRouteMan->GetpActiveRoute()) {
3079  int indexActive = r->GetIndexOf(r->m_pRouteActivePoint);
3080  if ((indexActive + 1) <= r->GetnPoints()) {
3081  g_pRouteMan->ActivateNextPoint(r, true);
3082  InvalidateGL();
3083  Refresh(false);
3084  }
3085  }
3086  break;
3087  }
3088 
3089  case 15: // Ctrl O - Drop Marker at boat's position
3090  {
3091  if (!g_bShowMenuBar) gFrame->DropMarker(true);
3092  break;
3093  }
3094 
3095  case 32: // Special needs use space bar
3096  {
3097  if (g_bSpaceDropMark) gFrame->DropMarker(true);
3098  break;
3099  }
3100 
3101  case -32: // Ctrl Space // Drop MOB
3102  {
3103  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_CONTROL) parent_frame->ActivateMOB();
3104 
3105  break;
3106  }
3107 
3108  case -20: // Ctrl ,
3109  {
3110  parent_frame->DoSettings();
3111  break;
3112  }
3113  case 17: // Ctrl Q
3114  parent_frame->Close();
3115  return;
3116 
3117  case 18: // Ctrl R
3118  StartRoute();
3119  return;
3120 
3121  case 20: // Ctrl T
3122  if (NULL == pGoToPositionDialog) // There is one global instance of
3123  // the Go To Position Dialog
3124  pGoToPositionDialog = new GoToPositionDialog(this);
3125  pGoToPositionDialog->SetCanvas(this);
3126  pGoToPositionDialog->Show();
3127  break;
3128 
3129  case 25: // Ctrl Y
3130  if (undo->AnythingToRedo()) {
3131  undo->RedoNextAction();
3132  InvalidateGL();
3133  Refresh(false);
3134  }
3135  break;
3136 
3137  case 26:
3138  if (event.ShiftDown()) { // Shift-Ctrl-Z
3139  if (undo->AnythingToRedo()) {
3140  undo->RedoNextAction();
3141  InvalidateGL();
3142  Refresh(false);
3143  }
3144  } else { // Ctrl Z
3145  if (undo->AnythingToUndo()) {
3146  undo->UndoLastAction();
3147  InvalidateGL();
3148  Refresh(false);
3149  }
3150  }
3151  break;
3152 
3153  case 27:
3154  // Generic break
3155  if (m_bMeasure_Active) {
3156  CancelMeasureRoute();
3157 
3158  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
3159 
3160  SurfaceToolbar();
3161  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
3162  }
3163 
3164  if (m_routeState) // creating route?
3165  {
3166  FinishRoute();
3167  SurfaceToolbar();
3168  InvalidateGL();
3169  Refresh(false);
3170  }
3171 
3172  break;
3173 
3174  case 7: // Ctrl G
3175  switch (gamma_state) {
3176  case (0):
3177  r_gamma_mult = 0;
3178  g_gamma_mult = 1;
3179  b_gamma_mult = 0;
3180  gamma_state = 1;
3181  break;
3182  case (1):
3183  r_gamma_mult = 1;
3184  g_gamma_mult = 0;
3185  b_gamma_mult = 0;
3186  gamma_state = 2;
3187  break;
3188  case (2):
3189  r_gamma_mult = 1;
3190  g_gamma_mult = 1;
3191  b_gamma_mult = 1;
3192  gamma_state = 0;
3193  break;
3194  }
3195  SetScreenBrightness(g_nbrightness);
3196 
3197  break;
3198 
3199  case 9: // Ctrl I
3200  if (event.ControlDown()) {
3201  m_bShowCompassWin = !m_bShowCompassWin;
3202  SetShowGPSCompassWindow(m_bShowCompassWin);
3203  Refresh(false);
3204  }
3205  break;
3206 
3207  default:
3208  break;
3209 
3210  } // switch
3211  }
3212 
3213 #ifndef __WXMAC__
3214  // Allow OnKeyChar to catch the key events too.
3215  // On OS X this is unnecessary since we handle all key events here.
3216  if (!b_handled) event.Skip();
3217 #endif
3218 }
3219 
3220 void ChartCanvas::OnKeyUp(wxKeyEvent &event) {
3221  if (g_pi_manager)
3222  if (g_pi_manager->SendKeyEventToPlugins(event))
3223  return; // PlugIn did something, and does not want the canvas to do
3224  // anything else
3225 
3226  switch (event.GetKeyCode()) {
3227  case WXK_TAB:
3228  parent_frame->SwitchKBFocus(this);
3229  break;
3230 
3231  case WXK_LEFT:
3232  case WXK_RIGHT:
3233  m_panx = 0;
3234  if (!m_pany) m_panspeed = 0;
3235  break;
3236 
3237  case WXK_UP:
3238  case WXK_DOWN:
3239  m_pany = 0;
3240  if (!m_panx) m_panspeed = 0;
3241  break;
3242 
3243  case WXK_NUMPAD_ADD: // '+' on NUM PAD
3244  case WXK_NUMPAD_SUBTRACT: // '-' on NUM PAD
3245  case WXK_PAGEUP:
3246  case WXK_PAGEDOWN:
3247  if (m_mustmove) DoMovement(m_mustmove);
3248 
3249  m_zoom_factor = 1;
3250  break;
3251 
3252  case WXK_ALT:
3253  m_modkeys &= ~wxMOD_ALT;
3254 #ifdef OCPN_ALT_MENUBAR
3255 #ifndef __WXOSX__
3256  // If the permanent menu bar is disabled, and we are not in the middle of
3257  // another key combo, then show the menu bar temporarily when Alt is
3258  // released (or hide it if already visible).
3259  if (IsTempMenuBarEnabled() && !g_bShowMenuBar && m_bMayToggleMenuBar) {
3260  g_bTempShowMenuBar = !g_bTempShowMenuBar;
3261  parent_frame->ApplyGlobalSettings(false);
3262  }
3263  m_bMayToggleMenuBar = true;
3264 #endif
3265 #endif
3266  break;
3267 
3268  case WXK_CONTROL:
3269  m_modkeys &= ~wxMOD_CONTROL;
3270  break;
3271  }
3272 
3273  if (event.GetKeyCode() < 128) // ascii
3274  {
3275  int key_char = event.GetKeyCode();
3276 
3277  // Handle both QWERTY and AZERTY keyboard separately for a few control
3278  // codes
3279  if (!g_b_assume_azerty) {
3280  switch (key_char) {
3281  case '+':
3282  case '=':
3283  case '-':
3284  case '_':
3285  case 54:
3286  case 56: // '_' alpha/num pad
3287  DoMovement(m_mustmove);
3288 
3289  // m_zoom_factor = 1;
3290  break;
3291  case '[':
3292  case ']':
3293  DoMovement(m_mustmove);
3294  m_rotation_speed = 0;
3295  break;
3296  }
3297  } else {
3298  switch (key_char) {
3299  case 43:
3300  case 54: // '-' alpha/num pad
3301  case 56: // '_' alpha/num pad
3302  DoMovement(m_mustmove);
3303 
3304  m_zoom_factor = 1;
3305  break;
3306  }
3307  }
3308  }
3309  event.Skip();
3310 }
3311 
3312 void ChartCanvas::ToggleChartOutlines(void) {
3313  m_bShowOutlines = !m_bShowOutlines;
3314 
3315  Refresh(false);
3316 
3317 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL // opengl renders chart outlines as part of the chart this
3318  // needs a full refresh
3319  if (g_bopengl) InvalidateGL();
3320 #endif
3321 }
3322 
3323 void ChartCanvas::ToggleLookahead() {
3324  m_bLookAhead = !m_bLookAhead;
3325  m_OSoffsetx = 0; // center ownship
3326  m_OSoffsety = 0;
3327 }
3328 
3329 void ChartCanvas::SetUpMode(int mode) {
3330  m_upMode = mode;
3331 
3332  if (mode != NORTH_UP_MODE) {
3333  // Stuff the COGAvg table in case COGUp is selected
3334  double stuff = 0;
3335  if (!std::isnan(gCog)) stuff = gCog;
3336 
3337  if (g_COGAvgSec > 0) {
3338  for (int i = 0; i < g_COGAvgSec; i++) gFrame->COGTable[i] = stuff;
3339  }
3340  g_COGAvg = stuff;
3341  gFrame->FrameCOGTimer.Start(100, wxTIMER_CONTINUOUS);
3342  } else {
3343  if (!g_bskew_comp && (fabs(GetVPSkew()) > 0.0001))
3344  SetVPRotation(GetVPSkew());
3345  else
3346  SetVPRotation(0); /* reset to north up */
3347  }
3348 
3349  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
3350  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
3351 
3352  UpdateGPSCompassStatusBox(true);
3353  gFrame->DoChartUpdate();
3354 }
3355 
3356 bool ChartCanvas::DoCanvasCOGSet(void) {
3357  if (GetUpMode() == NORTH_UP_MODE) return false;
3358 
3359  if (std::isnan(g_COGAvg)) return true;
3360 
3361  double old_VPRotate = m_VPRotate;
3362 
3363  if ((GetUpMode() == HEAD_UP_MODE) && !std::isnan(gHdt)) {
3364  m_VPRotate = -gHdt * PI / 180.;
3365  } else if (GetUpMode() == COURSE_UP_MODE)
3366  m_VPRotate = -g_COGAvg * PI / 180.;
3367 
3368  SetVPRotation(m_VPRotate);
3369  bool bnew_chart = DoCanvasUpdate();
3370 
3371  if ((bnew_chart) || (old_VPRotate != m_VPRotate)) ReloadVP();
3372 
3373  return true;
3374 }
3375 
3376 void ChartCanvas::StopMovement() {
3377  m_panx = m_pany = 0;
3378  m_panspeed = 0;
3379  m_zoom_factor = 1;
3380  m_rotation_speed = 0;
3381  m_mustmove = 0;
3382 #if 0
3383 #if !defined(__WXGTK__) && !defined(__WXQT__)
3384  SetFocus();
3385  gFrame->Raise();
3386 #endif
3387 #endif
3388 }
3389 
3390 /* instead of integrating in timer callbacks
3391  (which do not always get called fast enough)
3392  we can perform the integration of movement
3393  at each render frame based on the time change */
3394 bool ChartCanvas::StartTimedMovement(bool stoptimer) {
3395  // Start/restart the stop movement timer
3396  if (stoptimer) pMovementStopTimer->Start(800, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
3397 
3398  if (!pMovementTimer->IsRunning()) {
3399  // printf("timer not running, starting\n");
3400  pMovementTimer->Start(1, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
3401  }
3402 
3403  if (m_panx || m_pany || m_zoom_factor != 1 || m_rotation_speed) {
3404  // already moving, gets called again because of key-repeat event
3405  return false;
3406  }
3407 
3408  m_last_movement_time = wxDateTime::UNow();
3409 
3410  /* jumpstart because paint gets called right away, if we want first frame to
3411  * move */
3412  // m_last_movement_time -= wxTimeSpan::Milliseconds(100);
3413 
3414  // Refresh( false );
3415 
3416  return true;
3417 }
3418 
3419 void ChartCanvas::DoTimedMovement() {
3420  if (m_pan_drag == wxPoint(0, 0) && !m_panx && !m_pany && m_zoom_factor == 1 &&
3421  !m_rotation_speed)
3422  return; /* not moving */
3423 
3424  wxDateTime now = wxDateTime::UNow();
3425  long dt = 0;
3426  if (m_last_movement_time.IsValid())
3427  dt = (now - m_last_movement_time).GetMilliseconds().ToLong();
3428 
3429  m_last_movement_time = now;
3430 
3431  if (dt > 500) /* if we are running very slow, don't integrate too fast */
3432  dt = 500;
3433 
3434  DoMovement(dt);
3435 }
3436 
3437 void ChartCanvas::DoMovement(long dt) {
3438  /* if we get here quickly assume 1ms so that some movement occurs */
3439  if (dt == 0) dt = 1;
3440 
3441  m_mustmove -= dt;
3442  if (m_mustmove < 0) m_mustmove = 0;
3443 
3444  if (m_pan_drag.x || m_pan_drag.y) {
3445  PanCanvas(m_pan_drag.x, m_pan_drag.y);
3446  m_pan_drag.x = m_pan_drag.y = 0;
3447  }
3448 
3449  if (m_panx || m_pany) {
3450  const double slowpan = .1, maxpan = 2;
3451  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT)
3452  m_panspeed = slowpan;
3453  else {
3454  m_panspeed += (double)dt / 500; /* apply acceleration */
3455  m_panspeed = wxMin(maxpan, m_panspeed);
3456  }
3457  PanCanvas(m_panspeed * m_panx * dt, m_panspeed * m_pany * dt);
3458  }
3459 
3460  if (m_zoom_factor != 1) {
3461  double alpha = 400, beta = 1.5;
3462  double zoom_factor = (exp(dt / alpha) - 1) / beta + 1;
3463 
3464  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT) zoom_factor = pow(zoom_factor, .15);
3465 
3466  if (m_zoom_factor < 1) zoom_factor = 1 / zoom_factor;
3467 
3468  // Try to hit the zoom target exactly.
3469  // if(m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot > 0)
3470  {
3471  if (zoom_factor > 1) {
3472  if (VPoint.chart_scale / zoom_factor <= m_zoom_target)
3473  zoom_factor = VPoint.chart_scale / m_zoom_target;
3474  }
3475 
3476  else if (zoom_factor < 1) {
3477  if (VPoint.chart_scale / zoom_factor >= m_zoom_target)
3478  zoom_factor = VPoint.chart_scale / m_zoom_target;
3479  }
3480  }
3481 
3482  if (fabs(zoom_factor - 1) > 1e-4)
3483  DoZoomCanvas(zoom_factor, m_bzooming_to_cursor);
3484 
3485  if (m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot > 0) {
3486  if (m_wheelstopwatch.Time() > m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot) {
3487  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot = 0;
3488  StopMovement();
3489  }
3490 
3491  // Don't overshoot the zoom target.
3492  if (zoom_factor > 1) {
3493  if (VPoint.chart_scale <= m_zoom_target) {
3494  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot = 0;
3495  StopMovement();
3496  }
3497  } else if (zoom_factor < 1) {
3498  if (VPoint.chart_scale >= m_zoom_target) {
3499  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot = 0;
3500  StopMovement();
3501  }
3502  }
3503  }
3504  }
3505 
3506  if (m_rotation_speed) { /* in degrees per second */
3507  double speed = m_rotation_speed;
3508  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT) speed /= 10;
3509  DoRotateCanvas(VPoint.rotation + speed * PI / 180 * dt / 1000.0);
3510  }
3511 }
3512 
3513 void ChartCanvas::SetColorScheme(ColorScheme cs) {
3514  SetAlertString(_T(""));
3515 
3516  // Setup ownship image pointers
3517  switch (cs) {
3518  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY:
3519  m_pos_image_red = &m_os_image_red_day;
3520  m_pos_image_grey = &m_os_image_grey_day;
3521  m_pos_image_yellow = &m_os_image_yellow_day;
3522  m_pos_image_user = m_pos_image_user_day;
3523  m_pos_image_user_grey = m_pos_image_user_grey_day;
3524  m_pos_image_user_yellow = m_pos_image_user_yellow_day;
3525  m_cTideBitmap = m_bmTideDay;
3526  m_cCurrentBitmap = m_bmCurrentDay;
3527 
3528  break;
3529  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DUSK:
3530  m_pos_image_red = &m_os_image_red_dusk;
3531  m_pos_image_grey = &m_os_image_grey_dusk;
3532  m_pos_image_yellow = &m_os_image_yellow_dusk;
3533  m_pos_image_user = m_pos_image_user_dusk;
3534  m_pos_image_user_grey = m_pos_image_user_grey_dusk;
3535  m_pos_image_user_yellow = m_pos_image_user_yellow_dusk;
3536  m_cTideBitmap = m_bmTideDusk;
3537  m_cCurrentBitmap = m_bmCurrentDusk;
3538  break;
3539  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_NIGHT:
3540  m_pos_image_red = &m_os_image_red_night;
3541  m_pos_image_grey = &m_os_image_grey_night;
3542  m_pos_image_yellow = &m_os_image_yellow_night;
3543  m_pos_image_user = m_pos_image_user_night;
3544  m_pos_image_user_grey = m_pos_image_user_grey_night;
3545  m_pos_image_user_yellow = m_pos_image_user_yellow_night;
3546  m_cTideBitmap = m_bmTideNight;
3547  m_cCurrentBitmap = m_bmCurrentNight;
3548  break;
3549  default:
3550  m_pos_image_red = &m_os_image_red_day;
3551  m_pos_image_grey = &m_os_image_grey_day;
3552  m_pos_image_yellow = &m_os_image_yellow_day;
3553  m_pos_image_user = m_pos_image_user_day;
3554  m_pos_image_user_grey = m_pos_image_user_grey_day;
3555  m_pos_image_user_yellow = m_pos_image_user_yellow_day;
3556  m_cTideBitmap = m_bmTideDay;
3557  m_cCurrentBitmap = m_bmCurrentDay;
3558  break;
3559  }
3560 
3561  CreateDepthUnitEmbossMaps(cs);
3562  CreateOZEmbossMapData(cs);
3563 
3564  // Set up fog effect base color
3565  m_fog_color = wxColor(
3566  170, 195, 240); // this is gshhs (backgound world chart) ocean color
3567  float dim = 1.0;
3568  switch (cs) {
3569  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DUSK:
3570  dim = 0.5;
3571  break;
3572  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_NIGHT:
3573  dim = 0.25;
3574  break;
3575  default:
3576  break;
3577  }
3578  m_fog_color.Set(m_fog_color.Red() * dim, m_fog_color.Green() * dim,
3579  m_fog_color.Blue() * dim);
3580 
3581  // Really dark
3582 #if 0
3583  if( cs == GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DUSK || cs == GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_NIGHT ) {
3584  SetBackgroundColour( wxColour(0,0,0) );
3585 
3586  SetWindowStyleFlag( (GetWindowStyleFlag() & ~wxSIMPLE_BORDER) | wxNO_BORDER);
3587  }
3588  else{
3589  SetWindowStyleFlag( (GetWindowStyleFlag() & ~wxNO_BORDER) | wxSIMPLE_BORDER);
3590 #ifndef __WXMAC__
3591  SetBackgroundColour( wxNullColour );
3592 #endif
3593  }
3594 #endif
3595 
3596  UpdateToolbarColorScheme(cs);
3597 
3598  m_Piano->SetColorScheme(cs);
3599 
3600  m_Compass->SetColorScheme(cs);
3601 
3602  if (m_muiBar) m_muiBar->SetColorScheme(cs);
3603 
3604  if (pWorldBackgroundChart) pWorldBackgroundChart->SetColorScheme(cs);
3605 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
3606  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc) {
3607  m_glcc->SetColorScheme(cs);
3608  g_glTextureManager->ClearAllRasterTextures();
3609  // m_glcc->FlushFBO();
3610  }
3611 #endif
3612  SetbTCUpdate(true); // force re-render of tide/current locators
3613  m_brepaint_piano = true;
3614 
3615  ReloadVP();
3616 
3617  m_cs = cs;
3618 }
3619 
3620 wxBitmap ChartCanvas::CreateDimBitmap(wxBitmap &Bitmap, double factor) {
3621  wxImage img = Bitmap.ConvertToImage();
3622  int sx = img.GetWidth();
3623  int sy = img.GetHeight();
3624 
3625  wxImage new_img(img);
3626 
3627  for (int i = 0; i < sx; i++) {
3628  for (int j = 0; j < sy; j++) {
3629  if (!img.IsTransparent(i, j)) {
3630  new_img.SetRGB(i, j, (unsigned char)(img.GetRed(i, j) * factor),
3631  (unsigned char)(img.GetGreen(i, j) * factor),
3632  (unsigned char)(img.GetBlue(i, j) * factor));
3633  }
3634  }
3635  }
3636 
3637  wxBitmap ret = wxBitmap(new_img);
3638 
3639  return ret;
3640 }
3641 
3642 void ChartCanvas::ShowBrightnessLevelTimedPopup(int brightness, int min,
3643  int max) {
3644  wxFont *pfont = FontMgr::Get().FindOrCreateFont(
3645  40, wxFONTFAMILY_DEFAULT, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD);
3646 
3647  if (!m_pBrightPopup) {
3648  // Calculate size
3649  int x, y;
3650  GetTextExtent(_T("MAX"), &x, &y, NULL, NULL, pfont);
3651 
3652  m_pBrightPopup = new TimedPopupWin(this, 3);
3653 
3654  m_pBrightPopup->SetSize(x, y);
3655  m_pBrightPopup->Move(120, 120);
3656  }
3657 
3658  int bmpsx = m_pBrightPopup->GetSize().x;
3659  int bmpsy = m_pBrightPopup->GetSize().y;
3660 
3661  wxBitmap bmp(bmpsx, bmpsx);
3662  wxMemoryDC mdc(bmp);
3663 
3664  mdc.SetTextForeground(GetGlobalColor(_T("GREEN4")));
3665  mdc.SetBackground(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T("UINFD"))));
3666  mdc.SetPen(wxPen(wxColour(0, 0, 0)));
3667  mdc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T("UINFD"))));
3668  mdc.Clear();
3669 
3670  mdc.DrawRectangle(0, 0, bmpsx, bmpsy);
3671 
3672  mdc.SetFont(*pfont);
3673  wxString val;
3674 
3675  if (brightness == max)
3676  val = _T("MAX");
3677  else if (brightness == min)
3678  val = _T("MIN");
3679  else
3680  val.Printf(_T("%3d"), brightness);
3681 
3682  mdc.DrawText(val, 0, 0);
3683 
3684  mdc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
3685 
3686  m_pBrightPopup->SetBitmap(bmp);
3687  m_pBrightPopup->Show();
3688  m_pBrightPopup->Refresh();
3689 }
3690 
3691 void ChartCanvas::RotateTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
3692  m_b_rot_hidef = true;
3693  ReloadVP();
3694 }
3695 
3696 void ChartCanvas::OnRolloverPopupTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
3697  if (!g_bRollover) return;
3698 
3699  bool b_need_refresh = false;
3700 
3701  wxSize win_size = GetSize() * m_displayScale;
3702  if (console && console->IsShown()) win_size.x -= console->GetSize().x;
3703 
3704  // Handle the AIS Rollover Window first
3705  bool showAISRollover = false;
3706  if (g_pAIS && g_pAIS->GetNumTargets() && m_bShowAIS) {
3707  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
3708  SelectItem *pFind = pSelectAIS->FindSelection(
3709  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_AISTARGET);
3710  if (pFind) {
3711  int FoundAIS_MMSI = (wxIntPtr)pFind->m_pData1;
3712  auto ptarget = g_pAIS->Get_Target_Data_From_MMSI(FoundAIS_MMSI);
3713 
3714  if (ptarget) {
3715  showAISRollover = true;
3716 
3717  if (NULL == m_pAISRolloverWin) {
3718  m_pAISRolloverWin = new RolloverWin(this);
3719  m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3720  b_need_refresh = true;
3721  } else if (m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive() && m_AISRollover_MMSI &&
3722  m_AISRollover_MMSI != FoundAIS_MMSI) {
3723  // Sometimes the mouse moves fast enough to get over a new AIS
3724  // target before the one-shot has fired to remove the old target.
3725  // Result: wrong target data is shown.
3726  // Detect this case,close the existing rollover ASAP, and restart
3727  // the timer.
3728  m_RolloverPopupTimer.Start(50, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
3729  m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3730  m_AISRollover_MMSI = 0;
3731  Refresh();
3732  return;
3733  }
3734 
3735  m_AISRollover_MMSI = FoundAIS_MMSI;
3736 
3737  if (!m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive()) {
3738  wxString s = ptarget->GetRolloverString();
3739  m_pAISRolloverWin->SetString(s);
3740 
3741  m_pAISRolloverWin->SetBestPosition(mouse_x, mouse_y, 16, 16,
3742  AIS_ROLLOVER, win_size);
3743  m_pAISRolloverWin->SetBitmap(AIS_ROLLOVER);
3744  m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive(true);
3745  b_need_refresh = true;
3746  }
3747  }
3748  } else {
3749  m_AISRollover_MMSI = 0;
3750  showAISRollover = false;
3751  }
3752  }
3753 
3754  // Maybe turn the rollover off
3755  if (m_pAISRolloverWin && m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive() && !showAISRollover) {
3756  m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3757  m_AISRollover_MMSI = 0;
3758  b_need_refresh = true;
3759  }
3760 
3761  // Now the Route info rollover
3762  // Show the route segment info
3763  bool showRouteRollover = false;
3764 
3765  if (NULL == m_pRolloverRouteSeg) {
3766  // Get a list of all selectable sgements, and search for the first
3767  // visible segment as the rollover target.
3768 
3769  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
3770  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
3771  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT);
3772  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
3773  while (node) {
3774  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
3775 
3776  Route *pr = (Route *)pFindSel->m_pData3; // candidate
3777 
3778  if (pr && pr->IsVisible()) {
3779  m_pRolloverRouteSeg = pFindSel;
3780  showRouteRollover = true;
3781 
3782  if (NULL == m_pRouteRolloverWin) {
3783  m_pRouteRolloverWin = new RolloverWin(this, 10);
3784  m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3785  }
3786 
3787  if (!m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive()) {
3788  wxString s;
3789  RoutePoint *segShow_point_a =
3790  (RoutePoint *)m_pRolloverRouteSeg->m_pData1;
3791  RoutePoint *segShow_point_b =
3792  (RoutePoint *)m_pRolloverRouteSeg->m_pData2;
3793 
3794  double brg, dist;
3795  DistanceBearingMercator(
3796  segShow_point_b->m_lat, segShow_point_b->m_lon,
3797  segShow_point_a->m_lat, segShow_point_a->m_lon, &brg, &dist);
3798 
3799  if (!pr->m_bIsInLayer)
3800  s.Append(_("Route") + _T(": "));
3801  else
3802  s.Append(_("Layer Route: "));
3803 
3804  if (pr->m_RouteNameString.IsEmpty())
3805  s.Append(_("(unnamed)"));
3806  else
3807  s.Append(pr->m_RouteNameString);
3808 
3809  s << _T("\n") << _("Total Length: ")
3810  << FormatDistanceAdaptive(pr->m_route_length) << _T("\n")
3811  << _("Leg: from ") << segShow_point_a->GetName() << _(" to ")
3812  << segShow_point_b->GetName() << _T("\n");
3813 
3814  if (g_bShowTrue)
3815  s << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)floor(brg+0.5),
3816  0x00B0);
3817  if (g_bShowMag) {
3818  double latAverage =
3819  (segShow_point_b->m_lat + segShow_point_a->m_lat) / 2;
3820  double lonAverage =
3821  (segShow_point_b->m_lon + segShow_point_a->m_lon) / 2;
3822  double varBrg = gFrame->GetMag(brg, latAverage, lonAverage);
3823 
3824  s << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)floor(varBrg+0.5),
3825  0x00B0);
3826  }
3827 
3828  s << FormatDistanceAdaptive(dist);
3829 
3830  // Compute and display cumulative distance from route start point to
3831  // current leg end point and RNG,TTG,ETA from ship to current leg end
3832  // point for active route
3833  double shiptoEndLeg = 0.;
3834  bool validActive = false;
3835  if (pr->IsActive() &&
3836  pr->pRoutePointList->GetFirst()->GetData()->m_bIsActive)
3837  validActive = true;
3838 
3839  if (segShow_point_a != pr->pRoutePointList->GetFirst()->GetData()) {
3840  wxRoutePointListNode *node =
3841  (pr->pRoutePointList)->GetFirst()->GetNext();
3842  RoutePoint *prp;
3843  float dist_to_endleg = 0;
3844  wxString t;
3845 
3846  while (node) {
3847  prp = node->GetData();
3848  if (validActive)
3849  shiptoEndLeg += prp->m_seg_len;
3850  else if (prp->m_bIsActive)
3851  validActive = true;
3852  dist_to_endleg += prp->m_seg_len;
3853  if (prp->IsSame(segShow_point_a)) break;
3854  node = node->GetNext();
3855  }
3856  s << _T(" (+") << FormatDistanceAdaptive(dist_to_endleg) << _T(")");
3857  }
3858  // write from ship to end selected leg point data if the route is
3859  // active
3860  if (validActive) {
3861  s << _T("\n") << _("From Ship To") << _T(" ")
3862  << segShow_point_b->GetName() << _T("\n");
3863  shiptoEndLeg +=
3864  g_pRouteMan
3865  ->GetCurrentRngToActivePoint(); // add distance from ship
3866  // to active point
3867  shiptoEndLeg +=
3868  segShow_point_b
3869  ->m_seg_len; // add the lenght of the selected leg
3870  s << FormatDistanceAdaptive(shiptoEndLeg);
3871  // ensure sog/cog are valid and vmg is positive to keep data
3872  // coherent
3873  double vmg = 0.;
3874  if (!std::isnan(gCog) && !std::isnan(gSog))
3875  vmg = gSog *
3876  cos((g_pRouteMan->GetCurrentBrgToActivePoint() - gCog) *
3877  PI / 180.);
3878  if (vmg > 0.) {
3879  float ttg_sec = (shiptoEndLeg / gSog) * 3600.;
3880  wxTimeSpan ttg_span = wxTimeSpan::Seconds((long)ttg_sec);
3881  s << _T(" - ")
3882  << wxString(ttg_sec > SECONDS_PER_DAY
3883  ? ttg_span.Format(_("%Dd %H:%M"))
3884  : ttg_span.Format(_("%H:%M")));
3885  wxDateTime dtnow, eta;
3886  eta = dtnow.SetToCurrent().Add(ttg_span);
3887  s << _T(" - ") << eta.Format(_T("%b")).Mid(0, 4)
3888  << eta.Format(_T(" %d %H:%M"));
3889  } else
3890  s << _T(" ---- ----");
3891  }
3892  m_pRouteRolloverWin->SetString(s);
3893 
3894  m_pRouteRolloverWin->SetBestPosition(mouse_x, mouse_y, 16, 16,
3895  LEG_ROLLOVER, win_size);
3896  m_pRouteRolloverWin->SetBitmap(LEG_ROLLOVER);
3897  m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive(true);
3898  b_need_refresh = true;
3899  showRouteRollover = true;
3900  break;
3901  }
3902  } else
3903  node = node->GetNext();
3904  }
3905  } else {
3906  // Is the cursor still in select radius, and not timed out?
3907  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
3908  if (!pSelect->IsSelectableSegmentSelected(ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon,
3909  m_pRolloverRouteSeg))
3910  showRouteRollover = false;
3911  else if (m_pRouteRolloverWin && !m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive())
3912  showRouteRollover = false;
3913  else
3914  showRouteRollover = true;
3915  }
3916 
3917  // If currently creating a route, do not show this rollover window
3918  if (m_routeState) showRouteRollover = false;
3919 
3920  // Similar for AIS target rollover window
3921  if (m_pAISRolloverWin && m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive())
3922  showRouteRollover = false;
3923 
3924  if (m_pRouteRolloverWin /*&& m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive()*/ &&
3925  !showRouteRollover) {
3926  m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3927  m_pRolloverRouteSeg = NULL;
3928  m_pRouteRolloverWin->Destroy();
3929  m_pRouteRolloverWin = NULL;
3930  b_need_refresh = true;
3931  } else if (m_pRouteRolloverWin && showRouteRollover) {
3932  m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive(true);
3933  b_need_refresh = true;
3934  }
3935 
3936  // Now the Track info rollover
3937  // Show the track segment info
3938  bool showTrackRollover = false;
3939 
3940  if (NULL == m_pRolloverTrackSeg) {
3941  // Get a list of all selectable sgements, and search for the first
3942  // visible segment as the rollover target.
3943 
3944  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
3945  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
3946  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT);
3947  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
3948  while (node) {
3949  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
3950 
3951  Track *pt = (Track *)pFindSel->m_pData3; // candidate
3952 
3953  if (pt && pt->IsVisible()) {
3954  m_pRolloverTrackSeg = pFindSel;
3955  showTrackRollover = true;
3956 
3957  if (NULL == m_pTrackRolloverWin) {
3958  m_pTrackRolloverWin = new RolloverWin(this, 10);
3959  m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
3960  }
3961 
3962  if (!m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive()) {
3963  wxString s;
3964  TrackPoint *segShow_point_a =
3965  (TrackPoint *)m_pRolloverTrackSeg->m_pData1;
3966  TrackPoint *segShow_point_b =
3967  (TrackPoint *)m_pRolloverTrackSeg->m_pData2;
3968 
3969  double brg, dist;
3970  DistanceBearingMercator(
3971  segShow_point_b->m_lat, segShow_point_b->m_lon,
3972  segShow_point_a->m_lat, segShow_point_a->m_lon, &brg, &dist);
3973 
3974  if (!pt->m_bIsInLayer)
3975  s.Append(_("Track") + _T(": "));
3976  else
3977  s.Append(_("Layer Track: "));
3978 
3979  if (pt->GetName().IsEmpty())
3980  s.Append(_("(unnamed)"));
3981  else
3982  s.Append(pt->GetName());
3983  double tlenght = pt->Length();
3984  s << _T("\n") << _("Total Track: ")
3985  << FormatDistanceAdaptive(tlenght);
3986  if (pt->GetLastPoint()->GetTimeString() &&
3987  pt->GetPoint(0)->GetTimeString()) {
3988  wxDateTime lastPointTime = pt->GetLastPoint()->GetCreateTime();
3989  wxDateTime zeroPointTime = pt->GetPoint(0)->GetCreateTime();
3990  if (lastPointTime.IsValid() && zeroPointTime.IsValid()){
3991  wxTimeSpan ttime = lastPointTime - zeroPointTime;
3992  double htime = ttime.GetSeconds().ToDouble() / 3600.;
3993  s << wxString::Format(_T(" %.1f "), (float)(tlenght / htime))
3994  << getUsrSpeedUnit();
3995  s << wxString(htime > 24. ? ttime.Format(_T(" %Dd %H:%M"))
3996  : ttime.Format(_T(" %H:%M")));
3997  }
3998  }
3999 
4000  if (g_bShowTrackPointTime && strlen(segShow_point_b->GetTimeString()))
4001  s << _T("\n") << _("Segment Created: ")
4002  << segShow_point_b->GetTimeString();
4003 
4004  s << _T("\n");
4005  if (g_bShowTrue)
4006  s << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)brg,
4007  0x00B0);
4008 
4009  if (g_bShowMag) {
4010  double latAverage =
4011  (segShow_point_b->m_lat + segShow_point_a->m_lat) / 2;
4012  double lonAverage =
4013  (segShow_point_b->m_lon + segShow_point_a->m_lon) / 2;
4014  double varBrg = gFrame->GetMag(brg, latAverage, lonAverage);
4015 
4016  s << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)varBrg,
4017  0x00B0);
4018  }
4019 
4020  s << FormatDistanceAdaptive(dist);
4021 
4022  if (segShow_point_a->GetTimeString() &&
4023  segShow_point_b->GetTimeString()) {
4024  wxDateTime apoint = segShow_point_a->GetCreateTime();
4025  wxDateTime bpoint = segShow_point_b->GetCreateTime();
4026  if (apoint.IsValid() && bpoint.IsValid()){
4027  double segmentSpeed =
4028  toUsrSpeed(dist / ((bpoint - apoint).GetSeconds()
4029  .ToDouble() /
4030  3600.));
4031  s << wxString::Format(_T(" %.1f "), (float)segmentSpeed)
4032  << getUsrSpeedUnit();
4033  }
4034  }
4035 
4036  m_pTrackRolloverWin->SetString(s);
4037 
4038  m_pTrackRolloverWin->SetBestPosition(mouse_x, mouse_y, 16, 16,
4039  LEG_ROLLOVER, win_size);
4040  m_pTrackRolloverWin->SetBitmap(LEG_ROLLOVER);
4041  m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive(true);
4042  b_need_refresh = true;
4043  showTrackRollover = true;
4044  break;
4045  }
4046  } else
4047  node = node->GetNext();
4048  }
4049  } else {
4050  // Is the cursor still in select radius, and not timed out?
4051  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
4052  if (!pSelect->IsSelectableSegmentSelected(ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon,
4053  m_pRolloverTrackSeg))
4054  showTrackRollover = false;
4055  else if (m_pTrackRolloverWin && !m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive())
4056  showTrackRollover = false;
4057  else
4058  showTrackRollover = true;
4059  }
4060 
4061  // Similar for AIS target rollover window
4062  if (m_pAISRolloverWin && m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive())
4063  showTrackRollover = false;
4064 
4065  // Similar for route rollover window
4066  if (m_pRouteRolloverWin && m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive())
4067  showTrackRollover = false;
4068 
4069  // TODO We onlt show tracks on primary canvas....
4070  // if(!IsPrimaryCanvas())
4071  // showTrackRollover = false;
4072 
4073  if (m_pTrackRolloverWin /*&& m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive()*/ &&
4074  !showTrackRollover) {
4075  m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
4076  m_pRolloverTrackSeg = NULL;
4077  m_pTrackRolloverWin->Destroy();
4078  m_pTrackRolloverWin = NULL;
4079  b_need_refresh = true;
4080  } else if (m_pTrackRolloverWin && showTrackRollover) {
4081  m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive(true);
4082  b_need_refresh = true;
4083  }
4084 
4085  if (b_need_refresh) Refresh();
4086 }
4087 
4088 void ChartCanvas::OnCursorTrackTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
4089  if ((GetShowENCLights() || m_bsectors_shown ) &&
4090  s57_CheckExtendedLightSectors( this, mouse_x, mouse_y, VPoint,
4091  extendedSectorLegs)) {
4092  if (!m_bsectors_shown) {
4093  ReloadVP(false);
4094  m_bsectors_shown = true;
4095  }
4096  } else {
4097  if (m_bsectors_shown) {
4098  ReloadVP(false);
4099  m_bsectors_shown = false;
4100  }
4101  }
4102 
4103 // This is here because GTK status window update is expensive..
4104 // cairo using pango rebuilds the font every time so is very
4105 // inefficient
4106 // Anyway, only update the status bar when this timer expires
4107 #if defined(__WXGTK__) || defined(__WXQT__)
4108  {
4109  // Check the absolute range of the cursor position
4110  // There could be a window wherein the chart geoereferencing is not
4111  // valid....
4112  double cursor_lat, cursor_lon;
4113  GetCanvasPixPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y, cursor_lat, cursor_lon);
4114 
4115  if ((fabs(cursor_lat) < 90.) && (fabs(cursor_lon) < 360.)) {
4116  while (cursor_lon < -180.) cursor_lon += 360.;
4117 
4118  while (cursor_lon > 180.) cursor_lon -= 360.;
4119 
4120  SetCursorStatus(cursor_lat, cursor_lon);
4121  }
4122  }
4123 #endif
4124 }
4125 
4126 void ChartCanvas::SetCursorStatus(double cursor_lat, double cursor_lon) {
4127  if (!parent_frame->m_pStatusBar) return;
4128 
4129  wxString s1;
4130  s1 += _T(" ");
4131  s1 += toSDMM(1, cursor_lat);
4132  s1 += _T(" ");
4133  s1 += toSDMM(2, cursor_lon);
4134 
4135  if (STAT_FIELD_CURSOR_LL >= 0)
4136  parent_frame->SetStatusText(s1, STAT_FIELD_CURSOR_LL);
4137 
4138  if (STAT_FIELD_CURSOR_BRGRNG < 0) return;
4139 
4140  double brg, dist;
4141  wxString s;
4142  DistanceBearingMercator(cursor_lat, cursor_lon, gLat, gLon, &brg, &dist);
4143  if (g_bShowMag)
4144  s.Printf("%03d%c(M) ", (int)gFrame->GetMag(brg), 0x00B0);
4145  else
4146  s.Printf("%03d%c ", (int)brg, 0x00B0);
4147 
4148  s << FormatDistanceAdaptive(dist);
4149 
4150  // CUSTOMIZATION - LIVE ETA OPTION
4151  // -------------------------------------------------------
4152  // Calculate an "live" ETA based on route starting from the current
4153  // position of the boat and goes to the cursor of the mouse.
4154  // In any case, an standard ETA will be calculated with a default speed
4155  // of the boat to give an estimation of the route (in particular if GPS
4156  // is off).
4157 
4158  // Display only if option "live ETA" is selected in Settings > Display >
4159  // General.
4160  if (g_bShowLiveETA) {
4161  float realTimeETA;
4162  float boatSpeed;
4163  float boatSpeedDefault = g_defaultBoatSpeed;
4164 
4165  // Calculate Estimate Time to Arrival (ETA) in minutes
4166  // Check before is value not closed to zero (it will make an very big
4167  // number...)
4168  if (!std::isnan(gSog)) {
4169  boatSpeed = gSog;
4170  if (boatSpeed < 0.5) {
4171  realTimeETA = 0;
4172  } else {
4173  realTimeETA = dist / boatSpeed * 60;
4174  }
4175  } else {
4176  realTimeETA = 0;
4177  }
4178 
4179  // Add space after distance display
4180  s << " ";
4181  // Display ETA
4182  s << minutesToHoursDays(realTimeETA);
4183 
4184  // In any case, display also an ETA with default speed at 6knts
4185 
4186  s << " [@";
4187  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), (int)toUsrSpeed(boatSpeedDefault, -1));
4188  s << wxString::Format(_T("%s"), getUsrSpeedUnit(-1));
4189  s << " ";
4190  s << minutesToHoursDays(dist / boatSpeedDefault * 60);
4191  s << "]";
4192  }
4193  // END OF - LIVE ETA OPTION
4194 
4195  parent_frame->SetStatusText(s, STAT_FIELD_CURSOR_BRGRNG);
4196 }
4197 
4198 // CUSTOMIZATION - FORMAT MINUTES
4199 // -------------------------------------------------------
4200 // New function to format minutes into a more readable format:
4201 // * Hours + minutes, or
4202 // * Days + hours.
4203 wxString minutesToHoursDays(float timeInMinutes) {
4204  wxString s;
4205 
4206  if (timeInMinutes == 0) {
4207  s << "--min";
4208  }
4209 
4210  // Less than 60min, keep time in minutes
4211  else if (timeInMinutes < 60 && timeInMinutes != 0) {
4212  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), (int)timeInMinutes);
4213  s << "min";
4214  }
4215 
4216  // Between 1h and less than 24h, display time in hours, minutes
4217  else if (timeInMinutes >= 60 && timeInMinutes < 24 * 60) {
4218  int hours;
4219  int min;
4220  hours = (int)timeInMinutes / 60;
4221  min = (int)timeInMinutes % 60;
4222 
4223  if (min == 0) {
4224  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), hours);
4225  s << "h";
4226  } else {
4227  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), hours);
4228  s << "h";
4229  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), min);
4230  s << "min";
4231  }
4232 
4233  }
4234 
4235  // More than 24h, display time in days, hours
4236  else if (timeInMinutes > 24 * 60) {
4237  int days;
4238  int hours;
4239  days = (int)(timeInMinutes / 60) / 24;
4240  hours = (int)(timeInMinutes / 60) % 24;
4241 
4242  if (hours == 0) {
4243  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), days);
4244  s << "d";
4245  } else {
4246  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), days);
4247  s << "d";
4248  s << wxString::Format(_T("%d"), hours);
4249  s << "h";
4250  }
4251  }
4252 
4253  return s;
4254 }
4255 
4256 // END OF CUSTOMIZATION - FORMAT MINUTES
4257 // Thanks open source code ;-)
4258 // -------------------------------------------------------
4259 
4260 void ChartCanvas::GetCursorLatLon(double *lat, double *lon) {
4261  double clat, clon;
4262  GetCanvasPixPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y, clat, clon);
4263  *lat = clat;
4264  *lon = clon;
4265 }
4266 
4267 void ChartCanvas::GetDoubleCanvasPointPix(double rlat, double rlon,
4268  wxPoint2DDouble *r) {
4269  return GetDoubleCanvasPointPixVP(GetVP(), rlat, rlon, r);
4270 }
4271 
4272 void ChartCanvas::GetDoubleCanvasPointPixVP(ViewPort &vp, double rlat,
4273  double rlon, wxPoint2DDouble *r) {
4274  // If the Current Chart is a raster chart, and the
4275  // requested lat/long is within the boundaries of the chart,
4276  // and the VP is not rotated,
4277  // then use the embedded BSB chart georeferencing algorithm
4278  // for greater accuracy
4279  // Additionally, use chart embedded georef if the projection is TMERC
4280  // i.e. NOT MERCATOR and NOT POLYCONIC
4281 
4282  // If for some reason the chart rejects the request by returning an error,
4283  // then fall back to Viewport Projection estimate from canvas parameters
4284  if (!g_bopengl && m_singleChart &&
4285  (m_singleChart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_RASTER) &&
4286  (((fabs(vp.rotation) < .0001) && (fabs(vp.skew) < .0001)) ||
4287  ((m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() != PROJECTION_MERCATOR) &&
4288  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() !=
4289  PROJECTION_TRANSVERSE_MERCATOR) &&
4290  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() != PROJECTION_POLYCONIC))) &&
4291  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() == vp.m_projection_type) &&
4292  (m_singleChart->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_PLUGIN)) {
4293  ChartBaseBSB *Cur_BSB_Ch = dynamic_cast<ChartBaseBSB *>(m_singleChart);
4294  // bool bInside = G_FloatPtInPolygon ( ( MyFlPoint *
4295  // ) Cur_BSB_Ch->GetCOVRTableHead ( 0 ),
4296  // Cur_BSB_Ch->GetCOVRTablenPoints
4297  // ( 0 ), rlon,
4298  // rlat );
4299  // bInside = true;
4300  // if ( bInside )
4301  if (Cur_BSB_Ch) {
4302  // This is a Raster chart....
4303  // If the VP is changing, the raster chart parameters may not yet be
4304  // setup So do that before accessing the chart's embedded
4305  // georeferencing
4306  Cur_BSB_Ch->SetVPRasterParms(vp);
4307  double rpixxd, rpixyd;
4308  if (0 == Cur_BSB_Ch->latlong_to_pix_vp(rlat, rlon, rpixxd, rpixyd, vp)) {
4309  r->m_x = rpixxd;
4310  r->m_y = rpixyd;
4311  return;
4312  }
4313  }
4314  }
4315 
4316  // if needed, use the VPoint scaling estimator,
4317  *r = vp.GetDoublePixFromLL(rlat, rlon);
4318 }
4319 
4320 // This routine might be deleted and all of the rendering improved
4321 // to have floating point accuracy
4322 bool ChartCanvas::GetCanvasPointPix(double rlat, double rlon, wxPoint *r) {
4323  return GetCanvasPointPixVP(GetVP(), rlat, rlon, r);
4324 }
4325 
4326 bool ChartCanvas::GetCanvasPointPixVP(ViewPort &vp, double rlat, double rlon,
4327  wxPoint *r) {
4328  wxPoint2DDouble p;
4329  GetDoubleCanvasPointPixVP(vp, rlat, rlon, &p);
4330 
4331  // some projections give nan values when invisible values (other side of
4332  // world) are requested we should stop using integer coordinates or return
4333  // false here (and test it everywhere)
4334  if (std::isnan(p.m_x)) {
4335  *r = wxPoint(INVALID_COORD, INVALID_COORD);
4336  return false;
4337  }
4338 
4339  if( (abs(p.m_x) < 1e6) && (abs(p.m_y) < 1e6) )
4340  *r = wxPoint(wxRound(p.m_x), wxRound(p.m_y));
4341  else
4342  *r = wxPoint(INVALID_COORD, INVALID_COORD);
4343 
4344  return true;
4345 }
4346 
4347 void ChartCanvas::GetCanvasPixPoint(double x, double y, double &lat,
4348  double &lon) {
4349  // If the Current Chart is a raster chart, and the
4350  // requested x,y is within the boundaries of the chart,
4351  // and the VP is not rotated,
4352  // then use the embedded BSB chart georeferencing algorithm
4353  // for greater accuracy
4354  // Additionally, use chart embedded georef if the projection is TMERC
4355  // i.e. NOT MERCATOR and NOT POLYCONIC
4356 
4357  // If for some reason the chart rejects the request by returning an error,
4358  // then fall back to Viewport Projection estimate from canvas parameters
4359  bool bUseVP = true;
4360 
4361  if (!g_bopengl && m_singleChart &&
4362  (m_singleChart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_RASTER) &&
4363  (((fabs(GetVP().rotation) < .0001) && (fabs(GetVP().skew) < .0001)) ||
4364  ((m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() != PROJECTION_MERCATOR) &&
4365  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() !=
4366  PROJECTION_TRANSVERSE_MERCATOR) &&
4367  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() != PROJECTION_POLYCONIC))) &&
4368  (m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType() == GetVP().m_projection_type) &&
4369  (m_singleChart->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_PLUGIN)) {
4370  ChartBaseBSB *Cur_BSB_Ch = dynamic_cast<ChartBaseBSB *>(m_singleChart);
4371 
4372  // TODO maybe need iterative process to validate bInside
4373  // first pass is mercator, then check chart boundaries
4374 
4375  if (Cur_BSB_Ch) {
4376  // This is a Raster chart....
4377  // If the VP is changing, the raster chart parameters may not yet be
4378  // setup So do that before accessing the chart's embedded
4379  // georeferencing
4380  Cur_BSB_Ch->SetVPRasterParms(GetVP());
4381 
4382  double slat, slon;
4383  if (0 == Cur_BSB_Ch->vp_pix_to_latlong(GetVP(), x, y, &slat, &slon)) {
4384  lat = slat;
4385 
4386  if (slon < -180.)
4387  slon += 360.;
4388  else if (slon > 180.)
4389  slon -= 360.;
4390 
4391  lon = slon;
4392  bUseVP = false;
4393  }
4394  }
4395  }
4396 
4397  // if needed, use the VPoint scaling estimator
4398  if (bUseVP) {
4399  GetVP().GetLLFromPix(wxPoint2DDouble(x, y), &lat, &lon);
4400  }
4401 }
4402 
4403 void ChartCanvas::ZoomCanvasSimple(double factor) {
4404  DoZoomCanvas(factor, false);
4405  extendedSectorLegs.clear();
4406 }
4407 
4408 void ChartCanvas::ZoomCanvas(double factor, bool can_zoom_to_cursor,
4409  bool stoptimer) {
4410  m_bzooming_to_cursor = can_zoom_to_cursor && g_bEnableZoomToCursor;
4411 
4412  if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
4413  if (StartTimedMovement(stoptimer)) {
4414  m_mustmove += 150; /* for quick presses register as 200 ms duration */
4415  m_zoom_factor = factor;
4416  }
4417 
4418  m_zoom_target = VPoint.chart_scale / factor;
4419  } else {
4420  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT) factor = pow(factor, .15);
4421 
4422  DoZoomCanvas(factor, can_zoom_to_cursor);
4423  }
4424 
4425  extendedSectorLegs.clear();
4426 }
4427 
4428 void ChartCanvas::DoZoomCanvas(double factor, bool can_zoom_to_cursor) {
4429  // possible on startup
4430  if (!ChartData) return;
4431  if (!m_pCurrentStack) return;
4432 
4433  if (g_bShowCompassWin) {
4434  m_bShowCompassWin = true;
4435  SetShowGPSCompassWindow(true); // Cancel effects of Ctrl-I
4436  }
4437 
4438  /* TODO: queue the quilted loading code to a background thread
4439  so yield is never called from here, and also rendering is not delayed */
4440 
4441  // Cannot allow Yield() re-entrancy here
4442  if (m_bzooming) return;
4443  m_bzooming = true;
4444 
4445  double old_ppm = GetVP().view_scale_ppm;
4446 
4447  // Capture current cursor position for zoom to cursor
4448  double zlat = m_cursor_lat;
4449  double zlon = m_cursor_lon;
4450 
4451  double proposed_scale_onscreen =
4452  GetVP().chart_scale /
4453  factor; // GetCanvasScaleFactor() / ( GetVPScale() * factor );
4454  bool b_do_zoom = false;
4455 
4456  if (factor > 1) {
4457  b_do_zoom = true;
4458 
4459  // double zoom_factor = factor;
4460 
4461  ChartBase *pc = NULL;
4462 
4463  if (!VPoint.b_quilt) {
4464  pc = m_singleChart;
4465  } else {
4466  int new_db_index = m_pQuilt->AdjustRefOnZoomIn(proposed_scale_onscreen);
4467  if (new_db_index >= 0)
4468  pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(new_db_index, FULL_INIT);
4469 
4470  if (m_pCurrentStack)
4471  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(
4472  new_db_index); // highlite the correct bar entry
4473  }
4474 
4475  if (pc) {
4476  // double target_scale_ppm = GetVPScale() * zoom_factor;
4477  // proposed_scale_onscreen = GetCanvasScaleFactor() /
4478  // target_scale_ppm;
4479 
4480  // Query the chart to determine the appropriate zoom range
4481  double min_allowed_scale =
4482  g_maxzoomin; // Roughly, latitude dependent for mercator charts
4483 
4484  if (proposed_scale_onscreen < min_allowed_scale) {
4485  if (min_allowed_scale == GetCanvasScaleFactor() / (GetVPScale())) {
4486  m_zoom_factor = 1; /* stop zooming */
4487  b_do_zoom = false;
4488  } else
4489  proposed_scale_onscreen = min_allowed_scale;
4490  }
4491 
4492  } else {
4493  proposed_scale_onscreen = wxMax(proposed_scale_onscreen, g_maxzoomin);
4494  }
4495 
4496  } else if (factor < 1) {
4497  b_do_zoom = true;
4498 
4499  ChartBase *pc = NULL;
4500 
4501  bool b_smallest = false;
4502 
4503  if (!VPoint.b_quilt) { // not quilted
4504  pc = m_singleChart;
4505 
4506  if (pc) {
4507  // If m_singleChart is not on the screen, unbound the zoomout
4508  LLBBox viewbox = VPoint.GetBBox();
4509  // BoundingBox chart_box;
4510  int current_index = ChartData->FinddbIndex(pc->GetFullPath());
4511  double max_allowed_scale;
4512 
4513  max_allowed_scale = GetCanvasScaleFactor() / m_absolute_min_scale_ppm;
4514 
4515  // We can allow essentially unbounded zoomout in single chart mode
4516  // if( ChartData->GetDBBoundingBox( current_index,
4517  // &chart_box ) &&
4518  // !viewbox.IntersectOut( chart_box ) )
4519  // // Clamp the minimum scale zoom-out to the value
4520  // specified by the chart max_allowed_scale =
4521  // wxMin(max_allowed_scale, 4.0 *
4522  // pc->GetNormalScaleMax(
4523  // GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
4524  // GetCanvasWidth() ) );
4525  if (proposed_scale_onscreen > max_allowed_scale) {
4526  m_zoom_factor = 1; /* stop zooming */
4527  proposed_scale_onscreen = max_allowed_scale;
4528  }
4529  }
4530 
4531  } else {
4532  int new_db_index = m_pQuilt->AdjustRefOnZoomOut(proposed_scale_onscreen);
4533  if (new_db_index >= 0)
4534  pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(new_db_index, FULL_INIT);
4535 
4536  if (m_pCurrentStack)
4537  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(
4538  new_db_index); // highlite the correct bar entry
4539 
4540  b_smallest = m_pQuilt->IsChartSmallestScale(new_db_index);
4541 
4542  if (b_smallest || (0 == m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackCount()))
4543  proposed_scale_onscreen =
4544  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen,
4545  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / m_absolute_min_scale_ppm);
4546  }
4547 
4548  // set a minimum scale
4549  if ((GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen) <
4550  m_absolute_min_scale_ppm)
4551  b_do_zoom = false;
4552  }
4553 
4554  double new_scale =
4555  GetVPScale() * (GetVP().chart_scale / proposed_scale_onscreen);
4556 
4557  if (b_do_zoom) {
4558  if (can_zoom_to_cursor && g_bEnableZoomToCursor) {
4559  // Arrange to combine the zoom and pan into one operation for smoother
4560  // appearance
4561  SetVPScale(new_scale, false); // adjust, but deferred refresh
4562 
4563  wxPoint r;
4564  GetCanvasPointPix(zlat, zlon, &r);
4565  PanCanvas(r.x - mouse_x, r.y - mouse_y); // this will give the Refresh()
4566  } else {
4567  SetVPScale(new_scale);
4568 
4569  if (m_bFollow) DoCanvasUpdate();
4570  }
4571  }
4572 
4573  m_bzooming = false;
4574 }
4575 int rot;
4576 void ChartCanvas::RotateCanvas(double dir) {
4577  //SetUpMode(NORTH_UP_MODE);
4578 
4579  if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
4580  if (StartTimedMovement()) {
4581  m_mustmove += 150; /* for quick presses register as 200 ms duration */
4582  m_rotation_speed = dir * 60;
4583  }
4584  } else {
4585  double speed = dir * 10;
4586  if (m_modkeys == wxMOD_ALT) speed /= 20;
4587  DoRotateCanvas(VPoint.rotation + PI / 180 * speed);
4588  }
4589 }
4590 
4591 void ChartCanvas::DoRotateCanvas(double rotation) {
4592  while (rotation < 0) rotation += 2 * PI;
4593  while (rotation > 2 * PI) rotation -= 2 * PI;
4594 
4595  if (rotation == VPoint.rotation || std::isnan(rotation)) return;
4596 
4597  SetVPRotation(rotation);
4598  parent_frame->UpdateRotationState(VPoint.rotation);
4599 }
4600 
4601 void ChartCanvas::DoTiltCanvas(double tilt) {
4602  while (tilt < 0) tilt = 0;
4603  while (tilt > .95) tilt = .95;
4604 
4605  if (tilt == VPoint.tilt || std::isnan(tilt)) return;
4606 
4607  VPoint.tilt = tilt;
4608  Refresh(false);
4609 }
4610 
4611 void ChartCanvas::TogglebFollow(void) {
4612  if (!m_bFollow)
4613  SetbFollow();
4614  else
4615  ClearbFollow();
4616 }
4617 
4618 void ChartCanvas::ClearbFollow(void) {
4619  m_bFollow = false; // update the follow flag
4620 
4621  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_FOLLOW, false);
4622  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_NAV_FOLLOW, false);
4623 
4624  UpdateFollowButtonState();
4625 
4626  DoCanvasUpdate();
4627  ReloadVP();
4628  parent_frame->SetChartUpdatePeriod();
4629 }
4630 
4631 void ChartCanvas::SetbFollow(void) {
4632  JumpToPosition(gLat, gLon, GetVPScale());
4633  m_bFollow = true;
4634 
4635  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_FOLLOW, true);
4636  parent_frame->SetMenubarItemState(ID_MENU_NAV_FOLLOW, true);
4637 
4638  UpdateFollowButtonState();
4639 
4640  // Is the OWNSHIP on-screen?
4641  // If not, then reset the OWNSHIP offset to 0 (center screen)
4642  if ((fabs(m_OSoffsetx) > VPoint.pix_width / 2) ||
4643  (fabs(m_OSoffsety) > VPoint.pix_height / 2)) {
4644  m_OSoffsetx = 0;
4645  m_OSoffsety = 0;
4646  }
4647 
4648  DoCanvasUpdate();
4649  ReloadVP();
4650  parent_frame->SetChartUpdatePeriod();
4651 }
4652 
4653 void ChartCanvas::UpdateFollowButtonState(void) {
4654  if (m_muiBar) {
4655  if (!m_bFollow)
4656  m_muiBar->SetFollowButtonState(0);
4657  else {
4658  if (m_bLookAhead)
4659  m_muiBar->SetFollowButtonState(2);
4660  else
4661  m_muiBar->SetFollowButtonState(1);
4662  }
4663  }
4664 
4665 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
4666  if (!m_bFollow)
4667  androidSetFollowTool(0);
4668  else {
4669  if (m_bLookAhead)
4670  androidSetFollowTool(2);
4671  else
4672  androidSetFollowTool(1);
4673  }
4674 #endif
4675 }
4676 
4677 void ChartCanvas::JumpToPosition(double lat, double lon, double scale_ppm) {
4678  if (lon > 180.0) lon -= 360.0;
4679  m_vLat = lat;
4680  m_vLon = lon;
4681  StopMovement();
4682  m_bFollow = false;
4683 
4684  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
4685  double skew = 0;
4686  if (m_singleChart) skew = m_singleChart->GetChartSkew() * PI / 180.;
4687  SetViewPoint(lat, lon, scale_ppm, skew, GetVPRotation());
4688  } else {
4689  if (scale_ppm != GetVPScale()) {
4690  // XXX should be done in SetViewPoint
4691  VPoint.chart_scale = m_canvas_scale_factor / (scale_ppm);
4692  AdjustQuiltRefChart();
4693  }
4694  SetViewPoint(lat, lon, scale_ppm, 0, GetVPRotation());
4695  }
4696 
4697  ReloadVP();
4698 
4699  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_FOLLOW, false);
4700 
4701  UpdateFollowButtonState();
4702 
4703  // TODO
4704  // if( g_pi_manager ) {
4705  // g_pi_manager->SendViewPortToRequestingPlugIns( cc1->GetVP() );
4706  // }
4707 }
4708 
4709 bool ChartCanvas::PanCanvas(double dx, double dy) {
4710  if (!ChartData) return false;
4711 
4712  extendedSectorLegs.clear();
4713 
4714  // double clat = VPoint.clat, clon = VPoint.clon;
4715  double dlat, dlon;
4716  wxPoint2DDouble p(VPoint.pix_width / 2.0, VPoint.pix_height / 2.0);
4717 
4718  int iters = 0;
4719  for (;;) {
4720  GetCanvasPixPoint(p.m_x + trunc(dx), p.m_y + trunc(dy), dlat, dlon);
4721 
4722  if (iters++ > 5) return false;
4723  if (!std::isnan(dlat)) break;
4724 
4725  dx *= .5, dy *= .5;
4726  if (fabs(dx) < 1 && fabs(dy) < 1) return false;
4727  }
4728 
4729  // avoid overshooting the poles
4730  if (dlat > 90)
4731  dlat = 90;
4732  else if (dlat < -90)
4733  dlat = -90;
4734 
4735  if (dlon > 360.) dlon -= 360.;
4736  if (dlon < -360.) dlon += 360.;
4737 
4738  // This should not really be necessary, but round-trip georef on some
4739  // charts is not perfect, So we can get creep on repeated unidimensional
4740  // pans, and corrupt chart cacheing.......
4741 
4742  // But this only works on north-up projections
4743  // TODO: can we remove this now?
4744  // if( ( ( fabs( GetVP().skew ) < .001 ) ) && ( fabs( GetVP().rotation ) <
4745  // .001 ) ) {
4746  //
4747  // if( dx == 0 ) dlon = clon;
4748  // if( dy == 0 ) dlat = clat;
4749  // }
4750 
4751  int cur_ref_dbIndex = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
4752 
4753  SetViewPoint(dlat, dlon, VPoint.view_scale_ppm, VPoint.skew, VPoint.rotation);
4754 
4755  if (VPoint.b_quilt) {
4756  int new_ref_dbIndex = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
4757  if ((new_ref_dbIndex != cur_ref_dbIndex) && (new_ref_dbIndex != -1)) {
4758  // Tweak the scale slightly for a new ref chart
4759  ChartBase *pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(new_ref_dbIndex, FULL_INIT);
4760  if (pc) {
4761  double tweak_scale_ppm =
4762  pc->GetNearestPreferredScalePPM(VPoint.view_scale_ppm);
4763  SetVPScale(tweak_scale_ppm);
4764  }
4765  }
4766  }
4767 
4768  // Turn off bFollow only if the ownship has left the screen
4769  double offx, offy;
4770  toSM(dlat, dlon, gLat, gLon, &offx, &offy);
4771 
4772  double offset_angle = atan2(offy, offx);
4773  double offset_distance = sqrt((offy * offy) + (offx * offx));
4774  double chart_angle = GetVPRotation();
4775  double target_angle = chart_angle - offset_angle;
4776  double d_east_mod = offset_distance * cos(target_angle);
4777  double d_north_mod = offset_distance * sin(target_angle);
4778 
4779  m_OSoffsetx = d_east_mod * VPoint.view_scale_ppm;
4780  m_OSoffsety = -d_north_mod * VPoint.view_scale_ppm;
4781 
4782  // m_OSoffsetx = offx * VPoint.view_scale_ppm;
4783  // m_OSoffsety = offy * VPoint.view_scale_ppm;
4784 
4785  if (m_bFollow && ((fabs(m_OSoffsetx) > VPoint.pix_width / 2) ||
4786  (fabs(m_OSoffsety) > VPoint.pix_height / 2))) {
4787  m_bFollow = false; // update the follow flag
4788  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_FOLLOW, false);
4789 
4790  UpdateFollowButtonState();
4791  }
4792 
4793  Refresh(false);
4794 
4795  pCurTrackTimer->Start(m_curtrack_timer_msec, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
4796 
4797  return true;
4798 }
4799 
4800 void ChartCanvas::ReloadVP(bool b_adjust) {
4801  if (g_brightness_init) SetScreenBrightness(g_nbrightness);
4802 
4803  LoadVP(VPoint, b_adjust);
4804 }
4805 
4806 void ChartCanvas::LoadVP(ViewPort &vp, bool b_adjust) {
4807 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
4808  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc) {
4809  m_glcc->Invalidate();
4810  if (m_glcc->GetSize() != GetSize()) {
4811  m_glcc->SetSize(GetSize());
4812  }
4813  } else
4814 #endif
4815  {
4816  m_cache_vp.Invalidate();
4817  m_bm_cache_vp.Invalidate();
4818  }
4819 
4820  VPoint.Invalidate();
4821 
4822  if (m_pQuilt) m_pQuilt->Invalidate();
4823 
4824  // Make sure that the Selected Group is sensible...
4825  // if( m_groupIndex > (int) g_pGroupArray->GetCount() )
4826  // m_groupIndex = 0;
4827  // if( !CheckGroup( m_groupIndex ) )
4828  // m_groupIndex = 0;
4829 
4830  SetViewPoint(vp.clat, vp.clon, vp.view_scale_ppm, vp.skew, vp.rotation,
4831  vp.m_projection_type, b_adjust);
4832 
4833 }
4834 
4835 void ChartCanvas::SetQuiltRefChart(int dbIndex) {
4836  m_pQuilt->SetReferenceChart(dbIndex);
4837  VPoint.Invalidate();
4838  m_pQuilt->Invalidate();
4839 }
4840 
4841 double ChartCanvas::GetBestStartScale(int dbi_hint, const ViewPort &vp) {
4842  if (m_pQuilt)
4843  return m_pQuilt->GetBestStartScale(dbi_hint, vp);
4844  else
4845  return vp.view_scale_ppm;
4846 }
4847 
4848 // Verify and adjust the current reference chart,
4849 // so that it will not lead to excessive overzoom or underzoom onscreen
4850 int ChartCanvas::AdjustQuiltRefChart() {
4851  int ret = -1;
4852  if (m_pQuilt) {
4853  wxASSERT(ChartData);
4854  ChartBase *pc =
4855  ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex(), FULL_INIT);
4856  if (pc) {
4857  double min_ref_scale =
4858  pc->GetNormalScaleMin(m_canvas_scale_factor, false);
4859  double max_ref_scale =
4860  pc->GetNormalScaleMax(m_canvas_scale_factor, m_canvas_width);
4861 
4862  if (VPoint.chart_scale < min_ref_scale) {
4863  ret = m_pQuilt->AdjustRefOnZoomIn(VPoint.chart_scale);
4864  } else if (VPoint.chart_scale > max_ref_scale) {
4865  ret = m_pQuilt->AdjustRefOnZoomOut(VPoint.chart_scale);
4866  } else {
4867  bool brender_ok = IsChartLargeEnoughToRender(pc, VPoint);
4868 
4869  int ref_family = pc->GetChartFamily();
4870 
4871  if (!brender_ok) {
4872  unsigned int target_stack_index = 0;
4873  int target_stack_index_check =
4874  m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray()
4875  [m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex()]; // Lookup
4876 
4877  if (wxNOT_FOUND != target_stack_index_check)
4878  target_stack_index = target_stack_index_check;
4879 
4880  int extended_array_count =
4881  m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray().size();
4882  while ((!brender_ok) &&
4883  ((int)target_stack_index < (extended_array_count - 1))) {
4884  target_stack_index++;
4885  int test_db_index =
4886  m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray()[target_stack_index];
4887 
4888  if ((ref_family == ChartData->GetDBChartFamily(test_db_index)) &&
4889  IsChartQuiltableRef(test_db_index)) {
4890  // open the target, and check the min_scale
4891  ChartBase *ptest_chart =
4892  ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(test_db_index, FULL_INIT);
4893  if (ptest_chart) {
4894  brender_ok = IsChartLargeEnoughToRender(ptest_chart, VPoint);
4895  }
4896  }
4897  }
4898 
4899  if (brender_ok) { // found a better reference chart
4900  int new_db_index =
4901  m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray()[target_stack_index];
4902  if ((ref_family == ChartData->GetDBChartFamily(new_db_index)) &&
4903  IsChartQuiltableRef(new_db_index)) {
4904  m_pQuilt->SetReferenceChart(new_db_index);
4905  ret = new_db_index;
4906  } else
4907  ret = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
4908  } else
4909  ret = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
4910 
4911  } else
4912  ret = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
4913  }
4914  } else
4915  ret = -1;
4916  }
4917 
4918  return ret;
4919 }
4920 
4921 void ChartCanvas::UpdateCanvasOnGroupChange(void) {
4922  delete m_pCurrentStack;
4923  m_pCurrentStack = new ChartStack;
4924  wxASSERT(ChartData);
4925  ChartData->BuildChartStack(m_pCurrentStack, VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon,
4926  m_groupIndex);
4927 
4928  if (m_pQuilt) {
4929  m_pQuilt->Compose(VPoint);
4930  SetFocus();
4931  }
4932 }
4933 
4934 bool ChartCanvas::SetViewPointByCorners(double latSW, double lonSW,
4935  double latNE, double lonNE) {
4936  // Center Point
4937  double latc = (latSW + latNE) / 2.0;
4938  double lonc = (lonSW + lonNE) / 2.0;
4939 
4940  // Get scale in ppm (latitude)
4941  double ne_easting, ne_northing;
4942  toSM(latNE, lonNE, latc, lonc, &ne_easting, &ne_northing);
4943 
4944  double sw_easting, sw_northing;
4945  toSM(latSW, lonSW, latc, lonc, &sw_easting, &sw_northing);
4946 
4947  double scale_ppm = VPoint.pix_height / fabs(ne_northing - sw_northing);
4948 
4949  return SetViewPoint(latc, lonc, scale_ppm, VPoint.skew, VPoint.rotation);
4950 }
4951 
4952 bool ChartCanvas::SetVPScale(double scale, bool refresh) {
4953  return SetViewPoint(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon, scale, VPoint.skew,
4954  VPoint.rotation, VPoint.m_projection_type, true, refresh);
4955 }
4956 
4957 bool ChartCanvas::SetVPProjection(int projection) {
4958  if (!g_bopengl) // alternative projections require opengl
4959  return false;
4960 
4961  // the view scale varies depending on geographic location and projection
4962  // rescale to keep the relative scale on the screen the same
4963  double prev_true_scale_ppm = m_true_scale_ppm;
4964  return SetViewPoint(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon, VPoint.view_scale_ppm,
4965  VPoint.skew, VPoint.rotation, projection) &&
4966  SetVPScale(wxMax(
4967  VPoint.view_scale_ppm * prev_true_scale_ppm / m_true_scale_ppm,
4968  m_absolute_min_scale_ppm));
4969 }
4970 
4971 bool ChartCanvas::SetViewPoint(double lat, double lon) {
4972  return SetViewPoint(lat, lon, VPoint.view_scale_ppm, VPoint.skew,
4973  VPoint.rotation);
4974 }
4975 
4976 bool ChartCanvas::SetVPRotation(double angle) {
4977  return SetViewPoint(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon, VPoint.view_scale_ppm, VPoint.skew,
4978  angle);
4979 }
4980 
4981 bool ChartCanvas::SetViewPoint(double lat, double lon, double scale_ppm,
4982  double skew, double rotation, int projection,
4983  bool b_adjust, bool b_refresh) {
4984  bool b_ret = false;
4985 
4986  if (skew > PI) /* so our difference tests work, put in range of +-Pi */
4987  skew -= 2 * PI;
4988 
4989  // Any sensible change?
4990  if (VPoint.IsValid()) {
4991  if ((fabs(VPoint.view_scale_ppm - scale_ppm) / scale_ppm < 1e-5) &&
4992  (fabs(VPoint.skew - skew) < 1e-9) &&
4993  (fabs(VPoint.rotation - rotation) < 1e-9) &&
4994  (fabs(VPoint.clat - lat) < 1e-9) && (fabs(VPoint.clon - lon) < 1e-9) &&
4995  (VPoint.m_projection_type == projection ||
4996  projection == PROJECTION_UNKNOWN))
4997  return false;
4998  }
4999 
5000  if (VPoint.m_projection_type != projection)
5001  VPoint.InvalidateTransformCache(); // invalidate
5002 
5003  // Take a local copy of the last viewport
5004  ViewPort last_vp = VPoint;
5005 
5006  VPoint.skew = skew;
5007  VPoint.clat = lat;
5008  VPoint.clon = lon;
5009  VPoint.rotation = rotation;
5010  VPoint.view_scale_ppm = scale_ppm;
5011  if (projection != PROJECTION_UNKNOWN)
5012  VPoint.SetProjectionType(projection);
5013  else if (VPoint.m_projection_type == PROJECTION_UNKNOWN)
5014  VPoint.SetProjectionType(PROJECTION_MERCATOR);
5015 
5016  // don't allow latitude above 88 for mercator (90 is infinity)
5017  if (VPoint.m_projection_type == PROJECTION_MERCATOR ||
5018  VPoint.m_projection_type == PROJECTION_TRANSVERSE_MERCATOR) {
5019  if (VPoint.clat > 89.5)
5020  VPoint.clat = 89.5;
5021  else if (VPoint.clat < -89.5)
5022  VPoint.clat = -89.5;
5023  }
5024 
5025  // don't zoom out too far for transverse mercator polyconic until we resolve
5026  // issues
5027  if (VPoint.m_projection_type == PROJECTION_POLYCONIC ||
5028  VPoint.m_projection_type == PROJECTION_TRANSVERSE_MERCATOR)
5029  VPoint.view_scale_ppm = wxMax(VPoint.view_scale_ppm, 2e-4);
5030 
5031  //SetVPRotation(rotation);
5032 
5033  if (!g_bopengl) // tilt is not possible without opengl
5034  VPoint.tilt = 0;
5035 
5036  if ((VPoint.pix_width <= 0) ||
5037  (VPoint.pix_height <= 0)) // Canvas parameters not yet set
5038  return false;
5039 
5040  bool bwasValid = VPoint.IsValid();
5041  VPoint.Validate(); // Mark this ViewPoint as OK
5042 
5043  // Has the Viewport scale changed? If so, invalidate the vp
5044  if (last_vp.view_scale_ppm != scale_ppm) {
5045  m_cache_vp.Invalidate();
5046  InvalidateGL();
5047  }
5048 
5049  // A preliminary value, may be tweaked below
5050  VPoint.chart_scale = m_canvas_scale_factor / (scale_ppm);
5051 
5052  // recompute cursor position
5053  // and send to interested plugins if the mouse is actually in this window
5054 
5055  const wxPoint pt = wxGetMousePosition();
5056  int mouseX = pt.x - GetScreenPosition().x;
5057  int mouseY = pt.y - GetScreenPosition().y;
5058  if ((mouseX > 0) && (mouseX < VPoint.pix_width) && (mouseY > 0) &&
5059  (mouseY < VPoint.pix_height)) {
5060  double lat, lon;
5061  GetCanvasPixPoint(mouseX, mouseY, lat, lon);
5062  m_cursor_lat = lat;
5063  m_cursor_lon = lon;
5064  if (g_pi_manager) g_pi_manager->SendCursorLatLonToAllPlugIns(lat, lon);
5065  }
5066 
5067  if (!VPoint.b_quilt && m_singleChart) {
5068  VPoint.SetBoxes();
5069 
5070  // Allow the chart to adjust the new ViewPort for performance optimization
5071  // This will normally be only a fractional (i.e.sub-pixel) adjustment...
5072  if (b_adjust) m_singleChart->AdjustVP(last_vp, VPoint);
5073 
5074  // If there is a sensible change in the chart render, refresh the whole
5075  // screen
5076  if ((!m_cache_vp.IsValid()) ||
5077  (m_cache_vp.view_scale_ppm != VPoint.view_scale_ppm)) {
5078  Refresh(false);
5079  b_ret = true;
5080  } else {
5081  wxPoint cp_last, cp_this;
5082  GetCanvasPointPix(m_cache_vp.clat, m_cache_vp.clon, &cp_last);
5083  GetCanvasPointPix(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon, &cp_this);
5084 
5085  if (cp_last != cp_this) {
5086  Refresh(false);
5087  b_ret = true;
5088  }
5089  }
5090  // Create the stack
5091  if (m_pCurrentStack) {
5092  assert(ChartData != 0);
5093  int current_db_index;
5094  current_db_index =
5095  m_pCurrentStack->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex(); // capture the current
5096 
5097  ChartData->BuildChartStack(m_pCurrentStack, lat, lon, current_db_index,
5098  m_groupIndex);
5099  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(current_db_index);
5100  }
5101 
5102  if (!g_bopengl) VPoint.b_MercatorProjectionOverride = false;
5103  }
5104 
5105  // Handle the quilted case
5106  if (VPoint.b_quilt) {
5107  if (last_vp.view_scale_ppm != scale_ppm)
5108  m_pQuilt->InvalidateAllQuiltPatchs();
5109 
5110  // Create the quilt
5111  if (ChartData /*&& ChartData->IsValid()*/) {
5112  if (!m_pCurrentStack) return false;
5113 
5114  int current_db_index;
5115  current_db_index =
5116  m_pCurrentStack->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex(); // capture the current
5117 
5118  ChartData->BuildChartStack(m_pCurrentStack, lat, lon, m_groupIndex);
5119  m_pCurrentStack->SetCurrentEntryFromdbIndex(current_db_index);
5120 
5121  // Check to see if the current quilt reference chart is in the new stack
5122  int current_ref_stack_index = -1;
5123  for (int i = 0; i < m_pCurrentStack->nEntry; i++) {
5124  if (m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex() == m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(i))
5125  current_ref_stack_index = i;
5126  }
5127 
5128  if (g_bFullScreenQuilt) {
5129  current_ref_stack_index = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex();
5130  }
5131 
5132  // We might need a new Reference Chart
5133  bool b_needNewRef = false;
5134 
5135  // If the new stack does not contain the current ref chart....
5136  if ((-1 == current_ref_stack_index) &&
5137  (m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex() >= 0))
5138  b_needNewRef = true;
5139 
5140  // Would the current Ref Chart be excessively underzoomed?
5141  // We need to check this here to be sure, since we cannot know where the
5142  // reference chart was assigned. For instance, the reference chart may
5143  // have been selected from the config file, or from a long jump with a
5144  // chart family switch implicit. Anyway, we check to be sure....
5145  bool renderable = true;
5146  ChartBase *referenceChart =
5147  ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex(), FULL_INIT);
5148  if (referenceChart) {
5149  double chartMaxScale = referenceChart->GetNormalScaleMax(
5150  GetCanvasScaleFactor(), GetCanvasWidth());
5151  renderable = chartMaxScale * 64 >= VPoint.chart_scale;
5152  }
5153  if (!renderable) b_needNewRef = true;
5154 
5155  // Need new refchart?
5156  if (b_needNewRef) {
5157  const ChartTableEntry &cte_ref =
5158  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex());
5159  int target_scale = cte_ref.GetScale();
5160  int target_type = cte_ref.GetChartType();
5161  int candidate_stack_index;
5162 
5163  // reset the ref chart in a way that does not lead to excessive
5164  // underzoom, for performance reasons Try to find a chart that is the
5165  // same type, and has a scale of just smaller than the current ref
5166  // chart
5167 
5168  candidate_stack_index = 0;
5169  while (candidate_stack_index <= m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1) {
5170  const ChartTableEntry &cte_candidate = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(
5171  m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(candidate_stack_index));
5172  int candidate_scale = cte_candidate.GetScale();
5173  int candidate_type = cte_candidate.GetChartType();
5174 
5175  if ((candidate_scale >= target_scale) &&
5176  (candidate_type == target_type)) {
5177  bool renderable = true;
5178  ChartBase *tentative_referenceChart = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(
5179  m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(candidate_stack_index), FULL_INIT);
5180  if (tentative_referenceChart) {
5181  double chartMaxScale =
5182  tentative_referenceChart->GetNormalScaleMax(
5183  GetCanvasScaleFactor(), GetCanvasWidth());
5184  renderable = chartMaxScale * 1.5 > VPoint.chart_scale;
5185  }
5186 
5187  if (renderable) break;
5188  }
5189 
5190  candidate_stack_index++;
5191  }
5192 
5193  // If that did not work, look for a chart of just larger scale and
5194  // same type
5195  if (candidate_stack_index >= m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) {
5196  candidate_stack_index = m_pCurrentStack->nEntry - 1;
5197  while (candidate_stack_index >= 0) {
5198  int idx = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(candidate_stack_index);
5199  if (idx >= 0) {
5200  const ChartTableEntry &cte_candidate =
5201  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(idx);
5202  int candidate_scale = cte_candidate.GetScale();
5203  int candidate_type = cte_candidate.GetChartType();
5204 
5205  if ((candidate_scale <= target_scale) &&
5206  (candidate_type == target_type))
5207  break;
5208  }
5209  candidate_stack_index--;
5210  }
5211  }
5212 
5213  // and if that did not work, chose stack entry 0
5214  if ((candidate_stack_index >= m_pCurrentStack->nEntry) ||
5215  (candidate_stack_index < 0))
5216  candidate_stack_index = 0;
5217 
5218  int new_ref_index = m_pCurrentStack->GetDBIndex(candidate_stack_index);
5219 
5220  m_pQuilt->SetReferenceChart(new_ref_index); // maybe???
5221  }
5222 
5223  if (!g_bopengl) {
5224  // Preset the VPoint projection type to match what the quilt projection
5225  // type will be
5226  int ref_db_index = m_pQuilt->GetRefChartdbIndex(), proj;
5227 
5228  // Always keep the default Mercator projection if the reference chart is
5229  // not in the PatchList or the scale is too small for it to render.
5230 
5231  bool renderable = true;
5232  ChartBase *referenceChart =
5233  ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(ref_db_index, FULL_INIT);
5234  if (referenceChart) {
5235  double chartMaxScale = referenceChart->GetNormalScaleMax(
5236  GetCanvasScaleFactor(), GetCanvasWidth());
5237  renderable = chartMaxScale * 1.5 > VPoint.chart_scale;
5238  proj = ChartData->GetDBChartProj(ref_db_index);
5239  } else
5240  proj = PROJECTION_MERCATOR;
5241 
5242  VPoint.b_MercatorProjectionOverride =
5243  (m_pQuilt->GetnCharts() == 0 || !renderable);
5244 
5245  if (VPoint.b_MercatorProjectionOverride) proj = PROJECTION_MERCATOR;
5246 
5247  VPoint.SetProjectionType(proj);
5248  }
5249 
5250  VPoint.SetBoxes();
5251 
5252  // If this quilt will be a perceptible delta from the existing quilt,
5253  // then refresh the entire screen
5254  if (m_pQuilt->IsQuiltDelta(VPoint)) {
5255  // Allow the quilt to adjust the new ViewPort for performance
5256  // optimization This will normally be only a fractional (i.e.
5257  // sub-pixel) adjustment...
5258  if (b_adjust) m_pQuilt->AdjustQuiltVP(last_vp, VPoint);
5259 
5260  // ChartData->ClearCacheInUseFlags();
5261  // unsigned long hash1 = m_pQuilt->GetXStackHash();
5262 
5263  // wxStopWatch sw;
5264 
5265 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
5266  // This is an optimization for panning on touch screen systems.
5267  // The quilt composition is deferred until the OnPaint() message gets
5268  // finally removed and processed from the message queue.
5269  // Takes advantage of the fact that touch-screen pan gestures are
5270  // usually short in distance,
5271  // so not requiring a full quilt rebuild until the pan gesture is
5272  // complete.
5273  if ((last_vp.view_scale_ppm != scale_ppm) || !bwasValid) {
5274  // qDebug() << "Force compose";
5275  m_pQuilt->Compose(VPoint);
5276  } else {
5277  m_pQuilt->Invalidate();
5278  }
5279 #else
5280  m_pQuilt->Compose(VPoint);
5281 #endif
5282 
5283  // printf("comp time %ld\n", sw.Time());
5284 
5285  // If the extended chart stack has changed, invalidate any cached
5286  // render bitmap
5287  // if(m_pQuilt->GetXStackHash() != hash1) {
5288  // m_bm_cache_vp.Invalidate();
5289  // InvalidateGL();
5290  // }
5291 
5292  ChartData->PurgeCacheUnusedCharts(0.7);
5293 
5294  if (b_refresh) Refresh(false);
5295 
5296  b_ret = true;
5297  }
5298  }
5299 
5300  VPoint.skew = 0.; // Quilting supports 0 Skew
5301  } else if (!g_bopengl) {
5302  OcpnProjType projection = PROJECTION_UNKNOWN;
5303  if (m_singleChart) // viewport projection must match chart projection
5304  // without opengl
5305  projection = m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType();
5306  if (projection == PROJECTION_UNKNOWN) projection = PROJECTION_MERCATOR;
5307  VPoint.SetProjectionType(projection);
5308  }
5309 
5310  // Has the Viewport projection changed? If so, invalidate the vp
5311  if (last_vp.m_projection_type != VPoint.m_projection_type) {
5312  m_cache_vp.Invalidate();
5313  InvalidateGL();
5314  }
5315 
5316  UpdateCanvasControlBar(); // Refresh the Piano
5317 
5318  VPoint.chart_scale = 1.0; // fallback default value
5319 
5320  /*if (!VPoint.GetBBox().GetValid())*/ VPoint.SetBoxes();
5321 
5322  if (VPoint.GetBBox().GetValid()) {
5323  // Update the viewpoint reference scale
5324  if (m_singleChart)
5325  VPoint.ref_scale = m_singleChart->GetNativeScale();
5326  else {
5327 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
5328  // This is an optimization for panning on touch screen systems.
5329  // See above.
5330  // Quilt might not be fully composed at this point, so for cm93
5331  // the reference scale may not be known.
5332  // In this case, do not update the VP ref_scale.
5333  if ((last_vp.view_scale_ppm != scale_ppm) || !bwasValid) {
5334  VPoint.ref_scale = m_pQuilt->GetRefNativeScale();
5335  }
5336 #else
5337  VPoint.ref_scale = m_pQuilt->GetRefNativeScale();
5338 #endif
5339  }
5340 
5341  // Calculate the on-screen displayed actual scale
5342  // by a simple traverse northward from the center point
5343  // of roughly one eighth of the canvas height
5344  wxPoint2DDouble r, r1;
5345 
5346  double delta_check =
5347  (VPoint.pix_height / VPoint.view_scale_ppm) / (1852. * 60);
5348  delta_check /= 8.;
5349 
5350  double check_point = wxMin(89., VPoint.clat);
5351 
5352  while ((delta_check + check_point) > 90.) delta_check /= 2.;
5353 
5354  double rhumbDist;
5355  DistanceBearingMercator(check_point, VPoint.clon, check_point + delta_check,
5356  VPoint.clon, 0, &rhumbDist);
5357 
5358  GetDoubleCanvasPointPix(check_point, VPoint.clon, &r1);
5359  GetDoubleCanvasPointPix(check_point + delta_check, VPoint.clon, &r);
5360  double delta_p = sqrt(((r1.m_y - r.m_y) * (r1.m_y - r.m_y)) +
5361  ((r1.m_x - r.m_x) * (r1.m_x - r.m_x)));
5362 
5363  m_true_scale_ppm = delta_p / (rhumbDist * 1852);
5364 
5365  // A fall back in case of very high zoom-out, giving delta_y == 0
5366  // which can probably only happen with vector charts
5367  if (0.0 == m_true_scale_ppm) m_true_scale_ppm = scale_ppm;
5368 
5369  // Another fallback, for highly zoomed out charts
5370  // This adjustment makes the displayed TrueScale correspond to the
5371  // same algorithm used to calculate the chart zoom-out limit for
5372  // ChartDummy.
5373  if (scale_ppm < 1e-4) m_true_scale_ppm = scale_ppm;
5374 
5375  if (m_true_scale_ppm)
5376  VPoint.chart_scale = m_canvas_scale_factor / (m_true_scale_ppm);
5377  else
5378  VPoint.chart_scale = 1.0;
5379 
5380  // Create a nice renderable string
5381  double round_factor = 1000.;
5382  if (VPoint.chart_scale <= 1000.)
5383  round_factor = 10.;
5384  else if (VPoint.chart_scale <= 10000.)
5385  round_factor = 100.;
5386  else if (VPoint.chart_scale <= 100000.)
5387  round_factor = 1000.;
5388 
5389  // Fixme: Workaround the wrongly calculated scale on Retina displays (#3117)
5390  double retina_coef = 1;
5391  #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
5392  #ifdef __WXOSX__
5393  if (g_bopengl) {
5394  retina_coef = GetContentScaleFactor();;
5395  }
5396  #endif
5397  #endif
5398 
5399  double true_scale_display =
5400  wxRound(VPoint.chart_scale / round_factor) * round_factor * retina_coef;
5401  wxString text;
5402 
5403  m_displayed_scale_factor = VPoint.ref_scale / VPoint.chart_scale;
5404 
5405  if (m_displayed_scale_factor > 10.0)
5406  text.Printf(_T("%s %4.0f (%1.0fx)"), _("Scale"), true_scale_display,
5407  m_displayed_scale_factor);
5408  else if (m_displayed_scale_factor > 1.0)
