5409  text.Printf(_T("%s %4.0f (%1.1fx)"), _("Scale"), true_scale_display,
5410  m_displayed_scale_factor);
5411  else if (m_displayed_scale_factor > 0.1) {
5412  double sfr = wxRound(m_displayed_scale_factor * 10.) / 10.;
5413  text.Printf(_T("%s %4.0f (%1.2fx)"), _("Scale"), true_scale_display, sfr);
5414  } else if (m_displayed_scale_factor > 0.01) {
5415  double sfr = wxRound(m_displayed_scale_factor * 100.) / 100.;
5416  text.Printf(_T("%s %4.0f (%1.2fx)"), _("Scale"), true_scale_display, sfr);
5417  } else {
5418  text.Printf(
5419  _T("%s %4.0f (---)"), _("Scale"),
5420  true_scale_display); // Generally, no chart, so no chart scale factor
5421  }
5422 
5423 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
5424  if (g_bopengl && g_bShowFPS) {
5425  wxString fps_str;
5426  double fps = 0.;
5427  if (g_gl_ms_per_frame > 0) {
5428  fps = 1000. / g_gl_ms_per_frame;
5429  fps_str.Printf(_T(" %3d fps"), (int)fps);
5430  }
5431  text += fps_str;
5432  }
5433 #endif
5434 
5435  m_scaleValue = true_scale_display;
5436  m_scaleText = text;
5437  if (m_muiBar) m_muiBar->UpdateDynamicValues();
5438 
5439  if (m_bShowScaleInStatusBar && parent_frame->GetStatusBar() &&
5440  (parent_frame->GetStatusBar()->GetFieldsCount() > STAT_FIELD_SCALE)) {
5441  // Check to see if the text will fit in the StatusBar field...
5442  bool b_noshow = false;
5443  {
5444  int w = 0;
5445  int h;
5446  wxClientDC dc(parent_frame->GetStatusBar());
5447  if (dc.IsOk()) {
5448  wxFont *templateFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("StatusBar"), 0);
5449  dc.SetFont(*templateFont);
5450  dc.GetTextExtent(text, &w, &h);
5451 
5452  // If text is too long for the allocated field, try to reduce the text
5453  // string a bit.
5454  wxRect rect;
5455  parent_frame->GetStatusBar()->GetFieldRect(STAT_FIELD_SCALE, rect);
5456  if (w && w > rect.width) {
5457  text.Printf(_T("%s (%1.1fx)"), _("Scale"),
5458  m_displayed_scale_factor);
5459  }
5460 
5461  // Test again...if too big still, then give it up.
5462  dc.GetTextExtent(text, &w, &h);
5463 
5464  if (w && w > rect.width) {
5465  b_noshow = true;
5466  }
5467  }
5468  }
5469 
5470  if (!b_noshow) parent_frame->SetStatusText(text, STAT_FIELD_SCALE);
5471  }
5472  }
5473 
5474  // Maintain member vLat/vLon
5475  m_vLat = VPoint.clat;
5476  m_vLon = VPoint.clon;
5477 
5478  return b_ret;
5479 }
5480 
5481 // Static Icon definitions for some symbols requiring
5482 // scaling/rotation/translation Very specific wxDC draw commands are
5483 // necessary to properly render these icons...See the code in
5484 // ShipDraw()
5485 
5486 // This icon was adapted and scaled from the S52 Presentation Library
5487 // version 3_03.
5488 // Symbol VECGND02
5489 
5490 static int s_png_pred_icon[] = {-10, -10, -10, 10, 10, 10, 10, -10};
5491 
5492 // This ownship icon was adapted and scaled from the S52 Presentation
5493 // Library version 3_03 Symbol OWNSHP05
5494 static int s_ownship_icon[] = {5, -42, 11, -28, 11, 42, -11, 42, -11, -28,
5495  -5, -42, -11, 0, 11, 0, 0, 42, 0, -42};
5496 
5497 wxColour ChartCanvas::PredColor() {
5498  // RAdjust predictor color change on LOW_ACCURACY ship state in interests of
5499  // visibility.
5500  if (SHIP_NORMAL == m_ownship_state)
5501  return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "URED" ));
5502 
5503  else if (SHIP_LOWACCURACY == m_ownship_state)
5504  return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "YELO1" ));
5505 
5506  return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "NODTA" ));
5507 }
5508 
5509 wxColour ChartCanvas::ShipColor() {
5510  // Establish ship color
5511  // It changes color based on GPS and Chart accuracy/availability
5512 
5513  if (SHIP_NORMAL != m_ownship_state) return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "GREY1" ));
5514 
5515  if (SHIP_LOWACCURACY == m_ownship_state)
5516  return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "YELO1" ));
5517 
5518  return GetGlobalColor(_T ( "URED" )); // default is OK
5519 }
5520 
5521 void ChartCanvas::ShipDrawLargeScale(ocpnDC &dc, wxPoint lShipMidPoint) {
5522  dc.SetPen(wxPen(PredColor(), 2));
5523 
5524  if (SHIP_NORMAL == m_ownship_state)
5525  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(ShipColor(), wxBRUSHSTYLE_TRANSPARENT));
5526  else
5527  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "YELO1" ))));
5528 
5529  dc.DrawEllipse(lShipMidPoint.x - 10, lShipMidPoint.y - 10, 20, 20);
5530  dc.DrawEllipse(lShipMidPoint.x - 6, lShipMidPoint.y - 6, 12, 12);
5531 
5532  dc.DrawLine(lShipMidPoint.x - 12, lShipMidPoint.y, lShipMidPoint.x + 12,
5533  lShipMidPoint.y);
5534  dc.DrawLine(lShipMidPoint.x, lShipMidPoint.y - 12, lShipMidPoint.x,
5535  lShipMidPoint.y + 12);
5536 }
5537 
5538 void ChartCanvas::ShipIndicatorsDraw(ocpnDC &dc, int img_height,
5539  wxPoint GPSOffsetPixels,
5540  wxPoint lGPSPoint) {
5541  // Develop a uniform length for course predictor line dash length, based on
5542  // physical display size Use this reference length to size all other graphics
5543  // elements
5544  float ref_dim = m_display_size_mm / 24;
5545  ref_dim = wxMin(ref_dim, 12);
5546  ref_dim = wxMax(ref_dim, 6);
5547 
5548  wxColour cPred = PredColor();
5549 
5550  // Establish some graphic element line widths dependent on the platform
5551  // display resolution
5552  // double nominal_line_width_pix = wxMax(1.0,
5553  // floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() / 2)); //0.5 mm nominal, but
5554  // not less than 1 pixel
5555  double nominal_line_width_pix = wxMax(
5556  1.0,
5557  floor(m_pix_per_mm / 2)); // 0.5 mm nominal, but not less than 1 pixel
5558 
5559  // If the calculated value is greater than the config file spec value, then
5560  // use it.
5561  if (nominal_line_width_pix > g_cog_predictor_width)
5562  g_cog_predictor_width = nominal_line_width_pix;
5563 
5564  // Calculate ownship Position Predictor
5565  wxPoint lPredPoint, lHeadPoint;
5566 
5567  float pCog = std::isnan(gCog) ? 0 : gCog;
5568  float pSog = std::isnan(gSog) ? 0 : gSog;
5569 
5570  double pred_lat, pred_lon;
5571  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, pCog, pSog * g_ownship_predictor_minutes / 60.,
5572  &pred_lat, &pred_lon);
5573  GetCanvasPointPix(pred_lat, pred_lon, &lPredPoint);
5574 
5575  // test to catch the case where COG/HDG line crosses the screen
5576  LLBBox box;
5577 
5578  // Should we draw the Head vector?
5579  // Compare the points lHeadPoint and lPredPoint
5580  // If they differ by more than n pixels, and the head vector is valid, then
5581  // render the head vector
5582 
5583  float ndelta_pix = 10.;
5584  double hdg_pred_lat, hdg_pred_lon;
5585  bool b_render_hdt = false;
5586  if (!std::isnan(gHdt)) {
5587  // Calculate ownship Heading pointer as a predictor
5588  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, gHdt, g_ownship_HDTpredictor_miles, &hdg_pred_lat,
5589  &hdg_pred_lon);
5590  GetCanvasPointPix(hdg_pred_lat, hdg_pred_lon, &lHeadPoint);
5591  float dist = sqrtf(powf((float)(lHeadPoint.x - lPredPoint.x), 2) +
5592  powf((float)(lHeadPoint.y - lPredPoint.y), 2));
5593  if (dist > ndelta_pix /*&& !std::isnan(gSog)*/) {
5594  box.SetFromSegment(gLat, gLon, hdg_pred_lat, hdg_pred_lon);
5595  if (!GetVP().GetBBox().IntersectOut(box)) b_render_hdt = true;
5596  }
5597  }
5598 
5599  // draw course over ground if they are longer than the ship
5600  wxPoint lShipMidPoint;
5601  lShipMidPoint.x = lGPSPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x;
5602  lShipMidPoint.y = lGPSPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y;
5603  float lpp = sqrtf(powf((float)(lPredPoint.x - lShipMidPoint.x), 2) +
5604  powf((float)(lPredPoint.y - lShipMidPoint.y), 2));
5605 
5606  if (lpp >= img_height / 2) {
5607  box.SetFromSegment(gLat, gLon, pred_lat, pred_lon);
5608  if (!GetVP().GetBBox().IntersectOut(box) && !std::isnan(gCog) &&
5609  !std::isnan(gSog)) {
5610  // COG Predictor
5611  float dash_length = ref_dim;
5612  wxDash dash_long[2];
5613  dash_long[0] =
5614  (int)(floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() * dash_length) /
5615  g_cog_predictor_width); // Long dash , in mm <---------+
5616  dash_long[1] = dash_long[0] / 2.0; // Short gap
5617 
5618  // On ultra-hi-res displays, do not allow the dashes to be greater than
5619  // 250, since it is defined as (char)
5620  if (dash_length > 250.) {
5621  dash_long[0] = 250. / g_cog_predictor_width;
5622  dash_long[1] = dash_long[0] / 2;
5623  }
5624 
5625  wxPen ppPen2(cPred, g_cog_predictor_width, wxPENSTYLE_USER_DASH);
5626  ppPen2.SetDashes(2, dash_long);
5627  dc.SetPen(ppPen2);
5628  dc.StrokeLine(
5629  lGPSPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lGPSPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y,
5630  lPredPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lPredPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y);
5631 
5632  if (g_cog_predictor_width > 1) {
5633  float line_width = g_cog_predictor_width / 3.;
5634 
5635  wxDash dash_long3[2];
5636  dash_long3[0] = g_cog_predictor_width / line_width * dash_long[0];
5637  dash_long3[1] = g_cog_predictor_width / line_width * dash_long[1];
5638 
5639  wxPen ppPen3(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), wxMax(1, line_width),
5640  wxPENSTYLE_USER_DASH);
5641  ppPen3.SetDashes(2, dash_long3);
5642  dc.SetPen(ppPen3);
5643  dc.StrokeLine(
5644  lGPSPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lGPSPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y,
5645  lPredPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lPredPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y);
5646  }
5647 
5648  // Prepare COG predictor endpoint icon
5649  double png_pred_icon_scale_factor = .4;
5650  if (g_ShipScaleFactorExp > 1.0)
5651  png_pred_icon_scale_factor *= (log(g_ShipScaleFactorExp) + 1.0) * 1.1;
5652  if (g_scaler)
5653  png_pred_icon_scale_factor *= 1.0 / g_scaler;
5654 
5655  wxPoint icon[4];
5656 
5657  float cog_rad = atan2f((float)(lPredPoint.y - lShipMidPoint.y),
5658  (float)(lPredPoint.x - lShipMidPoint.x));
5659  cog_rad += (float)PI;
5660 
5661  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
5662  int j = i * 2;
5663  double pxa = (double)(s_png_pred_icon[j]);
5664  double pya = (double)(s_png_pred_icon[j + 1]);
5665 
5666  pya *= png_pred_icon_scale_factor;
5667  pxa *= png_pred_icon_scale_factor;
5668 
5669  double px = (pxa * sin(cog_rad)) + (pya * cos(cog_rad));
5670  double py = (pya * sin(cog_rad)) - (pxa * cos(cog_rad));
5671 
5672  icon[i].x = (int)wxRound(px) + lPredPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x;
5673  icon[i].y = (int)wxRound(py) + lPredPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y;
5674  }
5675 
5676  // Render COG endpoint icon
5677  wxPen ppPen1(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), g_cog_predictor_width / 2,
5678  wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
5679  dc.SetPen(ppPen1);
5680  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(cPred));
5681 
5682  dc.StrokePolygon(4, icon);
5683  }
5684  }
5685 
5686  // HDT Predictor
5687  if (b_render_hdt) {
5688  float hdt_dash_length = ref_dim * 0.4;
5689 
5690  float hdt_width = g_cog_predictor_width * 0.8;
5691  wxDash dash_short[2];
5692  dash_short[0] =
5693  (int)(floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() * hdt_dash_length) /
5694  hdt_width); // Short dash , in mm <---------+
5695  dash_short[1] =
5696  (int)(floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() * hdt_dash_length * 0.9) /
5697  hdt_width); // Short gap |
5698 
5699  wxPen ppPen2(cPred, hdt_width, wxPENSTYLE_USER_DASH);
5700  ppPen2.SetDashes(2, dash_short);
5701 
5702  dc.SetPen(ppPen2);
5703  dc.StrokeLine(
5704  lGPSPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lGPSPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y,
5705  lHeadPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x, lHeadPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y);
5706 
5707  wxPen ppPen1(cPred, g_cog_predictor_width / 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
5708  dc.SetPen(ppPen1);
5709  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "GREY2" ))));
5710 
5711  double nominal_circle_size_pixels = wxMax(
5712  4.0, floor(m_pix_per_mm * (ref_dim / 5.0))); // not less than 4 pixel
5713 
5714  // Scale the circle to ChartScaleFactor, slightly softened....
5715  if (g_ShipScaleFactorExp > 1.0)
5716  nominal_circle_size_pixels *= (log(g_ShipScaleFactorExp) + 1.0) * 1.1;
5717 
5718  dc.StrokeCircle(lHeadPoint.x + GPSOffsetPixels.x,
5719  lHeadPoint.y + GPSOffsetPixels.y,
5720  nominal_circle_size_pixels / 2);
5721  }
5722 
5723  // Draw radar rings if activated
5724  if (g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible) {
5725  double factor = 1.00;
5726  if (g_pNavAidRadarRingsStepUnits == 1) // nautical miles
5727  factor = 1 / 1.852;
5728 
5729  factor *= g_fNavAidRadarRingsStep;
5730 
5731  double tlat, tlon;
5732  wxPoint r;
5733  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, 0, factor, &tlat, &tlon);
5734  GetCanvasPointPix(tlat, tlon, &r);
5735 
5736  double lpp = sqrt(pow((double)(lGPSPoint.x - r.x), 2) +
5737  pow((double)(lGPSPoint.y - r.y), 2));
5738  int pix_radius = (int)lpp;
5739 
5740  extern wxColor GetDimColor(wxColor c);
5741  wxColor rangeringcolour = GetDimColor(g_colourOwnshipRangeRingsColour);
5742 
5743  wxPen ppPen1(rangeringcolour, g_cog_predictor_width);
5744 
5745  dc.SetPen(ppPen1);
5746  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(rangeringcolour, wxBRUSHSTYLE_TRANSPARENT));
5747 
5748  for (int i = 1; i <= g_iNavAidRadarRingsNumberVisible; i++)
5749  dc.StrokeCircle(lGPSPoint.x, lGPSPoint.y, i * pix_radius);
5750  }
5751 }
5752 
5753 void ChartCanvas::ComputeShipScaleFactor(
5754  float icon_hdt, int ownShipWidth, int ownShipLength, wxPoint &lShipMidPoint,
5755  wxPoint &GPSOffsetPixels, wxPoint lGPSPoint, float &scale_factor_x,
5756  float &scale_factor_y) {
5757  float screenResolution = m_pix_per_mm;
5758 
5759  // Calculate the true ship length in exact pixels
5760  double ship_bow_lat, ship_bow_lon;
5761  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, icon_hdt, g_n_ownship_length_meters / 1852.,
5762  &ship_bow_lat, &ship_bow_lon);
5763  wxPoint lShipBowPoint;
5764  wxPoint2DDouble b_point =
5765  GetVP().GetDoublePixFromLL(ship_bow_lat, ship_bow_lon);
5766  wxPoint2DDouble a_point = GetVP().GetDoublePixFromLL(gLat, gLon);
5767 
5768  float shipLength_px = sqrtf(powf((float)(b_point.m_x - a_point.m_x), 2) +
5769  powf((float)(b_point.m_y - a_point.m_y), 2));
5770 
5771  // And in mm
5772  float shipLength_mm = shipLength_px / screenResolution;
5773 
5774  // Set minimum ownship drawing size
5775  float ownship_min_mm = g_n_ownship_min_mm;
5776  ownship_min_mm = wxMax(ownship_min_mm, 1.0);
5777 
5778  // Calculate Nautical Miles distance from midships to gps antenna
5779  float hdt_ant = icon_hdt + 180.;
5780  float dy = (g_n_ownship_length_meters / 2 - g_n_gps_antenna_offset_y) / 1852.;
5781  float dx = g_n_gps_antenna_offset_x / 1852.;
5782  if (g_n_gps_antenna_offset_y > g_n_ownship_length_meters / 2) // reverse?
5783  {
5784  hdt_ant = icon_hdt;
5785  dy = -dy;
5786  }
5787 
5788  // If the drawn ship size is going to be clamped, adjust the gps antenna
5789  // offsets
5790  if (shipLength_mm < ownship_min_mm) {
5791  dy /= shipLength_mm / ownship_min_mm;
5792  dx /= shipLength_mm / ownship_min_mm;
5793  }
5794 
5795  double ship_mid_lat, ship_mid_lon, ship_mid_lat1, ship_mid_lon1;
5796 
5797  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, hdt_ant, dy, &ship_mid_lat, &ship_mid_lon);
5798  ll_gc_ll(ship_mid_lat, ship_mid_lon, icon_hdt - 90., dx, &ship_mid_lat1,
5799  &ship_mid_lon1);
5800 
5801  GetCanvasPointPix(ship_mid_lat1, ship_mid_lon1, &lShipMidPoint);
5802  GPSOffsetPixels.x = lShipMidPoint.x - lGPSPoint.x;
5803  GPSOffsetPixels.y = lShipMidPoint.y - lGPSPoint.y;
5804 
5805  float scale_factor = shipLength_px / ownShipLength;
5806 
5807  // Calculate a scale factor that would produce a reasonably sized icon
5808  float scale_factor_min = ownship_min_mm / (ownShipLength / screenResolution);
5809 
5810  // And choose the correct one
5811  scale_factor = wxMax(scale_factor, scale_factor_min);
5812 
5813  scale_factor_y = scale_factor;
5814  scale_factor_x = scale_factor_y * ((float)ownShipLength / ownShipWidth) /
5815  ((float)g_n_ownship_length_meters / g_n_ownship_beam_meters);
5816 }
5817 
5818 void ChartCanvas::ShipDraw(ocpnDC &dc) {
5819  if (!GetVP().IsValid()) return;
5820 
5821  wxPoint lGPSPoint, lShipMidPoint, GPSOffsetPixels(0, 0);
5822 
5823  // COG/SOG may be undefined in NMEA data stream
5824  float pCog = std::isnan(gCog) ? 0 : gCog;
5825  float pSog = std::isnan(gSog) ? 0 : gSog;
5826 
5827  GetCanvasPointPix(gLat, gLon, &lGPSPoint);
5828  lShipMidPoint = lGPSPoint;
5829 
5830  // Draw the icon rotated to the COG
5831  // or to the Hdt if available
5832  float icon_hdt = pCog;
5833  if (!std::isnan(gHdt)) icon_hdt = gHdt;
5834 
5835  // COG may be undefined in NMEA data stream
5836  if (std::isnan(icon_hdt)) icon_hdt = 0.0;
5837 
5838  // Calculate the ownship drawing angle icon_rad using an assumed 10 minute
5839  // predictor
5840  double osd_head_lat, osd_head_lon;
5841  wxPoint osd_head_point;
5842 
5843  ll_gc_ll(gLat, gLon, icon_hdt, pSog * 10. / 60., &osd_head_lat,
5844  &osd_head_lon);
5845 
5846  GetCanvasPointPix(osd_head_lat, osd_head_lon, &osd_head_point);
5847 
5848  float icon_rad = atan2f((float)(osd_head_point.y - lShipMidPoint.y),
5849  (float)(osd_head_point.x - lShipMidPoint.x));
5850  icon_rad += (float)PI;
5851 
5852  if (pSog < 0.2) icon_rad = ((icon_hdt + 90.) * PI / 180) + GetVP().rotation;
5853 
5854  // Another draw test ,based on pixels, assuming the ship icon is a fixed
5855  // nominal size and is just barely outside the viewport ....
5856  BoundingBox bb_screen(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height);
5857 
5858  // TODO: fix to include actual size of boat that will be rendered
5859  int img_height = 0;
5860  if (bb_screen.PointInBox(lShipMidPoint, 20)) {
5861  if (GetVP().chart_scale >
5862  300000) // According to S52, this should be 50,000
5863  {
5864  ShipDrawLargeScale(dc, lShipMidPoint);
5865  img_height = 20;
5866  } else {
5867  wxImage pos_image;
5868 
5869  // Substitute user ownship image if found
5870  if (m_pos_image_user)
5871  pos_image = m_pos_image_user->Copy();
5872  else if (SHIP_NORMAL == m_ownship_state)
5873  pos_image = m_pos_image_red->Copy();
5874  if (SHIP_LOWACCURACY == m_ownship_state)
5875  pos_image = m_pos_image_yellow->Copy();
5876  else if (SHIP_NORMAL != m_ownship_state)
5877  pos_image = m_pos_image_grey->Copy();
5878 
5879  // Substitute user ownship image if found
5880  if (m_pos_image_user) {
5881  pos_image = m_pos_image_user->Copy();
5882 
5883  if (SHIP_LOWACCURACY == m_ownship_state)
5884  pos_image = m_pos_image_user_yellow->Copy();
5885  else if (SHIP_NORMAL != m_ownship_state)
5886  pos_image = m_pos_image_user_grey->Copy();
5887  }
5888 
5889  img_height = pos_image.GetHeight();
5890 
5891  if (g_n_ownship_beam_meters > 0.0 && g_n_ownship_length_meters > 0.0 &&
5892  g_OwnShipIconType > 0) // use large ship
5893  {
5894  int ownShipWidth = 22; // Default values from s_ownship_icon
5895  int ownShipLength = 84;
5896  if (g_OwnShipIconType == 1) {
5897  ownShipWidth = pos_image.GetWidth();
5898  ownShipLength = pos_image.GetHeight();
5899  }
5900 
5901  float scale_factor_x, scale_factor_y;
5902  ComputeShipScaleFactor(icon_hdt, ownShipWidth, ownShipLength,
5903  lShipMidPoint, GPSOffsetPixels, lGPSPoint,
5904  scale_factor_x, scale_factor_y);
5905 
5906  if (g_OwnShipIconType == 1) { // Scaled bitmap
5907  pos_image.Rescale(ownShipWidth * scale_factor_x,
5908  ownShipLength * scale_factor_y,
5909  wxIMAGE_QUALITY_HIGH);
5910  wxPoint rot_ctr(pos_image.GetWidth() / 2, pos_image.GetHeight() / 2);
5911  wxImage rot_image =
5912  pos_image.Rotate(-(icon_rad - (PI / 2.)), rot_ctr, true);
5913 
5914  // Simple sharpening algorithm.....
5915  for (int ip = 0; ip < rot_image.GetWidth(); ip++)
5916  for (int jp = 0; jp < rot_image.GetHeight(); jp++)
5917  if (rot_image.GetAlpha(ip, jp) > 64)
5918  rot_image.SetAlpha(ip, jp, 255);
5919 
5920  wxBitmap os_bm(rot_image);
5921 
5922  int w = os_bm.GetWidth();
5923  int h = os_bm.GetHeight();
5924  img_height = h;
5925 
5926  dc.DrawBitmap(os_bm, lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2, lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2,
5927  true);
5928 
5929  // Maintain dirty box,, missing in __WXMSW__ library
5930  dc.CalcBoundingBox(lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2, lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2);
5931  dc.CalcBoundingBox(lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2 + w,
5932  lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2 + h);
5933  }
5934 
5935  else if (g_OwnShipIconType == 2) { // Scaled Vector
5936  wxPoint ownship_icon[10];
5937 
5938  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
5939  int j = i * 2;
5940  float pxa = (float)(s_ownship_icon[j]);
5941  float pya = (float)(s_ownship_icon[j + 1]);
5942  pya *= scale_factor_y;
5943  pxa *= scale_factor_x;
5944 
5945  float px = (pxa * sinf(icon_rad)) + (pya * cosf(icon_rad));
5946  float py = (pya * sinf(icon_rad)) - (pxa * cosf(icon_rad));
5947 
5948  ownship_icon[i].x = (int)(px) + lShipMidPoint.x;
5949  ownship_icon[i].y = (int)(py) + lShipMidPoint.y;
5950  }
5951 
5952  wxPen ppPen1(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
5953  dc.SetPen(ppPen1);
5954  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(ShipColor()));
5955 
5956  dc.StrokePolygon(6, &ownship_icon[0], 0, 0);
5957 
5958  // draw reference point (midships) cross
5959  dc.StrokeLine(ownship_icon[6].x, ownship_icon[6].y, ownship_icon[7].x,
5960  ownship_icon[7].y);
5961  dc.StrokeLine(ownship_icon[8].x, ownship_icon[8].y, ownship_icon[9].x,
5962  ownship_icon[9].y);
5963  }
5964 
5965  img_height = ownShipLength * scale_factor_y;
5966 
5967  // Reference point, where the GPS antenna is
5968  int circle_rad = 3;
5969  if (m_pos_image_user) circle_rad = 1;
5970 
5971  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), 1));
5972  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UIBCK" ))));
5973  dc.StrokeCircle(lGPSPoint.x, lGPSPoint.y, circle_rad);
5974  } else { // Fixed bitmap icon.
5975  /* non opengl, or suboptimal opengl via ocpndc: */
5976  wxPoint rot_ctr(pos_image.GetWidth() / 2, pos_image.GetHeight() / 2);
5977  wxImage rot_image =
5978  pos_image.Rotate(-(icon_rad - (PI / 2.)), rot_ctr, true);
5979 
5980  // Simple sharpening algorithm.....
5981  for (int ip = 0; ip < rot_image.GetWidth(); ip++)
5982  for (int jp = 0; jp < rot_image.GetHeight(); jp++)
5983  if (rot_image.GetAlpha(ip, jp) > 64)
5984  rot_image.SetAlpha(ip, jp, 255);
5985 
5986  wxBitmap os_bm(rot_image);
5987 
5988  if (g_ShipScaleFactorExp > 1) {
5989  wxImage scaled_image = os_bm.ConvertToImage();
5990  double factor = (log(g_ShipScaleFactorExp) + 1.0) *
5991  1.0; // soften the scale factor a bit
5992  os_bm = wxBitmap(scaled_image.Scale(scaled_image.GetWidth() * factor,
5993  scaled_image.GetHeight() * factor,
5994  wxIMAGE_QUALITY_HIGH));
5995  }
5996  int w = os_bm.GetWidth();
5997  int h = os_bm.GetHeight();
5998  img_height = h;
5999 
6000  dc.DrawBitmap(os_bm, lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2, lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2,
6001  true);
6002 
6003  // Reference point, where the GPS antenna is
6004  int circle_rad = 3;
6005  if (m_pos_image_user) circle_rad = 1;
6006 
6007  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), 1));
6008  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UIBCK" ))));
6009  dc.StrokeCircle(lShipMidPoint.x, lShipMidPoint.y, circle_rad);
6010 
6011  // Maintain dirty box,, missing in __WXMSW__ library
6012  dc.CalcBoundingBox(lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2, lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2);
6013  dc.CalcBoundingBox(lShipMidPoint.x - w / 2 + w,
6014  lShipMidPoint.y - h / 2 + h);
6015  }
6016  } // ownship draw
6017  }
6018 
6019  ShipIndicatorsDraw(dc, img_height, GPSOffsetPixels, lGPSPoint);
6020 }
6021 
6022 /* @ChartCanvas::CalcGridSpacing
6023  **
6024  ** Calculate the major and minor spacing between the lat/lon grid
6025  **
6026  ** @param [r] WindowDegrees [float] displayed number of lat or lan in the
6027  *window
6028  ** @param [w] MajorSpacing [float &] Major distance between grid lines
6029  ** @param [w] MinorSpacing [float &] Minor distance between grid lines
6030  ** @return [void]
6031  */
6032 void CalcGridSpacing(float view_scale_ppm, float &MajorSpacing,
6033  float &MinorSpacing) {
6034  // table for calculating the distance between the grids
6035  // [0] view_scale ppm
6036  // [1] spacing between major grid lines in degrees
6037  // [2] spacing between minor grid lines in degrees
6038  const float lltab[][3] = {{0.0f, 90.0f, 30.0f},
6039  {.000001f, 45.0f, 15.0f},
6040  {.0002f, 30.0f, 10.0f},
6041  {.0003f, 10.0f, 2.0f},
6042  {.0008f, 5.0f, 1.0f},
6043  {.001f, 2.0f, 30.0f / 60.0f},
6044  {.003f, 1.0f, 20.0f / 60.0f},
6045  {.006f, 0.5f, 10.0f / 60.0f},
6046  {.03f, 15.0f / 60.0f, 5.0f / 60.0f},
6047  {.01f, 10.0f / 60.0f, 2.0f / 60.0f},
6048  {.06f, 5.0f / 60.0f, 1.0f / 60.0f},
6049  {.1f, 2.0f / 60.0f, 1.0f / 60.0f},
6050  {.4f, 1.0f / 60.0f, 0.5f / 60.0f},
6051  {.6f, 0.5f / 60.0f, 0.1f / 60.0f},
6052  {1.0f, 0.2f / 60.0f, 0.1f / 60.0f},
6053  {1e10f, 0.1f / 60.0f, 0.05f / 60.0f}};
6054 
6055  unsigned int tabi;
6056  for (tabi = 0; tabi < ((sizeof lltab) / (sizeof *lltab)) - 1; tabi++)
6057  if (view_scale_ppm < lltab[tabi][0]) break;
6058  MajorSpacing = lltab[tabi][1]; // major latitude distance
6059  MinorSpacing = lltab[tabi][2]; // minor latitude distance
6060  return;
6061 }
6062 /* @ChartCanvas::CalcGridText *************************************
6063  **
6064  ** Calculates text to display at the major grid lines
6065  **
6066  ** @param [r] latlon [float] latitude or longitude of grid line
6067  ** @param [r] spacing [float] distance between two major grid lines
6068  ** @param [r] bPostfix [bool] true for latitudes, false for longitudes
6069  **
6070  ** @return
6071  */
6072 
6073 wxString CalcGridText(float latlon, float spacing, bool bPostfix) {
6074  int deg = (int)fabs(latlon); // degrees
6075  float min = fabs((fabs(latlon) - deg) * 60.0); // Minutes
6076  char postfix;
6077 
6078  // calculate postfix letter (NSEW)
6079  if (latlon > 0.0) {
6080  if (bPostfix) {
6081  postfix = 'N';
6082  } else {
6083  postfix = 'E';
6084  }
6085  } else if (latlon < 0.0) {
6086  if (bPostfix) {
6087  postfix = 'S';
6088  } else {
6089  postfix = 'W';
6090  }
6091  } else {
6092  postfix = ' '; // no postfix for equator and greenwich
6093  }
6094  // calculate text, display minutes only if spacing is smaller than one degree
6095 
6096  wxString ret;
6097  if (spacing >= 1.0) {
6098  ret.Printf(_T("%3d%c %c"), deg, 0x00b0, postfix);
6099  } else if (spacing >= (1.0 / 60.0)) {
6100  ret.Printf(_T("%3d%c%02.0f %c"), deg, 0x00b0, min, postfix);
6101  } else {
6102  ret.Printf(_T("%3d%c%02.2f %c"), deg, 0x00b0, min, postfix);
6103  }
6104 
6105  return ret;
6106 }
6107 
6108 /* @ChartCanvas::GridDraw *****************************************
6109  **
6110  ** Draws major and minor Lat/Lon Grid on the chart
6111  ** - distance between Grid-lm ines are calculated automatic
6112  ** - major grid lines will be across the whole chart window
6113  ** - minor grid lines will be 10 pixel at each edge of the chart window.
6114  **
6115  ** @param [w] dc [wxDC&] the wx drawing context
6116  **
6117  ** @return [void]
6118  ************************************************************************/
6119 void ChartCanvas::GridDraw(ocpnDC &dc) {
6120  if (!(m_bDisplayGrid && (fabs(GetVP().rotation) < 1e-5))) return;
6121 
6122  double nlat, elon, slat, wlon;
6123  float lat, lon;
6124  float dlon;
6125  float gridlatMajor, gridlatMinor, gridlonMajor, gridlonMinor;
6126  wxCoord w, h;
6127  wxPen GridPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "SNDG1" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6128  dc.SetPen(GridPen);
6129  dc.SetFont(*m_pgridFont);
6130  dc.SetTextForeground(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "SNDG1" )));
6131 
6132  w = m_canvas_width;
6133  h = m_canvas_height;
6134 
6135  GetCanvasPixPoint(0, 0, nlat,
6136  wlon); // get lat/lon of upper left point of the window
6137  GetCanvasPixPoint(w, h, slat,
6138  elon); // get lat/lon of lower right point of the window
6139  dlon =
6140  elon -
6141  wlon; // calculate how many degrees of longitude are shown in the window
6142  if (dlon < 0.0) // concider datum border at 180 degrees longitude
6143  {
6144  dlon = dlon + 360.0;
6145  }
6146  // calculate distance between latitude grid lines
6147  CalcGridSpacing(GetVP().view_scale_ppm, gridlatMajor, gridlatMinor);
6148 
6149  // calculate position of first major latitude grid line
6150  lat = ceil(slat / gridlatMajor) * gridlatMajor;
6151 
6152  // Draw Major latitude grid lines and text
6153  while (lat < nlat) {
6154  wxPoint r;
6155  wxString st =
6156  CalcGridText(lat, gridlatMajor, true); // get text for grid line
6157  GetCanvasPointPix(lat, (elon + wlon) / 2, &r);
6158  dc.DrawLine(0, r.y, w, r.y, false); // draw grid line
6159  dc.DrawText(st, 0, r.y); // draw text
6160  lat = lat + gridlatMajor;
6161 
6162  if (fabs(lat - wxRound(lat)) < 1e-5) lat = wxRound(lat);
6163  }
6164 
6165  // calculate position of first minor latitude grid line
6166  lat = ceil(slat / gridlatMinor) * gridlatMinor;
6167 
6168  // Draw minor latitude grid lines
6169  while (lat < nlat) {
6170  wxPoint r;
6171  GetCanvasPointPix(lat, (elon + wlon) / 2, &r);
6172  dc.DrawLine(0, r.y, 10, r.y, false);
6173  dc.DrawLine(w - 10, r.y, w, r.y, false);
6174  lat = lat + gridlatMinor;
6175  }
6176 
6177  // calculate distance between grid lines
6178  CalcGridSpacing(GetVP().view_scale_ppm, gridlonMajor, gridlonMinor);
6179 
6180  // calculate position of first major latitude grid line
6181  lon = ceil(wlon / gridlonMajor) * gridlonMajor;
6182 
6183  // draw major longitude grid lines
6184  for (int i = 0, itermax = (int)(dlon / gridlonMajor); i <= itermax; i++) {
6185  wxPoint r;
6186  wxString st = CalcGridText(lon, gridlonMajor, false);
6187  GetCanvasPointPix((nlat + slat) / 2, lon, &r);
6188  dc.DrawLine(r.x, 0, r.x, h, false);
6189  dc.DrawText(st, r.x, 0);
6190  lon = lon + gridlonMajor;
6191  if (lon > 180.0) {
6192  lon = lon - 360.0;
6193  }
6194 
6195  if (fabs(lon - wxRound(lon)) < 1e-5) lon = wxRound(lon);
6196  }
6197 
6198  // calculate position of first minor longitude grid line
6199  lon = ceil(wlon / gridlonMinor) * gridlonMinor;
6200  // draw minor longitude grid lines
6201  for (int i = 0, itermax = (int)(dlon / gridlonMinor); i <= itermax; i++) {
6202  wxPoint r;
6203  GetCanvasPointPix((nlat + slat) / 2, lon, &r);
6204  dc.DrawLine(r.x, 0, r.x, 10, false);
6205  dc.DrawLine(r.x, h - 10, r.x, h, false);
6206  lon = lon + gridlonMinor;
6207  if (lon > 180.0) {
6208  lon = lon - 360.0;
6209  }
6210  }
6211 }
6212 
6213 void ChartCanvas::ScaleBarDraw(ocpnDC &dc) {
6214  if (0 ) {
6215  double blat, blon, tlat, tlon;
6216  wxPoint r;
6217 
6218  int x_origin = m_bDisplayGrid ? 60 : 20;
6219  int y_origin = m_canvas_height - 50;
6220 
6221  float dist;
6222  int count;
6223  wxPen pen1, pen2;
6224 
6225  if (GetVP().chart_scale > 80000) // Draw 10 mile scale as SCALEB11
6226  {
6227  dist = 10.0;
6228  count = 5;
6229  pen1 = wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "SNDG2" )), 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6230  pen2 = wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "SNDG1" )), 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6231  } else // Draw 1 mile scale as SCALEB10
6232  {
6233  dist = 1.0;
6234  count = 10;
6235  pen1 = wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "SCLBR" )), 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6236  pen2 = wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "CHGRD" )), 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6237  }
6238 
6239  GetCanvasPixPoint(x_origin, y_origin, blat, blon);
6240  double rotation = -VPoint.rotation;
6241 
6242  ll_gc_ll(blat, blon, rotation * 180 / PI, dist, &tlat, &tlon);
6243  GetCanvasPointPix(tlat, tlon, &r);
6244  int l1 = (y_origin - r.y) / count;
6245 
6246  for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
6247  int y = l1 * i;
6248  if (i & 1)
6249  dc.SetPen(pen1);
6250  else
6251  dc.SetPen(pen2);
6252 
6253  dc.DrawLine(x_origin, y_origin - y, x_origin, y_origin - (y + l1));
6254  }
6255  } else {
6256  double blat, blon, tlat, tlon;
6257 
6258  int x_origin = 5.0 * GetPixPerMM();
6259  int chartbar_height = GetChartbarHeight();
6260  // ocpnStyle::Style* style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
6261  // if (style->chartStatusWindowTransparent)
6262  // chartbar_height = 0;
6263  int y_origin = m_canvas_height - chartbar_height - 5;
6264 #ifdef __WXOSX__
6265  if (!g_bopengl)
6266  y_origin = m_canvas_height/GetContentScaleFactor() - chartbar_height - 5;
6267 #endif
6268 
6269  GetCanvasPixPoint(x_origin, y_origin, blat, blon);
6270  GetCanvasPixPoint(x_origin + m_canvas_width, y_origin, tlat, tlon);
6271 
6272  double d;
6273  ll_gc_ll_reverse(blat, blon, tlat, tlon, 0, &d);
6274  d /= 2;
6275 
6276  int unit = g_iDistanceFormat;
6277  if (d < .5 &&
6278  (unit == DISTANCE_KM || unit == DISTANCE_MI || unit == DISTANCE_NMI))
6279  unit = (unit == DISTANCE_MI) ? DISTANCE_FT : DISTANCE_M;
6280 
6281  // nice number
6282  float dist = toUsrDistance(d, unit), logdist = log(dist) / log(10.F);
6283  float places = floor(logdist), rem = logdist - places;
6284  dist = pow(10, places);
6285 
6286  if (rem < .2)
6287  dist /= 5;
6288  else if (rem < .5)
6289  dist /= 2;
6290 
6291  wxString s = wxString::Format(_T("%g "), dist) + getUsrDistanceUnit(unit);
6292  wxPen pen1 = wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )), 3, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
6293  double rotation = -VPoint.rotation;
6294 
6295  ll_gc_ll(blat, blon, rotation * 180 / PI + 90, fromUsrDistance(dist, unit),
6296  &tlat, &tlon);
6297  wxPoint r;
6298  GetCanvasPointPix(tlat, tlon, &r);
6299  int l1 = r.x - x_origin;
6300 
6301  m_scaleBarRect = wxRect(x_origin, y_origin - 12, l1,
6302  12); // Store this for later reference
6303 
6304  dc.SetPen(pen1);
6305 
6306  dc.DrawLine(x_origin, y_origin, x_origin, y_origin - 12);
6307  dc.DrawLine(x_origin, y_origin, x_origin + l1, y_origin);
6308  dc.DrawLine(x_origin + l1, y_origin, x_origin + l1, y_origin - 12);
6309 
6310  dc.SetFont(*m_pgridFont);
6311  dc.SetTextForeground(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )));
6312  int w, h;
6313  dc.GetTextExtent(s, &w, &h);
6314  dc.DrawText(s, x_origin + l1 / 2 - w / 2, y_origin - h - 1);
6315  }
6316 }
6317 
6318 void ChartCanvas::JaggyCircle(ocpnDC &dc, wxPen pen, int x, int y, int radius) {
6319  // Constants?
6320  double da_min = 2.;
6321  double da_max = 6.;
6322  double ra_min = 0.;
6323  double ra_max = 40.;
6324 
6325  wxPen pen_save = dc.GetPen();
6326 
6327  wxDateTime now = wxDateTime::Now();
6328 
6329  dc.SetPen(pen);
6330 
6331  int x0, y0, x1, y1;
6332 
6333  x0 = x1 = x + radius; // Start point
6334  y0 = y1 = y;
6335  double angle = 0.;
6336  int i = 0;
6337 
6338  while (angle < 360.) {
6339  double da = da_min + (((double)rand() / RAND_MAX) * (da_max - da_min));
6340  angle += da;
6341 
6342  if (angle > 360.) angle = 360.;
6343 
6344  double ra = ra_min + (((double)rand() / RAND_MAX) * (ra_max - ra_min));
6345 
6346  double r;
6347  if (i & 1)
6348  r = radius + ra;
6349  else
6350  r = radius - ra;
6351 
6352  x1 = (int)(x + cos(angle * PI / 180.) * r);
6353  y1 = (int)(y + sin(angle * PI / 180.) * r);
6354 
6355  dc.DrawLine(x0, y0, x1, y1);
6356 
6357  x0 = x1;
6358  y0 = y1;
6359 
6360  i++;
6361  }
6362 
6363  dc.DrawLine(x + radius, y, x1, y1); // closure
6364 
6365  dc.SetPen(pen_save);
6366 }
6367 
6368 static bool bAnchorSoundPlaying = false;
6369 
6370 static void onAnchorSoundFinished(void *ptr) {
6371  g_anchorwatch_sound->UnLoad();
6372  bAnchorSoundPlaying = false;
6373 }
6374 
6375 void ChartCanvas::AlertDraw(ocpnDC &dc) {
6376  // Visual and audio alert for anchorwatch goes here
6377  bool play_sound = false;
6378  if (pAnchorWatchPoint1 && AnchorAlertOn1) {
6379  if (AnchorAlertOn1) {
6380  wxPoint TargetPoint;
6381  GetCanvasPointPix(pAnchorWatchPoint1->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint1->m_lon,
6382  &TargetPoint);
6383  JaggyCircle(dc, wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T("URED")), 2), TargetPoint.x,
6384  TargetPoint.y, 100);
6385  play_sound = true;
6386  }
6387  } else
6388  AnchorAlertOn1 = false;
6389 
6390  if (pAnchorWatchPoint2 && AnchorAlertOn2) {
6391  if (AnchorAlertOn2) {
6392  wxPoint TargetPoint;
6393  GetCanvasPointPix(pAnchorWatchPoint2->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint2->m_lon,
6394  &TargetPoint);
6395  JaggyCircle(dc, wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T("URED")), 2), TargetPoint.x,
6396  TargetPoint.y, 100);
6397  play_sound = true;
6398  }
6399  } else
6400  AnchorAlertOn2 = false;
6401 
6402  if (play_sound) {
6403  if(!bAnchorSoundPlaying) {
6404  auto cmd_sound = dynamic_cast<SystemCmdSound*>(g_anchorwatch_sound);
6405  if (cmd_sound) cmd_sound->SetCmd(g_CmdSoundString.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
6406  g_anchorwatch_sound->Load(g_anchorwatch_sound_file);
6407  if (g_anchorwatch_sound->IsOk()) {
6408  bAnchorSoundPlaying = true;
6409  g_anchorwatch_sound->SetFinishedCallback(onAnchorSoundFinished, NULL);
6410  g_anchorwatch_sound->Play();
6411  }
6412  }
6413  }
6414 }
6415 
6416 void ChartCanvas::UpdateShips() {
6417  // Get the rectangle in the current dc which bounds the "ownship" symbol
6418 
6419  wxClientDC dc(this);
6420  if (!dc.IsOk()) return;
6421 
6422  wxBitmap test_bitmap(dc.GetSize().x, dc.GetSize().y);
6423  wxMemoryDC temp_dc(test_bitmap);
6424 
6425  temp_dc.ResetBoundingBox();
6426  temp_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
6427  temp_dc.SetClippingRegion(0, 0, dc.GetSize().x, dc.GetSize().y);
6428 
6429  // Draw the ownship on the temp_dc
6430  ocpnDC ocpndc = ocpnDC(temp_dc);
6431  ShipDraw(ocpndc);
6432 
6433  if (g_pActiveTrack && g_pActiveTrack->IsRunning()) {
6434  TrackPoint *p = g_pActiveTrack->GetLastPoint();
6435  if (p) {
6436  wxPoint px;
6437  GetCanvasPointPix(p->m_lat, p->m_lon, &px);
6438  ocpndc.CalcBoundingBox(px.x, px.y);
6439  }
6440  }
6441 
6442  ship_draw_rect =
6443  wxRect(temp_dc.MinX(), temp_dc.MinY(), temp_dc.MaxX() - temp_dc.MinX(),
6444  temp_dc.MaxY() - temp_dc.MinY());
6445 
6446  wxRect own_ship_update_rect = ship_draw_rect;
6447 
6448  if (!own_ship_update_rect.IsEmpty()) {
6449  // The required invalidate rectangle is the union of the last drawn
6450  // rectangle and this drawn rectangle
6451  own_ship_update_rect.Union(ship_draw_last_rect);
6452  own_ship_update_rect.Inflate(2);
6453  }
6454 
6455  if (!own_ship_update_rect.IsEmpty()) RefreshRect(own_ship_update_rect, false);
6456 
6457  ship_draw_last_rect = ship_draw_rect;
6458 
6459  temp_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
6460 }
6461 
6462 void ChartCanvas::UpdateAlerts() {
6463  // Get the rectangle in the current dc which bounds the detected Alert
6464  // targets
6465 
6466  // Use this dc
6467  wxClientDC dc(this);
6468 
6469  // Get dc boundary
6470  int sx, sy;
6471  dc.GetSize(&sx, &sy);
6472 
6473  // Need a bitmap
6474  wxBitmap test_bitmap(sx, sy, -1);
6475 
6476  // Create a memory DC
6477  wxMemoryDC temp_dc;
6478  temp_dc.SelectObject(test_bitmap);
6479 
6480  temp_dc.ResetBoundingBox();
6481  temp_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
6482  temp_dc.SetClippingRegion(wxRect(0, 0, sx, sy));
6483 
6484  // Draw the Alert Targets on the temp_dc
6485  ocpnDC ocpndc = ocpnDC(temp_dc);
6486  AlertDraw(ocpndc);
6487 
6488  // Retrieve the drawing extents
6489  wxRect alert_rect(temp_dc.MinX(), temp_dc.MinY(),
6490  temp_dc.MaxX() - temp_dc.MinX(),
6491  temp_dc.MaxY() - temp_dc.MinY());
6492 
6493  if (!alert_rect.IsEmpty())
6494  alert_rect.Inflate(2); // clear all drawing artifacts
6495 
6496  if (!alert_rect.IsEmpty() || !alert_draw_rect.IsEmpty()) {
6497  // The required invalidate rectangle is the union of the last drawn
6498  // rectangle and this drawn rectangle
6499  wxRect alert_update_rect = alert_draw_rect;
6500  alert_update_rect.Union(alert_rect);
6501 
6502  // Invalidate the rectangular region
6503  RefreshRect(alert_update_rect, false);
6504  }
6505 
6506  // Save this rectangle for next time
6507  alert_draw_rect = alert_rect;
6508 
6509  temp_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap); // clean up
6510 }
6511 
6512 void ChartCanvas::UpdateAIS() {
6513  if (!g_pAIS) return;
6514 
6515  // Get the rectangle in the current dc which bounds the detected AIS targets
6516 
6517  // Use this dc
6518  wxClientDC dc(this);
6519 
6520  // Get dc boundary
6521  int sx, sy;
6522  dc.GetSize(&sx, &sy);
6523 
6524  wxRect ais_rect;
6525 
6526  // How many targets are there?
6527 
6528  // If more than "some number", it will be cheaper to refresh the entire
6529  // screen than to build update rectangles for each target.
6530  if (g_pAIS->GetTargetList().size() > 10) {
6531  ais_rect = wxRect(0, 0, sx, sy); // full screen
6532  } else {
6533  // Need a bitmap
6534  wxBitmap test_bitmap(sx, sy, -1);
6535 
6536  // Create a memory DC
6537  wxMemoryDC temp_dc;
6538  temp_dc.SelectObject(test_bitmap);
6539 
6540  temp_dc.ResetBoundingBox();
6541  temp_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
6542  temp_dc.SetClippingRegion(wxRect(0, 0, sx, sy));
6543 
6544  // Draw the AIS Targets on the temp_dc
6545  ocpnDC ocpndc = ocpnDC(temp_dc);
6546  AISDraw(ocpndc, GetVP(), this);
6547  AISDrawAreaNotices(ocpndc, GetVP(), this);
6548 
6549  // Retrieve the drawing extents
6550  ais_rect =
6551  wxRect(temp_dc.MinX(), temp_dc.MinY(), temp_dc.MaxX() - temp_dc.MinX(),
6552  temp_dc.MaxY() - temp_dc.MinY());
6553 
6554  if (!ais_rect.IsEmpty())
6555  ais_rect.Inflate(2); // clear all drawing artifacts
6556 
6557  temp_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap); // clean up
6558  }
6559 
6560  if (!ais_rect.IsEmpty() || !ais_draw_rect.IsEmpty()) {
6561  // The required invalidate rectangle is the union of the last drawn
6562  // rectangle and this drawn rectangle
6563  wxRect ais_update_rect = ais_draw_rect;
6564  ais_update_rect.Union(ais_rect);
6565 
6566  // Invalidate the rectangular region
6567  RefreshRect(ais_update_rect, false);
6568  }
6569 
6570  // Save this rectangle for next time
6571  ais_draw_rect = ais_rect;
6572 }
6573 
6574 void ChartCanvas::ToggleCPAWarn() {
6575  g_bCPAWarn = !g_bCPAWarn;
6576  wxString mess = _("ON");
6577  if (!g_bCPAWarn) {
6578  g_bTCPA_Max = false;
6579  mess = _("OFF");
6580  }
6581  else { g_bTCPA_Max = true; }
6582  // Print to status bar if available.
6583  if (STAT_FIELD_SCALE >= 4 && parent_frame->GetStatusBar()) {
6584  parent_frame->SetStatusText(_("CPA alarm ") + mess, STAT_FIELD_SCALE);
6585  }
6586  else {
6587  OCPNMessageBox(this,
6588  _("CPA Alarm is switched") + _T(" ") + mess.MakeLower(),
6589  _("CPA") + _T(" ") + mess, 4, 4);
6590  }
6591 }
6592 
6593 void ChartCanvas::OnActivate(wxActivateEvent &event) { ReloadVP(); }
6594 
6595 void ChartCanvas::OnSize(wxSizeEvent &event) {
6596  if ((event.m_size.GetWidth() < 1) || (event.m_size.GetHeight() < 1))
6597  return;
6598  GetClientSize(&m_canvas_width, &m_canvas_height);
6599 
6600 #ifdef __WXOSX__
6601  // Support scaled HDPI displays.
6602  m_displayScale = GetContentScaleFactor();
6603 #endif
6604 
6605 
6606  m_canvas_width *= m_displayScale;
6607  m_canvas_height *= m_displayScale;
6608 
6609  // Resize the current viewport
6610  VPoint.pix_width = m_canvas_width;
6611  VPoint.pix_height = m_canvas_height;
6612 
6613  // Get some canvas metrics
6614 
6615  // Rescale to current value, in order to rebuild VPoint data
6616  // structures for new canvas size
6617  SetVPScale(GetVPScale());
6618 
6619  m_absolute_min_scale_ppm =
6620  m_canvas_width /
6621  (1.2 * WGS84_semimajor_axis_meters * PI); // something like 180 degrees
6622 
6623  // Inform the parent Frame that I am being resized...
6624  gFrame->ProcessCanvasResize();
6625 
6626  // if MUIBar is active, size the bar
6627  // if(g_useMUI && !m_muiBar){ // rebuild if
6628  // necessary
6629  // m_muiBar = new MUIBar(this, wxHORIZONTAL);
6630  // m_muiBarHOSize = m_muiBar->GetSize();
6631  // }
6632 
6633  if (m_muiBar) {
6634  SetMUIBarPosition();
6635  UpdateFollowButtonState();
6636  m_muiBar->SetCanvasENCAvailable(m_bENCGroup);
6637  m_muiBar->Raise();
6638  }
6639 
6640  // Set up the scroll margins
6641  xr_margin = m_canvas_width * 95 / 100;
6642  xl_margin = m_canvas_width * 5 / 100;
6643  yt_margin = m_canvas_height * 5 / 100;
6644  yb_margin = m_canvas_height * 95 / 100;
6645 
6646  if (m_pQuilt)
6647  m_pQuilt->SetQuiltParameters(m_canvas_scale_factor, m_canvas_width);
6648 
6649  // Resize the scratch BM
6650  delete pscratch_bm;
6651  pscratch_bm = new wxBitmap(VPoint.pix_width, VPoint.pix_height, -1);
6652  m_brepaint_piano = true;
6653 
6654  // Resize the Route Calculation BM
6655  m_dc_route.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
6656  delete proute_bm;
6657  proute_bm = new wxBitmap(VPoint.pix_width, VPoint.pix_height, -1);
6658  m_dc_route.SelectObject(*proute_bm);
6659 
6660  // Resize the saved Bitmap
6661  m_cached_chart_bm.Create(VPoint.pix_width, VPoint.pix_height, -1);
6662 
6663  // Resize the working Bitmap
6664  m_working_bm.Create(VPoint.pix_width, VPoint.pix_height, -1);
6665 
6666  // Rescale again, to capture all the changes for new canvas size
6667  SetVPScale(GetVPScale());
6668 
6669 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
6670  if (/*g_bopengl &&*/ m_glcc) {
6671  //FIXME (dave) This can go away?
6672  m_glcc->OnSize(event);
6673  }
6674 #endif
6675 
6676  FormatPianoKeys();
6677  // Invalidate the whole window
6678  ReloadVP();
6679 }
6680 
6681 void ChartCanvas::ProcessNewGUIScale() {
6682  m_muiBar->Hide();
6683  delete m_muiBar;
6684  m_muiBar = 0;
6685 
6686  CreateMUIBar();
6687 }
6688 
6689 void ChartCanvas::CreateMUIBar() {
6690  if (g_useMUI && !m_muiBar) { // rebuild if necessary
6691 
6692  // We need to update the m_bENCGroup flag, at least for the initial creation
6693  // of a MUIBar
6694  if (ChartData) m_bENCGroup = ChartData->IsENCInGroup(m_groupIndex);
6695 
6696  m_muiBar = new MUIBar(this, wxHORIZONTAL, g_toolbar_scalefactor);
6697  m_muiBar->SetColorScheme(m_cs);
6698  m_muiBarHOSize = m_muiBar->GetSize();
6699  }
6700 
6701  if (m_muiBar) {
6702  SetMUIBarPosition();
6703  UpdateFollowButtonState();
6704  m_muiBar->UpdateDynamicValues();
6705  m_muiBar->SetCanvasENCAvailable(m_bENCGroup);
6706  m_muiBar->Raise();
6707  }
6708 }
6709 
6710 void ChartCanvas::SetMUIBarPosition() {
6711  // if MUIBar is active, size the bar
6712  if (m_muiBar) {
6713  // We precalculate the piano width based on the canvas width
6714  int pianoWidth = GetClientSize().x * (g_btouch ? 0.7f : 0.6f);
6715  // if(m_Piano)
6716  // pianoWidth = m_Piano->GetWidth();
6717 
6718  if ((m_muiBar->GetOrientation() == wxHORIZONTAL)) {
6719  if (m_muiBarHOSize.x > (GetClientSize().x - pianoWidth)) {
6720  delete m_muiBar;
6721  m_muiBar = new MUIBar(this, wxVERTICAL, g_toolbar_scalefactor);
6722  }
6723  }
6724 
6725  if ((m_muiBar->GetOrientation() == wxVERTICAL)) {
6726  if (m_muiBarHOSize.x < (GetClientSize().x - pianoWidth)) {
6727  delete m_muiBar;
6728  m_muiBar = new MUIBar(this, wxHORIZONTAL, g_toolbar_scalefactor);
6729  }
6730  }
6731 
6732  m_muiBar->SetBestPosition();
6733  }
6734 }
6735 
6736 void ChartCanvas::DestroyMuiBar() {
6737  if (m_muiBar) {
6738  m_muiBar->Destroy();
6739  m_muiBar = NULL;
6740  }
6741 }
6742 
6743 void ChartCanvas::ShowChartInfoWindow(int x, int dbIndex) {
6744  if (dbIndex >= 0) {
6745  if (NULL == m_pCIWin) {
6746  m_pCIWin = new ChInfoWin(this);
6747  m_pCIWin->Hide();
6748  }
6749 
6750  if (!m_pCIWin->IsShown() || (m_pCIWin->dbIndex != dbIndex)) {
6751  wxString s;
6752  ChartBase *pc = NULL;
6753 
6754  // TOCTOU race but worst case will reload chart.
6755  // need to lock it or the background spooler may evict charts in
6756  // OpenChartFromDBAndLock
6757  if ((ChartData->IsChartInCache(dbIndex)) && ChartData->IsValid())
6758  pc = ChartData->OpenChartFromDBAndLock(
6759  dbIndex, FULL_INIT); // this must come from cache
6760 
6761  int char_width, char_height;
6762  s = ChartData->GetFullChartInfo(pc, dbIndex, &char_width, &char_height);
6763  if (pc) ChartData->UnLockCacheChart(dbIndex);
6764 
6765  m_pCIWin->SetString(s);
6766  m_pCIWin->FitToChars(char_width, char_height);
6767 
6768  wxPoint p;
6769  p.x = x / GetContentScaleFactor();
6770  if ((p.x + m_pCIWin->GetWinSize().x) > (m_canvas_width / GetContentScaleFactor()))
6771  p.x = ((m_canvas_width / GetContentScaleFactor())
6772  - m_pCIWin->GetWinSize().x) / 2; // centered
6773 
6774  p.y =
6775  (m_canvas_height - m_Piano->GetHeight()) / GetContentScaleFactor()
6776  - 4 - m_pCIWin->GetWinSize().y;
6777 
6778  m_pCIWin->dbIndex = dbIndex;
6779  m_pCIWin->SetPosition(p);
6780  m_pCIWin->SetBitmap();
6781  m_pCIWin->Refresh();
6782  m_pCIWin->Show();
6783  }
6784  } else {
6785  HideChartInfoWindow();
6786  }
6787 }
6788 
6789 void ChartCanvas::HideChartInfoWindow(void) {
6790  if (m_pCIWin /*&& m_pCIWin->IsShown()*/) {
6791  m_pCIWin->Hide();
6792  m_pCIWin->Destroy();
6793  m_pCIWin = NULL;
6794 
6795 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
6796  androidForceFullRepaint();
6797 #endif
6798  }
6799 }
6800 
6801 void ChartCanvas::PanTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
6802  wxMouseEvent ev(wxEVT_MOTION);
6803  ev.m_x = mouse_x;
6804  ev.m_y = mouse_y;
6805  ev.m_leftDown = mouse_leftisdown;
6806 
6807  wxEvtHandler *evthp = GetEventHandler();
6808 
6809  ::wxPostEvent(evthp, ev);
6810 }
6811 
6812 void ChartCanvas::MovementTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &) { DoTimedMovement(); }
6813 
6814 void ChartCanvas::MovementStopTimerEvent(wxTimerEvent &) { StopMovement(); }
6815 
6816 bool ChartCanvas::CheckEdgePan(int x, int y, bool bdragging, int margin,
6817  int delta) {
6818  if (m_disable_edge_pan) return false;
6819 
6820  bool bft = false;
6821  int pan_margin = m_canvas_width * margin / 100;
6822  int pan_timer_set = 200;
6823  double pan_delta = GetVP().pix_width * delta / 100;
6824  int pan_x = 0;
6825  int pan_y = 0;
6826 
6827  if (x > m_canvas_width - pan_margin) {
6828  bft = true;
6829  pan_x = pan_delta;
6830  }
6831 
6832  else if (x < pan_margin) {
6833  bft = true;
6834  pan_x = -pan_delta;
6835  }
6836 
6837  if (y < pan_margin) {
6838  bft = true;
6839  pan_y = -pan_delta;
6840  }
6841 
6842  else if (y > m_canvas_height - pan_margin) {
6843  bft = true;
6844  pan_y = pan_delta;
6845  }
6846 
6847  // Of course, if dragging, and the mouse left button is not down, we must
6848  // stop the event injection
6849  if (bdragging) {
6850  if (!g_btouch) {
6851  wxMouseState state = ::wxGetMouseState();
6852 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
6853  if (!state.LeftIsDown())
6854 #else
6855  if (!state.LeftDown())
6856 #endif
6857  bft = false;
6858  }
6859  }
6860  if ((bft) && !pPanTimer->IsRunning()) {
6861  PanCanvas(pan_x, pan_y);
6862  pPanTimer->Start(pan_timer_set, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
6863  return true;
6864  }
6865 
6866  // This mouse event must not be due to pan timer event injector
6867  // Mouse is out of the pan zone, so prevent any orphan event injection
6868  if ((!bft) && pPanTimer->IsRunning()) {
6869  pPanTimer->Stop();
6870  }
6871 
6872  return (false);
6873 }
6874 
6875 // Look for waypoints at the current position.
6876 // Used to determine what a mouse event should act on.
6877 
6878 void ChartCanvas::FindRoutePointsAtCursor(float selectRadius,
6879  bool setBeingEdited) {
6880  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget = m_pRoutePointEditTarget; // save a copy
6881  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
6882  m_pFoundPoint = NULL;
6883 
6884  SelectItem *pFind = NULL;
6885  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
6886  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
6887  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
6888  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
6889  while (node) {
6890  pFind = node->GetData();
6891 
6892  RoutePoint *frp = (RoutePoint *)pFind->m_pData1;
6893 
6894  // Get an array of all routes using this point
6895  m_pEditRouteArray = g_pRouteMan->GetRouteArrayContaining(frp);
6896 
6897  // Use route array to determine actual visibility for the point
6898  bool brp_viz = false;
6899  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
6900  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount(); ir++) {
6901  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
6902  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
6903  brp_viz = true;
6904  break;
6905  }
6906  }
6907  } else
6908  brp_viz = frp->IsVisible(); // isolated point
6909 
6910  if (brp_viz) {
6911  // Use route array to rubberband all affected routes
6912  if (m_pEditRouteArray) // Editing Waypoint as part of route
6913  {
6914  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount(); ir++) {
6915  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
6916  pr->m_bIsBeingEdited = setBeingEdited;
6917  }
6918  m_bRouteEditing = setBeingEdited;
6919  } else // editing Mark
6920  {
6921  frp->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = setBeingEdited;
6922  m_bMarkEditing = setBeingEdited;
6923  }
6924 
6925  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = frp;
6926  m_pFoundPoint = pFind;
6927  break; // out of the while(node)
6928  }
6929 
6930  node = node->GetNext();
6931  } // while (node)
6932 }
6933 
6934 void ChartCanvas::MouseTimedEvent(wxTimerEvent &event) {
6935  if (singleClickEventIsValid) MouseEvent(singleClickEvent);
6936  singleClickEventIsValid = false;
6937  m_DoubleClickTimer->Stop();
6938 }
6939 
6940 bool leftIsDown;
6941 
6942 bool ChartCanvas::MouseEventOverlayWindows(wxMouseEvent &event) {
6943  if (!m_bChartDragging && !m_bDrawingRoute) {
6944  if (m_Compass && m_Compass->IsShown() &&
6945  m_Compass->GetRect().Contains(event.GetPosition())) {
6946  if (m_Compass->MouseEvent(event)) {
6947  cursor_region = CENTER;
6948  if (!g_btouch) SetCanvasCursor(event);
6949  return true;
6950  }
6951  }
6952 
6953  if (MouseEventChartBar(event)) return true;
6954  }
6955  return false;
6956 }
6957 
6958 bool ChartCanvas::MouseEventChartBar(wxMouseEvent &event) {
6959  if (!g_bShowChartBar) return false;
6960 
6961  if (!m_Piano->MouseEvent(event)) return false;
6962 
6963  cursor_region = CENTER;
6964  if (!g_btouch) SetCanvasCursor(event);
6965  return true;
6966 }
6967 
6968 bool ChartCanvas::MouseEventSetup(wxMouseEvent &event, bool b_handle_dclick) {
6969  int x, y;
6970 
6971  bool bret = false;
6972 
6973  event.GetPosition(&x, &y);
6974 
6975  x *= m_displayScale;
6976  y *= m_displayScale;
6977 
6978  m_MouseDragging = event.Dragging();
6979 
6980  // Some systems produce null drag events, where the pointer position has not
6981  // changed from the previous value. Detect this case, and abort further
6982  // processing (FS#1748)
6983 #ifdef __WXMSW__
6984  if (event.Dragging()) {
6985  if ((x == mouse_x) && (y == mouse_y)) return true;
6986  }
6987 #endif
6988 
6989  mouse_x = x;
6990  mouse_y = y;
6991  mouse_leftisdown = event.LeftDown();
6992  GetCanvasPixPoint(x, y, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon);
6993 
6994  // Establish the event region
6995  cursor_region = CENTER;
6996 
6997  int chartbar_height = GetChartbarHeight();
6998 
6999  if (m_Compass && m_Compass->IsShown() &&
7000  m_Compass->GetRect().Contains(event.GetPosition())) {
7001  cursor_region = CENTER;
7002  } else if (x > xr_margin) {
7003  cursor_region = MID_RIGHT;
7004  } else if (x < xl_margin) {
7005  cursor_region = MID_LEFT;
7006  } else if (y > yb_margin - chartbar_height &&
7007  y < m_canvas_height - chartbar_height) {
7008  cursor_region = MID_TOP;
7009  } else if (y < yt_margin) {
7010  cursor_region = MID_BOT;
7011  } else {
7012  cursor_region = CENTER;
7013  }
7014 
7015  if (!g_btouch) SetCanvasCursor(event);
7016 
7017  // Protect from leftUp's coming from event handlers in child
7018  // windows who return focus to the canvas.
7019  leftIsDown = event.LeftDown();
7020 
7021 #ifndef __WXOSX__
7022  if (event.LeftDown()) {
7023  if (g_bShowMenuBar == false && g_bTempShowMenuBar == true) {
7024  // The menu bar is temporarily visible due to alt having been pressed.
7025  // Clicking will hide it, and do nothing else.
7026  g_bTempShowMenuBar = false;
7027  parent_frame->ApplyGlobalSettings(false);
7028  return (true);
7029  }
7030  }
7031 #endif
7032 
7033  // Update modifiers here; some window managers never send the key event
7034  m_modkeys = 0;
7035  if (event.ControlDown()) m_modkeys |= wxMOD_CONTROL;
7036  if (event.AltDown()) m_modkeys |= wxMOD_ALT;
7037 
7038 #ifdef __WXMSW__
7039  // TODO Test carefully in other platforms, remove ifdef....
7040  if (event.ButtonDown() && !HasCapture()) CaptureMouse();
7041  if (event.ButtonUp() && HasCapture()) ReleaseMouse();
7042 #endif
7043 
7044  if (g_pi_manager)
7045  if (g_pi_manager->SendMouseEventToPlugins(event))
7046  return (true); // PlugIn did something, and does not want the canvas to
7047  // do anything else
7048 
7049  // Capture LeftUp's and time them, unless it already came from the timer.
7050 
7051  if (b_handle_dclick && event.LeftUp() && !singleClickEventIsValid) {
7052  // Ignore the second LeftUp after the DClick.
7053  if (m_DoubleClickTimer->IsRunning()) {
7054  m_DoubleClickTimer->Stop();
7055  return (true);
7056  }
7057 
7058  // Save the event for later running if there is no DClick.
7059  m_DoubleClickTimer->Start(350, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
7060  singleClickEvent = event;
7061  singleClickEventIsValid = true;
7062  return (true);
7063  }
7064 
7065  // This logic is necessary on MSW to handle the case where
7066  // a context (right-click) menu is dismissed without action
7067  // by clicking on the chart surface.
7068  // We need to avoid an unintentional pan by eating some clicks...
7069 #ifdef __WXMSW__
7070  if (event.LeftDown() || event.LeftUp() || event.Dragging()) {
7071  if (g_click_stop > 0) {
7072  g_click_stop--;
7073  return (true);
7074  }
7075  }
7076 #endif
7077 
7078  // Kick off the Rotation control timer
7079  if (GetUpMode() == COURSE_UP_MODE) {
7080  m_b_rot_hidef = false;
7081  pRotDefTimer->Start(500, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
7082  } else
7083  pRotDefTimer->Stop();
7084 
7085  // Retrigger the route leg / AIS target popup timer
7086  bool bRoll = !g_btouch;
7087 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
7088  bRoll = g_bRollover;
7089 #endif
7090  if (bRoll) {
7091  if ((m_pRouteRolloverWin && m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive()) ||
7092  (m_pTrackRolloverWin && m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive()) ||
7093  (m_pAISRolloverWin && m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive()))
7094  m_RolloverPopupTimer.Start(
7095  10,
7096  wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT); // faster response while the rollover is turned on
7097  else
7098  m_RolloverPopupTimer.Start(m_rollover_popup_timer_msec, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
7099  }
7100 
7101  // Retrigger the cursor tracking timer
7102  pCurTrackTimer->Start(m_curtrack_timer_msec, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
7103 
7104 // Show cursor position on Status Bar, if present
7105 // except for GTK, under which status bar updates are very slow
7106 // due to Update() call.
7107 // In this case, as a workaround, update the status window
7108 // after an interval timer (pCurTrackTimer) pops, which will happen
7109 // whenever the mouse has stopped moving for specified interval.
7110 // See the method OnCursorTrackTimerEvent()
7111 #if !defined(__WXGTK__) && !defined(__WXQT__)
7112  SetCursorStatus(m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon);
7113 #endif
7114 
7115  // Send the current cursor lat/lon to all PlugIns requesting it
7116  if (g_pi_manager) {
7117  // Occasionally, MSW will produce nonsense events on right click....
7118  // This results in an error in cursor geo position, so we skip this case
7119  if ((x >= 0) && (y >= 0))
7120  g_pi_manager->SendCursorLatLonToAllPlugIns(m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon);
7121  }
7122 
7123  if (!g_btouch) {
7124  if ((m_bMeasure_Active && (m_nMeasureState >= 2)) || (m_routeState > 1)) {
7125  wxPoint p = ClientToScreen(wxPoint(x, y));
7126 
7127  // Submerge the toolbar if necessary
7128  if (m_toolBar) {
7129  wxRect rect = m_toolBar->GetScreenRect();
7130  rect.Inflate(20);
7131  if (rect.Contains(p.x, p.y)) m_toolBar->Submerge();
7132  }
7133  }
7134  }
7135 
7136  if (1 ) {
7137  // Route Creation Rubber Banding
7138  if (m_routeState >= 2) {
7139  r_rband.x = x;
7140  r_rband.y = y;
7141  m_bDrawingRoute = true;
7142 
7143  if (!g_btouch) CheckEdgePan(x, y, event.Dragging(), 5, 2);
7144  Refresh(false);
7145  }
7146 
7147  // Measure Tool Rubber Banding
7148  if (m_bMeasure_Active && (m_nMeasureState >= 2)) {
7149  r_rband.x = x;
7150  r_rband.y = y;
7151  m_bDrawingRoute = true;
7152 
7153  if (!g_btouch) CheckEdgePan(x, y, event.Dragging(), 5, 2);
7154  Refresh(false);
7155  }
7156  }
7157  return bret;
7158 }
7159 
7160 void ChartCanvas::CallPopupMenu(int x, int y) {
7161  int mx, my;
7162  mx = x;
7163  my = y;
7164 
7165  last_drag.x = mx;
7166  last_drag.y = my;
7167  if (m_routeState) { // creating route?
7168  InvokeCanvasMenu(x, y, SELTYPE_ROUTECREATE);
7169  return;
7170  }
7171  // General Right Click
7172  // Look for selectable objects
7173  double slat, slon;
7174  slat = m_cursor_lat;
7175  slon = m_cursor_lon;
7176 
7177 #if defined(__WXMAC__) || defined(__OCPN__ANDROID__)
7178  wxScreenDC sdc;
7179  ocpnDC dc(sdc);
7180 #else
7181  wxClientDC cdc(GetParent());
7182  ocpnDC dc(cdc);
7183 #endif
7184 
7185  SelectItem *pFindAIS;
7186  SelectItem *pFindRP;
7187  SelectItem *pFindRouteSeg;
7188  SelectItem *pFindTrackSeg;
7189  SelectItem *pFindCurrent = NULL;
7190  SelectItem *pFindTide = NULL;
7191 
7192  // Deselect any current objects
7193  if (m_pSelectedRoute) {
7194  m_pSelectedRoute->m_bRtIsSelected = false; // Only one selection at a time
7195  m_pSelectedRoute->DeSelectRoute();
7196 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
7197  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc) {
7198  InvalidateGL();
7199  Update();
7200  } else
7201 #endif
7202  RouteGui(*m_pSelectedRoute).Draw(dc, this, GetVP().GetBBox());
7203  }
7204 
7205  if (m_pFoundRoutePoint) {
7206  m_pFoundRoutePoint->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
7207  RoutePointGui(*m_pFoundRoutePoint).Draw(dc, this);
7208  RefreshRect(m_pFoundRoutePoint->CurrentRect_in_DC);
7209  }
7210 
7213  if (g_btouch && m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
7214  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
7215  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
7216  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).EnableDragHandle(false);
7217  }
7218 
7219  // Get all the selectable things at the cursor
7220  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7221  pFindAIS = pSelectAIS->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_AISTARGET);
7222  pFindRP = pSelect->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
7223  pFindRouteSeg =
7224  pSelect->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT);
7225  pFindTrackSeg =
7226  pSelect->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT);
7227 
7228  if (m_bShowCurrent)
7229  pFindCurrent =
7230  pSelectTC->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_CURRENTPOINT);
7231 
7232  if (m_bShowTide) // look for tide stations
7233  pFindTide = pSelectTC->FindSelection(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_TIDEPOINT);
7234 
7235  int seltype = 0;
7236 
7237  // Try for AIS targets first
7238  if (pFindAIS) {
7239  m_FoundAIS_MMSI = pFindAIS->GetUserData();
7240 
7241  // Make sure the target data is available
7242  if (g_pAIS->Get_Target_Data_From_MMSI(m_FoundAIS_MMSI))
7243  seltype |= SELTYPE_AISTARGET;
7244  }
7245 
7246  // Now the various Route Parts
7247 
7248  m_pFoundRoutePoint = NULL;
7249  if (pFindRP) {
7250  RoutePoint *pFirstVizPoint = NULL;
7251  RoutePoint *pFoundActiveRoutePoint = NULL;
7252  RoutePoint *pFoundVizRoutePoint = NULL;
7253  Route *pSelectedActiveRoute = NULL;
7254  Route *pSelectedVizRoute = NULL;
7255 
7256  // There is at least one routepoint, so get the whole list
7257  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7258  SelectableItemList SelList =
7259  pSelect->FindSelectionList(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
7260  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7261  while (node) {
7262  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
7263 
7264  RoutePoint *prp = (RoutePoint *)pFindSel->m_pData1; // candidate
7265 
7266  // Get an array of all routes using this point
7267  wxArrayPtrVoid *proute_array = g_pRouteMan->GetRouteArrayContaining(prp);
7268 
7269  // Use route array (if any) to determine actual visibility for this point
7270  bool brp_viz = false;
7271  if (proute_array) {
7272  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < proute_array->GetCount(); ir++) {
7273  Route *pr = (Route *)proute_array->Item(ir);
7274  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7275  brp_viz = true;
7276  break;
7277  }
7278  }
7279  if (!brp_viz && prp->IsShared()) // is not visible as part of route,
7280  // but still exists as a waypoint
7281  brp_viz = prp->IsVisible(); // so treat as isolated point
7282 
7283  } else
7284  brp_viz = prp->IsVisible(); // isolated point
7285 
7286  if ((NULL == pFirstVizPoint) && brp_viz) pFirstVizPoint = prp;
7287 
7288  // Use route array to choose the appropriate route
7289  // Give preference to any active route, otherwise select the first visible
7290  // route in the array for this point
7291  m_pSelectedRoute = NULL;
7292  if (proute_array) {
7293  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < proute_array->GetCount(); ir++) {
7294  Route *pr = (Route *)proute_array->Item(ir);
7295  if (pr->m_bRtIsActive) {
7296  pSelectedActiveRoute = pr;
7297  pFoundActiveRoutePoint = prp;
7298  break;
7299  }
7300  }
7301 
7302  if (NULL == pSelectedVizRoute) {
7303  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < proute_array->GetCount(); ir++) {
7304  Route *pr = (Route *)proute_array->Item(ir);
7305  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7306  pSelectedVizRoute = pr;
7307  pFoundVizRoutePoint = prp;
7308  break;
7309  }
7310  }
7311  }
7312 
7313  delete proute_array;
7314  }
7315 
7316  node = node->GetNext();
7317  }
7318 
7319  // Now choose the "best" selections
7320  if (pFoundActiveRoutePoint) {
7321  m_pFoundRoutePoint = pFoundActiveRoutePoint;
7322  m_pSelectedRoute = pSelectedActiveRoute;
7323  } else if (pFoundVizRoutePoint) {
7324  m_pFoundRoutePoint = pFoundVizRoutePoint;
7325  m_pSelectedRoute = pSelectedVizRoute;
7326  } else
7327  // default is first visible point in list
7328  m_pFoundRoutePoint = pFirstVizPoint;
7329 
7330  if (m_pSelectedRoute) {
7331  if (m_pSelectedRoute->IsVisible()) seltype |= SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT;
7332  } else if (m_pFoundRoutePoint)
7333  seltype |= SELTYPE_MARKPOINT;
7334 
7335  // Highlite the selected point, to verify the proper right click
7336  // selection
7337  if (m_pFoundRoutePoint) {
7338  m_pFoundRoutePoint->m_bPtIsSelected = true;
7339  wxRect wp_rect;
7340  RoutePointGui(*m_pFoundRoutePoint).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &wp_rect);
7341  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
7342  }
7343  }
7344 
7345  // Note here that we use SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT to select tracks as well as
7346  // routes But call the popup handler with identifier appropriate to the type
7347  if (pFindRouteSeg) // there is at least one select item
7348  {
7349  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7350  SelectableItemList SelList =
7351  pSelect->FindSelectionList(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT);
7352 
7353  if (NULL == m_pSelectedRoute) // the case where a segment only is selected
7354  {
7355  // Choose the first visible route containing segment in the list
7356  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7357  while (node) {
7358  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
7359 
7360  Route *pr = (Route *)pFindSel->m_pData3;
7361  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7362  m_pSelectedRoute = pr;
7363  break;
7364  }
7365  node = node->GetNext();
7366  }
7367  }
7368 
7369  if (m_pSelectedRoute) {
7370  if (NULL == m_pFoundRoutePoint)
7371  m_pFoundRoutePoint = (RoutePoint *)pFindRouteSeg->m_pData1;
7372 
7373  m_pSelectedRoute->m_bRtIsSelected = !(seltype & SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
7374  if (m_pSelectedRoute->m_bRtIsSelected) {
7375 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
7376  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc) {
7377  InvalidateGL();
7378  Update();
7379  } else
7380 #endif
7381  RouteGui(*m_pSelectedRoute).Draw(dc, this, GetVP().GetBBox());
7382  }
7383 
7384  seltype |= SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT;
7385  }
7386  }
7387 
7388  if (pFindTrackSeg) {
7389  m_pSelectedTrack = NULL;
7390  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7391  SelectableItemList SelList =
7392  pSelect->FindSelectionList(ctx, slat, slon, SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT);
7393 
7394  // Choose the first visible track containing segment in the list
7395  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7396  while (node) {
7397  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
7398 
7399  Track *pt = (Track *)pFindSel->m_pData3;
7400  if (pt->IsVisible()) {
7401  m_pSelectedTrack = pt;
7402  break;
7403  }
7404  node = node->GetNext();
7405  }
7406 
7407  if (m_pSelectedTrack) seltype |= SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT;
7408  }
7409 
7410  bool bseltc = false;
7411  // if(0 == seltype)
7412  {
7413  if (pFindCurrent) {
7414  // There may be multiple current entries at the same point.
7415  // For example, there often is a current substation (with directions
7416  // specified) co-located with its master. We want to select the
7417  // substation, so that the direction will be properly indicated on the
7418  // graphic. So, we search the select list looking for IDX_type == 'c' (i.e
7419  // substation)
7420  IDX_entry *pIDX_best_candidate;
7421 
7422  SelectItem *pFind = NULL;
7423  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7424  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelectTC->FindSelectionList(
7425  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_CURRENTPOINT);
7426 
7427  // Default is first entry
7428  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7429  pFind = node->GetData();
7430  pIDX_best_candidate = (IDX_entry *)(pFind->m_pData1);
7431 
7432  if (SelList.GetCount() > 1) {
7433  node = node->GetNext();
7434  while (node) {
7435  pFind = node->GetData();
7436  IDX_entry *pIDX_candidate = (IDX_entry *)(pFind->m_pData1);
7437  if (pIDX_candidate->IDX_type == 'c') {
7438  pIDX_best_candidate = pIDX_candidate;
7439  break;
7440  }
7441 
7442  node = node->GetNext();
7443  } // while (node)
7444  } else {
7445  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7446  pFind = node->GetData();
7447  pIDX_best_candidate = (IDX_entry *)(pFind->m_pData1);
7448  }
7449 
7450  m_pIDXCandidate = pIDX_best_candidate;
7451 
7452  if (0 == seltype) {
7453  DrawTCWindow(x, y, (void *)pIDX_best_candidate);
7454  Refresh(false);
7455  bseltc = true;
7456  } else
7457  seltype |= SELTYPE_CURRENTPOINT;
7458  }
7459 
7460  else if (pFindTide) {
7461  m_pIDXCandidate = (IDX_entry *)pFindTide->m_pData1;
7462 
7463  if (0 == seltype) {
7464  DrawTCWindow(x, y, (void *)pFindTide->m_pData1);
7465  Refresh(false);
7466  bseltc = true;
7467  } else
7468  seltype |= SELTYPE_TIDEPOINT;
7469  }
7470  }
7471 
7472  if (0 == seltype) seltype |= SELTYPE_UNKNOWN;
7473 
7474  if (!bseltc) {
7475  InvokeCanvasMenu(x, y, seltype);
7476 
7477  // Clean up if not deleted in InvokeCanvasMenu
7478  if (m_pSelectedRoute && g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(m_pSelectedRoute)) {
7479  m_pSelectedRoute->m_bRtIsSelected = false;
7480  }
7481 
7482  m_pSelectedRoute = NULL;
7483 
7484  if (m_pFoundRoutePoint) {
7485  if (pSelect->IsSelectableRoutePointValid(m_pFoundRoutePoint))
7486  m_pFoundRoutePoint->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
7487  }
7488  m_pFoundRoutePoint = NULL;
7489 
7490  Refresh(true);
7491  }
7492 
7493  // Seth: Is this refresh needed?
7494  Refresh(false); // needed for MSW, not GTK Why??
7495 }
7496 bool ChartCanvas::MouseEventProcessObjects(wxMouseEvent &event) {
7497  // For now just bail out completely if the point clicked is not on the chart
7498  if (std::isnan(m_cursor_lat)) return false;
7499 
7500  // Mouse Clicks
7501  bool ret = false; // return true if processed
7502 
7503  int x, y, mx, my;
7504  event.GetPosition(&x, &y);
7505  mx = x;
7506  my = y;
7507 
7508  // Calculate meaningful SelectRadius
7509  float SelectRadius;
7510  SelectRadius = g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() /
7511  (m_true_scale_ppm * 1852 * 60); // Degrees, approximately
7512 
7514  // We start with Double Click processing. The first left click just starts a
7515  // timer and is remembered, then we actually do something if there is a
7516  // LeftDClick. If there is, the two single clicks are ignored.
7517 
7518  if (event.LeftDClick() && (cursor_region == CENTER)) {
7519  m_DoubleClickTimer->Start();
7520  singleClickEventIsValid = false;
7521 
7522  double zlat, zlon;
7523  GetCanvasPixPoint(x, y, zlat, zlon);
7524 
7525  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7526  if (m_bShowAIS) {
7527  SelectItem *pFindAIS;
7528  pFindAIS = pSelectAIS->FindSelection(ctx, zlat, zlon, SELTYPE_AISTARGET);
7529 
7530  if (pFindAIS) {
7531  m_FoundAIS_MMSI = pFindAIS->GetUserData();
7532  if (g_pAIS->Get_Target_Data_From_MMSI(m_FoundAIS_MMSI)) {
7533  wxWindow *pwin = wxDynamicCast(this, wxWindow);
7534  ShowAISTargetQueryDialog(pwin, m_FoundAIS_MMSI);
7535  }
7536  return true;
7537  }
7538  }
7539 
7540  SelectableItemList rpSelList =
7541  pSelect->FindSelectionList(ctx, zlat, zlon, SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
7542  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = rpSelList.GetFirst();
7543  bool b_onRPtarget = false;
7544  while (node) {
7545  SelectItem *pFind = node->GetData();
7546  RoutePoint *frp = (RoutePoint *)pFind->m_pData1;
7547  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget && (frp == m_pRoutePointEditTarget)) {
7548  b_onRPtarget = true;
7549  break;
7550  }
7551  node = node->GetNext();
7552  }
7553 
7554  // Double tap with selected RoutePoint or Mark
7555 
7556  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
7557  if (b_onRPtarget) {
7558  ShowMarkPropertiesDialog(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
7559  return true;
7560  } else {
7561  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
7562  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
7563  if (g_btouch) RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).EnableDragHandle(false);
7564  wxRect wp_rect;
7565  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &wp_rect);
7566  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL; // cancel selection
7567  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
7568  return true;
7569  }
7570  } else {
7571  node = rpSelList.GetFirst();
7572  if (node) {
7573  SelectItem *pFind = node->GetData();
7574  RoutePoint *frp = (RoutePoint *)pFind->m_pData1;
7575  if (frp) {
7576  wxArrayPtrVoid *proute_array =
7577  g_pRouteMan->GetRouteArrayContaining(frp);
7578 
7579  // Use route array (if any) to determine actual visibility for this
7580  // point
7581  bool brp_viz = false;
7582  if (proute_array) {
7583  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < proute_array->GetCount(); ir++) {
7584  Route *pr = (Route *)proute_array->Item(ir);
7585  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7586  brp_viz = true;
7587  break;
7588  }
7589  }
7590  if (!brp_viz &&
7591  frp->IsShared()) // is not visible as part of route, but still
7592  // exists as a waypoint
7593  brp_viz = frp->IsVisible(); // so treat as isolated point
7594  } else
7595  brp_viz = frp->IsVisible(); // isolated point
7596 
7597  if (brp_viz) {
7598  ShowMarkPropertiesDialog(frp);
7599  return true;
7600  }
7601  }
7602  }
7603  }
7604 
7605  SelectItem *cursorItem;
7606  cursorItem = pSelect->FindSelection(ctx, zlat, zlon, SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT);
7607 
7608  if (cursorItem) {
7609  Route *pr = (Route *)cursorItem->m_pData3;
7610  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7611  ShowRoutePropertiesDialog(_("Route Properties"), pr);
7612  return true;
7613  }
7614  }
7615 
7616  cursorItem = pSelect->FindSelection(ctx, zlat, zlon, SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT);
7617 
7618  if (cursorItem) {
7619  Track *pt = (Track *)cursorItem->m_pData3;
7620  if (pt->IsVisible()) {
7621  ShowTrackPropertiesDialog(pt);
7622  return true;
7623  }
7624  }
7625 
7626  // Found no object to act on, so show chart info.
7627 
7628  ShowObjectQueryWindow(x, y, zlat, zlon);
7629  return true;
7630  }
7631 
7633  if (event.LeftDown()) {
7634  // This really should not be needed, but....
7635  // on Windows, when using wxAUIManager, sometimes the focus is lost
7636  // when clicking into another pane, e.g.the AIS target list, and then back
7637  // to this pane. Oddly, some mouse events are not lost, however. Like this
7638  // one....
7639  SetFocus();
7640 
7641  last_drag.x = mx;
7642  last_drag.y = my;
7643  leftIsDown = true;
7644 
7645  if (!g_btouch) {
7646  if (m_routeState) // creating route?
7647  {
7648  double rlat, rlon;
7649  bool appending = false;
7650  bool inserting = false;
7651  Route *tail = 0;
7652 
7653  SetCursor(*pCursorPencil);
7654  rlat = m_cursor_lat;
7655  rlon = m_cursor_lon;
7656 
7657  m_bRouteEditing = true;
7658 
7659  if (m_routeState == 1) {
7660  m_pMouseRoute = new Route();
7661  pRouteList->Append(m_pMouseRoute);
7662  r_rband.x = x;
7663  r_rband.y = y;
7664  }
7665 
7666  // Check to see if there is a nearby point which may be reused
7667  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = NULL;
7668 
7669  // Calculate meaningful SelectRadius
7670  double nearby_radius_meters =
7671  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() / m_true_scale_ppm;
7672 
7673  RoutePoint *pNearbyPoint =
7674  pWayPointMan->GetNearbyWaypoint(rlat, rlon, nearby_radius_meters);
7675  if (pNearbyPoint && (pNearbyPoint != m_prev_pMousePoint) &&
7676  !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsInLayer && pNearbyPoint->IsVisible()) {
7677  wxArrayPtrVoid *proute_array =
7678  g_pRouteMan->GetRouteArrayContaining(pNearbyPoint);
7679 
7680  // Use route array (if any) to determine actual visibility for this
7681  // point
7682  bool brp_viz = false;
7683  if (proute_array) {
7684  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < proute_array->GetCount(); ir++) {
7685  Route *pr = (Route *)proute_array->Item(ir);
7686  if (pr->IsVisible()) {
7687  brp_viz = true;
7688  break;
7689  }
7690  }
7691  if (!brp_viz &&
7692  pNearbyPoint->IsShared()) // is not visible as part of route,
7693  // but still exists as a waypoint
7694  brp_viz =
7695  pNearbyPoint->IsVisible(); // so treat as isolated point
7696  } else
7697  brp_viz = pNearbyPoint->IsVisible(); // isolated point
7698 
7699  if (brp_viz) {
7700  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus =
7701  false; // Avoid route finish on focus change for message dialog
7702  int dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
7703  this, _("Use nearby waypoint?"), _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
7704  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
7705  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
7706 
7707  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
7708  pMousePoint = pNearbyPoint;
7709 
7710  // Using existing waypoint, so nothing to delete for undo.
7711  if (m_routeState > 1)
7712  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_AppendWaypoint, pMousePoint,
7713  Undo_HasParent, NULL);
7714 
7715  tail =
7716  g_pRouteMan->FindVisibleRouteContainingWaypoint(pMousePoint);
7717  bool procede = false;
7718  if (tail) {
7719  procede = true;
7720  // if (pMousePoint == tail->GetLastPoint()) procede = false;
7721  if (m_routeState > 1 && m_pMouseRoute && tail == m_pMouseRoute)
7722  procede = false;
7723  }
7724 
7725  if (procede) {
7726  int dlg_return;
7727  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
7728  if (m_routeState ==
7729  1) { // first point in new route, preceeding route to be
7730  // added? Not touch case
7731 
7732  wxString dmsg =
7733  _("Insert first part of this route in the new route?");
7734  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) ==
7735  tail->GetnPoints()) // Starting on last point of another
7736  // route?
7737  dmsg = _("Insert this route in the new route?");
7738 
7739  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) != 1) { // Anything to do?
7740  dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
7741  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
7742  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
7743  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
7744 
7745  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
7746  inserting = true; // part of the other route will be
7747  // preceeding the new route
7748  }
7749  }
7750  } else {
7751  wxString dmsg =
7752  _("Append last part of this route to the new route?");
7753  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) == 1)
7754  dmsg = _(
7755  "Append this route to the new route?"); // Picking the
7756  // first point
7757  // of another
7758  // route?
7759 
7760  if (tail->GetLastPoint() != pMousePoint) { // Anything to do?
7761  dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
7762  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
7763  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
7764  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
7765 
7766  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
7767  appending = true; // part of the other route will be
7768  // appended to the new route
7769  }
7770  }
7771  }
7772  }
7773 
7774  // check all other routes to see if this point appears in any
7775  // other route If it appears in NO other route, then it should e
7776  // considered an isolated mark
7777  if (!FindRouteContainingWaypoint(pMousePoint))
7778  pMousePoint->SetShared(true);
7779  }
7780  }
7781  }
7782 
7783  if (NULL == pMousePoint) { // need a new point
7784  pMousePoint = new RoutePoint(rlat, rlon, g_default_routepoint_icon,
7785  _T(""), wxEmptyString);
7786  pMousePoint->SetNameShown(false);
7787 
7788  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(pMousePoint, -1); // use auto next num
7789  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(rlat, rlon, pMousePoint);
7790 
7791  if (m_routeState > 1)
7792  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_AppendWaypoint, pMousePoint,
7793  Undo_IsOrphanded, NULL);
7794  }
7795 
7796  if (m_pMouseRoute) {
7797  if (m_routeState == 1) {
7798  // First point in the route.
7799  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
7800  } else {
7801  if (m_pMouseRoute->m_NextLegGreatCircle) {
