7802  double rhumbBearing, rhumbDist, gcBearing, gcDist;
7803  DistanceBearingMercator(rlat, rlon, m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon,
7804  &rhumbBearing, &rhumbDist);
7805  Geodesic::GreatCircleDistBear(m_prev_rlon, m_prev_rlat, rlon,
7806  rlat, &gcDist, &gcBearing, NULL);
7807  double gcDistNM = gcDist / 1852.0;
7808 
7809  // Empirically found expression to get reasonable route segments.
7810  int segmentCount = (3.0 + (rhumbDist - gcDistNM)) /
7811  pow(rhumbDist - gcDistNM - 1, 0.5);
7812 
7813  wxString msg;
7814  msg << _("For this leg the Great Circle route is ")
7815  << FormatDistanceAdaptive(rhumbDist - gcDistNM)
7816  << _(" shorter than rhumbline.\n\n")
7817  << _("Would you like include the Great Circle routing points "
7818  "for this leg?");
7819 
7820  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
7821  m_disable_edge_pan = true; // This helps on OS X if MessageBox
7822  // does not fully capture mouse
7823 
7824  int answer = OCPNMessageBox(this, msg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
7825  wxYES_NO | wxNO_DEFAULT);
7826 
7827  m_disable_edge_pan = false;
7828  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
7829 
7830  if (answer == wxID_YES) {
7831  RoutePoint *gcPoint;
7832  RoutePoint *prevGcPoint = m_prev_pMousePoint;
7833  wxRealPoint gcCoord;
7834 
7835  for (int i = 1; i <= segmentCount; i++) {
7836  double fraction = (double)i * (1.0 / (double)segmentCount);
7837  Geodesic::GreatCircleTravel(m_prev_rlon, m_prev_rlat,
7838  gcDist * fraction, gcBearing,
7839  &gcCoord.x, &gcCoord.y, NULL);
7840 
7841  if (i < segmentCount) {
7842  gcPoint = new RoutePoint(gcCoord.y, gcCoord.x, _T("xmblue"),
7843  _T(""), wxEmptyString);
7844  gcPoint->SetNameShown(false);
7845  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(gcPoint, -1);
7846  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(gcCoord.y, gcCoord.x,
7847  gcPoint);
7848  } else {
7849  gcPoint = pMousePoint; // Last point, previously exsisting!
7850  }
7851 
7852  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(gcPoint);
7853  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(
7854  prevGcPoint->m_lat, prevGcPoint->m_lon, gcPoint->m_lat,
7855  gcPoint->m_lon, prevGcPoint, gcPoint, m_pMouseRoute);
7856  prevGcPoint = gcPoint;
7857  }
7858 
7859  undo->CancelUndoableAction(true);
7860 
7861  } else {
7862  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
7863  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(
7864  m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon, rlat, rlon, m_prev_pMousePoint,
7865  pMousePoint, m_pMouseRoute);
7866  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pMouseRoute);
7867  }
7868  } else {
7869  // Ordinary rhumblinesegment.
7870  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
7871  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon, rlat,
7872  rlon, m_prev_pMousePoint,
7873  pMousePoint, m_pMouseRoute);
7874  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pMouseRoute);
7875  }
7876  }
7877  }
7878  m_prev_rlat = rlat;
7879  m_prev_rlon = rlon;
7880  m_prev_pMousePoint = pMousePoint;
7881  if (m_pMouseRoute)
7882  m_pMouseRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex = m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints();
7883 
7884  m_routeState++;
7885 
7886  if (appending ||
7887  inserting) { // Appending a route or making a new route
7888  int connect = tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint);
7889  if (connect == 1) {
7890  inserting = false; // there is nothing to insert
7891  appending = true; // so append
7892  }
7893  int length = tail->GetnPoints();
7894 
7895  int i;
7896  int start, stop;
7897  if (appending) {
7898  start = connect + 1;
7899  stop = length;
7900  } else { // inserting
7901  start = 1;
7902  stop = connect;
7903  m_pMouseRoute->RemovePoint(
7904  m_pMouseRoute
7905  ->GetLastPoint()); // Remove the first and only point
7906  }
7907  for (i = start; i <= stop; i++) {
7908  m_pMouseRoute->AddPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), false);
7909  if (m_pMouseRoute)
7910  m_pMouseRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex =
7911  m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints();
7912  m_routeState++;
7913  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
7914  ret = true;
7915  }
7916  m_prev_rlat =
7917  m_pMouseRoute->GetPoint(m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints())->m_lat;
7918  m_prev_rlon =
7919  m_pMouseRoute->GetPoint(m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints())->m_lon;
7920  m_pMouseRoute->FinalizeForRendering();
7921  }
7922  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
7923  ret = true;
7924  }
7925 
7926  else if (m_bMeasure_Active && (m_nMeasureState >= 1)) // measure tool?
7927  {
7928  SetCursor(*pCursorPencil);
7929 
7930  if (!m_pMeasureRoute) {
7931  m_pMeasureRoute = new Route();
7932  pRouteList->Append(m_pMeasureRoute);
7933  }
7934 
7935  if (m_nMeasureState == 1) {
7936  r_rband.x = x;
7937  r_rband.y = y;
7938  }
7939 
7940  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = new RoutePoint(
7941  m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, wxString(_T ( "circle" )),
7942  wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString);
7943  pMousePoint->m_bShowName = false;
7944  pMousePoint->SetShowWaypointRangeRings(false);
7945 
7946  m_pMeasureRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
7947 
7948  m_prev_rlat = m_cursor_lat;
7949  m_prev_rlon = m_cursor_lon;
7950  m_prev_pMousePoint = pMousePoint;
7951  m_pMeasureRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex =
7952  m_pMeasureRoute->GetnPoints();
7953 
7954  m_nMeasureState++;
7955  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
7956  ret = true;
7957  }
7958 
7959  else {
7960  FindRoutePointsAtCursor(SelectRadius, true); // Not creating Route
7961  }
7962  } // !g_btouch
7963  else { // g_btouch
7964 
7965  if ((m_bMeasure_Active && m_nMeasureState) || (m_routeState)) {
7966  // if near screen edge, pan with injection
7967  // if( CheckEdgePan( x, y, true, 5, 10 ) ) {
7968  // return;
7969  // }
7970  }
7971  }
7972 
7973  if (ret) return true;
7974  }
7975 
7976  if (event.Dragging()) {
7977  // in touch screen mode ensure the finger/cursor is on the selected point's
7978  // radius to allow dragging
7979  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
7980  if (g_btouch) {
7981  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget && !m_bIsInRadius) {
7982  SelectItem *pFind = NULL;
7983  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
7984  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_ROUTEPOINT);
7985  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
7986  while (node) {
7987  pFind = node->GetData();
7988  RoutePoint *frp = (RoutePoint *)pFind->m_pData1;
7989  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == frp) m_bIsInRadius = true;
7990  node = node->GetNext();
7991  }
7992  }
7993 
7994  // Check for use of dragHandle
7995  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget &&
7996  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->IsDragHandleEnabled()) {
7997  SelectItem *pFind = NULL;
7998  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
7999  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8000  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
8001  while (node) {
8002  pFind = node->GetData();
8003  RoutePoint *frp = (RoutePoint *)pFind->m_pData1;
8004  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == frp) {
8005  m_bIsInRadius = true;
8006  break;
8007  }
8008  node = node->GetNext();
8009  }
8010 
8011  if (!m_dragoffsetSet) {
8012  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).PresetDragOffset(this, mouse_x, mouse_y);
8013  m_dragoffsetSet = true;
8014  }
8015  }
8016  }
8017 
8018  if (m_bRouteEditing && m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8019  bool DraggingAllowed = g_btouch ? m_bIsInRadius : true;
8020 
8021  if (NULL == g_pMarkInfoDialog) {
8022  if (g_bWayPointPreventDragging) DraggingAllowed = false;
8023  } else if (!g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown() && g_bWayPointPreventDragging)
8024  DraggingAllowed = false;
8025 
8026  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget &&
8027  (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->GetIconName() == _T("mob")))
8028  DraggingAllowed = false;
8029 
8030  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bIsInLayer) DraggingAllowed = false;
8031 
8032  if (DraggingAllowed) {
8033  if (!undo->InUndoableAction()) {
8034  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_MoveWaypoint, m_pRoutePointEditTarget,
8035  Undo_NeedsCopy, m_pFoundPoint);
8036  }
8037 
8038  // Get the update rectangle for the union of the un-edited routes
8039  wxRect pre_rect;
8040 
8041  if (!g_bopengl && m_pEditRouteArray) {
8042  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount(); ir++) {
8043  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8044  // Need to validate route pointer
8045  // Route may be gone due to drgging close to ownship with
8046  // "Delete On Arrival" state set, as in the case of
8047  // navigating to an isolated waypoint on a temporary route
8048  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8049  wxRect route_rect;
8050  RouteGui(*pr).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &route_rect);
8051  pre_rect.Union(route_rect);
8052  }
8053  }
8054  }
8055 
8056  double new_cursor_lat = m_cursor_lat;
8057  double new_cursor_lon = m_cursor_lon;
8058 
8059  if (CheckEdgePan(x, y, true, 5, 2))
8060  GetCanvasPixPoint(x, y, new_cursor_lat, new_cursor_lon);
8061 
8062  // update the point itself
8063  if (g_btouch) {
8064  // m_pRoutePointEditTarget->SetPointFromDraghandlePoint(VPoint,
8065  // new_cursor_lat, new_cursor_lon);
8066  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).SetPointFromDraghandlePoint(this, mouse_x,
8067  mouse_y);
8068  // update the Drag Handle entry in the pSelect list
8069  pSelect->ModifySelectablePoint(new_cursor_lat, new_cursor_lon,
8070  m_pRoutePointEditTarget,
8071  SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8072  m_pFoundPoint->m_slat =
8073  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat; // update the SelectList entry
8074  m_pFoundPoint->m_slon = m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon;
8075  } else {
8076  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat =
8077  new_cursor_lat; // update the RoutePoint entry
8078  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon = new_cursor_lon;
8079  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_wpBBox.Invalidate();
8080  m_pFoundPoint->m_slat =
8081  new_cursor_lat; // update the SelectList entry
8082  m_pFoundPoint->m_slon = new_cursor_lon;
8083  }
8084 
8085  // Update the MarkProperties Dialog, if currently shown
8086  if ((NULL != g_pMarkInfoDialog) && (g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown())) {
8087  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == g_pMarkInfoDialog->GetRoutePoint())
8088  g_pMarkInfoDialog->UpdateProperties(true);
8089  }
8090 
8091  if (g_bopengl) {
8092  // InvalidateGL();
8093  Refresh(false);
8094  } else {
8095  // Get the update rectangle for the edited route
8096  wxRect post_rect;
8097 
8098  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
8099  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8100  ir++) {
8101  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8102  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8103  wxRect route_rect;
8104  RouteGui(*pr).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &route_rect);
8105  post_rect.Union(route_rect);
8106  }
8107  }
8108  }
8109 
8110  // Invalidate the union region
8111  pre_rect.Union(post_rect);
8112  RefreshRect(pre_rect, false);
8113  }
8114  gFrame->RefreshCanvasOther(this);
8115  m_bRoutePoinDragging = true;
8116  }
8117  ret = true;
8118  } // if Route Editing
8119 
8120  else if (m_bMarkEditing && m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8121  bool DraggingAllowed = g_btouch ? m_bIsInRadius : true;
8122 
8123  if (NULL == g_pMarkInfoDialog) {
8124  if (g_bWayPointPreventDragging) DraggingAllowed = false;
8125  } else if (!g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown() && g_bWayPointPreventDragging)
8126  DraggingAllowed = false;
8127 
8128  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget &&
8129  (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->GetIconName() == _T("mob")))
8130  DraggingAllowed = false;
8131 
8132  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bIsInLayer) DraggingAllowed = false;
8133 
8134  if (DraggingAllowed) {
8135  if (!undo->InUndoableAction()) {
8136  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_MoveWaypoint, m_pRoutePointEditTarget,
8137  Undo_NeedsCopy, m_pFoundPoint);
8138  }
8139 
8140  // The mark may be an anchorwatch
8141  double lpp1 = 0.;
8142  double lpp2 = 0.;
8143  double lppmax;
8144 
8145  if (pAnchorWatchPoint1 == m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8146  lpp1 = fabs(GetAnchorWatchRadiusPixels(pAnchorWatchPoint1));
8147  }
8148  if (pAnchorWatchPoint2 == m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8149  lpp2 = fabs(GetAnchorWatchRadiusPixels(pAnchorWatchPoint2));
8150  }
8151  lppmax = wxMax(lpp1 + 10, lpp2 + 10); // allow for cruft
8152 
8153  // Get the update rectangle for the un-edited mark
8154  wxRect pre_rect;
8155  if (!g_bopengl) {
8156  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &pre_rect);
8157  if ((lppmax > pre_rect.width / 2) || (lppmax > pre_rect.height / 2))
8158  pre_rect.Inflate((int)(lppmax - (pre_rect.width / 2)),
8159  (int)(lppmax - (pre_rect.height / 2)));
8160  }
8161 
8162  // update the point itself
8163  if (g_btouch) {
8164  // m_pRoutePointEditTarget->SetPointFromDraghandlePoint(VPoint,
8165  // m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon);
8166  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).SetPointFromDraghandlePoint(this, mouse_x,
8167  mouse_y);
8168  // update the Drag Handle entry in the pSelect list
8169  pSelect->ModifySelectablePoint(m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon,
8170  m_pRoutePointEditTarget,
8171  SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8172  m_pFoundPoint->m_slat =
8173  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat; // update the SelectList entry
8174  m_pFoundPoint->m_slon = m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon;
8175  } else {
8176  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat =
8177  m_cursor_lat; // update the RoutePoint entry
8178  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon = m_cursor_lon;
8179  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_wpBBox.Invalidate();
8180  m_pFoundPoint->m_slat = m_cursor_lat; // update the SelectList entry
8181  m_pFoundPoint->m_slon = m_cursor_lon;
8182  }
8183 
8184  // Update the MarkProperties Dialog, if currently shown
8185  if ((NULL != g_pMarkInfoDialog) && (g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown())) {
8186  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == g_pMarkInfoDialog->GetRoutePoint())
8187  g_pMarkInfoDialog->UpdateProperties(true);
8188  }
8189 
8190  // Invalidate the union region
8191  if (g_bopengl) {
8192  if (!g_btouch) InvalidateGL();
8193  Refresh(false);
8194  } else {
8195  // Get the update rectangle for the edited mark
8196  wxRect post_rect;
8197  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this,
8198  &post_rect);
8199  if ((lppmax > post_rect.width / 2) || (lppmax > post_rect.height / 2))
8200  post_rect.Inflate((int)(lppmax - (post_rect.width / 2)),
8201  (int)(lppmax - (post_rect.height / 2)));
8202 
8203  // Invalidate the union region
8204  pre_rect.Union(post_rect);
8205  RefreshRect(pre_rect, false);
8206  }
8207  gFrame->RefreshCanvasOther(this);
8208  m_bRoutePoinDragging = true;
8209  }
8210  ret = true;
8211  }
8212 
8213  if (ret) return true;
8214  } // dragging
8215 
8216  if (event.LeftUp()) {
8217  bool b_startedit_route = false;
8218  m_dragoffsetSet = false;
8219 
8220  if (g_btouch) {
8221  m_bChartDragging = false;
8222  m_bIsInRadius = false;
8223 
8224  if (m_routeState) // creating route?
8225  {
8226  if (m_bedge_pan) {
8227  m_bedge_pan = false;
8228  return false;
8229  }
8230 
8231  double rlat, rlon;
8232  bool appending = false;
8233  bool inserting = false;
8234  Route *tail = 0;
8235 
8236  rlat = m_cursor_lat;
8237  rlon = m_cursor_lon;
8238 
8239  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8240  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
8241  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
8242  if (!g_bopengl) {
8243  wxRect wp_rect;
8244  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget)
8245  .CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &wp_rect);
8246  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
8247  }
8248  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
8249  }
8250  m_bRouteEditing = true;
8251 
8252  if (m_routeState == 1) {
8253  m_pMouseRoute = new Route();
8254  m_pMouseRoute->SetHiLite(50);
8255  pRouteList->Append(m_pMouseRoute);
8256  r_rband.x = x;
8257  r_rband.y = y;
8258  }
8259 
8260  // Check to see if there is a nearby point which may be reused
8261  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = NULL;
8262 
8263  // Calculate meaningful SelectRadius
8264  double nearby_radius_meters =
8265  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() / m_true_scale_ppm;
8266 
8267  RoutePoint *pNearbyPoint =
8268  pWayPointMan->GetNearbyWaypoint(rlat, rlon, nearby_radius_meters);
8269  if (pNearbyPoint && (pNearbyPoint != m_prev_pMousePoint) &&
8270  !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsInLayer && pNearbyPoint->IsVisible()) {
8271  int dlg_return;
8272 #ifndef __WXOSX__
8273  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus =
8274  false; // Avoid route finish on focus change for message dialog
8275  dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
8276  this, _("Use nearby waypoint?"), _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8277  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8278  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
8279 #else
8280  dlg_return = wxID_YES;
8281 #endif
8282  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
8283  pMousePoint = pNearbyPoint;
8284 
8285  // Using existing waypoint, so nothing to delete for undo.
8286  if (m_routeState > 1)
8287  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_AppendWaypoint, pMousePoint,
8288  Undo_HasParent, NULL);
8289  tail = g_pRouteMan->FindVisibleRouteContainingWaypoint(pMousePoint);
8290 
8291  bool procede = false;
8292  if (tail) {
8293  procede = true;
8294  // if (pMousePoint == tail->GetLastPoint()) procede = false;
8295  if (m_routeState > 1 && m_pMouseRoute && tail == m_pMouseRoute)
8296  procede = false;
8297  }
8298 
8299  if (procede) {
8300  int dlg_return;
8301  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
8302  if (m_routeState == 1) { // first point in new route, preceeding
8303  // route to be added? touch case
8304 
8305  wxString dmsg =
8306  _("Insert first part of this route in the new route?");
8307  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) ==
8308  tail->GetnPoints()) // Starting on last point of another
8309  // route?
8310  dmsg = _("Insert this route in the new route?");
8311 
8312  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) != 1) { // Anything to do?
8313  dlg_return =
8314  OCPNMessageBox(this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8315  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8316  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
8317 
8318  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
8319  inserting = true; // part of the other route will be
8320  // preceeding the new route
8321  }
8322  }
8323  } else {
8324  wxString dmsg =
8325  _("Append last part of this route to the new route?");
8326  if (tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint) == 1)
8327  dmsg = _(
8328  "Append this route to the new route?"); // Picking the
8329  // first point of
8330  // another route?
8331 
8332  if (tail->GetLastPoint() != pMousePoint) { // Anything to do?
8333  dlg_return =
8334  OCPNMessageBox(this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8335  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8336  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
8337 
8338  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
8339  appending = true; // part of the other route will be
8340  // appended to the new route
8341  }
8342  }
8343  }
8344  }
8345 
8346  // check all other routes to see if this point appears in any other
8347  // route If it appears in NO other route, then it should e
8348  // considered an isolated mark
8349  if (!FindRouteContainingWaypoint(pMousePoint))
8350  pMousePoint->SetShared(true);
8351  }
8352  }
8353 
8354  if (NULL == pMousePoint) { // need a new point
8355  pMousePoint = new RoutePoint(rlat, rlon, g_default_routepoint_icon,
8356  _T(""), wxEmptyString);
8357  pMousePoint->SetNameShown(false);
8358 
8359  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(pMousePoint, -1); // use auto next num
8360  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(rlat, rlon, pMousePoint);
8361 
8362  if (m_routeState > 1)
8363  undo->BeforeUndoableAction(Undo_AppendWaypoint, pMousePoint,
8364  Undo_IsOrphanded, NULL);
8365  }
8366 
8367  if (m_routeState == 1) {
8368  // First point in the route.
8369  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
8370  } else {
8371  if (m_pMouseRoute->m_NextLegGreatCircle) {
8372  double rhumbBearing, rhumbDist, gcBearing, gcDist;
8373  DistanceBearingMercator(rlat, rlon, m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon,
8374  &rhumbBearing, &rhumbDist);
8375  Geodesic::GreatCircleDistBear(m_prev_rlon, m_prev_rlat, rlon, rlat,
8376  &gcDist, &gcBearing, NULL);
8377  double gcDistNM = gcDist / 1852.0;
8378 
8379  // Empirically found expression to get reasonable route segments.
8380  int segmentCount = (3.0 + (rhumbDist - gcDistNM)) /
8381  pow(rhumbDist - gcDistNM - 1, 0.5);
8382 
8383  wxString msg;
8384  msg << _("For this leg the Great Circle route is ")
8385  << FormatDistanceAdaptive(rhumbDist - gcDistNM)
8386  << _(" shorter than rhumbline.\n\n")
8387  << _("Would you like include the Great Circle routing points "
8388  "for this leg?");
8389 
8390 #ifndef __WXOSX__
8391  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
8392  int answer = OCPNMessageBox(this, msg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8393  wxYES_NO | wxNO_DEFAULT);
8394  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
8395 #else
8396  int answer = wxID_NO;
8397 #endif
8398 
8399  if (answer == wxID_YES) {
8400  RoutePoint *gcPoint;
8401  RoutePoint *prevGcPoint = m_prev_pMousePoint;
8402  wxRealPoint gcCoord;
8403 
8404  for (int i = 1; i <= segmentCount; i++) {
8405  double fraction = (double)i * (1.0 / (double)segmentCount);
8406  Geodesic::GreatCircleTravel(m_prev_rlon, m_prev_rlat,
8407  gcDist * fraction, gcBearing,
8408  &gcCoord.x, &gcCoord.y, NULL);
8409 
8410  if (i < segmentCount) {
8411  gcPoint = new RoutePoint(gcCoord.y, gcCoord.x, _T("xmblue"),
8412  _T(""), wxEmptyString);
8413  gcPoint->SetNameShown(false);
8414  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(gcPoint, -1);
8415  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(gcCoord.y, gcCoord.x,
8416  gcPoint);
8417  } else {
8418  gcPoint = pMousePoint; // Last point, previously exsisting!
8419  }
8420 
8421  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(gcPoint);
8422  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(
8423  prevGcPoint->m_lat, prevGcPoint->m_lon, gcPoint->m_lat,
8424  gcPoint->m_lon, prevGcPoint, gcPoint, m_pMouseRoute);
8425  prevGcPoint = gcPoint;
8426  }
8427 
8428  undo->CancelUndoableAction(true);
8429 
8430  } else {
8431  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
8432  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon, rlat,
8433  rlon, m_prev_pMousePoint,
8434  pMousePoint, m_pMouseRoute);
8435  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pMouseRoute);
8436  }
8437  } else {
8438  // Ordinary rhumblinesegment.
8439  m_pMouseRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
8440  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(m_prev_rlat, m_prev_rlon, rlat,
8441  rlon, m_prev_pMousePoint,
8442  pMousePoint, m_pMouseRoute);
8443  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pMouseRoute);
8444  }
8445  }
8446 
8447  m_prev_rlat = rlat;
8448  m_prev_rlon = rlon;
8449  m_prev_pMousePoint = pMousePoint;
8450  m_pMouseRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex = m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints();
8451 
8452  m_routeState++;
8453 
8454  if (appending ||
8455  inserting) { // Appending a route or making a new route
8456  int connect = tail->GetIndexOf(pMousePoint);
8457  if (connect == 1) {
8458  inserting = false; // there is nothing to insert
8459  appending = true; // so append
8460  }
8461  int length = tail->GetnPoints();
8462 
8463  int i;
8464  int start, stop;
8465  if (appending) {
8466  start = connect + 1;
8467  stop = length;
8468  } else { // inserting
8469  start = 1;
8470  stop = connect;
8471  m_pMouseRoute->RemovePoint(
8472  m_pMouseRoute
8473  ->GetLastPoint()); // Remove the first and only point
8474  }
8475  for (i = start; i <= stop; i++) {
8476  m_pMouseRoute->AddPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), false);
8477  if (m_pMouseRoute)
8478  m_pMouseRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex =
8479  m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints();
8480  m_routeState++;
8481  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
8482  ret = true;
8483  }
8484  m_prev_rlat =
8485  m_pMouseRoute->GetPoint(m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints())->m_lat;
8486  m_prev_rlon =
8487  m_pMouseRoute->GetPoint(m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints())->m_lon;
8488  m_pMouseRoute->FinalizeForRendering();
8489  }
8490 
8491  Refresh(true);
8492  ret = true;
8493  } else if (m_bMeasure_Active && m_nMeasureState) // measure tool?
8494  {
8495  if (m_bedge_pan) {
8496  m_bedge_pan = false;
8497  return false;
8498  }
8499 
8500  if (m_nMeasureState == 1) {
8501  m_pMeasureRoute = new Route();
8502  pRouteList->Append(m_pMeasureRoute);
8503  r_rband.x = x;
8504  r_rband.y = y;
8505  }
8506 
8507  if (m_pMeasureRoute){
8508  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = new RoutePoint(m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon,
8509  wxString(_T ( "circle" )),
8510  wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString);
8511  pMousePoint->m_bShowName = false;
8512 
8513  m_pMeasureRoute->AddPoint(pMousePoint);
8514 
8515  m_prev_rlat = m_cursor_lat;
8516  m_prev_rlon = m_cursor_lon;
8517  m_prev_pMousePoint = pMousePoint;
8518  m_pMeasureRoute->m_lastMousePointIndex = m_pMeasureRoute->GetnPoints();
8519 
8520  m_nMeasureState++;
8521  }
8522  else {
8523  CancelMeasureRoute();
8524  }
8525 
8526  Refresh(true);
8527  ret = true;
8528  } else {
8529  bool bSelectAllowed = true;
8530  if (NULL == g_pMarkInfoDialog) {
8531  if (g_bWayPointPreventDragging) bSelectAllowed = false;
8532  } else if (!g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown() && g_bWayPointPreventDragging)
8533  bSelectAllowed = false;
8534 
8535  /*if this left up happens at the end of a route point dragging and if
8536  the cursor/thumb is on the draghandle icon, not on the point iself a new
8537  selection will select nothing and the drag will never be ended, so the
8538  legs around this point never selectable. At this step we don't need a
8539  new selection, just keep the previoulsly selected and dragged point */
8540  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging) bSelectAllowed = false;
8541 
8542  if (bSelectAllowed) {
8543  bool b_was_editing_mark = m_bMarkEditing;
8544  bool b_was_editing_route = m_bRouteEditing;
8545  FindRoutePointsAtCursor(SelectRadius,
8546  true); // Possibly selecting a point in a
8547  // route for later dragging
8548 
8549  /*route and a mark points in layer can't be dragged so should't be
8550  * selected and no draghandle icon*/
8551  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget && m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bIsInLayer)
8552  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
8553 
8554  if (!b_was_editing_route) {
8555  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
8556  b_startedit_route = true;
8557 
8558  // Hide the track and route rollover during route point edit, not
8559  // needed, and may be confusing
8560  if (m_pTrackRolloverWin && m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive()) {
8561  m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
8562  }
8563  if (m_pRouteRolloverWin && m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive()) {
8564  m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive(false);
8565  }
8566 
8567  wxRect pre_rect;
8568  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8569  ir++) {
8570  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8571  // Need to validate route pointer
8572  // Route may be gone due to drgging close to ownship with
8573  // "Delete On Arrival" state set, as in the case of
8574  // navigating to an isolated waypoint on a temporary route
8575  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8576  // pr->SetHiLite(50);
8577  wxRect route_rect;
8578  RouteGui(*pr).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &route_rect);
8579  pre_rect.Union(route_rect);
8580  }
8581  }
8582  RefreshRect(pre_rect, true);
8583  }
8584  } else {
8585  b_startedit_route = false;
8586  }
8587 
8588  // Mark editing
8589  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8590  if (b_was_editing_mark ||
8591  b_was_editing_route) { // kill previous hilight
8592  if (m_lastRoutePointEditTarget) {
8593  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
8594  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
8595  RoutePointGui(*m_lastRoutePointEditTarget).EnableDragHandle(false);
8596  pSelect->DeleteSelectablePoint(m_lastRoutePointEditTarget,
8597  SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8598  }
8599  }
8600 
8601  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8602  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = true;
8603  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = true;
8604  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).EnableDragHandle(true);
8605  wxPoint2DDouble dragHandlePoint =
8606  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).GetDragHandlePoint(this);
8607  pSelect->AddSelectablePoint(
8608  dragHandlePoint.m_y, dragHandlePoint.m_x,
8609  m_pRoutePointEditTarget, SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8610  }
8611  } else { // Deselect everything
8612  if (m_lastRoutePointEditTarget) {
8613  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
8614  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
8615  RoutePointGui(*m_lastRoutePointEditTarget).EnableDragHandle(false);
8616  pSelect->DeleteSelectablePoint(m_lastRoutePointEditTarget,
8617  SELTYPE_DRAGHANDLE);
8618 
8619  // Clear any routes being edited, probably orphans
8620  wxArrayPtrVoid *lastEditRouteArray =
8621  g_pRouteMan->GetRouteArrayContaining(
8622  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget);
8623  if (lastEditRouteArray) {
8624  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < lastEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8625  ir++) {
8626  Route *pr = (Route *)lastEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8627  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8628  pr->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
8629  }
8630  }
8631  }
8632  }
8633  }
8634 
8635  // Do the refresh
8636 
8637  if (g_bopengl) {
8638  InvalidateGL();
8639  Refresh(false);
8640  } else {
8641  if (m_lastRoutePointEditTarget) {
8642  wxRect wp_rect;
8643  RoutePointGui(*m_lastRoutePointEditTarget).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this,
8644  &wp_rect);
8645  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
8646  }
8647 
8648  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8649  wxRect wp_rect;
8650  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget).CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this,
8651  &wp_rect);
8652  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
8653  }
8654  }
8655  }
8656  } // bSelectAllowed
8657 
8658  // Check to see if there is a route or AIS target under the cursor
8659  // If so, start the rollover timer which creates the popup
8660  SelectCtx ctx(m_bShowNavobjects, GetCanvasTrueScale());
8661  bool b_start_rollover = false;
8662  if (g_pAIS && g_pAIS->GetNumTargets() && m_bShowAIS) {
8663  SelectItem *pFind = pSelectAIS->FindSelection(
8664  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_AISTARGET);
8665  if (pFind) b_start_rollover = true;
8666  }
8667 
8668  if (!b_start_rollover && !b_startedit_route) {
8669  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
8670  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_ROUTESEGMENT);
8671  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
8672  while (node) {
8673  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
8674 
8675  Route *pr = (Route *)pFindSel->m_pData3; // candidate
8676 
8677  if (pr && pr->IsVisible()) {
8678  b_start_rollover = true;
8679  break;
8680  }
8681  node = node->GetNext();
8682  } // while
8683  }
8684 
8685  if (!b_start_rollover && !b_startedit_route) {
8686  SelectableItemList SelList = pSelect->FindSelectionList(
8687  ctx, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, SELTYPE_TRACKSEGMENT);
8688  wxSelectableItemListNode *node = SelList.GetFirst();
8689  while (node) {
8690  SelectItem *pFindSel = node->GetData();
8691 
8692  Track *tr = (Track *)pFindSel->m_pData3; // candidate
8693 
8694  if (tr && tr->IsVisible()) {
8695  b_start_rollover = true;
8696  break;
8697  }
8698  node = node->GetNext();
8699  } // while
8700  }
8701 
8702  if (b_start_rollover)
8703  m_RolloverPopupTimer.Start(m_rollover_popup_timer_msec,
8704  wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
8705  Route *tail = 0, *current;
8706  bool appending = false;
8707  bool inserting = false;
8708  int connect = 0;
8709  if (m_bRouteEditing /* && !b_startedit_route*/) { // End of RoutePoint
8710  // drag
8711  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8712  // Check to see if there is a nearby point which may replace the
8713  // dragged one
8714  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = NULL;
8715 
8716  int index_last;
8717  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging && !m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bIsActive) {
8718  double nearby_radius_meters =
8719  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() / m_true_scale_ppm;
8720  RoutePoint *pNearbyPoint = pWayPointMan->GetOtherNearbyWaypoint(
8721  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat, m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon,
8722  nearby_radius_meters, m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_GUID);
8723  if (pNearbyPoint && !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsInLayer &&
8724  pWayPointMan->IsReallyVisible(pNearbyPoint)) {
8725  bool duplicate =
8726  false; // ensure we won't create duplicate point in routes
8727  if (m_pEditRouteArray && !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsolatedMark) {
8728  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8729  ir++) {
8730  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8731  if (pr && pr->pRoutePointList) {
8732  if (pr->pRoutePointList->IndexOf(pNearbyPoint) !=
8733  wxNOT_FOUND) {
8734  duplicate = true;
8735  break;
8736  }
8737  }
8738  }
8739  }
8740 
8741  // Special case:
8742  // Allow "re-use" of a route's waypoints iff it is a simple
8743  // isolated route. This allows, for instance, creation of a closed
8744  // polygon route
8745  if (m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount() == 1) duplicate = false;
8746 
8747  if (!duplicate) {
8748  int dlg_return;
8749  dlg_return =
8750  OCPNMessageBox(this,
8751  _("Replace this RoutePoint by the nearby "
8752  "Waypoint?"),
8753  _("OpenCPN RoutePoint change"),
8754  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8755  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
8756  /*double confirmation if the dragged point has been manually
8757  * created which can be important and could be deleted
8758  * unintentionally*/
8759 
8760  tail = g_pRouteMan->FindVisibleRouteContainingWaypoint(
8761  pNearbyPoint);
8762  current = FindRouteContainingWaypoint(
8763  m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8764 
8765  if (tail && current && (tail != current)) {
8766  int dlg_return1;
8767  connect = tail->GetIndexOf(pNearbyPoint);
8768  int index_current_route =
8769  current->GetIndexOf(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8770  index_last = current->GetIndexOf(current->GetLastPoint());
8771  dlg_return1 = wxID_NO;
8772  if (index_last ==
8773  index_current_route) { // we are dragging the last
8774  // point of the route
8775  if (connect != tail->GetnPoints()) { // anything to do?
8776 
8777  wxString dmsg(
8778  _("Last part of route to be appended to dragged "
8779  "route?"));
8780  if (connect == 1)
8781  dmsg =
8782  _("Full route to be appended to dragged route?");
8783 
8784  dlg_return1 = OCPNMessageBox(
8785  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8786  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8787  if (dlg_return1 == wxID_YES) {
8788  appending = true;
8789  }
8790  }
8791  } else if (index_current_route ==
8792  1) { // dragging the first point of the route
8793  if (connect != 1) { // anything to do?
8794 
8795  wxString dmsg(
8796  _("First part of route to be inserted into dragged "
8797  "route?"));
8798  if (connect == tail->GetnPoints())
8799  dmsg = _(
8800  "Full route to be inserted into dragged route?");
8801 
8802  dlg_return1 = OCPNMessageBox(
8803  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
8804  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8805  if (dlg_return1 == wxID_YES) {
8806  inserting = true;
8807  }
8808  }
8809  }
8810  }
8811 
8812  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->IsShared()) {
8813  // dlg_return = wxID_NO;
8814  dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
8815  this,
8816  _("Do you really want to delete and replace this "
8817  "WayPoint") +
8818  _T("\n") + _("which has been created manually?"),
8819  ("OpenCPN RoutePoint warning"),
8820  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
8821  }
8822  }
8823  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
8824  pMousePoint = pNearbyPoint;
8825  if (pMousePoint->m_bIsolatedMark) {
8826  pMousePoint->SetShared(true);
8827  }
8828  pMousePoint->m_bIsolatedMark =
8829  false; // definitely no longer isolated
8830  pMousePoint->m_bIsInRoute = true;
8831  }
8832  }
8833  }
8834  }
8835  if (!pMousePoint)
8836  pSelect->UpdateSelectableRouteSegments(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8837 
8838  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
8839  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8840  ir++) {
8841  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8842  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8843  if (pMousePoint) { // remove the dragged point and insert the
8844  // nearby
8845  int nRP =
8846  pr->pRoutePointList->IndexOf(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8847 
8848  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRoutePoints(pr);
8849  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRouteSegments(pr);
8850 
8851  pr->pRoutePointList->Insert(nRP, pMousePoint);
8852  pr->pRoutePointList->DeleteObject(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8853 
8854  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRouteSegments(pr);
8855  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRoutePoints(pr);
8856  }
8857  pr->FinalizeForRendering();
8858  pr->UpdateSegmentDistances();
8859  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging) pConfig->UpdateRoute(pr);
8860  }
8861  }
8862  }
8863 
8864  // Update the RouteProperties Dialog, if currently shown
8865  if (pRoutePropDialog && pRoutePropDialog->IsShown()) {
8866  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
8867  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8868  ir++) {
8869  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8870  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8871  if (pRoutePropDialog->GetRoute() == pr) {
8872  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(pr, true);
8873  }
8874  /* cannot edit track points anyway
8875  else if ( ( NULL !=
8876  pTrackPropDialog ) && ( pTrackPropDialog->IsShown() ) &&
8877  pTrackPropDialog->m_pTrack == pr ) {
8878  pTrackPropDialog->SetTrackAndUpdate(
8879  pr );
8880  }
8881  */
8882  }
8883  }
8884  }
8885  }
8886  if (pMousePoint) { // clear all about the dragged point
8887  pConfig->DeleteWayPoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8888  pWayPointMan->RemoveRoutePoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8889  // Hide mark properties dialog if open on the replaced point
8890  if ((NULL != g_pMarkInfoDialog) && (g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown()))
8891  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == g_pMarkInfoDialog->GetRoutePoint())
8892  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Hide();
8893 
8894  delete m_pRoutePointEditTarget;
8895  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
8896  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
8897  undo->AfterUndoableAction(pMousePoint);
8898  undo->InvalidateUndo();
8899  }
8900  }
8901  }
8902 
8903  else if (m_bMarkEditing) { // End of way point drag
8904  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget)
8905  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging)
8906  pConfig->UpdateWayPoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8907  }
8908 
8909  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget)
8910  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
8911 
8912  if (!m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8913  delete m_pEditRouteArray;
8914  m_pEditRouteArray = NULL;
8915  m_bRouteEditing = false;
8916  }
8917  m_bRoutePoinDragging = false;
8918 
8919  if (appending) { // Appending to the route of which the last point is
8920  // dragged onto another route
8921 
8922  // copy tail from connect until length to end of current after dragging
8923 
8924  int length = tail->GetnPoints();
8925  for (int i = connect + 1; i <= length; i++) {
8926  current->AddPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), false);
8927  if (current) current->m_lastMousePointIndex = current->GetnPoints();
8928  m_routeState++;
8929  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
8930  ret = true;
8931  }
8932  current->FinalizeForRendering();
8933  current->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
8934  FinishRoute();
8935  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(tail, NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
8936  }
8937  if (inserting) {
8938  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRoutePoints(current);
8939  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRouteSegments(current);
8940  for (int i = 1; i < connect; i++) { // numbering in the tail route
8941  current->InsertPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), i - 1, false);
8942  }
8943  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRouteSegments(current);
8944  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRoutePoints(current);
8945  current->FinalizeForRendering();
8946  current->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
8947  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(tail, NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
8948  }
8949 
8950  // Update the RouteProperties Dialog, if currently shown
8951  if (pRoutePropDialog && pRoutePropDialog->IsShown()) {
8952  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
8953  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount(); ir++) {
8954  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8955  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
8956  if (pRoutePropDialog->GetRoute() == pr) {
8957  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(pr, true);
8958  }
8959  }
8960  }
8961  }
8962  }
8963 
8964  } // g_btouch
8965 
8966  else { // !g_btouch
8967  if (m_bRouteEditing) { // End of RoutePoint drag
8968  Route *tail = 0;
8969  Route *current = 0;
8970  bool appending = false;
8971  bool inserting = false;
8972  int connect = 0;
8973  int index_last;
8974  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
8975  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bBlink = false;
8976  // Check to see if there is a nearby point which may replace the
8977  // dragged one
8978  RoutePoint *pMousePoint = NULL;
8979  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging && !m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bIsActive) {
8980  double nearby_radius_meters =
8981  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() / m_true_scale_ppm;
8982  RoutePoint *pNearbyPoint = pWayPointMan->GetOtherNearbyWaypoint(
8983  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lat, m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_lon,
8984  nearby_radius_meters, m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_GUID);
8985  if (pNearbyPoint && !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsInLayer &&
8986  pWayPointMan->IsReallyVisible(pNearbyPoint)) {
8987  bool duplicate = false; // don't create duplicate point in routes
8988  if (m_pEditRouteArray && !pNearbyPoint->m_bIsolatedMark) {
8989  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
8990  ir++) {
8991  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
8992  if (pr && pr->pRoutePointList) {
8993  if (pr->pRoutePointList->IndexOf(pNearbyPoint) !=
8994  wxNOT_FOUND) {
8995  duplicate = true;
8996  break;
8997  }
8998  }
8999  }
9000  }
9001 
9002  // Special case:
9003  // Allow "re-use" of a route's waypoints iff it is a simple
9004  // isolated route. This allows, for instance, creation of a closed
9005  // polygon route
9006  if (m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount() == 1) duplicate = false;
9007 
9008  if (!duplicate) {
9009  int dlg_return;
9010  dlg_return =
9011  OCPNMessageBox(this,
9012  _("Replace this RoutePoint by the nearby "
9013  "Waypoint?"),
9014  _("OpenCPN RoutePoint change"),
9015  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
9016  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
9017  /*double confirmation if the dragged point has been manually
9018  * created which can be important and could be deleted
9019  * unintentionally*/
9020  tail = g_pRouteMan->FindVisibleRouteContainingWaypoint(
9021  pNearbyPoint);
9022  current = FindRouteContainingWaypoint(
9023  m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9024 
9025  if (tail && current && (tail != current)) {
9026  int dlg_return1;
9027  connect = tail->GetIndexOf(pNearbyPoint);
9028  int index_current_route =
9029  current->GetIndexOf(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9030  index_last = current->GetIndexOf(current->GetLastPoint());
9031  dlg_return1 = wxID_NO;
9032  if (index_last ==
9033  index_current_route) { // we are dragging the last
9034  // point of the route
9035  if (connect != tail->GetnPoints()) { // anything to do?
9036 
9037  wxString dmsg(
9038  _("Last part of route to be appended to dragged "
9039  "route?"));
9040  if (connect == 1)
9041  dmsg =
9042  _("Full route to be appended to dragged route?");
9043 
9044  dlg_return1 = OCPNMessageBox(
9045  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
9046  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
9047  if (dlg_return1 == wxID_YES) {
9048  appending = true;
9049  }
9050  }
9051  } else if (index_current_route ==
9052  1) { // dragging the first point of the route
9053  if (connect != 1) { // anything to do?
9054 
9055  wxString dmsg(
9056  _("First part of route to be inserted into dragged "
9057  "route?"));
9058  if (connect == tail->GetnPoints())
9059  dmsg = _(
9060  "Full route to be inserted into dragged route?");
9061 
9062  dlg_return1 = OCPNMessageBox(
9063  this, dmsg, _("OpenCPN Route Create"),
9064  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
9065  if (dlg_return1 == wxID_YES) {
9066  inserting = true;
9067  }
9068  }
9069  }
9070  }
9071 
9072  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget->IsShared()) {
9073  dlg_return = wxID_NO;
9074  dlg_return = OCPNMessageBox(
9075  this,
9076  _("Do you really want to delete and replace this "
9077  "WayPoint") +
9078  _T("\n") + _("which has been created manually?"),
9079  ("OpenCPN RoutePoint warning"),
9080  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
9081  }
9082  }
9083  if (dlg_return == wxID_YES) {
9084  pMousePoint = pNearbyPoint;
9085  if (pMousePoint->m_bIsolatedMark) {
9086  pMousePoint->SetShared(true);
9087  }
9088  pMousePoint->m_bIsolatedMark =
9089  false; // definitely no longer isolated
9090  pMousePoint->m_bIsInRoute = true;
9091  }
9092  }
9093  }
9094  }
9095  if (!pMousePoint)
9096  pSelect->UpdateSelectableRouteSegments(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9097 
9098  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
9099  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
9100  ir++) {
9101  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
9102  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
9103  if (pMousePoint) { // replace dragged point by nearby one
9104  int nRP =
9105  pr->pRoutePointList->IndexOf(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9106 
9107  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRoutePoints(pr);
9108  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRouteSegments(pr);
9109 
9110  pr->pRoutePointList->Insert(nRP, pMousePoint);
9111  pr->pRoutePointList->DeleteObject(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9112 
9113  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRouteSegments(pr);
9114  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRoutePoints(pr);
9115  }
9116  pr->FinalizeForRendering();
9117  pr->UpdateSegmentDistances();
9118  pr->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
9119 
9120  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging) pConfig->UpdateRoute(pr);
9121 
9122  pr->SetHiLite(0);
9123  }
9124  }
9125  Refresh(false);
9126  }
9127 
9128  if (appending) {
9129  // copy tail from connect until length to end of current after
9130  // dragging
9131 
9132  int length = tail->GetnPoints();
9133  for (int i = connect + 1; i <= length; i++) {
9134  current->AddPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), false);
9135  if (current)
9136  current->m_lastMousePointIndex = current->GetnPoints();
9137  m_routeState++;
9138  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas();
9139  ret = true;
9140  }
9141  current->FinalizeForRendering();
9142  current->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
9143  FinishRoute();
9144  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(tail, NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
9145  }
9146  if (inserting) {
9147  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRoutePoints(current);
9148  pSelect->DeleteAllSelectableRouteSegments(current);
9149  for (int i = 1; i < connect; i++) { // numbering in the tail route
9150  current->InsertPointAndSegment(tail->GetPoint(i), i - 1, false);
9151  }
9152  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRouteSegments(current);
9153  pSelect->AddAllSelectableRoutePoints(current);
9154  current->FinalizeForRendering();
9155  current->m_bIsBeingEdited = false;
9156  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(tail, NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
9157  }
9158 
9159  // Update the RouteProperties Dialog, if currently shown
9160  if (pRoutePropDialog && pRoutePropDialog->IsShown()) {
9161  if (m_pEditRouteArray) {
9162  for (unsigned int ir = 0; ir < m_pEditRouteArray->GetCount();
9163  ir++) {
9164  Route *pr = (Route *)m_pEditRouteArray->Item(ir);
9165  if (g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(pr)) {
9166  if (pRoutePropDialog->GetRoute() == pr) {
9167  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(pr, true);
9168  }
9169  }
9170  }
9171  }
9172  }
9173 
9174  if (pMousePoint) {
9175  pConfig->DeleteWayPoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9176  pWayPointMan->RemoveRoutePoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9177  // Hide mark properties dialog if open on the replaced point
9178  if ((NULL != g_pMarkInfoDialog) && (g_pMarkInfoDialog->IsShown()))
9179  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget == g_pMarkInfoDialog->GetRoutePoint())
9180  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Hide();
9181 
9182  delete m_pRoutePointEditTarget;
9183  m_lastRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
9184  undo->AfterUndoableAction(pMousePoint);
9185  undo->InvalidateUndo();
9186  } else {
9187  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
9188  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
9189 
9190  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9191  }
9192 
9193  delete m_pEditRouteArray;
9194  m_pEditRouteArray = NULL;
9195  }
9196 
9197  InvalidateGL();
9198  m_bRouteEditing = false;
9199  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
9200 
9201  if (m_toolBar && !m_toolBar->IsToolbarShown()) SurfaceToolbar();
9202  ret = true;
9203  }
9204 
9205  else if (m_bMarkEditing) { // end of Waypoint drag
9206  if (m_pRoutePointEditTarget) {
9207  if (m_bRoutePoinDragging)
9208  pConfig->UpdateWayPoint(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9209  undo->AfterUndoableAction(m_pRoutePointEditTarget);
9210  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
9211  if (!g_bopengl) {
9212  wxRect wp_rect;
9213  RoutePointGui(*m_pRoutePointEditTarget)
9214  .CalculateDCRect(m_dc_route, this, &wp_rect);
9215  m_pRoutePointEditTarget->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
9216  RefreshRect(wp_rect, true);
9217  }
9218  }
9219  m_pRoutePointEditTarget = NULL;
9220  m_bMarkEditing = false;
9221  if (m_toolBar && !m_toolBar->IsToolbarShown()) SurfaceToolbar();
9222  ret = true;
9223  }
9224 
9225  else if (leftIsDown) { // left click for chart center
9226  leftIsDown = false;
9227  ret = false;
9228 
9229  if (!g_btouch) {
9230  if (!m_bChartDragging && !m_bMeasure_Active) {
9231  } else {
9232  m_bChartDragging = false;
9233  }
9234  }
9235  }
9236  m_bRoutePoinDragging = false;
9237  } // !btouch
9238 
9239  if (ret) return true;
9240  } // left up
9241 
9242  if (event.RightDown()) {
9243  SetFocus(); // This is to let a plugin know which canvas is right-clicked
9244  last_drag.x = mx;
9245  last_drag.y = my;
9246 
9247  if (g_btouch) {
9248  // if( m_pRoutePointEditTarget )
9249  // return false;
9250  }
9251 
9252  ret = true;
9253  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = false;
9254  CallPopupMenu(mx, my);
9255  m_FinishRouteOnKillFocus = true;
9256  } // Right down
9257 
9258  return ret;
9259 }
9260 
9261 bool panleftIsDown;
9262 
9263 bool ChartCanvas::MouseEventProcessCanvas(wxMouseEvent &event) {
9264  int x, y;
9265  event.GetPosition(&x, &y);
9266 
9267  x *= m_displayScale;
9268  y *= m_displayScale;
9269 
9270  // Check for wheel rotation
9271  // ideally, should be just longer than the time between
9272  // processing accumulated mouse events from the event queue
9273  // as would happen during screen redraws.
9274  int wheel_dir = event.GetWheelRotation();
9275 
9276  if (wheel_dir) {
9277  int mouse_wheel_oneshot = abs(wheel_dir) * 4; // msec
9278  wheel_dir = wheel_dir > 0 ? 1 : -1; // normalize
9279 
9280  double factor = g_mouse_zoom_sensitivity;
9281  if (wheel_dir < 0) factor = 1 / factor;
9282 
9283  if (g_bsmoothpanzoom) {
9284  if ((m_wheelstopwatch.Time() < m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot)) {
9285  if (wheel_dir == m_last_wheel_dir) {
9286  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot += mouse_wheel_oneshot;
9287  // m_zoom_target /= factor;
9288  } else
9289  StopMovement();
9290  } else {
9291  m_wheelzoom_stop_oneshot = mouse_wheel_oneshot;
9292  m_wheelstopwatch.Start(0);
9293  // m_zoom_target = VPoint.chart_scale / factor;
9294  }
9295  }
9296 
9297  m_last_wheel_dir = wheel_dir;
9298 
9299  ZoomCanvas(factor, true, false);
9300  }
9301 
9302  if (event.LeftDown()) {
9303  // Skip the first left click if it will cause a canvas focus shift
9304  if ((GetCanvasCount() > 1) && (this != g_focusCanvas)) {
9305  // printf("focus shift\n");
9306  return false;
9307  }
9308 
9309  last_drag.x = x, last_drag.y = y;
9310  panleftIsDown = true;
9311  }
9312 
9313  if (event.LeftUp()) {
9314  if (panleftIsDown) { // leftUp for chart center, but only after a leftDown
9315  // seen here.
9316  panleftIsDown = false;
9317 
9318  if (!g_btouch) {
9319  if (!m_bChartDragging && !m_bMeasure_Active) {
9320  switch (cursor_region) {
9321  case MID_RIGHT: {
9322  PanCanvas(100, 0);
9323  break;
9324  }
9325 
9326  case MID_LEFT: {
9327  PanCanvas(-100, 0);
9328  break;
9329  }
9330 
9331  case MID_TOP: {
9332  PanCanvas(0, 100);
9333  break;
9334  }
9335 
9336  case MID_BOT: {
9337  PanCanvas(0, -100);
9338  break;
9339  }
9340 
9341  case CENTER: {
9342  PanCanvas(x - GetVP().pix_width / 2, y - GetVP().pix_height / 2);
9343  break;
9344  }
9345  }
9346  } else {
9347  m_bChartDragging = false;
9348  }
9349  }
9350  }
9351  }
9352 
9353  if (event.Dragging() && event.LeftIsDown()) {
9354  /*
9355  * fixed dragging.
9356  * On my Surface Pro 3 running Arch Linux there is no mouse down event
9357  * before the drag event. Hence, as there is no mouse down event, last_drag
9358  * is not reset before the drag. And that results in one single drag
9359  * session, meaning you cannot drag the map a few miles north, lift your
9360  * finger, and the go even further north. Instead, the map resets itself
9361  * always to the very first drag start (since there is not reset of
9362  * last_drag).
9363  *
9364  * Besides, should not left down and dragging be enough of a situation to
9365  * start a drag procedure?
9366  *
9367  * Anyways, guarded it to be active in touch situations only.
9368  */
9369  if (g_btouch) {
9370  if (false == m_bChartDragging) {
9371  last_drag.x = x, last_drag.y = y;
9372  m_bChartDragging = true;
9373  }
9374  }
9375 
9376  if ((last_drag.x != x) || (last_drag.y != y)) {
9377  if(!m_routeState){ // Correct fault on wx32/gtk3, uncommanded dragging on route create.
9378  // github #2994
9379  m_bChartDragging = true;
9380  StartTimedMovement();
9381  m_pan_drag.x += last_drag.x - x;
9382  m_pan_drag.y += last_drag.y - y;
9383 
9384  last_drag.x = x, last_drag.y = y;
9385  }
9386 
9387  if (g_btouch) {
9388  if ((m_bMeasure_Active && m_nMeasureState) || (m_routeState)) {
9389  // deactivate next LeftUp to ovoid creating an unexpected point
9390  m_DoubleClickTimer->Start();
9391  singleClickEventIsValid = false;
9392  }
9393  }
9394  }
9395  }
9396 
9397  return true;
9398 }
9399 
9400 void ChartCanvas::MouseEvent(wxMouseEvent &event) {
9401  if (MouseEventOverlayWindows(event)) return;
9402 
9403  if (MouseEventSetup(event)) return; // handled, no further action required
9404 
9405  if (!MouseEventProcessObjects(event)) MouseEventProcessCanvas(event);
9406 }
9407 
9408 void ChartCanvas::SetCanvasCursor(wxMouseEvent &event) {
9409  // Switch to the appropriate cursor on mouse movement
9410 
9411  wxCursor *ptarget_cursor = pCursorArrow;
9412  if (!pPlugIn_Cursor) {
9413  ptarget_cursor = pCursorArrow;
9414  if ((!m_routeState) &&
9415  (!m_bMeasure_Active) /*&& ( !m_bCM93MeasureOffset_Active )*/) {
9416  if (cursor_region == MID_RIGHT) {
9417  ptarget_cursor = pCursorRight;
9418  } else if (cursor_region == MID_LEFT) {
9419  ptarget_cursor = pCursorLeft;
9420  } else if (cursor_region == MID_TOP) {
9421  ptarget_cursor = pCursorDown;
9422  } else if (cursor_region == MID_BOT) {
9423  ptarget_cursor = pCursorUp;
9424  } else {
9425  ptarget_cursor = pCursorArrow;
9426  }
9427  } else if (m_bMeasure_Active ||
9428  m_routeState) // If Measure tool use Pencil Cursor
9429  ptarget_cursor = pCursorPencil;
9430  } else {
9431  ptarget_cursor = pPlugIn_Cursor;
9432  }
9433 
9434  SetCursor(*ptarget_cursor);
9435 }
9436 
9437 void ChartCanvas::LostMouseCapture(wxMouseCaptureLostEvent &event) {
9438  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
9439 }
9440 
9441 void ChartCanvas::ShowObjectQueryWindow(int x, int y, float zlat, float zlon) {
9442  ChartPlugInWrapper *target_plugin_chart = NULL;
9443  s57chart *Chs57 = NULL;
9444  wxFileName file;
9445  wxArrayString files;
9446 
9447  ChartBase *target_chart = GetChartAtCursor();
9448  if (target_chart) {
9449  file.Assign(target_chart->GetFullPath());
9450  if ((target_chart->GetChartType() == CHART_TYPE_PLUGIN) &&
9451  (target_chart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR))
9452  target_plugin_chart = dynamic_cast<ChartPlugInWrapper *>(target_chart);
9453  else
9454  Chs57 = dynamic_cast<s57chart *>(target_chart);
9455  } else { // target_chart = null, might be mbtiles
9456  std::vector<int> stackIndexArray = m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray();
9457  unsigned int im = stackIndexArray.size();
9458  int scale = 2147483647; // max 32b integer
9459  if (VPoint.b_quilt && im > 0) {
9460  for (unsigned int is = 0; is < im; is++) {
9461  if (ChartData->GetDBChartType(stackIndexArray[is]) ==
9462  CHART_TYPE_MBTILES) {
9463  if (IsTileOverlayIndexInNoShow(stackIndexArray[is])) continue;
9464  double lat, lon;
9465  VPoint.GetLLFromPix(wxPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y), &lat, &lon);
9466  if (ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(stackIndexArray[is])
9467  .GetBBox()
9468  .Contains(lat, lon)) {
9469  if (ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(stackIndexArray[is]).GetScale() <
9470  scale) {
9471  scale =
9472  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(stackIndexArray[is]).GetScale();
9473  file.Assign(ChartData->GetDBChartFileName(stackIndexArray[is]));
9474  }
9475  }
9476  }
9477  }
9478  }
9479  }
9480 
9481  std::vector<Ais8_001_22 *> area_notices;
9482 
9483  if (g_pAIS && m_bShowAIS && g_bShowAreaNotices) {
9484  float vp_scale = GetVPScale();
9485 
9486  for (const auto &target : g_pAIS->GetAreaNoticeSourcesList()) {
9487  auto target_data = target.second;
9488  if (!target_data->area_notices.empty()) {
9489  for (auto &ani : target_data->area_notices) {
9490  Ais8_001_22 &area_notice = ani.second;
9491 
9492  BoundingBox bbox;
9493 
9494  for (Ais8_001_22_SubAreaList::iterator sa =
9495  area_notice.sub_areas.begin();
9496  sa != area_notice.sub_areas.end(); ++sa) {
9497  switch (sa->shape) {
9498  case AIS8_001_22_SHAPE_CIRCLE: {
9499  wxPoint target_point;
9500  GetCanvasPointPix(sa->latitude, sa->longitude, &target_point);
9501  bbox.Expand(target_point);
9502  if (sa->radius_m > 0.0) bbox.EnLarge(sa->radius_m * vp_scale);
9503  break;
9504  }
9505  case AIS8_001_22_SHAPE_POLYGON:
9506  case AIS8_001_22_SHAPE_POLYLINE: {
9507  for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
9508  double lat = sa->latitude;
9509  double lon = sa->longitude;
9510  ll_gc_ll(lat, lon, sa->angles[i], sa->dists_m[i] / 1852.0,
9511  &lat, &lon);
9512  wxPoint target_point;
9513  GetCanvasPointPix(lat, lon, &target_point);
9514  bbox.Expand(target_point);
9515  }
9516  }
9517  }
9518  }
9519 
9520  if (bbox.PointInBox(x, y)) {
9521  area_notices.push_back(&area_notice);
9522  }
9523  }
9524  }
9525  }
9526  }
9527 
9528  if (target_chart || !area_notices.empty() || file.HasName()) {
9529  // Go get the array of all objects at the cursor lat/lon
9530  int sel_rad_pix = 5;
9531  float SelectRadius = sel_rad_pix / (GetVP().view_scale_ppm * 1852 * 60);
9532 
9533  // Make sure we always get the lights from an object, even if we are
9534  // currently not displaying lights on the chart.
9535 
9536  SetCursor(wxCURSOR_WAIT);
9537  bool lightsVis = m_encShowLights; // gFrame->ToggleLights( false );
9538  if (!lightsVis) SetShowENCLights(true);
9539  ;
9540 
9541  ListOfObjRazRules *rule_list = NULL;
9542  ListOfPI_S57Obj *pi_rule_list = NULL;
9543  if (Chs57)
9544  rule_list =
9545  Chs57->GetObjRuleListAtLatLon(zlat, zlon, SelectRadius, &GetVP());
9546  else if (target_plugin_chart)
9547  pi_rule_list = g_pi_manager->GetPlugInObjRuleListAtLatLon(
9548  target_plugin_chart, zlat, zlon, SelectRadius, GetVP());
9549 
9550  ListOfObjRazRules *overlay_rule_list = NULL;
9551  ChartBase *overlay_chart = GetOverlayChartAtCursor();
9552  s57chart *CHs57_Overlay = dynamic_cast<s57chart *>(overlay_chart);
9553 
9554  if (CHs57_Overlay) {
9555  overlay_rule_list = CHs57_Overlay->GetObjRuleListAtLatLon(
9556  zlat, zlon, SelectRadius, &GetVP());
9557  }
9558 
9559  if (!lightsVis) SetShowENCLights(false);
9560 
9561  wxString objText;
9562  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("ObjectQuery"));
9563  wxString face = dFont->GetFaceName();
9564 
9565  if (NULL == g_pObjectQueryDialog) {
9566  g_pObjectQueryDialog =
9567  new S57QueryDialog(this, -1, _("Object Query"), wxDefaultPosition,
9568  wxSize(g_S57_dialog_sx, g_S57_dialog_sy));
9569  }
9570 
9571  wxColor bg = g_pObjectQueryDialog->GetBackgroundColour();
9572  wxColor fg = FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(_("ObjectQuery"));
9573 
9574 #ifdef __WXOSX__
9575  // Auto Adjustment for dark mode
9576  fg = g_pObjectQueryDialog->GetForegroundColour();
9577 #endif
9578 
9579  objText.Printf(
9580  _T("<html><body bgcolor=#%02x%02x%02x><font color=#%02x%02x%02x>"),
9581  bg.Red(), bg.Green(), bg.Blue(), fg.Red(), fg.Green(), fg.Blue());
9582 
9583 #ifdef __WXOSX__
9584  int points = dFont->GetPointSize();
9585 #else
9586  int points = dFont->GetPointSize() + 1;
9587 #endif
9588 
9589  int sizes[7];
9590  for (int i = -2; i < 5; i++) {
9591  sizes[i + 2] = points + i + (i > 0 ? i : 0);
9592  }
9593  g_pObjectQueryDialog->m_phtml->SetFonts(face, face, sizes);
9594 
9595  if (wxFONTSTYLE_ITALIC == dFont->GetStyle()) objText += _T("<i>");
9596 
9597  if (overlay_rule_list && CHs57_Overlay) {
9598  objText << CHs57_Overlay->CreateObjDescriptions(overlay_rule_list);
9599  objText << _T("<hr noshade>");
9600  }
9601 
9602  for (std::vector<Ais8_001_22 *>::iterator an = area_notices.begin();
9603  an != area_notices.end(); ++an) {
9604  objText << _T( "<b>AIS Area Notice:</b> " );
9605  objText << ais8_001_22_notice_names[(*an)->notice_type];
9606  for (std::vector<Ais8_001_22_SubArea>::iterator sa =
9607  (*an)->sub_areas.begin();
9608  sa != (*an)->sub_areas.end(); ++sa)
9609  if (!sa->text.empty()) objText << sa->text;
9610  objText << _T( "<br>expires: " ) << (*an)->expiry_time.Format();
9611  objText << _T( "<hr noshade>" );
9612  }
9613 
9614  if (Chs57)
9615  objText << Chs57->CreateObjDescriptions(rule_list);
9616  else if (target_plugin_chart)
9617  objText << g_pi_manager->CreateObjDescriptions(target_plugin_chart,
9618  pi_rule_list);
9619 
9620  objText << _T("</font>");
9621  if (wxFONTSTYLE_ITALIC == dFont->GetStyle()) objText << _T("</i>");
9622 
9623  // Add the additional info files
9624  wxString AddFiles, filenameOK;
9625  int filecount = 0;
9626  if (!target_plugin_chart) { // plugincharts shoud take care of this in the
9627  // plugin
9628 
9629  AddFiles = wxString::Format(
9630  _T("<hr noshade><br><b>Additional info files attached to: </b> ")
9631  _T("<font ")
9632  _T("size=-2>%s</font><br><table border=0 cellspacing=0 ")
9633  _T("cellpadding=3>"),
9634  file.GetFullName());
9635  file.Normalize();
9636  file.Assign(file.GetPath(), wxT(""));
9637  wxDir dir( file.GetFullPath() );
9638  wxString filename;
9639  bool cont = dir.GetFirst( &filename, "", wxDIR_FILES );
9640  while ( cont )
9641  {
9642  file.Assign( dir.GetNameWithSep().append( filename) );
9643  wxString FormatString = _T("<td valign=top><font size=-2><a href=\"%s\">%s</a></font></td>");
9644  if( g_ObjQFileExt.Find( file.GetExt().Lower() ) != wxNOT_FOUND )
9645  {
9646  filenameOK=file.GetFullPath();//remember last valid name
9647  // we are making a 3 columns table. New row only every third file
9648  if ( 3*((int)filecount/3) == filecount )
9649  FormatString.Prepend(_T("<tr>")); // new row
9650  else
9651  FormatString.Prepend(_T("<td>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp</td>")); // an empty spacer column
9652 
9653  AddFiles << wxString::Format(FormatString, file.GetFullPath(), file.GetFullName());
9654  filecount++;
9655  }
9656  cont = dir.GetNext(&filename);
9657  }
9658  objText << AddFiles << _T("</table>");
9659  }
9660 
9661  objText << _T("</body></html>");
9662 
9663  if (Chs57 || target_plugin_chart || (filecount > 1)) {
9664  g_pObjectQueryDialog->SetHTMLPage(objText);
9665  g_pObjectQueryDialog->Show();
9666  }
9667  if ((!Chs57 && filecount == 1)){ // only one file?, show direktly
9668  //generate an event to avoid double code
9669  wxHtmlLinkInfo hli(filenameOK);
9670  wxHtmlLinkEvent hle(1, hli);
9671  g_pObjectQueryDialog->OnHtmlLinkClicked(hle);
9672  }
9673 
9674  if (rule_list) rule_list->Clear();
9675  delete rule_list;
9676 
9677  if (overlay_rule_list) overlay_rule_list->Clear();
9678  delete overlay_rule_list;
9679 
9680  if (pi_rule_list) pi_rule_list->Clear();
9681  delete pi_rule_list;
9682 
9683  SetCursor(wxCURSOR_ARROW);
9684  }
9685 }
9686 
9687 void ChartCanvas::ShowMarkPropertiesDialog(RoutePoint *markPoint) {
9688  bool bNew = false;
9689  if (!g_pMarkInfoDialog) { // There is one global instance of the MarkProp
9690  // Dialog
9691  g_pMarkInfoDialog = new MarkInfoDlg(this);
9692  bNew = true;
9693  }
9694 
9695  if (1 /*g_bresponsive*/) {
9696  wxSize canvas_size = GetSize();
9697 
9698  int best_size_y = wxMin(400 / OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor(), canvas_size.y);
9699  g_pMarkInfoDialog->SetMinSize(wxSize(-1, best_size_y));
9700 
9701  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Layout();
9702 
9703  wxPoint canvas_pos = GetPosition();
9704  wxSize fitted_size = g_pMarkInfoDialog->GetSize();
9705 
9706  bool newFit = false;
9707  if (canvas_size.x < fitted_size.x) {
9708  fitted_size.x = canvas_size.x - 40;
9709  if (canvas_size.y < fitted_size.y)
9710  fitted_size.y -= 40; // scrollbar added
9711  }
9712  if (canvas_size.y < fitted_size.y) {
9713  fitted_size.y = canvas_size.y - 40;
9714  if (canvas_size.x < fitted_size.x)
9715  fitted_size.x -= 40; // scrollbar added
9716  }
9717 
9718  if (newFit) {
9719  g_pMarkInfoDialog->SetSize(fitted_size);
9720  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Centre();
9721  }
9722  }
9723 
9724  markPoint->m_bRPIsBeingEdited = false;
9725 
9726  g_pMarkInfoDialog->SetRoutePoint(markPoint);
9727  g_pMarkInfoDialog->UpdateProperties();
9728  if (markPoint->m_bIsInLayer) {
9729  wxString caption(wxString::Format(_T("%s, %s: %s"),
9730  _("Waypoint Properties"), _("Layer"),
9731  GetLayerName(markPoint->m_LayerID)));
9732  g_pMarkInfoDialog->SetDialogTitle(caption);
9733  } else
9734  g_pMarkInfoDialog->SetDialogTitle(_("Waypoint Properties"));
9735 
9736  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Show();
9737  g_pMarkInfoDialog->Raise();
9738  g_pMarkInfoDialog->InitialFocus();
9739  if (bNew) g_pMarkInfoDialog->CenterOnScreen();
9740 }
9741 
9742 void ChartCanvas::ShowRoutePropertiesDialog(wxString title, Route *selected) {
9743  pRoutePropDialog = RoutePropDlgImpl::getInstance(this);
9744  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(selected);
9745  // pNew->UpdateProperties();
9746  pRoutePropDialog->Show();
9747  pRoutePropDialog->Raise();
9748  return;
9749  pRoutePropDialog = RoutePropDlgImpl::getInstance(
9750  this); // There is one global instance of the RouteProp Dialog
9751 
9752  if (g_bresponsive) {
9753  wxSize canvas_size = GetSize();
9754  wxPoint canvas_pos = GetPosition();
9755  wxSize fitted_size = pRoutePropDialog->GetSize();
9756  ;
9757 
9758  if (canvas_size.x < fitted_size.x) {
9759  fitted_size.x = canvas_size.x;
9760  if (canvas_size.y < fitted_size.y)
9761  fitted_size.y -= 20; // scrollbar added
9762  }
9763  if (canvas_size.y < fitted_size.y) {
9764  fitted_size.y = canvas_size.y;
9765  if (canvas_size.x < fitted_size.x)
9766  fitted_size.x -= 20; // scrollbar added
9767  }
9768 
9769  pRoutePropDialog->SetSize(fitted_size);
9770  pRoutePropDialog->Centre();
9771 
9772  // int xp = (canvas_size.x - fitted_size.x)/2;
9773  // int yp = (canvas_size.y - fitted_size.y)/2;
9774 
9775  wxPoint xxp = ClientToScreen(canvas_pos);
9776  // pRoutePropDialog->Move(xxp.x + xp, xxp.y + yp);
9777  }
9778 
9779  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(selected);
9780 
9781  pRoutePropDialog->Show();
9782 
9783  Refresh(false);
9784 }

9797 
9798 void pupHandler_PasteWaypoint() {
9799  Kml kml;
9800 
9801  int pasteBuffer = kml.ParsePasteBuffer();
9802  RoutePoint *pasted = kml.GetParsedRoutePoint();
9803  if (!pasted) return;
9804 
9805  double nearby_radius_meters =
9806  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() /
9807  gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetCanvasTrueScale();
9808 
9809  RoutePoint *nearPoint = pWayPointMan->GetNearbyWaypoint(
9810  pasted->m_lat, pasted->m_lon, nearby_radius_meters);
9811 
9812  int answer = wxID_NO;
9813  if (nearPoint && !nearPoint->m_bIsInLayer) {
9814  wxString msg;
9815  msg << _(
9816  "There is an existing waypoint at the same location as the one you are "
9817  "pasting. Would you like to merge the pasted data with it?\n\n");
9818  msg << _("Answering 'No' will create a new waypoint at the same location.");
9819  answer = OCPNMessageBox(NULL, msg, _("Merge waypoint?"),
9820  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxNO_DEFAULT);
9821  }
9822 
9823  if (answer == wxID_YES) {
9824  nearPoint->SetName(pasted->GetName());
9825  nearPoint->m_MarkDescription = pasted->m_MarkDescription;
9826  if (pRouteManagerDialog && pRouteManagerDialog->IsShown())
9827  pRouteManagerDialog->UpdateWptListCtrl();
9828  }
9829 
9830  if (answer == wxID_NO) {
9831  RoutePoint *newPoint = new RoutePoint(pasted);
9832  newPoint->m_bIsolatedMark = true;
9833  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(newPoint->m_lat, newPoint->m_lon,
9834  newPoint);
9835  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(newPoint, -1);
9836  pWayPointMan->AddRoutePoint(newPoint);
9837  if (pRouteManagerDialog && pRouteManagerDialog->IsShown())
9838  pRouteManagerDialog->UpdateWptListCtrl();
9839  if (RoutePointGui(*newPoint).IsVisibleSelectable(g_focusCanvas))
9840  RoutePointGui(*newPoint).ShowScaleWarningMessage(g_focusCanvas);
9841  }
9842 
9843  gFrame->InvalidateAllGL();
9844  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas(false);
9845 }
9846 
9847 void pupHandler_PasteRoute() {
9848  Kml kml;
9849 
9850  int pasteBuffer = kml.ParsePasteBuffer();
9851  Route *pasted = kml.GetParsedRoute();
9852  if (!pasted) return;
9853 
9854  double nearby_radius_meters =
9855  g_Platform->GetSelectRadiusPix() /
9856  gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetCanvasTrueScale();
9857 
9858  RoutePoint *curPoint;
9859  RoutePoint *nearPoint;
9860  RoutePoint *prevPoint = NULL;
9861 
9862  bool mergepoints = false;
9863  bool createNewRoute = true;
9864  int existingWaypointCounter = 0;
9865 
9866  for (int i = 1; i <= pasted->GetnPoints(); i++) {
9867  curPoint = pasted->GetPoint(i); // NB! n starts at 1 !
9868  nearPoint = pWayPointMan->GetNearbyWaypoint(
9869  curPoint->m_lat, curPoint->m_lon, nearby_radius_meters);
9870  if (nearPoint) {
9871  mergepoints = true;
9872  existingWaypointCounter++;
9873  // Small hack here to avoid both extending RoutePoint and repeating all
9874  // the GetNearbyWaypoint calculations. Use existin data field in
9875  // RoutePoint as temporary storage.
9876  curPoint->m_bPtIsSelected = true;
9877  }
9878  }
9879 
9880  int answer = wxID_NO;
9881  if (mergepoints) {
9882  wxString msg;
9883  msg << _(
9884  "There are existing waypoints at the same location as some of the ones "
9885  "you are pasting. Would you like to just merge the pasted data into "
9886  "them?\n\n");
9887  msg << _("Answering 'No' will create all new waypoints for this route.");
9888  answer = OCPNMessageBox(NULL, msg, _("Merge waypoints?"),
9889  (long)wxYES_NO | wxCANCEL | wxYES_DEFAULT);
9890 
9891  if (answer == wxID_CANCEL) {
9892  return;
9893  }
9894  }
9895 
9896  // If all waypoints exist since before, and a route with the same name, we
9897  // don't create a new route.
9898  if (mergepoints && answer == wxID_YES &&
9899  existingWaypointCounter == pasted->GetnPoints()) {
9900  wxRouteListNode *route_node = pRouteList->GetFirst();
9901  while (route_node) {
9902  Route *proute = route_node->GetData();
9903 
9904  if (pasted->m_RouteNameString == proute->m_RouteNameString) {
9905  createNewRoute = false;
9906  break;
9907  }
9908  route_node = route_node->GetNext();
9909  }
9910  }
9911 
9912  Route *newRoute = 0;
9913  RoutePoint *newPoint = 0;
9914 
9915  if (createNewRoute) {
9916  newRoute = new Route();
9917  newRoute->m_RouteNameString = pasted->m_RouteNameString;
9918  }
9919 
9920  for (int i = 1; i <= pasted->GetnPoints(); i++) {
9921  curPoint = pasted->GetPoint(i);
9922  if (answer == wxID_YES && curPoint->m_bPtIsSelected) {
9923  curPoint->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
9924  newPoint = pWayPointMan->GetNearbyWaypoint(
9925  curPoint->m_lat, curPoint->m_lon, nearby_radius_meters);
9926  newPoint->SetName(curPoint->GetName());
9927  newPoint->m_MarkDescription = curPoint->m_MarkDescription;
9928 
9929  if (createNewRoute) newRoute->AddPoint(newPoint);
9930  } else {
9931  curPoint->m_bPtIsSelected = false;
9932 
9933  newPoint = new RoutePoint(curPoint);
9934  newPoint->m_bIsolatedMark = false;
9935  newPoint->SetIconName(_T("circle"));
9936  newPoint->m_bIsVisible = true;
9937  newPoint->m_bShowName = false;
9938  newPoint->SetShared(false);
9939 
9940  newRoute->AddPoint(newPoint);
9941  pSelect->AddSelectableRoutePoint(newPoint->m_lat, newPoint->m_lon,
9942  newPoint);
9943  pConfig->AddNewWayPoint(newPoint, -1);
9944  pWayPointMan->AddRoutePoint(newPoint);
9945  }
9946  if (i > 1 && createNewRoute)
9947  pSelect->AddSelectableRouteSegment(prevPoint->m_lat, prevPoint->m_lon,
9948  curPoint->m_lat, curPoint->m_lon,
9949  prevPoint, newPoint, newRoute);
9950  prevPoint = newPoint;
9951  }
9952 
9953  if (createNewRoute) {
9954  pRouteList->Append(newRoute);
9955  pConfig->AddNewRoute(newRoute); // use auto next num
9956 
9957  if (pRoutePropDialog && pRoutePropDialog->IsShown()) {
9958  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(newRoute);
9959  }
9960 
9961  if (pRouteManagerDialog && pRouteManagerDialog->IsShown()) {
9962  pRouteManagerDialog->UpdateRouteListCtrl();
9963  pRouteManagerDialog->UpdateWptListCtrl();
9964  }
9965  gFrame->InvalidateAllGL();
9966  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas(false);
9967  }
9968  if (RoutePointGui(*newPoint).IsVisibleSelectable(g_focusCanvas))
9969  RoutePointGui(*newPoint).ShowScaleWarningMessage(g_focusCanvas);
9970 }
9971 
9972 void pupHandler_PasteTrack() {
9973  Kml kml;
9974 
9975  int pasteBuffer = kml.ParsePasteBuffer();
9976  Track *pasted = kml.GetParsedTrack();
9977  if (!pasted) return;
9978 
9979  TrackPoint *curPoint;
9980 
9981  Track *newTrack = new Track();
9982  TrackPoint *newPoint;
9983  TrackPoint *prevPoint = NULL;
9984 
9985  newTrack->SetName(pasted->GetName());
9986 
9987  for (int i = 0; i < pasted->GetnPoints(); i++) {
9988  curPoint = pasted->GetPoint(i);
9989 
9990  newPoint = new TrackPoint(curPoint);
9991 
9992  wxDateTime now = wxDateTime::Now();
9993  newPoint->SetCreateTime(curPoint->GetCreateTime());
9994 
9995  newTrack->AddPoint(newPoint);
9996 
9997  if (prevPoint)
9998  pSelect->AddSelectableTrackSegment(prevPoint->m_lat, prevPoint->m_lon,
9999  newPoint->m_lat, newPoint->m_lon,
10000  prevPoint, newPoint, newTrack);
10001 
10002  prevPoint = newPoint;
10003  }
10004 
10005  g_TrackList.push_back(newTrack);
10006  pConfig->AddNewTrack(newTrack);
10007 
10008  gFrame->InvalidateAllGL();
10009  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas(false);
10010 }
10011 
10012 bool ChartCanvas::InvokeCanvasMenu(int x, int y, int seltype) {
10013  m_canvasMenu = new CanvasMenuHandler(this, m_pSelectedRoute, m_pSelectedTrack,
10014  m_pFoundRoutePoint, m_FoundAIS_MMSI,
10015  m_pIDXCandidate);
10016 
10017  Connect(
10018  wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
10019  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)&ChartCanvas::PopupMenuHandler);
10020 
10021  m_canvasMenu->CanvasPopupMenu(x, y, seltype);
10022 
10023  Disconnect(
10024  wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
10025  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)&ChartCanvas::PopupMenuHandler);
10026 
10027  delete m_canvasMenu;
10028  m_canvasMenu = NULL;
10029 
10030 #ifdef __WXQT__
10031  // gFrame->SurfaceToolbar();
10032  // g_MainToolbar->Raise();
10033 #endif
10034 
10035  return true;
10036 }
10037 
10038 void ChartCanvas::PopupMenuHandler(wxCommandEvent &event) {
10039  // Pass menu events from the canvas to the menu handler
10040  // This is necessarily in ChartCanvas since that is the menu's parent.
10041  if (m_canvasMenu) {
10042  m_canvasMenu->PopupMenuHandler(event);
10043  }
10044  return;
10045 }
10046 
10047 void ChartCanvas::StartRoute(void) {
10048  // Do not allow more than one canvas to create a route at one time.
10049  if (g_brouteCreating) return;
10050 
10051  if (g_MainToolbar) g_MainToolbar->DisableTooltips();
10052 
10053  g_brouteCreating = true;
10054  m_routeState = 1;
10055  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
10056  SetCursor(*pCursorPencil);
10057  SetCanvasToolbarItemState(ID_ROUTE, true);
10058  gFrame->SetMasterToolbarItemState(ID_MENU_ROUTE_NEW, true);
10059 
10060  HideGlobalToolbar();
10061 
10062 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
10063  androidSetRouteAnnunciator(true);
10064 #endif
10065 }
10066 
10067 void ChartCanvas::FinishRoute(void) {
10068  m_routeState = 0;
10069  m_prev_pMousePoint = NULL;
10070  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
10071 
10072  SetCanvasToolbarItemState(ID_ROUTE, false);
10073  gFrame->SetMasterToolbarItemState(ID_MENU_ROUTE_NEW, false);
10074 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
10075  androidSetRouteAnnunciator(false);
10076 #endif
10077 
10078  SetCursor(*pCursorArrow);
10079 
10080  if (m_pMouseRoute) {
10081  if (m_bAppendingRoute)
10082  pConfig->UpdateRoute(m_pMouseRoute);
10083  else {
10084  if (m_pMouseRoute->GetnPoints() > 1) {
10085  pConfig->AddNewRoute(m_pMouseRoute);
10086  } else {
10087  g_pRouteMan->DeleteRoute(m_pMouseRoute,
10088  NavObjectChanges::getInstance());
10089  m_pMouseRoute = NULL;
10090  }
10091  }
10092  if (m_pMouseRoute) m_pMouseRoute->SetHiLite(0);
10093 
10094  if (RoutePropDlgImpl::getInstanceFlag() && pRoutePropDialog &&
10095  (pRoutePropDialog->IsShown())) {
10096  pRoutePropDialog->SetRouteAndUpdate(m_pMouseRoute, true);
10097  }
10098 
10099  if (RouteManagerDialog::getInstanceFlag() && pRouteManagerDialog) {
10100  if (pRouteManagerDialog && pRouteManagerDialog->IsShown())
10101  pRouteManagerDialog->UpdateRouteListCtrl();
10102  }
10103  }
10104  m_bAppendingRoute = false;
10105  m_pMouseRoute = NULL;
10106 
10107  m_pSelectedRoute = NULL;
10108 
10109  undo->InvalidateUndo();
10110  gFrame->RefreshAllCanvas(true);
10111 
10112  if (g_MainToolbar) g_MainToolbar->EnableTooltips();
10113 
10114  ShowGlobalToolbar();
10115 
10116  g_brouteCreating = false;
10117 }
10118 
10119 void ChartCanvas::HideGlobalToolbar() {
10120  if (m_canvasIndex == 0) {
10121  m_last_TBviz = gFrame->SetGlobalToolbarViz(false);
10122  }
10123 }
10124 
10125 void ChartCanvas::ShowGlobalToolbar() {
10126  if (m_canvasIndex == 0) {
10127  if (m_last_TBviz) gFrame->SetGlobalToolbarViz(true);
10128  }
10129 }
10130 
10131 void ChartCanvas::ShowAISTargetList(void) {
10132  if (NULL == g_pAISTargetList) { // There is one global instance of the Dialog
10133  g_pAISTargetList = new AISTargetListDialog(parent_frame, g_pauimgr, g_pAIS);
10134  }
10135 
10136  g_pAISTargetList->UpdateAISTargetList();
10137 }
10138 
10139 void ChartCanvas::RenderAllChartOutlines(ocpnDC &dc, ViewPort &vp) {
10140  if (!m_bShowOutlines) return;
10141 
10142  if (!ChartData) return;
10143 
10144  int nEntry = ChartData->GetChartTableEntries();
10145 
10146  for (int i = 0; i < nEntry; i++) {
10147  ChartTableEntry *pt = (ChartTableEntry *)&ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(i);
10148 
10149  // Check to see if the candidate chart is in the currently active group
10150  bool b_group_draw = false;
10151  if (m_groupIndex > 0) {
10152  for (unsigned int ig = 0; ig < pt->GetGroupArray().size(); ig++) {
10153  int index = pt->GetGroupArray()[ig];
10154  if (m_groupIndex == index) {
10155  b_group_draw = true;
10156  break;
10157  }
10158  }
10159  } else
10160  b_group_draw = true;
10161 
10162  if (b_group_draw) RenderChartOutline(dc, i, vp);
10163  }
10164 
10165  // On CM93 Composite Charts, draw the outlines of the next smaller
10166  // scale cell
10167  cm93compchart *pcm93 = NULL;
10168  if (VPoint.b_quilt) {
10169  for (ChartBase *pch = GetFirstQuiltChart(); pch; pch = GetNextQuiltChart())
10170  if (pch->GetChartType() == CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP) {
10171  pcm93 = (cm93compchart *)pch;
10172  break;
10173  }
10174  } else if (m_singleChart &&
10175  (m_singleChart->GetChartType() == CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP))
10176  pcm93 = (cm93compchart *)m_singleChart;
10177 
10178  if (pcm93) {
10179  double chart_native_ppm = m_canvas_scale_factor / pcm93->GetNativeScale();
10180  double zoom_factor = GetVP().view_scale_ppm / chart_native_ppm;
10181 
10182  if (zoom_factor > 8.0) {
10183  wxPen mPen(GetGlobalColor(_T("UINFM")), 2, wxPENSTYLE_SHORT_DASH);
10184  dc.SetPen(mPen);
10185  } else {
10186  wxPen mPen(GetGlobalColor(_T("UINFM")), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
10187  dc.SetPen(mPen);
10188  }
10189 
10190  pcm93->RenderNextSmallerCellOutlines(dc, vp, this);
10191  }
10192 }
10193 
10194 void ChartCanvas::RenderChartOutline(ocpnDC &dc, int dbIndex, ViewPort &vp) {
10195 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
10196  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc) {
10197  /* opengl version specially optimized */
10198  m_glcc->RenderChartOutline(dc, dbIndex, vp);
10199  return;
10200  }
10201 #endif
10202
