10203  if (ChartData->GetDBChartType(dbIndex) == CHART_TYPE_PLUGIN) {
10204  if (!ChartData->IsChartAvailable(dbIndex)) return;
10205  }
10206 
10207  float plylat, plylon;
10208  float plylat1, plylon1;
10209 
10210  int pixx, pixy, pixx1, pixy1;
10211 
10212  LLBBox box;
10213  ChartData->GetDBBoundingBox(dbIndex, box);
10214 
10215  // Don't draw an outline in the case where the chart covers the entire world
10216  // */
10217  if (box.GetLonRange() == 360) return;
10218 
10219  double lon_bias = 0;
10220  // chart is outside of viewport lat/lon bounding box
10221  if (box.IntersectOutGetBias(vp.GetBBox(), lon_bias)) return;
10222 
10223  int nPly = ChartData->GetDBPlyPoint(dbIndex, 0, &plylat, &plylon);
10224 
10225  if (ChartData->GetDBChartType(dbIndex) == CHART_TYPE_CM93)
10226  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "YELO1" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID));
10227 
10228  else if (ChartData->GetDBChartFamily(dbIndex) == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR)
10229  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UINFG" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID));
10230 
10231  else
10232  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UINFR" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID));
10233 
10234  // Are there any aux ply entries?
10235  int nAuxPlyEntries = ChartData->GetnAuxPlyEntries(dbIndex);
10236  if (0 == nAuxPlyEntries) // There are no aux Ply Point entries
10237  {
10238  wxPoint r, r1;
10239 
10240  ChartData->GetDBPlyPoint(dbIndex, 0, &plylat, &plylon);
10241  plylon += lon_bias;
10242 
10243  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat, plylon, &r);
10244  pixx = r.x;
10245  pixy = r.y;
10246 
10247  for (int i = 0; i < nPly - 1; i++) {
10248  ChartData->GetDBPlyPoint(dbIndex, i + 1, &plylat1, &plylon1);
10249  plylon1 += lon_bias;
10250 
10251  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat1, plylon1, &r1);
10252  pixx1 = r1.x;
10253  pixy1 = r1.y;
10254 
10255  int pixxs1 = pixx1;
10256  int pixys1 = pixy1;
10257 
10258  bool b_skip = false;
10259 
10260  if (vp.chart_scale > 5e7) {
10261  // calculate projected distance between these two points in meters
10262  double dist = sqrt(pow((double)(pixx1 - pixx), 2) +
10263  pow((double)(pixy1 - pixy), 2)) /
10264  vp.view_scale_ppm;
10265 
10266  if (dist > 0.0) {
10267  // calculate GC distance between these two points in meters
10268  double distgc =
10269  DistGreatCircle(plylat, plylon, plylat1, plylon1) * 1852.;
10270 
10271  // If the distances are nonsense, it means that the scale is very
10272  // small and the segment wrapped the world So skip it....
10273  // TODO improve this to draw two segments
10274  if (fabs(dist - distgc) > 10000. * 1852.) // lotsa miles
10275  b_skip = true;
10276  } else
10277  b_skip = true;
10278  }
10279 
10280  ClipResult res = cohen_sutherland_line_clip_i(
10281  &pixx, &pixy, &pixx1, &pixy1, 0, vp.pix_width, 0, vp.pix_height);
10282  if (res != Invisible && !b_skip)
10283  dc.DrawLine(pixx, pixy, pixx1, pixy1, false);
10284 
10285  plylat = plylat1;
10286  plylon = plylon1;
10287  pixx = pixxs1;
10288  pixy = pixys1;
10289  }
10290 
10291  ChartData->GetDBPlyPoint(dbIndex, 0, &plylat1, &plylon1);
10292  plylon1 += lon_bias;
10293 
10294  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat1, plylon1, &r1);
10295  pixx1 = r1.x;
10296  pixy1 = r1.y;
10297 
10298  ClipResult res = cohen_sutherland_line_clip_i(
10299  &pixx, &pixy, &pixx1, &pixy1, 0, vp.pix_width, 0, vp.pix_height);
10300  if (res != Invisible) dc.DrawLine(pixx, pixy, pixx1, pixy1, false);
10301  }
10302 
10303  else // Use Aux PlyPoints
10304  {
10305  wxPoint r, r1;
10306 
10307  int nAuxPlyEntries = ChartData->GetnAuxPlyEntries(dbIndex);
10308  for (int j = 0; j < nAuxPlyEntries; j++) {
10309  int nAuxPly =
10310  ChartData->GetDBAuxPlyPoint(dbIndex, 0, j, &plylat, &plylon);
10311  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat, plylon, &r);
10312  pixx = r.x;
10313  pixy = r.y;
10314 
10315  for (int i = 0; i < nAuxPly - 1; i++) {
10316  ChartData->GetDBAuxPlyPoint(dbIndex, i + 1, j, &plylat1, &plylon1);
10317 
10318  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat1, plylon1, &r1);
10319  pixx1 = r1.x;
10320  pixy1 = r1.y;
10321 
10322  int pixxs1 = pixx1;
10323  int pixys1 = pixy1;
10324 
10325  bool b_skip = false;
10326 
10327  if (vp.chart_scale > 5e7) {
10328  // calculate projected distance between these two points in meters
10329  double dist = sqrt((double)((pixx1 - pixx) * (pixx1 - pixx)) +
10330  ((pixy1 - pixy) * (pixy1 - pixy))) /
10331  vp.view_scale_ppm;
10332  if (dist > 0.0) {
10333  // calculate GC distance between these two points in meters
10334  double distgc =
10335  DistGreatCircle(plylat, plylon, plylat1, plylon1) * 1852.;
10336 
10337  // If the distances are nonsense, it means that the scale is very
10338  // small and the segment wrapped the world So skip it....
10339  // TODO improve this to draw two segments
10340  if (fabs(dist - distgc) > 10000. * 1852.) // lotsa miles
10341  b_skip = true;
10342  } else
10343  b_skip = true;
10344  }
10345 
10346  ClipResult res = cohen_sutherland_line_clip_i(
10347  &pixx, &pixy, &pixx1, &pixy1, 0, vp.pix_width, 0, vp.pix_height);
10348  if (res != Invisible && !b_skip) dc.DrawLine(pixx, pixy, pixx1, pixy1);
10349 
10350  plylat = plylat1;
10351  plylon = plylon1;
10352  pixx = pixxs1;
10353  pixy = pixys1;
10354  }
10355 
10356  ChartData->GetDBAuxPlyPoint(dbIndex, 0, j, &plylat1, &plylon1);
10357  GetCanvasPointPix(plylat1, plylon1, &r1);
10358  pixx1 = r1.x;
10359  pixy1 = r1.y;
10360 
10361  ClipResult res = cohen_sutherland_line_clip_i(
10362  &pixx, &pixy, &pixx1, &pixy1, 0, vp.pix_width, 0, vp.pix_height);
10363  if (res != Invisible) dc.DrawLine(pixx, pixy, pixx1, pixy1, false);
10364  }
10365  }
10366 }
10367 
10368 static void RouteLegInfo(ocpnDC &dc, wxPoint ref_point, const wxString &first,
10369  const wxString &second) {
10370  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("RouteLegInfoRollover"));
10371 
10372  int pointsize = dFont->GetPointSize();
10373  pointsize /= OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor();
10374 
10375  wxFont *psRLI_font = FontMgr::Get().FindOrCreateFont(
10376  pointsize, dFont->GetFamily(), dFont->GetStyle(),
10377  dFont->GetWeight(), false, dFont->GetFaceName());
10378 
10379 
10380  dc.SetFont(*psRLI_font);
10381 
10382  int w1, h1;
10383  int w2 = 0;
10384  int h2 = 0;
10385  int h, w;
10386 
10387  int xp, yp;
10388  int hilite_offset = 3;
10389 #ifdef __WXMAC__
10390  wxScreenDC sdc;
10391  sdc.GetTextExtent(first, &w1, &h1, NULL, NULL, psRLI_font);
10392  if (second.Len()) sdc.GetTextExtent(second, &w2, &h2, NULL, NULL, psRLI_font);
10393 #else
10394  dc.GetTextExtent(first, &w1, &h1);
10395  if (second.Len()) dc.GetTextExtent(second, &w2, &h2);
10396 #endif
10397 
10398  h1 *= (OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor() * 100.) / 100;
10399  h2 *= (OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor() * 100.) / 100;
10400 
10401  w = wxMax(w1, w2) + (h1 / 2); // Add a little right pad
10402  w *= (OCPN_GetWinDIPScaleFactor() * 100.) / 100;
10403 
10404  h = h1 + h2;
10405 
10406  xp = ref_point.x - w;
10407  yp = ref_point.y;
10408  yp += hilite_offset;
10409 
10410  AlphaBlending(dc, xp, yp, w, h, 0.0, GetGlobalColor(_T ( "YELO1" )), 172);
10411 
10412  dc.SetPen(wxPen(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" ))));
10413  dc.SetTextForeground(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UBLCK" )));
10414 
10415  dc.DrawText(first, xp, yp);
10416  if (second.Len()) dc.DrawText(second, xp, yp + h1);
10417 }
10418 
10419 void ChartCanvas::RenderShipToActive(ocpnDC &dc, bool Use_Opengl) {
10420  if (!g_bAllowShipToActive) return;
10421 
10422  Route *rt = g_pRouteMan->GetpActiveRoute();
10423  if (!rt) return;
10424 
10425  if (RoutePoint *rp = g_pRouteMan->GetpActivePoint()) {
10426  wxPoint2DDouble pa, pb;
10427  GetDoubleCanvasPointPix(gLat, gLon, &pa);
10428  GetDoubleCanvasPointPix(rp->m_lat, rp->m_lon, &pb);
10429 
10430  // set pen
10431  int width =
10432  g_pRouteMan->GetRoutePen()->GetWidth(); // get default route pen with
10433  if (rt->m_width != wxPENSTYLE_INVALID)
10434  width = rt->m_width; // set route pen style if any
10435  wxPenStyle style = (wxPenStyle)::StyleValues[wxMin(
10436  g_shipToActiveStyle, 5)]; // get setting pen style
10437  if (style == wxPENSTYLE_INVALID) style = wxPENSTYLE_SOLID; // default style
10438  wxColour color =
10439  g_shipToActiveColor > 0 ? GpxxColors[wxMin(g_shipToActiveColor - 1, 15)]
10440  : // set setting route pen color
10441  g_pRouteMan->GetActiveRoutePen()->GetColour(); // default color
10442  wxPen *mypen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(color, width, style);
10443 
10444  dc.SetPen(*mypen);
10445  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(color, wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID));
10446 
10447  if (!Use_Opengl)
10448  RouteGui(*rt).RenderSegment(dc, (int)pa.m_x, (int)pa.m_y, (int)pb.m_x, (int)pb.m_y,
10449  GetVP(), true);
10450 
10451 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
10452  else {
10453  glLineWidth(wxMax(g_GLMinSymbolLineWidth, width));
10454  dc.SetGLStipple();
10455 
10456 #ifdef USE_ANDROID_GLES2
10457  dc.DrawLine(pa.m_x, pa.m_y, pb.m_x, pb.m_y);
10458 #else
10459  glColor3ub(color.Red(), color.Green(), color.Blue());
10460  glBegin(GL_LINES);
10461  glVertex2f(pa.m_x, pa.m_y);
10462  glVertex2f(pb.m_x, pb.m_y);
10463  glEnd();
10464 #endif
10465  glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
10466 
10467  RouteGui(*rt).RenderSegmentArrowsGL(dc, (int)pa.m_x, (int)pa.m_y, (int)pb.m_x,
10468  (int)pb.m_y, GetVP());
10469  }
10470 #endif
10471  }
10472 }
10473 
10474 void ChartCanvas::RenderRouteLegs(ocpnDC &dc) {
10475  Route *route = 0;
10476  if (m_routeState >= 2) route = m_pMouseRoute;
10477  if (m_pMeasureRoute && m_bMeasure_Active && (m_nMeasureState >= 2))
10478  route = m_pMeasureRoute;
10479 
10480  if (!route) return;
10481 
10482  // Validate route pointer
10483  if( !g_pRouteMan->IsRouteValid(route) )
10484  return;
10485 
10486  double render_lat = m_cursor_lat;
10487  double render_lon = m_cursor_lon;
10488 
10489  int np = route->GetnPoints();
10490  if (np) {
10491  if (g_btouch && (np > 1)) np--;
10492  RoutePoint rp = route->GetPoint(np);
10493  render_lat = rp.m_lat;
10494  render_lon = rp.m_lon;
10495  }
10496 
10497  double rhumbBearing, rhumbDist;
10498  DistanceBearingMercator(m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon, render_lat, render_lon,
10499  &rhumbBearing, &rhumbDist);
10500  double brg = rhumbBearing;
10501  double dist = rhumbDist;
10502 
10503  // Skip GreatCircle rubberbanding on touch devices.
10504  if (!g_btouch) {
10505  double gcBearing, gcBearing2, gcDist;
10506  Geodesic::GreatCircleDistBear(render_lon, render_lat, m_cursor_lon,
10507  m_cursor_lat, &gcDist, &gcBearing,
10508  &gcBearing2);
10509  double gcDistm = gcDist / 1852.0;
10510 
10511  if ((render_lat == m_cursor_lat) && (render_lon == m_cursor_lon))
10512  rhumbBearing = 90.;
10513 
10514  wxPoint destPoint, lastPoint;
10515 
10516  route->m_NextLegGreatCircle = false;
10517  int milesDiff = rhumbDist - gcDistm;
10518  if (milesDiff > 1) {
10519  brg = gcBearing;
10520  dist = gcDistm;
10521  route->m_NextLegGreatCircle = true;
10522  }
10523 
10524  //FIXME (MacOS, the first segment is rendered wrong)
10525  RouteGui(*route).DrawPointWhich(dc, this, route->m_lastMousePointIndex, &lastPoint);
10526 
10527  if (route->m_NextLegGreatCircle) {
10528  for (int i = 1; i <= milesDiff; i++) {
10529  double p = (double)i * (1.0 / (double)milesDiff);
10530  double pLat, pLon;
10531  Geodesic::GreatCircleTravel(render_lon, render_lat, gcDist * p, brg,
10532  &pLon, &pLat, &gcBearing2);
10533  destPoint = VPoint.GetPixFromLL(pLat, pLon);
10534  RouteGui(*route).DrawSegment(dc, this, &lastPoint, &destPoint, GetVP(), false);
10535  lastPoint = destPoint;
10536  }
10537  } else {
10538  if (r_rband.x && r_rband.y) { // RubberBand disabled?
10539  RouteGui(*route).DrawSegment(dc, this, &lastPoint, &r_rband, GetVP(), false);
10540  if (m_bMeasure_DistCircle) {
10541  double distanceRad = sqrtf(powf((float)(r_rband.x - lastPoint.x), 2) +
10542  powf((float)(r_rband.y - lastPoint.y), 2));
10543 
10544  dc.SetPen(*g_pRouteMan->GetRoutePen());
10545  dc.SetBrush(*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH);
10546  dc.StrokeCircle(lastPoint.x, lastPoint.y, distanceRad);
10547  }
10548  }
10549  }
10550  }
10551 
10552  wxString routeInfo;
10553  if (g_bShowTrue)
10554  routeInfo << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)brg,
10555  0x00B0);
10556 
10557  if (g_bShowMag) {
10558  double latAverage = (m_cursor_lat + render_lat) / 2;
10559  double lonAverage = (m_cursor_lon + render_lon) / 2;
10560  double varBrg = gFrame->GetMag(brg, latAverage, lonAverage);
10561 
10562  routeInfo << wxString::Format(wxString("%03d%c ", wxConvUTF8), (int)varBrg,
10563  0x00B0);
10564  }
10565 
10566  routeInfo << _T(" ") << FormatDistanceAdaptive(dist);
10567 
10568  wxString s0;
10569  if (!route->m_bIsInLayer)
10570  s0.Append(_("Route") + _T(": "));
10571  else
10572  s0.Append(_("Layer Route: "));
10573 
10574  double disp_length = route->m_route_length;
10575  if (!g_btouch) disp_length += dist; // Add in the to-be-created leg.
10576  s0 += FormatDistanceAdaptive(disp_length);
10577 
10578  RouteLegInfo(dc, r_rband, routeInfo, s0);
10579 
10580  m_brepaint_piano = true;
10581 }
10582 
10583 void ChartCanvas::RenderVisibleSectorLights(ocpnDC &dc) {
10584  if (!m_bShowVisibleSectors) return;
10585 
10586  if (g_bDeferredInitDone) {
10587  // need to re-evaluate sectors?
10588  double rhumbBearing, rhumbDist;
10589  DistanceBearingMercator(gLat, gLon, m_sector_glat, m_sector_glon,
10590  &rhumbBearing, &rhumbDist);
10591 
10592  if (rhumbDist > 0.05) // miles
10593  {
10594  s57_GetVisibleLightSectors(this, gLat, gLon, GetVP(),
10595  m_sectorlegsVisible);
10596  m_sector_glat = gLat;
10597  m_sector_glon = gLon;
10598  }
10599  s57_DrawExtendedLightSectors(dc, VPoint, m_sectorlegsVisible);
10600  }
10601 }
10602 
10603 void ChartCanvas::WarpPointerDeferred(int x, int y) {
10604  warp_x = x;
10605  warp_y = y;
10606  warp_flag = true;
10607 }
10608 
10609 int s_msg;
10610 
10611 void ChartCanvas::UpdateCanvasS52PLIBConfig() {
10612  if (!ps52plib) return;
10613 
10614  if (VPoint.b_quilt) { // quilted
10615  if (!m_pQuilt || !m_pQuilt->IsComposed()) return; // not ready
10616 
10617  if (m_pQuilt->IsQuiltVector()) {
10618  if (ps52plib->GetStateHash() != m_s52StateHash) {
10619  UpdateS52State();
10620  m_s52StateHash = ps52plib->GetStateHash();
10621  }
10622  }
10623  } else {
10624  if (ps52plib->GetStateHash() != m_s52StateHash) {
10625  UpdateS52State();
10626  m_s52StateHash = ps52plib->GetStateHash();
10627  }
10628  }
10629 
10630  // Plugin charts
10631  bool bSendPlibState = true;
10632  if (VPoint.b_quilt) { // quilted
10633  if (!m_pQuilt->DoesQuiltContainPlugins()) bSendPlibState = false;
10634  }
10635 
10636  if (bSendPlibState) {
10637  wxJSONValue v;
10638  v[_T("OpenCPN Version Major")] = VERSION_MAJOR;
10639  v[_T("OpenCPN Version Minor")] = VERSION_MINOR;
10640  v[_T("OpenCPN Version Patch")] = VERSION_PATCH;
10641  v[_T("OpenCPN Version Date")] = VERSION_DATE;
10642  v[_T("OpenCPN Version Full")] = VERSION_FULL;
10643 
10644  // S52PLIB state
10645  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowText")] = GetShowENCText();
10646  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowSoundings")] = GetShowENCDepth();
10647  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowLights")] = GetShowENCLights();
10648  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowAnchorConditions")] =
10649  m_encShowAnchor;
10650  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowQualityOfData")] =
10651  GetShowENCDataQual();
10652  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowATONLabel")] = GetShowENCBuoyLabels();
10653  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowLightDescription")] = GetShowENCLightDesc();
10654 
10655  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB DisplayCategory")] = GetENCDisplayCategory();
10656 
10657  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB SoundingsFactor")] = g_ENCSoundingScaleFactor;
10658  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB TextFactor")] = g_ENCTextScaleFactor;
10659 
10660  // Global S52 options
10661 
10662  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB MetaDisplay")] = ps52plib->m_bShowMeta;
10663  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB DeclutterText")] = ps52plib->m_bDeClutterText;
10664  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowNationalText")] = ps52plib->m_bShowNationalTexts;
10665  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ShowImportantTextOnly")] = ps52plib->m_bShowS57ImportantTextOnly;
10666  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB UseSCAMIN")] = ps52plib->m_bUseSCAMIN;
10667  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB UseSUPER_SCAMIN")] = ps52plib->m_bUseSUPER_SCAMIN;
10668  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB SymbolStyle")] = ps52plib->m_nSymbolStyle;
10669  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB BoundaryStyle")] = ps52plib->m_nBoundaryStyle;
10670  v[_T("OpenCPN S52PLIB ColorShades")] = S52_getMarinerParam( S52_MAR_TWO_SHADES );
10671 
10672  // Some global GUI parameters, for completeness
10673  v[_T("OpenCPN Zoom Mod Vector")] = g_chart_zoom_modifier_vector;
10674  v[_T("OpenCPN Zoom Mod Other")] = g_chart_zoom_modifier_raster;
10675  v[_T("OpenCPN Scale Factor Exp")] = g_Platform->GetChartScaleFactorExp(g_ChartScaleFactor);
10676  v[_T("OpenCPN Display Width")] = (int)g_display_size_mm;
10677 
10678  wxJSONWriter w;
10679  wxString out;
10680  w.Write(v, out);
10681 
10682  if (!g_lastS52PLIBPluginMessage.IsSameAs(out)) {
10683  g_pi_manager->SendMessageToAllPlugins(wxString(_T("OpenCPN Config")),
10684  out);
10685  g_lastS52PLIBPluginMessage = out;
10686  }
10687  }
10688 }
10689 int spaint;
10690 int s_in_update;
10691 void ChartCanvas::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent &event) {
10692  wxPaintDC dc(this);
10693 
10694  // GetToolbar()->Show( m_bToolbarEnable );
10695 
10696  // Paint updates may have been externally disabled (temporarily, to avoid
10697  // Yield() recursion performance loss) It is important that the wxPaintDC is
10698  // built, even if we elect to not process this paint message. Otherwise, the
10699  // paint message may not be removed from the message queue, esp on Windows.
10700  // (FS#1213) This would lead to a deadlock condition in ::wxYield()
10701 
10702  if (!m_b_paint_enable) {
10703  return;
10704  }
10705 
10706  // If necessary, reconfigure the S52 PLIB
10707  UpdateCanvasS52PLIBConfig();
10708 
10709 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
10710  if (!g_bdisable_opengl && m_glcc) m_glcc->Show(g_bopengl);
10711 
10712  if (m_glcc && g_bopengl) {
10713  if (!s_in_update) { // no recursion allowed, seen on lo-spec Mac
10714  s_in_update++;
10715  m_glcc->Update();
10716  s_in_update--;
10717  }
10718 
10719  return;
10720  }
10721 #endif
10722 
10723  if ((GetVP().pix_width == 0) || (GetVP().pix_height == 0)) return;
10724 
10725  wxRegion ru = GetUpdateRegion();
10726 
10727  int rx, ry, rwidth, rheight;
10728  ru.GetBox(rx, ry, rwidth, rheight);
10729  // printf("%d Onpaint update region box: %d %d %d %d\n", spaint++, rx, ry,
10730  // rwidth, rheight);
10731 
10732 #ifdef ocpnUSE_DIBSECTION
10733  ocpnMemDC temp_dc;
10734 #else
10735  wxMemoryDC temp_dc;
10736 #endif
10737 
10738  long height = GetVP().pix_height;
10739 
10740 #ifdef __WXMAC__
10741  // On OS X we have to explicitly extend the region for the piano area
10742  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
10743  if (!style->chartStatusWindowTransparent && g_bShowChartBar)
10744  height += m_Piano->GetHeight();
10745 #endif // __WXMAC__
10746  wxRegion rgn_chart(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, height);
10747 
10748  // In case Thumbnail is shown, set up dc clipper and blt iterator regions
10749  if (pthumbwin) {
10750  int thumbx, thumby, thumbsx, thumbsy;
10751  pthumbwin->GetPosition(&thumbx, &thumby);
10752  pthumbwin->GetSize(&thumbsx, &thumbsy);
10753  wxRegion rgn_thumbwin(thumbx, thumby, thumbsx - 1, thumbsy - 1);
10754 
10755  if (pthumbwin->IsShown()) {
10756  rgn_chart.Subtract(rgn_thumbwin);
10757  ru.Subtract(rgn_thumbwin);
10758  }
10759  }
10760 
10761  // subtract the chart bar if it isn't transparent, and determine if we need to
10762  // paint it
10763  wxRegion rgn_blit = ru;
10764  if (g_bShowChartBar) {
10765  wxRect chart_bar_rect(0, GetClientSize().y - m_Piano->GetHeight(),
10766  GetClientSize().x, m_Piano->GetHeight());
10767 
10768  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
10769  if (ru.Contains(chart_bar_rect) != wxOutRegion) {
10770  if (style->chartStatusWindowTransparent)
10771  m_brepaint_piano = true;
10772  else
10773  ru.Subtract(chart_bar_rect);
10774  }
10775  }
10776 
10777  if (m_Compass && m_Compass->IsShown()) {
10778  wxRect compassRect = m_Compass->GetRect();
10779  if (ru.Contains(compassRect) != wxOutRegion) {
10780  ru.Subtract(compassRect);
10781  }
10782  }
10783 
10784  // Is this viewpoint the same as the previously painted one?
10785  bool b_newview = true;
10786 
10787  if ((m_cache_vp.view_scale_ppm == VPoint.view_scale_ppm) &&
10788  (m_cache_vp.rotation == VPoint.rotation) &&
10789  (m_cache_vp.clat == VPoint.clat) && (m_cache_vp.clon == VPoint.clon) &&
10790  m_cache_vp.IsValid()) {
10791  b_newview = false;
10792  }
10793 
10794  // If the ViewPort is skewed or rotated, we may be able to use the cached
10795  // rotated bitmap.
10796  bool b_rcache_ok = false;
10797  if (fabs(VPoint.skew) > 0.01 || fabs(VPoint.rotation) > 0.01)
10798  b_rcache_ok = !b_newview;
10799 
10800  // Make a special VP
10801  if (VPoint.b_MercatorProjectionOverride)
10802  VPoint.SetProjectionType(PROJECTION_MERCATOR);
10803  ViewPort svp = VPoint;
10804 
10805  svp.pix_width = svp.rv_rect.width;
10806  svp.pix_height = svp.rv_rect.height;
10807 
10808  // printf("Onpaint pix %d %d\n", VPoint.pix_width, VPoint.pix_height);
10809  // printf("OnPaint rv_rect %d %d\n", VPoint.rv_rect.width,
10810  // VPoint.rv_rect.height);
10811 
10812  OCPNRegion chart_get_region(wxRect(0, 0, svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height));
10813 
10814  // If we are going to use the cached rotated image, there is no need to fetch
10815  // any chart data and this will do it...
10816  if (b_rcache_ok) chart_get_region.Clear();
10817 
10818  // Blit pan acceleration
10819  if (VPoint.b_quilt) // quilted
10820  {
10821  if (!m_pQuilt || !m_pQuilt->IsComposed()) return; // not ready
10822 
10823  bool bvectorQuilt = m_pQuilt->IsQuiltVector();
10824 
10825  bool busy = false;
10826  if (bvectorQuilt && (m_cache_vp.view_scale_ppm != VPoint.view_scale_ppm ||
10827  m_cache_vp.rotation != VPoint.rotation)) {
10828  AbstractPlatform::ShowBusySpinner();
10829  busy = true;
10830  }
10831 
10832  if ((m_working_bm.GetWidth() != svp.pix_width) ||
10833  (m_working_bm.GetHeight() != svp.pix_height))
10834  m_working_bm.Create(svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height,
10835  -1); // make sure the target is big enoug
10836 
10837  if (fabs(VPoint.rotation) < 0.01) {
10838  bool b_save = true;
10839 
10840  if (g_SencThreadManager) {
10841  if (g_SencThreadManager->GetJobCount()) {
10842  b_save = false;
10843  m_cache_vp.Invalidate();
10844  }
10845  }
10846 
10847  // If the saved wxBitmap from last OnPaint is useable
10848  // calculate the blit parameters
10849 
10850  // We can only do screen blit painting if subsequent ViewPorts differ by
10851  // whole pixels So, in small scale bFollow mode, force the full screen
10852  // render. This seems a hack....There may be better logic here.....
10853 
10854  // if(m_bFollow)
10855  // b_save = false;
10856 
10857  if (m_bm_cache_vp.IsValid() && m_cache_vp.IsValid() /*&& !m_bFollow*/) {
10858  if (b_newview) {
10859  wxPoint c_old = VPoint.GetPixFromLL(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon);
10860  wxPoint c_new = m_bm_cache_vp.GetPixFromLL(VPoint.clat, VPoint.clon);
10861 
10862  int dy = c_new.y - c_old.y;
10863  int dx = c_new.x - c_old.x;
10864 
10865  // printf("In OnPaint Trying Blit dx: %d
10866  // dy:%d\n\n", dx, dy);
10867 
10868  if (m_pQuilt->IsVPBlittable(VPoint, dx, dy, true)) {
10869  if (dx || dy) {
10870  // Blit the reuseable portion of the cached wxBitmap to a working
10871  // bitmap
10872  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_working_bm);
10873 
10874  wxMemoryDC cache_dc;
10875  cache_dc.SelectObject(m_cached_chart_bm);
10876 
10877  if (dy > 0) {
10878  if (dx > 0) {
10879  temp_dc.Blit(0, 0, VPoint.pix_width - dx,
10880  VPoint.pix_height - dy, &cache_dc, dx, dy);
10881  } else {
10882  temp_dc.Blit(-dx, 0, VPoint.pix_width + dx,
10883  VPoint.pix_height - dy, &cache_dc, 0, dy);
10884  }
10885 
10886  } else {
10887  if (dx > 0) {
10888  temp_dc.Blit(0, -dy, VPoint.pix_width - dx,
10889  VPoint.pix_height + dy, &cache_dc, dx, 0);
10890  } else {
10891  temp_dc.Blit(-dx, -dy, VPoint.pix_width + dx,
10892  VPoint.pix_height + dy, &cache_dc, 0, 0);
10893  }
10894  }
10895 
10896  OCPNRegion update_region;
10897  if (dy) {
10898  if (dy > 0)
10899  update_region.Union(
10900  wxRect(0, VPoint.pix_height - dy, VPoint.pix_width, dy));
10901  else
10902  update_region.Union(wxRect(0, 0, VPoint.pix_width, -dy));
10903  }
10904 
10905  if (dx) {
10906  if (dx > 0)
10907  update_region.Union(
10908  wxRect(VPoint.pix_width - dx, 0, dx, VPoint.pix_height));
10909  else
10910  update_region.Union(wxRect(0, 0, -dx, VPoint.pix_height));
10911  }
10912 
10913  // Render the new region
10914  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCNoText(temp_dc, svp,
10915  update_region);
10916  cache_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
10917  } else {
10918  // No sensible (dx, dy) change in the view, so use the cached
10919  // member bitmap
10920  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_cached_chart_bm);
10921  b_save = false;
10922  }
10923  m_pQuilt->ComputeRenderRegion(svp, chart_get_region);
10924 
10925  } else // not blitable
10926  {
10927  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_working_bm);
10928  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCNoText(temp_dc, svp,
10929  chart_get_region);
10930  }
10931  } else {
10932  // No change in the view, so use the cached member bitmap2
10933  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_cached_chart_bm);
10934  b_save = false;
10935  }
10936  } else // cached bitmap is not yet valid
10937  {
10938  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_working_bm);
10939  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCNoText(temp_dc, svp,
10940  chart_get_region);
10941  }
10942 
10943  // Save the fully rendered quilt image as a wxBitmap member of this class
10944  if (b_save) {
10945  // if((m_cached_chart_bm.GetWidth() !=
10946  // svp.pix_width) ||
10947  // (m_cached_chart_bm.GetHeight() !=
10948  // svp.pix_height))
10949  // m_cached_chart_bm.Create(svp.pix_width,
10950  // svp.pix_height, -1); // target wxBitmap
10951  // is big enough
10952  wxMemoryDC scratch_dc_0;
10953  scratch_dc_0.SelectObject(m_cached_chart_bm);
10954  scratch_dc_0.Blit(0, 0, svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height, &temp_dc, 0, 0);
10955 
10956  scratch_dc_0.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
10957 
10958  m_bm_cache_vp =
10959  VPoint; // save the ViewPort associated with the cached wxBitmap
10960  }
10961  }
10962 
10963  else // quilted, rotated
10964  {
10965  temp_dc.SelectObject(m_working_bm);
10966  OCPNRegion chart_get_all_region(
10967  wxRect(0, 0, svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height));
10968  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCNoText(temp_dc, svp,
10969  chart_get_all_region);
10970  }
10971 
10972  AbstractPlatform::HideBusySpinner();
10973 
10974  }
10975 
10976  else // not quilted
10977  {
10978  if (!m_singleChart) {
10979  dc.SetBackground(wxBrush(*wxLIGHT_GREY));
10980  dc.Clear();
10981  return;
10982  }
10983 
10984  if (!chart_get_region.IsEmpty()) {
10985  m_singleChart->RenderRegionViewOnDC(temp_dc, svp, chart_get_region);
10986  }
10987  }
10988 
10989  if (temp_dc.IsOk()) {
10990  // Arrange to render the World Chart vector data behind the rendered
10991  // current chart so that uncovered canvas areas show at least the world
10992  // chart.
10993  OCPNRegion chartValidRegion;
10994  if (!VPoint.b_quilt) {
10995  // Make a region covering the current chart on the canvas
10996 
10997  if (m_singleChart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR)
10998  m_singleChart->GetValidCanvasRegion(svp, &chartValidRegion);
10999  else {
11000  // The raster calculations in ChartBaseBSB::ComputeSourceRectangle
11001  // require that the viewport passed here have pix_width and pix_height
11002  // set to the actual display, not the virtual (rv_rect) sizes
11003  // (the vector calculations require the virtual sizes in svp)
11004 
11005  m_singleChart->GetValidCanvasRegion(VPoint, &chartValidRegion);
11006  chartValidRegion.Offset(-VPoint.rv_rect.x, -VPoint.rv_rect.y);
11007  }
11008  } else
11009  chartValidRegion = m_pQuilt->GetFullQuiltRenderedRegion();
11010 
11011  temp_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
11012 
11013  // Copy current chart region
11014  OCPNRegion backgroundRegion(wxRect(0, 0, svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height));
11015 
11016  if (chartValidRegion.IsOk()) backgroundRegion.Subtract(chartValidRegion);
11017 
11018  if (!backgroundRegion.IsEmpty()) {
11019  // Draw the Background Chart only in the areas NOT covered by the
11020  // current chart view
11021 
11022  /* unfortunately wxDC::DrawRectangle and wxDC::Clear do not respect
11023  clipping regions with more than 1 rectangle so... */
11024  wxColour water = pWorldBackgroundChart->water;
11025  if (water.IsOk()) {
11026  temp_dc.SetPen(*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN);
11027  temp_dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(water));
11028  OCPNRegionIterator upd(backgroundRegion); // get the update rect list
11029  while (upd.HaveRects()) {
11030  wxRect rect = upd.GetRect();
11031  temp_dc.DrawRectangle(rect);
11032  upd.NextRect();
11033  }
11034  }
11035  // Associate with temp_dc
11036  wxRegion *clip_region = backgroundRegion.GetNew_wxRegion();
11037  temp_dc.SetDeviceClippingRegion(*clip_region);
11038  delete clip_region;
11039 
11040  ocpnDC bgdc(temp_dc);
11041  double r = VPoint.rotation;
11042  SetVPRotation(VPoint.skew);
11043 
11044  pWorldBackgroundChart->RenderViewOnDC(bgdc, VPoint);
11045  SetVPRotation(r);
11046  }
11047  } // temp_dc.IsOk();
11048 
11049  wxMemoryDC *pChartDC = &temp_dc;
11050  wxMemoryDC rotd_dc;
11051 
11052  if (((fabs(GetVP().rotation) > 0.01)) || (fabs(GetVP().skew) > 0.01)) {
11053  // Can we use the current rotated image cache?
11054  if (!b_rcache_ok) {
11055 #ifdef __WXMSW__
11056  wxMemoryDC tbase_dc;
11057  wxBitmap bm_base(svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height, -1);
11058  tbase_dc.SelectObject(bm_base);
11059  tbase_dc.Blit(0, 0, svp.pix_width, svp.pix_height, &temp_dc, 0, 0);
11060  tbase_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11061 #else
11062  const wxBitmap &bm_base = temp_dc.GetSelectedBitmap();
11063 #endif
11064 
11065  wxImage base_image;
11066  if (bm_base.IsOk()) base_image = bm_base.ConvertToImage();
11067 
11068  // Use a local static image rotator to improve wxWidgets code profile
11069  // Especially, on GTK the wxRound and wxRealPoint functions are very
11070  // expensive.....
11071 
11072  double angle = GetVP().skew - GetVP().rotation;
11073  wxImage ri;
11074  bool b_rot_ok = false;
11075  if (base_image.IsOk()) {
11076  ViewPort rot_vp = GetVP();
11077 
11078  m_b_rot_hidef = false;
11079 
11080  ri = Image_Rotate(
11081  base_image, angle,
11082  wxPoint(GetVP().rv_rect.width / 2, GetVP().rv_rect.height / 2),
11083  m_b_rot_hidef, &m_roffset);
11084 
11085  if ((rot_vp.view_scale_ppm == VPoint.view_scale_ppm) &&
11086  (rot_vp.rotation == VPoint.rotation) &&
11087  (rot_vp.clat == VPoint.clat) && (rot_vp.clon == VPoint.clon) &&
11088  rot_vp.IsValid() && (ri.IsOk())) {
11089  b_rot_ok = true;
11090  }
11091  }
11092 
11093  if (b_rot_ok) {
11094  delete m_prot_bm;
11095  m_prot_bm = new wxBitmap(ri);
11096  }
11097 
11098  m_roffset.x += VPoint.rv_rect.x;
11099  m_roffset.y += VPoint.rv_rect.y;
11100  }
11101 
11102  if (m_prot_bm && m_prot_bm->IsOk()) {
11103  rotd_dc.SelectObject(*m_prot_bm);
11104  pChartDC = &rotd_dc;
11105  } else {
11106  pChartDC = &temp_dc;
11107  m_roffset = wxPoint(0, 0);
11108  }
11109  } else { // unrotated
11110  pChartDC = &temp_dc;
11111  m_roffset = wxPoint(0, 0);
11112  }
11113 
11114  wxPoint offset = m_roffset;
11115 
11116  // Save the PixelCache viewpoint for next time
11117  m_cache_vp = VPoint;
11118 
11119  // Set up a scratch DC for overlay objects
11120  wxMemoryDC mscratch_dc;
11121  mscratch_dc.SelectObject(*pscratch_bm);
11122 
11123  mscratch_dc.ResetBoundingBox();
11124  mscratch_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
11125  mscratch_dc.SetDeviceClippingRegion(rgn_chart);
11126 
11127  // Blit the externally invalidated areas of the chart onto the scratch dc
11128  wxRegionIterator upd(rgn_blit); // get the update rect list
11129  while (upd) {
11130  wxRect rect = upd.GetRect();
11131 
11132  mscratch_dc.Blit(rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height, pChartDC,
11133  rect.x - offset.x, rect.y - offset.y);
11134  upd++;
11135  }
11136 
11137  // If multi-canvas, indicate which canvas has keyboard focus
11138  // by drawing a simple blue bar at the top.
11139  if (g_canvasConfig != 0) { // multi-canvas?
11140  if (this == wxWindow::FindFocus()) {
11141  g_focusCanvas = this;
11142 
11143  wxColour colour = GetGlobalColor(_T("BLUE4"));
11144  mscratch_dc.SetPen(wxPen(colour));
11145  mscratch_dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(colour));
11146 
11147  wxRect activeRect(0, 0, GetClientSize().x, m_focus_indicator_pix);
11148  mscratch_dc.DrawRectangle(activeRect);
11149  }
11150  }
11151 
11152  // Any MBtiles?
11153  std::vector<int> stackIndexArray = m_pQuilt->GetExtendedStackIndexArray();
11154  unsigned int im = stackIndexArray.size();
11155  if (VPoint.b_quilt && im > 0) {
11156  std::vector<int> tiles_to_show;
11157  for (unsigned int is = 0; is < im; is++) {
11158  const ChartTableEntry &cte =
11159  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(stackIndexArray[is]);
11160  if (IsTileOverlayIndexInNoShow(stackIndexArray[is])) {
11161  continue;
11162  }
11163  if (cte.GetChartType() == CHART_TYPE_MBTILES) {
11164  tiles_to_show.push_back(stackIndexArray[is]);
11165  }
11166  }
11167 
11168  if (tiles_to_show.size())
11169  SetAlertString(_("MBTile requires OpenGL to be enabled"));
11170  }
11171 
11172  // Draw the rest of the overlay objects directly on the scratch dc
11173  ocpnDC scratch_dc(mscratch_dc);
11174  DrawOverlayObjects(scratch_dc, ru);
11175 
11176  if (m_bShowTide) {
11177  RebuildTideSelectList(GetVP().GetBBox());
11178  DrawAllTidesInBBox(scratch_dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11179  }
11180 
11181  if (m_bShowCurrent) {
11182  RebuildCurrentSelectList(GetVP().GetBBox());
11183  DrawAllCurrentsInBBox(scratch_dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11184  }
11185 
11186  if (m_brepaint_piano && g_bShowChartBar) {
11187  m_Piano->Paint(GetClientSize().y - m_Piano->GetHeight(), mscratch_dc);
11188  }
11189 
11190  if (m_Compass) m_Compass->Paint(scratch_dc);
11191 
11192  RenderAlertMessage(mscratch_dc, GetVP());
11193 
11194  // quiting?
11195  if (g_bquiting) {
11196 #ifdef ocpnUSE_DIBSECTION
11197  ocpnMemDC q_dc;
11198 #else
11199  wxMemoryDC q_dc;
11200 #endif
11201  wxBitmap qbm(GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height);
11202  q_dc.SelectObject(qbm);
11203 
11204  // Get a copy of the screen
11205  q_dc.Blit(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height, &mscratch_dc, 0, 0);
11206 
11207  // Draw a rectangle over the screen with a stipple brush
11208  wxBrush qbr(*wxBLACK, wxBRUSHSTYLE_FDIAGONAL_HATCH);
11209  q_dc.SetBrush(qbr);
11210  q_dc.DrawRectangle(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height);
11211 
11212  // Blit back into source
11213  mscratch_dc.Blit(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height, &q_dc, 0, 0,
11214  wxCOPY);
11215 
11216  q_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11217  }
11218 #if 0
11219  // It is possible that this two-step method may be reuired for some platforms.
11220  // So, retain in the code base to aid recovery if necessary
11221 
11222  // Create and Render the Vector quilt decluttered text overlay, omitting CM93 composite
11223  if( VPoint.b_quilt ) {
11224  if(m_pQuilt->IsQuiltVector() && ps52plib && ps52plib->GetShowS57Text()){
11225  ChartBase *chart = m_pQuilt->GetRefChart();
11226  if( chart && chart->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP){
11227 
11228  // Clear the text Global declutter list
11229  ChartPlugInWrapper *ChPI = dynamic_cast<ChartPlugInWrapper*>( chart );
11230  if(ChPI)
11231  ChPI->ClearPLIBTextList();
11232  else{
11233  if(ps52plib)
11234  ps52plib->ClearTextList();
11235  }
11236 
11237  wxMemoryDC t_dc;
11238  wxBitmap qbm( GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height );
11239 
11240  wxColor maskBackground = wxColour(1,0,0);
11241  t_dc.SelectObject( qbm );
11242  t_dc.SetBackground(wxBrush(maskBackground));
11243  t_dc.Clear();
11244 
11245  // Copy the scratch DC into the new bitmap
11246  t_dc.Blit( 0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height, scratch_dc.GetDC(), 0, 0, wxCOPY );
11247 
11248  // Render the text to the new bitmap
11249  OCPNRegion chart_all_text_region( wxRect( 0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height ) );
11250  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCTextOnly( t_dc, svp, chart_all_text_region );
11251 
11252  // Copy the new bitmap back to the scratch dc
11253  wxRegionIterator upd_final( ru );
11254  while( upd_final ) {
11255  wxRect rect = upd_final.GetRect();
11256  scratch_dc.GetDC()->Blit( rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height, &t_dc, rect.x, rect.y, wxCOPY, true );
11257  upd_final++;
11258  }
11259 
11260  t_dc.SelectObject( wxNullBitmap );
11261  }
11262  }
11263  }
11264 #endif
11265  // Direct rendering model...
11266  if (VPoint.b_quilt) {
11267  if (m_pQuilt->IsQuiltVector() && ps52plib && ps52plib->GetShowS57Text()) {
11268  ChartBase *chart = m_pQuilt->GetRefChart();
11269  if (chart && chart->GetChartType() != CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP) {
11270  // Clear the text Global declutter list
11271  ChartPlugInWrapper *ChPI = dynamic_cast<ChartPlugInWrapper *>(chart);
11272  if (ChPI)
11273  ChPI->ClearPLIBTextList();
11274  else {
11275  if (ps52plib) ps52plib->ClearTextList();
11276  }
11277 
11278  // Render the text directly to the scratch bitmap
11279  OCPNRegion chart_all_text_region(
11280  wxRect(0, 0, GetVP().pix_width, GetVP().pix_height));
11281 
11282  if (g_bShowChartBar && m_Piano) {
11283  wxRect chart_bar_rect(0, GetVP().pix_height - m_Piano->GetHeight(),
11284  GetVP().pix_width, m_Piano->GetHeight());
11285 
11286  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
11287  if (!style->chartStatusWindowTransparent)
11288  chart_all_text_region.Subtract(chart_bar_rect);
11289  }
11290 
11291  if (m_Compass && m_Compass->IsShown()) {
11292  wxRect compassRect = m_Compass->GetRect();
11293  if (chart_all_text_region.Contains(compassRect) != wxOutRegion) {
11294  chart_all_text_region.Subtract(compassRect);
11295  }
11296  }
11297 
11298  mscratch_dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
11299 
11300  m_pQuilt->RenderQuiltRegionViewOnDCTextOnly(mscratch_dc, svp,
11301  chart_all_text_region);
11302  }
11303  }
11304  }
11305 
11306  // And finally, blit the scratch dc onto the physical dc
11307  wxRegionIterator upd_final(rgn_blit);
11308  while (upd_final) {
11309  wxRect rect = upd_final.GetRect();
11310  dc.Blit(rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height, &mscratch_dc, rect.x,
11311  rect.y);
11312  upd_final++;
11313  }
11314 
11315  // Test code to validate the dc drawing rectangle....
11316  /*
11317  wxRegionIterator upd_ru ( rgn_blit ); // get the update rect list
11318  while ( upd_ru )
11319  {
11320  wxRect rect = upd_ru.GetRect();
11321 
11322  dc.SetPen(wxPen(*wxRED));
11323  dc.SetBrush(wxBrush(*wxRED, wxTRANSPARENT));
11324  dc.DrawRectangle(rect);
11325  upd_ru ++ ;
11326  }
11327  */
11328 
11329  // Deselect the chart bitmap from the temp_dc, so that it will not be
11330  // destroyed in the temp_dc dtor
11331  temp_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11332  // And for the scratch bitmap
11333  mscratch_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11334 
11335  dc.DestroyClippingRegion();
11336 
11337  if (m_muiBar) {
11338  m_muiBar->Refresh();
11339  }
11340 
11341  PaintCleanup();
11342 }
11343 
11344 void ChartCanvas::PaintCleanup() {
11345  // Handle the current graphic window, if present
11346 
11347  if (pCwin) {
11348  pCwin->Show();
11349  if (m_bTCupdate) {
11350  pCwin->Refresh();
11351  pCwin->Update();
11352  }
11353  }
11354 
11355  // And set flags for next time
11356  m_bTCupdate = false;
11357 
11358  // Handle deferred WarpPointer
11359  if (warp_flag) {
11360  WarpPointer(warp_x, warp_y);
11361  warp_flag = false;
11362  }
11363 
11364  // Start movement timer, this runs nearly immediately.
11365  // the reason we cannot simply call it directly is the
11366  // refresh events it emits may be blocked from this paint event
11367  pMovementTimer->Start(1, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
11368 }
11369 
11370 #if 0
11371 wxColour GetErrorGraphicColor(double val)
11372 {
11373  /*
11374  double valm = wxMin(val_max, val);
11375 
11376  unsigned char green = (unsigned char)(255 * (1 - (valm/val_max)));
11377  unsigned char red = (unsigned char)(255 * (valm/val_max));
11378 
11379  wxImage::HSVValue hv = wxImage::RGBtoHSV(wxImage::RGBValue(red, green, 0));
11380 
11381  hv.saturation = 1.0;
11382  hv.value = 1.0;
11383 
11384  wxImage::RGBValue rv = wxImage::HSVtoRGB(hv);
11385  return wxColour(rv.red, rv.green, rv.blue);
11386  */
11387 
11388  // HTML colors taken from NOAA WW3 Web representation
11389  wxColour c;
11390  if((val > 0) && (val < 1)) c.Set(_T("#002ad9"));
11391  else if((val >= 1) && (val < 2)) c.Set(_T("#006ed9"));
11392  else if((val >= 2) && (val < 3)) c.Set(_T("#00b2d9"));
11393  else if((val >= 3) && (val < 4)) c.Set(_T("#00d4d4"));
11394  else if((val >= 4) && (val < 5)) c.Set(_T("#00d9a6"));
11395  else if((val >= 5) && (val < 7)) c.Set(_T("#00d900"));
11396  else if((val >= 7) && (val < 9)) c.Set(_T("#95d900"));
11397  else if((val >= 9) && (val < 12)) c.Set(_T("#d9d900"));
11398  else if((val >= 12) && (val < 15)) c.Set(_T("#d9ae00"));
11399  else if((val >= 15) && (val < 18)) c.Set(_T("#d98300"));
11400  else if((val >= 18) && (val < 21)) c.Set(_T("#d95700"));
11401  else if((val >= 21) && (val < 24)) c.Set(_T("#d90000"));
11402  else if((val >= 24) && (val < 27)) c.Set(_T("#ae0000"));
11403  else if((val >= 27) && (val < 30)) c.Set(_T("#8c0000"));
11404  else if((val >= 30) && (val < 36)) c.Set(_T("#870000"));
11405  else if((val >= 36) && (val < 42)) c.Set(_T("#690000"));
11406  else if((val >= 42) && (val < 48)) c.Set(_T("#550000"));
11407  else if( val >= 48) c.Set(_T("#410000"));
11408 
11409  return c;
11410 }
11411 
11412 void ChartCanvas::RenderGeorefErrorMap( wxMemoryDC *pmdc, ViewPort *vp)
11413 {
11414  wxImage gr_image(vp->pix_width, vp->pix_height);
11415  gr_image.InitAlpha();
11416 
11417  double maxval = -10000;
11418  double minval = 10000;
11419 
11420  double rlat, rlon;
11421  double glat, glon;
11422 
11423  GetCanvasPixPoint(0, 0, rlat, rlon);
11424 
11425  for(int i=1; i < vp->pix_height-1; i++)
11426  {
11427  for(int j=0; j < vp->pix_width; j++)
11428  {
11429  // Reference mercator value
11430 // vp->GetMercatorLLFromPix(wxPoint(j, i), &rlat, &rlon);
11431 
11432  // Georef value
11433  GetCanvasPixPoint(j, i, glat, glon);
11434 
11435  maxval = wxMax(maxval, (glat - rlat));
11436  minval = wxMin(minval, (glat - rlat));
11437 
11438  }
11439  rlat = glat;
11440  }
11441 
11442  GetCanvasPixPoint(0, 0, rlat, rlon);
11443  for(int i=1; i < vp->pix_height-1; i++)
11444  {
11445  for(int j=0; j < vp->pix_width; j++)
11446  {
11447  // Reference mercator value
11448 // vp->GetMercatorLLFromPix(wxPoint(j, i), &rlat, &rlon);
11449 
11450  // Georef value
11451  GetCanvasPixPoint(j, i, glat, glon);
11452 
11453  double f = ((glat - rlat)-minval)/(maxval - minval);
11454 
11455  double dy = (f * 40);
11456 
11457  wxColour c = GetErrorGraphicColor(dy);
11458  unsigned char r = c.Red();
11459  unsigned char g = c.Green();
11460  unsigned char b = c.Blue();
11461 
11462  gr_image.SetRGB(j, i, r,g,b);
11463  if((glat - rlat )!= 0)
11464  gr_image.SetAlpha(j, i, 128);
11465  else
11466  gr_image.SetAlpha(j, i, 255);
11467 
11468  }
11469  rlat = glat;
11470  }
11471 
11472  // Create a Bitmap
11473  wxBitmap *pbm = new wxBitmap(gr_image);
11474  wxMask *gr_mask = new wxMask(*pbm, wxColour(0,0,0));
11475  pbm->SetMask(gr_mask);
11476 
11477  pmdc->DrawBitmap(*pbm, 0,0);
11478 
11479  delete pbm;
11480 
11481 }
11482 
11483 #endif
11484 
11485 void ChartCanvas::CancelMouseRoute() {
11486  m_routeState = 0;
11487  m_pMouseRoute = NULL;
11488  m_bDrawingRoute = false;
11489 }
11490 
11491 int ChartCanvas::GetNextContextMenuId() {
11492  return CanvasMenuHandler::GetNextContextMenuId();
11493 }
11494 
11495 bool ChartCanvas::SetCursor(const wxCursor &c) {
11496 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
11497  if (g_bopengl && m_glcc)
11498  return m_glcc->SetCursor(c);
11499  else
11500 #endif
11501  return wxWindow::SetCursor(c);
11502 }
11503 
11504 void ChartCanvas::Refresh(bool eraseBackground, const wxRect *rect) {
11505  if (g_bquiting) return;
11506  // Keep the mouse position members up to date
11507  GetCanvasPixPoint(mouse_x, mouse_y, m_cursor_lat, m_cursor_lon);
11508 
11509  // Retrigger the route leg popup timer
11510  // This handles the case when the chart is moving in auto-follow mode,
11511  // but no user mouse input is made. The timer handler may Hide() the
11512  // popup if the chart moved enough n.b. We use slightly longer oneshot
11513  // value to allow this method's Refresh() to complete before potentially
11514  // getting another Refresh() in the popup timer handler.
11515  if (!m_RolloverPopupTimer.IsRunning() &&
11516  ((m_pRouteRolloverWin && m_pRouteRolloverWin->IsActive()) ||
11517  (m_pTrackRolloverWin && m_pTrackRolloverWin->IsActive()) ||
11518  (m_pAISRolloverWin && m_pAISRolloverWin->IsActive())))
11519  m_RolloverPopupTimer.Start(500, wxTIMER_ONE_SHOT);
11520 
11521 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
11522  if (m_glcc && g_bopengl) {
11523  // We need to invalidate the FBO cache to ensure repaint of "grounded"
11524  // overlay objects.
11525  if (eraseBackground && m_glcc->UsingFBO()) m_glcc->Invalidate();
11526 
11527  m_glcc->Refresh(eraseBackground,
11528  NULL); // We always are going to render the entire screen
11529  // anyway, so make
11530  // sure that the window managers understand the invalid area
11531  // is actually the entire client area.
11532 
11533  // We need to selectively Refresh some child windows, if they are visible.
11534  // Note that some children are refreshed elsewhere on timer ticks, so don't
11535  // need attention here.
11536 
11537  // Thumbnail chart
11538  if (pthumbwin && pthumbwin->IsShown()) {
11539  pthumbwin->Raise();
11540  pthumbwin->Refresh(false);
11541  }
11542 
11543  // ChartInfo window
11544  if (m_pCIWin && m_pCIWin->IsShown()) {
11545  m_pCIWin->Raise();
11546  m_pCIWin->Refresh(false);
11547  }
11548 
11549  // if(g_MainToolbar)
11550  // g_MainToolbar->UpdateRecoveryWindow(g_bshowToolbar);
11551 
11552  } else
11553 #endif
11554  wxWindow::Refresh(eraseBackground, rect);
11555 }
11556 
11557 void ChartCanvas::Update() {
11558  if (m_glcc && g_bopengl) {
11559 #ifdef ocpnUSE_GL
11560  m_glcc->Update();
11561 #endif
11562  } else
11563  wxWindow::Update();
11564 }
11565 
11566 void ChartCanvas::DrawEmboss(ocpnDC &dc, emboss_data *pemboss) {
11567  if (!pemboss) return;
11568  int x = pemboss->x, y = pemboss->y;
11569  const double factor = 200;
11570 
11571  wxASSERT_MSG(dc.GetDC(), wxT("DrawEmboss has no dc (opengl?)"));
11572  wxMemoryDC *pmdc = dynamic_cast<wxMemoryDC *>(dc.GetDC());
11573  wxASSERT_MSG(pmdc, wxT("dc to EmbossCanvas not a memory dc"));
11574 
11575  // Grab a snipped image out of the chart
11576  wxMemoryDC snip_dc;
11577  wxBitmap snip_bmp(pemboss->width, pemboss->height, -1);
11578  snip_dc.SelectObject(snip_bmp);
11579 
11580  snip_dc.Blit(0, 0, pemboss->width, pemboss->height, pmdc, x, y);
11581  snip_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11582 
11583  wxImage snip_img = snip_bmp.ConvertToImage();
11584 
11585  // Apply Emboss map to the snip image
11586  unsigned char *pdata = snip_img.GetData();
11587  if (pdata) {
11588  for (int y = 0; y < pemboss->height; y++) {
11589  int map_index = (y * pemboss->width);
11590  for (int x = 0; x < pemboss->width; x++) {
11591  double val = (pemboss->pmap[map_index] * factor) / 256.;
11592 
11593  int nred = (int)((*pdata) + val);
11594  nred = nred > 255 ? 255 : (nred < 0 ? 0 : nred);
11595  *pdata++ = (unsigned char)nred;
11596 
11597  int ngreen = (int)((*pdata) + val);
11598  ngreen = ngreen > 255 ? 255 : (ngreen < 0 ? 0 : ngreen);
11599  *pdata++ = (unsigned char)ngreen;
11600 
11601  int nblue = (int)((*pdata) + val);
11602  nblue = nblue > 255 ? 255 : (nblue < 0 ? 0 : nblue);
11603  *pdata++ = (unsigned char)nblue;
11604 
11605  map_index++;
11606  }
11607  }
11608  }
11609 
11610  // Convert embossed snip to a bitmap
11611  wxBitmap emb_bmp(snip_img);
11612 
11613  // Map to another memoryDC
11614  wxMemoryDC result_dc;
11615  result_dc.SelectObject(emb_bmp);
11616 
11617  // Blit to target
11618  pmdc->Blit(x, y, pemboss->width, pemboss->height, &result_dc, 0, 0);
11619 
11620  result_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11621 }
11622 
11623 emboss_data *ChartCanvas::EmbossOverzoomIndicator(ocpnDC &dc) {
11624  double zoom_factor = GetVP().ref_scale / GetVP().chart_scale;
11625 
11626  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
11627  // disable Overzoom indicator for MBTiles
11628  int refIndex = GetQuiltRefChartdbIndex();
11629  if (refIndex >= 0) {
11630  const ChartTableEntry &cte = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(refIndex);
11631  ChartTypeEnum current_type = (ChartTypeEnum)cte.GetChartType();
11632  if (current_type == CHART_TYPE_MBTILES) {
11633  ChartBase *pChart = m_pQuilt->GetRefChart();
11634  ChartMBTiles *ptc = dynamic_cast<ChartMBTiles *>(pChart);
11635  if (ptc) {
11636  zoom_factor = ptc->GetZoomFactor();
11637  }
11638  }
11639  }
11640 
11641  if (zoom_factor <= 3.9) return NULL;
11642  } else {
11643  if (m_singleChart) {
11644  if (zoom_factor <= 3.9) return NULL;
11645  } else
11646  return NULL;
11647  }
11648 
11649  if (m_pEM_OverZoom) {
11650  m_pEM_OverZoom->x = 4;
11651  m_pEM_OverZoom->y = 0;
11652  if (g_MainToolbar && IsPrimaryCanvas()) {
11653  wxRect masterToolbarRect = g_MainToolbar->GetRect();
11654  m_pEM_OverZoom->x = masterToolbarRect.width + 4;
11655  }
11656  }
11657  return m_pEM_OverZoom;
11658 }
11659 
11660 void ChartCanvas::DrawOverlayObjects(ocpnDC &dc, const wxRegion &ru) {
11661  GridDraw(dc);
11662 
11663  // bool pluginOverlayRender = true;
11664  //
11665  // if(g_canvasConfig > 0){ // Multi canvas
11666  // if(IsPrimaryCanvas())
11667  // pluginOverlayRender = false;
11668  // }
11669 
11670  g_overlayCanvas = this;
11671 
11672  if (g_pi_manager) {
11673  g_pi_manager->SendViewPortToRequestingPlugIns(GetVP());
11674  g_pi_manager->RenderAllCanvasOverlayPlugIns(dc, GetVP(), m_canvasIndex, OVERLAY_LEGACY);
11675  }
11676 
11677  AISDrawAreaNotices(dc, GetVP(), this);
11678 
11679  wxDC *pdc = dc.GetDC();
11680  if (pdc) {
11681  pdc->DestroyClippingRegion();
11682  wxDCClipper(*pdc, ru);
11683  }
11684 
11685  if (m_bShowNavobjects) {
11686  DrawAllTracksInBBox(dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11687  DrawAllRoutesInBBox(dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11688  DrawAllWaypointsInBBox(dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11689  DrawAnchorWatchPoints(dc);
11690  } else {
11691  DrawActiveTrackInBBox(dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11692  DrawActiveRouteInBBox(dc, GetVP().GetBBox());
11693  }
11694 
11695  AISDraw(dc, GetVP(), this);
11696  ShipDraw(dc);
11697  AlertDraw(dc);
11698 
11699  RenderVisibleSectorLights(dc);
11700 
11701  RenderAllChartOutlines(dc, GetVP());
11702  RenderRouteLegs(dc);
11703  RenderShipToActive(dc, false);
11704  ScaleBarDraw(dc);
11705  s57_DrawExtendedLightSectors(dc, VPoint, extendedSectorLegs);
11706  if (g_pi_manager) {
11707  g_pi_manager->RenderAllCanvasOverlayPlugIns(dc, GetVP(), m_canvasIndex, OVERLAY_OVER_SHIPS);
11708  }
11709 
11710  DrawEmboss(dc, EmbossDepthScale());
11711  DrawEmboss(dc, EmbossOverzoomIndicator(dc));
11712  if (g_pi_manager) {
11713  g_pi_manager->RenderAllCanvasOverlayPlugIns(dc, GetVP(), m_canvasIndex, OVERLAY_OVER_EMBOSS);
11714  }
11715 
11716  if (m_pTrackRolloverWin) {
11717  m_pTrackRolloverWin->Draw(dc);
11718  m_brepaint_piano = true;
11719  }
11720 
11721  if (m_pRouteRolloverWin) {
11722  m_pRouteRolloverWin->Draw(dc);
11723  m_brepaint_piano = true;
11724  }
11725 
11726  if (m_pAISRolloverWin) {
11727  m_pAISRolloverWin->Draw(dc);
11728  m_brepaint_piano = true;
11729  }
11730 
11731  if (g_pi_manager) {
11732  g_pi_manager->RenderAllCanvasOverlayPlugIns(dc, GetVP(), m_canvasIndex, OVERLAY_OVER_UI);
11733  }
11734 }
11735 
11736 emboss_data *ChartCanvas::EmbossDepthScale() {
11737  if (!m_bShowDepthUnits) return NULL;
11738 
11739  int depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_UNKNOWN;
11740 
11741  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
11742  wxString s = m_pQuilt->GetQuiltDepthUnit();
11743  s.MakeUpper();
11744  if (s == _T("FEET"))
11745  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_FEET;
11746  else if (s.StartsWith(_T("FATHOMS")))
11747  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_FATHOMS;
11748  else if (s.StartsWith(_T("METERS")))
11749  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_METERS;
11750  else if (s.StartsWith(_T("METRES")))
11751  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_METERS;
11752  else if (s.StartsWith(_T("METRIC")))
11753  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_METERS;
11754  else if (s.StartsWith(_T("METER")))
11755  depth_unit_type = DEPTH_UNIT_METERS;
11756 
11757  } else {
11758  if (m_singleChart) {
11759  depth_unit_type = m_singleChart->GetDepthUnitType();
11760  if (m_singleChart->GetChartFamily() == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR)
11761  depth_unit_type = ps52plib->m_nDepthUnitDisplay + 1;
11762  }
11763  }
11764 
11765  emboss_data *ped = NULL;
11766  switch (depth_unit_type) {
11767  case DEPTH_UNIT_FEET:
11768  ped = m_pEM_Feet;
11769  break;
11770  case DEPTH_UNIT_METERS:
11771  ped = m_pEM_Meters;
11772  break;
11773  case DEPTH_UNIT_FATHOMS:
11774  ped = m_pEM_Fathoms;
11775  break;
11776  default:
11777  return NULL;
11778  }
11779 
11780  ped->x = (GetVP().pix_width - ped->width);
11781 
11782  if (m_Compass && m_bShowCompassWin) {
11783  wxRect r = m_Compass->GetRect();
11784  ped->y = r.y + r.height;
11785  } else {
11786  ped->y = 40;
11787  }
11788  return ped;
11789 }
11790 
11791 void ChartCanvas::CreateDepthUnitEmbossMaps(ColorScheme cs) {
11792  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
11793  wxFont font;
11794  if (style->embossFont == wxEmptyString) {
11795  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("Dialog"), 0);
11796  font = *dFont;
11797  font.SetPointSize(60);
11798  font.SetWeight(wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD);
11799  } else
11800  font = wxFont(style->embossHeight, wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL,
11801  wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD, false, style->embossFont);
11802 
11803  int emboss_width = 500;
11804  int emboss_height = 200;
11805 
11806  // Free any existing emboss maps
11807  delete m_pEM_Feet;
11808  delete m_pEM_Meters;
11809  delete m_pEM_Fathoms;
11810 
11811  // Create the 3 DepthUnit emboss map structures
11812  m_pEM_Feet =
11813  CreateEmbossMapData(font, emboss_width, emboss_height, _("Feet"), cs);
11814  m_pEM_Meters =
11815  CreateEmbossMapData(font, emboss_width, emboss_height, _("Meters"), cs);
11816  m_pEM_Fathoms =
11817  CreateEmbossMapData(font, emboss_width, emboss_height, _("Fathoms"), cs);
11818 }
11819 
11820 #define OVERZOOM_TEXT _("OverZoom")
11821 
11822 void ChartCanvas::SetOverzoomFont() {
11823  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
11824  int w, h;
11825 
11826  wxFont font;
11827  if (style->embossFont == wxEmptyString) {
11828  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("Dialog"), 0);
11829  font = *dFont;
11830  font.SetPointSize(40);
11831  font.SetWeight(wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD);
11832  } else
11833  font = wxFont(style->embossHeight, wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL,
11834  wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD, false, style->embossFont);
11835 
11836  wxClientDC dc(this);
11837  dc.SetFont(font);
11838  dc.GetTextExtent(OVERZOOM_TEXT, &w, &h);
11839 
11840  while (font.GetPointSize() > 10 && (w > 500 || h > 100)) {
11841  font.SetPointSize(font.GetPointSize() - 1);
11842  dc.SetFont(font);
11843  dc.GetTextExtent(OVERZOOM_TEXT, &w, &h);
11844  }
11845  m_overzoomFont = font;
11846  m_overzoomTextWidth = w;
11847  m_overzoomTextHeight = h;
11848 }
11849 
11850 void ChartCanvas::CreateOZEmbossMapData(ColorScheme cs) {
11851  delete m_pEM_OverZoom;
11852 
11853  if (m_overzoomTextWidth > 0 && m_overzoomTextHeight > 0)
11854  m_pEM_OverZoom =
11855  CreateEmbossMapData(m_overzoomFont, m_overzoomTextWidth + 10,
11856  m_overzoomTextHeight + 10, OVERZOOM_TEXT, cs);
11857 }
11858 
11859 emboss_data *ChartCanvas::CreateEmbossMapData(wxFont &font, int width,
11860  int height, const wxString &str,
11861  ColorScheme cs) {
11862  int *pmap;
11863 
11864  // Create a temporary bitmap
11865  wxBitmap bmp(width, height, -1);
11866 
11867  // Create a memory DC
11868  wxMemoryDC temp_dc;
11869  temp_dc.SelectObject(bmp);
11870 
11871  // Paint on it
11872  temp_dc.SetBackground(*wxWHITE_BRUSH);
11873  temp_dc.SetTextBackground(*wxWHITE);
11874  temp_dc.SetTextForeground(*wxBLACK);
11875 
11876  temp_dc.Clear();
11877 
11878  temp_dc.SetFont(font);
11879 
11880  int str_w, str_h;
11881  temp_dc.GetTextExtent(str, &str_w, &str_h);
11882  // temp_dc.DrawText( str, width - str_w - 10, 10 );
11883  temp_dc.DrawText(str, 1, 1);
11884 
11885  // Deselect the bitmap
11886  temp_dc.SelectObject(wxNullBitmap);
11887 
11888  // Convert bitmap the wxImage for manipulation
11889  wxImage img = bmp.ConvertToImage();
11890 
11891  int image_width = str_w * 105 / 100;
11892  int image_height = str_h * 105 / 100;
11893  wxRect r(0, 0, wxMin(image_width, img.GetWidth()),
11894  wxMin(image_height, img.GetHeight()));
11895  wxImage imgs = img.GetSubImage(r);
11896 
11897  double val_factor;
11898  switch (cs) {
11899  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY:
11900  default:
11901  val_factor = 1;
11902  break;
11903  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DUSK:
11904  val_factor = .5;
11905  break;
11906  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_NIGHT:
11907  val_factor = .25;
11908  break;
11909  }
11910 
11911  int val;
11912  int index;
11913  const int w = imgs.GetWidth();
11914  const int h = imgs.GetHeight();
11915  pmap = (int *)calloc(w * h * sizeof(int), 1);
11916  // Create emboss map by differentiating the emboss image
11917  // and storing integer results in pmap
11918  // n.b. since the image is B/W, it is sufficient to check
11919  // one channel (i.e. red) only
11920  for (int y = 1; y < h - 1; y++) {
11921  for (int x = 1; x < w - 1; x++) {
11922  val =
11923  img.GetRed(x + 1, y + 1) - img.GetRed(x - 1, y - 1); // range +/- 256
11924  val = (int)(val * val_factor);
11925  index = (y * w) + x;
11926  pmap[index] = val;
11927  }
11928  }
11929 
11930  emboss_data *pret = new emboss_data;
11931  pret->pmap = pmap;
11932  pret->width = w;
11933  pret->height = h;
11934 
11935  return pret;
11936 }
11937 
11938 void ChartCanvas::DrawAllTracksInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BltBBox) {
11939  Track *active_track = NULL;
11940  for (Track* pTrackDraw : g_TrackList) {
11941  if (g_pActiveTrack == pTrackDraw) {
11942  active_track = pTrackDraw;
11943  continue;
11944  }
11945 
11946  TrackGui(*pTrackDraw).Draw(this, dc, GetVP(), BltBBox);
11947  }
11948 
11949  if (active_track) TrackGui(*active_track).Draw(this, dc, GetVP(), BltBBox);
11950 }
11951 
11952 void ChartCanvas::DrawActiveTrackInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BltBBox) {
11953  Track *active_track = NULL;
11954  for (Track* pTrackDraw : g_TrackList) {
11955  if (g_pActiveTrack == pTrackDraw) {
11956  active_track = pTrackDraw;
11957  break;
11958  }
11959  }
11960  if (active_track) TrackGui(*active_track).Draw(this, dc, GetVP(), BltBBox);
11961 }
11962 
11963 void ChartCanvas::DrawAllRoutesInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BltBBox) {
11964  Route *active_route = NULL;
11965 
11966  for (wxRouteListNode *node = pRouteList->GetFirst(); node;
11967  node = node->GetNext()) {
11968  Route *pRouteDraw = node->GetData();
11969  if (pRouteDraw->IsActive() || pRouteDraw->IsSelected()) {
11970  active_route = pRouteDraw;
11971  continue;
11972  }
11973 
11974  // if(m_canvasIndex == 1)
11975  RouteGui(*pRouteDraw).Draw(dc, this, BltBBox);
11976  }
11977 
11978  // Draw any active or selected route (or track) last, so that is is always on
11979  // top
11980  if (active_route) RouteGui(*active_route).Draw(dc, this, BltBBox);
11981 }
11982 
11983 void ChartCanvas::DrawActiveRouteInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BltBBox) {
11984  Route *active_route = NULL;
11985 
11986  for (wxRouteListNode *node = pRouteList->GetFirst(); node;
11987  node = node->GetNext()) {
11988  Route *pRouteDraw = node->GetData();
11989  if (pRouteDraw->IsActive() || pRouteDraw->IsSelected()) {
11990  active_route = pRouteDraw;
11991  break;
11992  }
11993  }
11994  if (active_route) RouteGui(*active_route).Draw(dc, this, BltBBox);
11995 }
11996 
11997 void ChartCanvas::DrawAllWaypointsInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BltBBox) {
11998  if (!pWayPointMan) return;
11999 
12000  wxRoutePointListNode *node = pWayPointMan->GetWaypointList()->GetFirst();
12001 
12002  while (node) {
12003  RoutePoint *pWP = node->GetData();
12004  if (pWP) {
12005  if (pWP->m_bIsInRoute) {
12006  node = node->GetNext();
12007  continue;
12008  }
12009 
12010  /* technically incorrect... waypoint has bounding box */
12011  if (BltBBox.Contains(pWP->m_lat, pWP->m_lon))
12012  RoutePointGui(*pWP).Draw(dc, this, NULL);
12013  else {
12014  // Are Range Rings enabled?
12015  if (pWP->GetShowWaypointRangeRings() &&
12016  (pWP->GetWaypointRangeRingsNumber() > 0)) {
12017  double factor = 1.00;
12018  if (pWP->GetWaypointRangeRingsStepUnits() ==
12019  1) // convert kilometers to NMi
12020  factor = 1 / 1.852;
12021 
12022  double radius = factor * pWP->GetWaypointRangeRingsNumber() *
12023  pWP->GetWaypointRangeRingsStep() / 60.;
12024  radius *= 2; // Fudge factor
12025 
12026  LLBBox radar_box;
12027  radar_box.Set(pWP->m_lat - radius, pWP->m_lon - radius,
12028  pWP->m_lat + radius, pWP->m_lon + radius);
12029  if (!BltBBox.IntersectOut(radar_box)) {
12030  RoutePointGui(*pWP).Draw(dc, this, NULL);
12031  }
12032  }
12033  }
12034  }
12035 
12036  node = node->GetNext();
12037  }
12038 }
12039 
12040 void ChartCanvas::DrawBlinkObjects(void) {
12041  // All RoutePoints
12042  wxRect update_rect;
12043 
12044  if (!pWayPointMan) return;
12045 
12046  wxRoutePointListNode *node = pWayPointMan->GetWaypointList()->GetFirst();
12047 
12048  while (node) {
12049  RoutePoint *pWP = node->GetData();
12050  if (pWP) {
12051  if (pWP->m_bBlink) {
12052  update_rect.Union(pWP->CurrentRect_in_DC);
12053  }
12054  }
12055 
12056  node = node->GetNext();
12057  }
12058  if (!update_rect.IsEmpty()) RefreshRect(update_rect);
12059 }
12060 
12061 void ChartCanvas::DrawAnchorWatchPoints(ocpnDC &dc) {
12062  // draw anchor watch rings, if activated
12063 
12064  if (pAnchorWatchPoint1 || pAnchorWatchPoint2) {
12065  wxPoint r1, r2;
12066  wxPoint lAnchorPoint1, lAnchorPoint2;
12067  double lpp1 = 0.0;
12068  double lpp2 = 0.0;
12069  if (pAnchorWatchPoint1) {
12070  lpp1 = GetAnchorWatchRadiusPixels(pAnchorWatchPoint1);
12071  GetCanvasPointPix(pAnchorWatchPoint1->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint1->m_lon,
12072  &lAnchorPoint1);
12073  }
12074  if (pAnchorWatchPoint2) {
12075  lpp2 = GetAnchorWatchRadiusPixels(pAnchorWatchPoint2);
12076  GetCanvasPointPix(pAnchorWatchPoint2->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint2->m_lon,
12077  &lAnchorPoint2);
12078  }
12079 
12080  wxPen ppPeng(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UGREN" )), 2);
12081  wxPen ppPenr(GetGlobalColor(_T ( "URED" )), 2);
12082 
12083  wxBrush *ppBrush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12084  wxColour(0, 0, 0), wxBRUSHSTYLE_TRANSPARENT);
12085  dc.SetBrush(*ppBrush);
12086 
12087  if (lpp1 > 0) {
12088  dc.SetPen(ppPeng);
12089  dc.StrokeCircle(lAnchorPoint1.x, lAnchorPoint1.y, fabs(lpp1));
12090  }
12091 
12092  if (lpp2 > 0) {
12093  dc.SetPen(ppPeng);
12094  dc.StrokeCircle(lAnchorPoint2.x, lAnchorPoint2.y, fabs(lpp2));
12095  }
12096 
12097  if (lpp1 < 0) {
12098  dc.SetPen(ppPenr);
12099  dc.StrokeCircle(lAnchorPoint1.x, lAnchorPoint1.y, fabs(lpp1));
12100  }
12101 
12102  if (lpp2 < 0) {
12103  dc.SetPen(ppPenr);
12104  dc.StrokeCircle(lAnchorPoint2.x, lAnchorPoint2.y, fabs(lpp2));
12105  }
12106  }
12107 }
12108 
12109 double ChartCanvas::GetAnchorWatchRadiusPixels(RoutePoint *pAnchorWatchPoint) {
12110  double lpp = 0.;
12111  wxPoint r1;
12112  wxPoint lAnchorPoint;
12113  double d1 = 0.0;
12114  double dabs;
12115  double tlat1, tlon1;
12116 
12117  if (pAnchorWatchPoint) {
12118  (pAnchorWatchPoint->GetName()).ToDouble(&d1);
12119  d1 = AnchorDistFix(d1, AnchorPointMinDist, g_nAWMax);
12120  dabs = fabs(d1 / 1852.);
12121  ll_gc_ll(pAnchorWatchPoint->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint->m_lon, 0, dabs,
12122  &tlat1, &tlon1);
12123  GetCanvasPointPix(tlat1, tlon1, &r1);
12124  GetCanvasPointPix(pAnchorWatchPoint->m_lat, pAnchorWatchPoint->m_lon,
12125  &lAnchorPoint);
12126  lpp = sqrt(pow((double)(lAnchorPoint.x - r1.x), 2) +
12127  pow((double)(lAnchorPoint.y - r1.y), 2));
12128 
12129  // This is an entry watch
12130  if (d1 < 0) lpp = -lpp;
12131  }
12132  return lpp;
12133 }
12134 
12135 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12136 // Tides Support
12137 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12138 void ChartCanvas::RebuildTideSelectList(LLBBox &BBox) {
12139  if (!ptcmgr) return;
12140 
12141  pSelectTC->DeleteAllSelectableTypePoints(SELTYPE_TIDEPOINT);
12142 
12143  for (int i = 1; i < ptcmgr->Get_max_IDX() + 1; i++) {
12144  const IDX_entry *pIDX = ptcmgr->GetIDX_entry(i);
12145  double lon = pIDX->IDX_lon;
12146  double lat = pIDX->IDX_lat;
12147 
12148  char type = pIDX->IDX_type; // Entry "TCtcIUu" identifier
12149  if ((type == 't') || (type == 'T')) {
12150  if (BBox.Contains(lat, lon)) {
12151  // Manage the point selection list
12152  pSelectTC->AddSelectablePoint(lat, lon, pIDX, SELTYPE_TIDEPOINT);
12153  }
12154  }
12155  }
12156 }
12157 
12158 extern wxDateTime gTimeSource;
12159 
12160 void ChartCanvas::DrawAllTidesInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BBox) {
12161  if (!ptcmgr) return;
12162 
12163  wxDateTime this_now = gTimeSource;
12164  bool cur_time = !gTimeSource.IsValid();
12165  if (cur_time) this_now = wxDateTime::Now();
12166  time_t t_this_now = this_now.GetTicks();
12167 
12168  wxPen *pblack_pen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(
12169  GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UINFD" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
12170  wxPen *pyelo_pen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(
12171  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "YELO1" ) : _T ( "YELO2" )), 1,
12172  wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
12173  wxPen *pblue_pen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(
12174  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "BLUE2" ) : _T ( "BLUE3" )), 1,
12175  wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
12176 
12177  wxBrush *pgreen_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12178  GetGlobalColor(_T ( "GREEN1" )), wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12179  // wxBrush *pblack_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush (
12180  // GetGlobalColor ( _T ( "UINFD" ) ), wxSOLID );
12181  wxBrush *pblue_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12182  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "BLUE2" ) : _T ( "BLUE3" )),
12183  wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12184  wxBrush *pyelo_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12185  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "YELO1" ) : _T ( "YELO2" )),
12186  wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12187 
12188  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("ExtendedTideIcon"));
12189  dc.SetTextForeground(FontMgr::Get().GetFontColor(_("ExtendedTideIcon")));
12190  int font_size = wxMax(10, dFont->GetPointSize());
12191  font_size /= g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
12192  wxFont *plabelFont =
12193  FontMgr::Get().FindOrCreateFont(font_size,
12194  dFont->GetFamily(), dFont->GetStyle(),
12195  dFont->GetWeight(), false,
12196  dFont->GetFaceName());
12197 
12198  dc.SetPen(*pblack_pen);
12199  dc.SetBrush(*pgreen_brush);
12200 
12201  wxBitmap bm;
12202  switch (m_cs) {
12203  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DAY:
12204  bm = m_bmTideDay;
12205  break;
12206  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_DUSK:
12207  bm = m_bmTideDusk;
12208  break;
12209  case GLOBAL_COLOR_SCHEME_NIGHT:
12210  bm = m_bmTideNight;
12211  break;
12212  default:
12213  bm = m_bmTideDay;
12214  break;
12215  }
12216 
12217  int bmw = bm.GetWidth();
12218  int bmh = bm.GetHeight();
12219 
12220  float scale_factor = 1.0;
12221 
12222  // Set the onscreen size of the symbol
12223  // Compensate for various display resolutions
12224  float icon_pixelRefDim = 45;
12225 
12226 #if 0
12227  float nominal_icon_size_mm = g_Platform->GetDisplaySizeMM() *25 / 1000; // Intended physical rendered size onscreen
12228  nominal_icon_size_mm = wxMax(nominal_icon_size_mm, 8);
12229  nominal_icon_size_mm = wxMin(nominal_icon_size_mm, 15);
12230  float nominal_icon_size_pixels = wxMax(4.0, floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() * nominal_icon_size_mm)); // nominal size, but not less than 4 pixel
12231 #endif
12232 
12233 #ifndef __OCPN__ANDROID__
12234  // another method is simply to declare that the icon shall be x times the size
12235  // of a raster symbol (e.g.BOYLAT)
12236  // This is a bit of a hack that will suffice until until we get fully
12237  // scalable ENC symbol sets
12238  // float nominal_icon_size_pixels = 48; // 3 x 16
12239  // float pix_factor = nominal_icon_size_pixels / icon_pixelRefDim;
12240 
12241  // or, x times size of text font
12242  wxScreenDC sdc;
12243  int height;
12244  sdc.GetTextExtent("M", NULL, &height, NULL, NULL, plabelFont);
12245  height *= g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
12246  float nominal_icon_size_pixels = 48; // 3 x 16
12247  float pix_factor = (2 * height) / nominal_icon_size_pixels;
12248 
12249 
12250 #else
12251  // Yet another method goes like this:
12252  // Set the onscreen size of the symbol
12253  // Compensate for various display resolutions
12254  // Develop empirically, making a symbol about 16 mm tall
12255  double symHeight =
12256  icon_pixelRefDim /
12257  GetPixPerMM(); // from draw instructions, symbol is xx pix high
12258  double targetHeight0 = 16.0;
12259 
12260  // But we want to scale the size down for smaller displays
12261  double displaySize = m_display_size_mm;
12262  displaySize = wxMax(displaySize, 100);
12263 
12264  float targetHeight = wxMin(targetHeight0, displaySize / 15);
12265 
12266  double pix_factor = targetHeight / symHeight;
12267 #endif
12268 
12269  scale_factor *= pix_factor;
12270 
12271  float user_scale_factor = g_ChartScaleFactorExp;
12272  if (g_ChartScaleFactorExp > 1.0)
12273  user_scale_factor = (log(g_ChartScaleFactorExp) + 1.0) *
12274  1.2; // soften the scale factor a bit
12275 
12276  scale_factor *= user_scale_factor;
12277  scale_factor *= GetContentScaleFactor();
12278 
12279 
12280  {
12281  double marge = 0.05;
12282  std::vector<LLBBox> drawn_boxes;
12283  for (int i = 1; i < ptcmgr->Get_max_IDX() + 1; i++) {
12284  const IDX_entry *pIDX = ptcmgr->GetIDX_entry(i);
12285 
12286  char type = pIDX->IDX_type; // Entry "TCtcIUu" identifier
12287  if ((type == 't') || (type == 'T')) // only Tides
12288  {
12289  double lon = pIDX->IDX_lon;
12290  double lat = pIDX->IDX_lat;
12291 
12292  if (BBox.ContainsMarge(lat, lon, marge)) {
12293 
12294  // Avoid drawing detailed graphic for duplicate tide stations
12295  if (GetVP().chart_scale < 500000){
12296  bool bdrawn = false;
12297  for (size_t i = 0; i < drawn_boxes.size(); i++){
12298  if (drawn_boxes[i].Contains(lat, lon)){
12299  bdrawn = true;
12300  break;
12301  }
12302  }
12303  if (bdrawn)
12304  continue; // the station loop
12305 
12306  LLBBox this_box;
12307  this_box.Set(lat, lon, lat, lon);
12308  this_box.EnLarge(.005);
12309  drawn_boxes.push_back(this_box);
12310  }
12311 
12312  wxPoint r;
12313  GetCanvasPointPix(lat, lon, &r);
12314  // draw standard icons
12315  if (GetVP().chart_scale > 500000) {
12316  dc.DrawBitmap(bm, r.x - bmw / 2, r.y - bmh / 2, true);
12317  }
12318  // draw "extended" icons
12319  else {
12320  dc.SetFont(*plabelFont);
12321  {
12322  {
12323  float val, nowlev;
12324  float ltleve = 0.;
12325  float htleve = 0.;
12326  time_t tctime;
12327  time_t lttime = 0;
12328  time_t httime = 0;
12329  bool wt;
12330  // define if flood or ebb in the last ten minutes and verify if
12331  // data are useable
12332  if (ptcmgr->GetTideFlowSens(
12333  t_this_now, BACKWARD_TEN_MINUTES_STEP,
12334  pIDX->IDX_rec_num, nowlev, val, wt)) {
12335  // search forward the first HW or LW near "now" ( starting at
12336  // "now" - ten minutes )
12337  ptcmgr->GetHightOrLowTide(
12338  t_this_now + BACKWARD_TEN_MINUTES_STEP,
12339  FORWARD_TEN_MINUTES_STEP, FORWARD_ONE_MINUTES_STEP, val,
12340  wt, pIDX->IDX_rec_num, val, tctime);
12341  if (wt) {
12342  httime = tctime;
12343  htleve = val;
12344  } else {
12345  lttime = tctime;
12346  ltleve = val;
12347  }
12348  wt = !wt;
12349 
12350  // then search opposite tide near "now"
12351  if (tctime > t_this_now) // search backward
12352  ptcmgr->GetHightOrLowTide(
12353  t_this_now, BACKWARD_TEN_MINUTES_STEP,
12354  BACKWARD_ONE_MINUTES_STEP, nowlev, wt,
12355  pIDX->IDX_rec_num, val, tctime);
12356  else
12357  // or search forward
12358  ptcmgr->GetHightOrLowTide(
12359  t_this_now, FORWARD_TEN_MINUTES_STEP,
12360  FORWARD_ONE_MINUTES_STEP, nowlev, wt, pIDX->IDX_rec_num,
12361  val, tctime);
12362  if (wt) {
12363  httime = tctime;
12364  htleve = val;
12365  } else {
12366  lttime = tctime;
12367  ltleve = val;
12368  }
12369 
12370  // draw the tide rectangle:
12371 
12372  // tide icon rectangle has default pre-scaled width = 12 ,
12373  // height = 45
12374  int width = (int)(12 * scale_factor + 0.5);
12375  int height = (int)(45 * scale_factor + 0.5);
12376  int linew = wxMax(1, (int)(scale_factor));
12377  int xDraw = r.x - (width / 2);
12378  int yDraw = r.y - (height / 2);
12379 
12380  // process tide state ( %height and flow sens )
12381  float ts = 1 - ((nowlev - ltleve) / (htleve - ltleve));
12382  int hs = (httime > lttime) ? -4 : 4;
12383  hs *= (int)(scale_factor + 0.5);
12384  if (ts > 0.995 || ts < 0.005) hs = 0;
12385  int ht_y = (int)(height * ts);
12386 
12387  // draw yellow tide rectangle outlined in black
12388  pblack_pen->SetWidth(linew);
12389  dc.SetPen(*pblack_pen);
12390  dc.SetBrush(*pyelo_brush);
12391  dc.DrawRectangle(xDraw, yDraw, width, height);
12392 
12393  // draw blue rectangle as water height, smaller in width than
12394  // yellow rectangle
12395  dc.SetPen(*pblue_pen);
12396  dc.SetBrush(*pblue_brush);
12397  dc.DrawRectangle((xDraw + 2 * linew), yDraw + ht_y,
12398  (width - (4 * linew)), height - ht_y);
12399 
12400  // draw sens arrows (ensure they are not "under-drawn" by top
12401  // line of blue rectangle )
12402  int hl;
12403  wxPoint arrow[3];
12404  arrow[0].x = xDraw + 2 * linew;
12405  arrow[1].x = xDraw + width / 2;
12406  arrow[2].x = xDraw + width - 2 * linew;
12407  pyelo_pen->SetWidth(linew);
12408  pblue_pen->SetWidth(linew);
12409  if (ts > 0.35 || ts < 0.15) // one arrow at 3/4 hight tide
12410  {
12411  hl = (int)(height * 0.25) + yDraw;
12412  arrow[0].y = hl;
12413  arrow[1].y = hl + hs;
12414  arrow[2].y = hl;
12415  if (ts < 0.15)
12416  dc.SetPen(*pyelo_pen);
12417  else
12418  dc.SetPen(*pblue_pen);
12419  dc.DrawLines(3, arrow);
12420  }
12421  if (ts > 0.60 || ts < 0.40) // one arrow at 1/2 hight tide
12422  {
12423  hl = (int)(height * 0.5) + yDraw;
12424  arrow[0].y = hl;
12425  arrow[1].y = hl + hs;
12426  arrow[2].y = hl;
12427  if (ts < 0.40)
12428  dc.SetPen(*pyelo_pen);
12429  else
12430  dc.SetPen(*pblue_pen);
12431  dc.DrawLines(3, arrow);
12432  }
12433  if (ts < 0.65 || ts > 0.85) // one arrow at 1/4 Hight tide
12434  {
12435  hl = (int)(height * 0.75) + yDraw;
12436  arrow[0].y = hl;
12437  arrow[1].y = hl + hs;
12438  arrow[2].y = hl;
12439  if (ts < 0.65)
12440  dc.SetPen(*pyelo_pen);
12441  else
12442  dc.SetPen(*pblue_pen);
12443  dc.DrawLines(3, arrow);
12444  }
12445  // draw tide level text
12446  wxString s;
12447  s.Printf(_T("%3.1f"), nowlev);
12448  Station_Data *pmsd = pIDX->pref_sta_data; // write unit
12449  if (pmsd) s.Append(wxString(pmsd->units_abbrv, wxConvUTF8));
12450  int wx1;
12451  dc.GetTextExtent(s, &wx1, NULL);
12452  wx1 *= g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
12453  dc.DrawText(s, r.x - (wx1 / 2), yDraw + height);
12454  }
12455  }
12456  }
12457  }
12458  }
12459  }
12460  }
12461  }
12462 }
12463 
12464 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12465 // Currents Support
12466 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12467 
12468 void ChartCanvas::RebuildCurrentSelectList(LLBBox &BBox) {
12469  if (!ptcmgr) return;
12470 
12471  pSelectTC->DeleteAllSelectableTypePoints(SELTYPE_CURRENTPOINT);
12472 
12473  for (int i = 1; i < ptcmgr->Get_max_IDX() + 1; i++) {
12474  const IDX_entry *pIDX = ptcmgr->GetIDX_entry(i);
12475  double lon = pIDX->IDX_lon;
12476  double lat = pIDX->IDX_lat;
12477 
12478  char type = pIDX->IDX_type; // Entry "TCtcIUu" identifier
12479  if (((type == 'c') || (type == 'C')) && (!pIDX->b_skipTooDeep)) {
12480  if ((BBox.Contains(lat, lon))) {
12481  // Manage the point selection list
12482  pSelectTC->AddSelectablePoint(lat, lon, pIDX, SELTYPE_CURRENTPOINT);
12483  }
12484  }
12485  }
12486 }
12487 
12488 void ChartCanvas::DrawAllCurrentsInBBox(ocpnDC &dc, LLBBox &BBox) {
12489  if (!ptcmgr) return;
12490 
12491  float tcvalue, dir;
12492  bool bnew_val;
12493  char sbuf[20];
12494  wxFont *pTCFont;
12495  double lon_last = 0.;
12496  double lat_last = 0.;
12497  // arrow size for Raz Blanchard : 12 knots north
12498  double marge = 0.2;
12499  bool cur_time = !gTimeSource.IsValid();
12500 
12501  double true_scale_display = floor(VPoint.chart_scale / 100.) * 100.;
12502  bDrawCurrentValues = true_scale_display < g_Show_Target_Name_Scale;
12503 
12504  wxPen *pblack_pen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(
12505  GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UINFD" )), 1, wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
12506  wxPen *porange_pen = wxThePenList->FindOrCreatePen(
12507  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "UINFO" ) : _T ( "UINFB" )), 1,
12508  wxPENSTYLE_SOLID);
12509  wxBrush *porange_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12510  GetGlobalColor(cur_time ? _T ( "UINFO" ) : _T ( "UINFB" )),
12511  wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12512  wxBrush *pgray_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12513  GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UIBDR" )), wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12514  wxBrush *pblack_brush = wxTheBrushList->FindOrCreateBrush(
12515  GetGlobalColor(_T ( "UINFD" )), wxBRUSHSTYLE_SOLID);
12516 
12517  double skew_angle = GetVPRotation();
12518 
12519  wxFont *dFont = FontMgr::Get().GetFont(_("CurrentValue"));
12520  int font_size = wxMax(10, dFont->GetPointSize());
12521  font_size /= g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
12522  pTCFont =
12523  FontMgr::Get().FindOrCreateFont(font_size,
12524  dFont->GetFamily(), dFont->GetStyle(),
12525  dFont->GetWeight(), false,
12526  dFont->GetFaceName());
12527 
12528 
12529  float scale_factor = 1.0;
12530 
12531  // Set the onscreen size of the symbol
12532  // Compensate for various display resolutions
12533 
12534 #if 0
12535  float nominal_icon_size_mm = g_Platform->GetDisplaySizeMM() *3 / 1000; // Intended physical rendered size onscreen
12536  nominal_icon_size_mm = wxMax(nominal_icon_size_mm, 2);
12537  nominal_icon_size_mm = wxMin(nominal_icon_size_mm, 4);
12538  float nominal_icon_size_pixels = wxMax(4.0, floor(g_Platform->GetDisplayDPmm() * nominal_icon_size_mm)); // nominal size, but not less than 4 pixel
12539 #endif
12540 
12541 #if 0
12542  // another method is simply to declare that the icon shall be x times the size of a raster symbol (e.g.BOYLAT)
12543  // This is a bit of a hack that will suffice until until we get fully scalable ENC symbol sets
12544  float nominal_icon_size_pixels = 6; // 16 / 3
12545  float pix_factor = nominal_icon_size_pixels / icon_pixelRefDim;
12546 #endif
12547 
12548 #ifndef __OCPN__ANDROID__
12549  // or, x times size of text font
12550  wxScreenDC sdc;
12551  int height;
12552  sdc.GetTextExtent("M", NULL, &height, NULL, NULL, pTCFont);
12553  height *= g_Platform->GetDisplayDIPMult(this);
12554  float nominal_icon_size_pixels = 15;
12555  float pix_factor = (1 * height) / nominal_icon_size_pixels;
12556 
12557 #else
12558  // Yet another method goes like this:
12559  // Set the onscreen size of the symbol
12560  // Compensate for various display resolutions
