12561  // Develop empirically....
12562  float icon_pixelRefDim = 5;
12563 
12564  double symHeight =
12565  icon_pixelRefDim /
12566  GetPixPerMM(); // from draw instructions, symbol is xx pix high
12567  double targetHeight0 = 2.0;
12568 
12569  // But we want to scale the size down for smaller displays
12570  double displaySize = m_display_size_mm;
12571  displaySize = wxMax(displaySize, 100);
12572 
12573  float targetHeight = wxMin(targetHeight0, displaySize / 50);
12574  double pix_factor = targetHeight / symHeight;
12575 #endif
12576 
12577  scale_factor *= pix_factor;
12578 
12579  float user_scale_factor = g_ChartScaleFactorExp;
12580  if (g_ChartScaleFactorExp > 1.0)
12581  user_scale_factor = (log(g_ChartScaleFactorExp) + 1.0) *
12582  1.2; // soften the scale factor a bit
12583 
12584  scale_factor *= user_scale_factor;
12585 
12586  scale_factor *= GetContentScaleFactor();
12587 
12588  {
12589  for (int i = 1; i < ptcmgr->Get_max_IDX() + 1; i++) {
12590  const IDX_entry *pIDX = ptcmgr->GetIDX_entry(i);
12591  double lon = pIDX->IDX_lon;
12592  double lat = pIDX->IDX_lat;
12593 
12594  char type = pIDX->IDX_type; // Entry "TCtcIUu" identifier
12595  if (((type == 'c') || (type == 'C')) && (1 /*pIDX->IDX_Useable*/)) {
12596  if (!pIDX->b_skipTooDeep && (BBox.ContainsMarge(lat, lon, marge))) {
12597  wxPoint r;
12598  GetCanvasPointPix(lat, lon, &r);
12599 
12600  wxPoint d[4]; // points of a diamond at the current station location
12601  int dd = (int)(5.0 * scale_factor + 0.5);
12602  d[0].x = r.x;
12603  d[0].y = r.y + dd;
12604  d[1].x = r.x + dd;
12605  d[1].y = r.y;
12606  d[2].x = r.x;
12607  d[2].y = r.y - dd;
12608  d[3].x = r.x - dd;
12609  d[3].y = r.y;
12610 
12611  if (1) {
12612  pblack_pen->SetWidth(wxMax(2, (int)(scale_factor + 0.5)));
12613  dc.SetPen(*pblack_pen);
12614  dc.SetBrush(*porange_brush);
12615  dc.DrawPolygon(4, d);
12616 
12617  if (type == 'C') {
12618  dc.SetBrush(*pblack_brush);
12619  dc.DrawCircle(r.x, r.y, (int)(2 * scale_factor));
12620  }
12621 
12622  if (GetVP().chart_scale < 1000000) {
12623  if (!ptcmgr->GetTideOrCurrent15(0, i, tcvalue, dir, bnew_val))
12624  continue;
12625  } else
12626  continue;
12627 
12628  if (1 /*type == 'c'*/) {
12629  {
12630  // Get the display pixel location of the current station
12631  int pixxc, pixyc;
12632  pixxc = r.x;
12633  pixyc = r.y;
12634 
12635  // Adjust drawing size using logarithmic scale. tcvalue is
12636  // current in knots
12637  double a1 = fabs(tcvalue) * 10.;
12638  // Current values <= 0.1 knot will have no arrow
12639  a1 = wxMax(1.0, a1);
12640  double a2 = log10(a1);
12641 
12642  float cscale = scale_factor * a2 * 0.4;
12643 
12644  porange_pen->SetWidth(wxMax(2, (int)(scale_factor + 0.5)));
12645  dc.SetPen(*porange_pen);
12646  DrawArrow(dc, pixxc, pixyc, dir - 90 + (skew_angle * 180. / PI),
12647  cscale);
12648  // Draw text, if enabled
12649 
12650  if (bDrawCurrentValues) {
12651  dc.SetFont(*pTCFont);
12652  snprintf(sbuf, 19, "%3.1f", fabs(tcvalue));
12653  dc.DrawText(wxString(sbuf, wxConvUTF8), pixxc, pixyc);
12654  }
12655  }
12656  } // scale
12657  }
12658  /* This is useful for debugging the TC database
12659  else
12660  {
12661  dc.SetPen ( *porange_pen );
12662  dc.SetBrush ( *pgray_brush );
12663  dc.DrawPolygon ( 4, d );
12664  }
12665  */
12666  }
12667  lon_last = lon;
12668  lat_last = lat;
12669  }
12670  }
12671  }
12672 }
12673 
12674 void ChartCanvas::DrawTCWindow(int x, int y, void *pvIDX) {
12675  pCwin = new TCWin(this, x, y, pvIDX);
12676 }
12677 
12678 #define NUM_CURRENT_ARROW_POINTS 9
12679 static wxPoint CurrentArrowArray[NUM_CURRENT_ARROW_POINTS] = {
12680  wxPoint(0, 0), wxPoint(0, -10), wxPoint(55, -10),
12681  wxPoint(55, -25), wxPoint(100, 0), wxPoint(55, 25),
12682  wxPoint(55, 10), wxPoint(0, 10), wxPoint(0, 0)};
12683 
12684 void ChartCanvas::DrawArrow(ocpnDC &dc, int x, int y, double rot_angle,
12685  double scale) {
12686  if (scale > 1e-2) {
12687  float sin_rot = sin(rot_angle * PI / 180.);
12688  float cos_rot = cos(rot_angle * PI / 180.);
12689 
12690  // Move to the first point
12691 
12692  float xt = CurrentArrowArray[0].x;
12693  float yt = CurrentArrowArray[0].y;
12694 
12695  float xp = (xt * cos_rot) - (yt * sin_rot);
12696  float yp = (xt * sin_rot) + (yt * cos_rot);
12697  int x1 = (int)(xp * scale);
12698  int y1 = (int)(yp * scale);
12699 
12700  // Walk thru the point list
12701  for (int ip = 1; ip < NUM_CURRENT_ARROW_POINTS; ip++) {
12702  xt = CurrentArrowArray[ip].x;
12703  yt = CurrentArrowArray[ip].y;
12704 
12705  float xp = (xt * cos_rot) - (yt * sin_rot);
12706  float yp = (xt * sin_rot) + (yt * cos_rot);
12707  int x2 = (int)(xp * scale);
12708  int y2 = (int)(yp * scale);
12709 
12710  dc.DrawLine(x1 + x, y1 + y, x2 + x, y2 + y);
12711 
12712  x1 = x2;
12713  y1 = y2;
12714  }
12715  }
12716 }
12717 
12718 wxString ChartCanvas::FindValidUploadPort() {
12719  wxString port;
12720  // Try to use the saved persistent upload port first
12721  if (!g_uploadConnection.IsEmpty() &&
12722  g_uploadConnection.StartsWith(_T("Serial"))) {
12723  port = g_uploadConnection;
12724  }
12725 
12726  else if (TheConnectionParams()) {
12727  // If there is no persistent upload port recorded (yet)
12728  // then use the first available serial connection which has output defined.
12729  for (size_t i = 0; i < TheConnectionParams()->Count(); i++) {
12730  ConnectionParams *cp = TheConnectionParams()->Item(i);
12731  if ((cp->IOSelect != DS_TYPE_INPUT) && cp->Type == SERIAL)
12732  port << _T("Serial:") << cp->Port;
12733  }
12734  }
12735  return port;
12736 }
12737 
12738 void ShowAISTargetQueryDialog(wxWindow *win, int mmsi) {
12739  if (!win) return;
12740 
12741  if (NULL == g_pais_query_dialog_active) {
12742  int pos_x = g_ais_query_dialog_x;
12743  int pos_y = g_ais_query_dialog_y;
12744 
12745  if (g_pais_query_dialog_active) {
12746  delete g_pais_query_dialog_active;
12747  g_pais_query_dialog_active = new AISTargetQueryDialog();
12748  } else {
12749  g_pais_query_dialog_active = new AISTargetQueryDialog();
12750  }
12751 
12752  g_pais_query_dialog_active->Create(win, -1, _("AIS Target Query"),
12753  wxPoint(pos_x, pos_y));
12754 
12755  g_pais_query_dialog_active->SetAutoCentre(g_btouch);
12756  g_pais_query_dialog_active->SetAutoSize(g_bresponsive);
12757  g_pais_query_dialog_active->SetMMSI(mmsi);
12758  g_pais_query_dialog_active->UpdateText();
12759  wxSize sz = g_pais_query_dialog_active->GetSize();
12760 
12761  bool b_reset_pos = false;
12762 #ifdef __WXMSW__
12763  // Support MultiMonitor setups which an allow negative window positions.
12764  // If the requested window title bar does not intersect any installed
12765  // monitor, then default to simple primary monitor positioning.
12766  RECT frame_title_rect;
12767  frame_title_rect.left = pos_x;
12768  frame_title_rect.top = pos_y;
12769  frame_title_rect.right = pos_x + sz.x;
12770  frame_title_rect.bottom = pos_y + 30;
12771 
12772  if (NULL == MonitorFromRect(&frame_title_rect, MONITOR_DEFAULTTONULL))
12773  b_reset_pos = true;
12774 #else
12775 
12776  // Make sure drag bar (title bar) of window intersects wxClient Area of
12777  // screen, with a little slop...
12778  wxRect window_title_rect; // conservative estimate
12779  window_title_rect.x = pos_x;
12780  window_title_rect.y = pos_y;
12781  window_title_rect.width = sz.x;
12782  window_title_rect.height = 30;
12783 
12784  wxRect ClientRect = wxGetClientDisplayRect();
12785  ClientRect.Deflate(
12786  60, 60); // Prevent the new window from being too close to the edge
12787  if (!ClientRect.Intersects(window_title_rect)) b_reset_pos = true;
12788 
12789 #endif
12790 
12791  if (b_reset_pos) g_pais_query_dialog_active->Move(50, 200);
12792 
12793  } else {
12794  g_pais_query_dialog_active->SetMMSI(mmsi);
12795  g_pais_query_dialog_active->UpdateText();
12796  }
12797 
12798  g_pais_query_dialog_active->Show();
12799 }
12800 
12801 void ChartCanvas::ToggleCanvasQuiltMode(void) {
12802  bool cur_mode = GetQuiltMode();
12803 
12804  if (!GetQuiltMode())
12805  SetQuiltMode(true);
12806  else if (GetQuiltMode()) {
12807  SetQuiltMode(false);
12808  g_sticky_chart = GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex();
12809  }
12810 
12811  if (cur_mode != GetQuiltMode()) {
12812  SetupCanvasQuiltMode();
12813  DoCanvasUpdate();
12814  InvalidateGL();
12815  Refresh();
12816  }
12817  // TODO What to do about this?
12818  // g_bQuiltEnable = GetQuiltMode();
12819 
12820  // Recycle the S52 PLIB so that vector charts will flush caches and re-render
12821  if (ps52plib) ps52plib->GenerateStateHash();
12822 
12823  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
12824  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
12825 }
12826 
12827 void ChartCanvas::DoCanvasStackDelta(int direction) {
12828  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
12829  int current_stack_index = GetpCurrentStack()->CurrentStackEntry;
12830  if ((current_stack_index + direction) >= GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry) return;
12831  if ((current_stack_index + direction) < 0) return;
12832 
12833  if (m_bpersistent_quilt /*&& g_bQuiltEnable*/) {
12834  int new_dbIndex =
12835  GetpCurrentStack()->GetDBIndex(current_stack_index + direction);
12836 
12837  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(new_dbIndex)) {
12838  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
12839  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(new_dbIndex);
12840  m_bpersistent_quilt = false;
12841  }
12842  } else {
12843  SelectChartFromStack(current_stack_index + direction);
12844  }
12845  } else {
12846  std::vector<int> piano_chart_index_array =
12847  GetQuiltExtendedStackdbIndexArray();
12848  int refdb = GetQuiltRefChartdbIndex();
12849 
12850  // Find the ref chart in the stack
12851  int current_index = -1;
12852  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < piano_chart_index_array.size(); i++) {
12853  if (refdb == piano_chart_index_array[i]) {
12854  current_index = i;
12855  break;
12856  }
12857  }
12858  if (current_index == -1) return;
12859 
12860  const ChartTableEntry &ctet = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(refdb);
12861  int target_family = ctet.GetChartFamily();
12862 
12863  int new_index = -1;
12864  int check_index = current_index + direction;
12865  bool found = false;
12866  int check_dbIndex = -1;
12867  int new_dbIndex = -1;
12868 
12869  // When quilted. switch within the same chart family
12870  while (!found &&
12871  (unsigned int)check_index < piano_chart_index_array.size() &&
12872  (check_index >= 0)) {
12873  check_dbIndex = piano_chart_index_array[check_index];
12874  const ChartTableEntry &cte = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(check_dbIndex);
12875  if (target_family == cte.GetChartFamily()) {
12876  found = true;
12877  new_index = check_index;
12878  new_dbIndex = check_dbIndex;
12879  break;
12880  }
12881 
12882  check_index += direction;
12883  }
12884 
12885  if (!found) return;
12886 
12887  if (!IsChartQuiltableRef(new_dbIndex)) {
12888  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
12889  SelectdbChart(new_dbIndex);
12890  m_bpersistent_quilt = true;
12891  } else {
12892  SelectQuiltRefChart(new_index);
12893  }
12894  }
12895 
12896  gFrame->UpdateGlobalMenuItems(); // update the state of the menu items
12897  // (checkmarks etc)
12898  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
12899 
12900  ReloadVP();
12901 }
12902 
12903 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12904 //
12905 // Toolbar support
12906 //
12907 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12908 
12909 void ChartCanvas::OnToolLeftClick(wxCommandEvent &event) {
12910  // Handle the per-canvas toolbar clicks here
12911 
12912  switch (event.GetId()) {
12913  case ID_ZOOMIN: {
12914  ZoomCanvasSimple(g_plus_minus_zoom_factor);
12915  break;
12916  }
12917 
12918  case ID_ZOOMOUT: {
12919  ZoomCanvasSimple(1.0 / g_plus_minus_zoom_factor);
12920  break;
12921  }
12922 
12923  case ID_STKUP:
12924  DoCanvasStackDelta(1);
12925  DoCanvasUpdate();
12926  break;
12927 
12928  case ID_STKDN:
12929  DoCanvasStackDelta(-1);
12930  DoCanvasUpdate();
12931  break;
12932 
12933  case ID_FOLLOW: {
12934  TogglebFollow();
12935  break;
12936  }
12937 
12938  case ID_CURRENT: {
12939  ShowCurrents(!GetbShowCurrent());
12940  ReloadVP();
12941  Refresh(false);
12942  break;
12943  }
12944 
12945  case ID_TIDE: {
12946  ShowTides(!GetbShowTide());
12947  ReloadVP();
12948  Refresh(false);
12949  break;
12950  }
12951 
12952  case ID_ROUTE: {
12953  if (0 == m_routeState) {
12954  StartRoute();
12955  } else {
12956  FinishRoute();
12957  }
12958 
12959 #ifdef __OCPN__ANDROID__
12960  androidSetRouteAnnunciator(m_routeState == 1);
12961 #endif
12962  break;
12963  }
12964 
12965  case ID_AIS: {
12966  SetAISCanvasDisplayStyle(-1);
12967  break;
12968  }
12969 
12970  default:
12971  break;
12972  }
12973 
12974  // And then let gFrame handle the rest....
12975  event.Skip();
12976 }
12977 
12978 void ChartCanvas::SetToolbarPosition(wxPoint position) {
12979  m_toolbarPosition = position;
12980 }
12981 
12982 void ChartCanvas::SetToolbarOrientation(long orient) {
12983  m_toolbarOrientation = orient;
12984 }
12985 
12986 wxPoint ChartCanvas::GetToolbarPosition() {
12987  if (m_toolBar) {
12988  wxPoint tbp = m_toolBar->GetPosition(); // toolbar is a TLW, so this is
12989  // screen coordinates.
12990  return ScreenToClient(tbp);
12991  } else
12992  return wxPoint(0, 0);
12993 }
12994 
12995 long ChartCanvas::GetToolbarOrientation() {
12996  if (m_toolBar)
12997  return m_toolBar->GetOrient();
12998  else
12999  return 0;
13000 }
13001 
13002 void ChartCanvas::SubmergeToolbar(void) {
13003  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->Submerge();
13004 }
13005 
13006 void ChartCanvas::SurfaceToolbar(void) {
13007  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->Surface();
13008 }
13009 
13010 bool ChartCanvas::IsToolbarShown() {
13011  bool rv = false;
13012  if (m_toolBar) rv = m_toolBar->IsShown();
13013  return rv;
13014 }
13015 
13016 void ChartCanvas::ToggleToolbar(bool b_smooth) {
13017  if (m_toolBar) {
13018  if (m_toolBar->IsShown()) {
13019  SubmergeToolbar();
13020  } else {
13021  SurfaceToolbar();
13022  m_toolBar->Raise();
13023  }
13024  }
13025 }
13026 
13027 void ChartCanvas::DestroyToolbar() {
13028  if (m_toolBar) m_toolBar->DestroyToolBar();
13029 }
13030 
13031 ocpnFloatingToolbarDialog *ChartCanvas::RequestNewCanvasToolbar(
13032  bool bforcenew) {
13033  return NULL;
13034 }
13035 
13036 // Update inplace the current toolbar with bitmaps corresponding to the
13037 // current color scheme
13038 void ChartCanvas::UpdateToolbarColorScheme(ColorScheme cs) {
13039  if (!m_toolBar) return;
13040 
13041  if (m_toolBar) {
13042  if (m_toolBar->GetColorScheme() != cs) {
13043  m_toolBar->SetColorScheme(cs);
13044 
13045  if (m_toolBar->IsToolbarShown()) {
13046  m_toolBar->DestroyToolBar();
13047  m_toolBar->CreateMyToolbar();
13048  if (m_toolBar->isSubmergedToGrabber())
13049  m_toolBar->SubmergeToGrabber(); // Surface(); //SubmergeToGrabber();
13050  }
13051  }
13052  }
13053 
13054  if (m_toolBar->GetToolbar()) {
13055  // Re-establish toggle states
13056  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_FOLLOW, m_bFollow);
13057  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_CURRENT, GetbShowCurrent());
13058  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(ID_TIDE, GetbShowTide());
13059  }
13060 
13061  return;
13062 }
13063 
13064 void ChartCanvas::SetCanvasToolbarItemState(int tool_id, bool state) {
13065  if (GetToolbar() && GetToolbar()->GetToolbar())
13066  GetToolbar()->GetToolbar()->ToggleTool(tool_id, state);
13067 }
13068 
13069 void ChartCanvas::SetShowAIS(bool show) {
13070  m_bShowAIS = show;
13071  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
13072  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
13073 }
13074 
13075 void ChartCanvas::SetAttenAIS(bool show) {
13076  m_bShowAISScaled = show;
13077  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
13078  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
13079 }
13080 
13081 void ChartCanvas::SetAISCanvasDisplayStyle(int StyleIndx) {
13082  // make some arrays to hold the dfferences between cycle steps
13083  // show all, scaled, hide all
13084  bool bShowAIS_Array[3] = {true, true, false};
13085  bool bShowScaled_Array[3] = {false, true, true};
13086  wxString ToolShortHelp_Array[3] = {_("Show all AIS Targets"),
13087  _("Attenuate less critical AIS targets"),
13088  _("Hide AIS Targets")};
13089  wxString iconName_Array[3] = {_T("AIS"), _T("AIS_Suppressed"),
13090  _T("AIS_Disabled")};
13091  int ArraySize = 3;
13092  int AIS_Toolbar_Switch = 0;
13093  if (StyleIndx == -1) { // -1 means coming from toolbar button
13094  // find current state of switch
13095  for (int i = 1; i < ArraySize; i++) {
13096  if ((bShowAIS_Array[i] == m_bShowAIS) &&
13097  (bShowScaled_Array[i] == m_bShowAISScaled))
13098  AIS_Toolbar_Switch = i;
13099  }
13100  AIS_Toolbar_Switch++; // we did click so continu with next item
13101  if ((!g_bAllowShowScaled) && (AIS_Toolbar_Switch == 1))
13102  AIS_Toolbar_Switch++;
13103 
13104  } else { // coming from menu bar.
13105  AIS_Toolbar_Switch = StyleIndx;
13106  }
13107  // make sure we are not above array
13108  if (AIS_Toolbar_Switch >= ArraySize) AIS_Toolbar_Switch = 0;
13109 
13110  int AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next =
13111  AIS_Toolbar_Switch + 1; // Find out what will happen at next click
13112  if ((!g_bAllowShowScaled) && (AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next == 1))
13113  AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next++;
13114  if (AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next >= ArraySize)
13115  AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next = 0; // If at end of cycle start at 0
13116 
13117  // Set found values to global and member variables
13118  m_bShowAIS = bShowAIS_Array[AIS_Toolbar_Switch];
13119  m_bShowAISScaled = bShowScaled_Array[AIS_Toolbar_Switch];
13120  if (m_toolBar) {
13121  m_toolBar->SetToolShortHelp(ID_AIS,
13122  ToolShortHelp_Array[AIS_Toolbar_Switch_Next]);
13123  if (m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool) {
13124  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->SetToolNormalBitmapEx(
13125  m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool, iconName_Array[AIS_Toolbar_Switch]);
13126  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->Refresh();
13127  m_toolBar->m_tblastAISiconName = iconName_Array[AIS_Toolbar_Switch];
13128  }
13129  }
13130 }
13131 
13132 void ChartCanvas::TouchAISToolActive(void) {
13133  if (!m_toolBar) return;
13134 
13135  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
13136 
13137  if (m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool) {
13138  if ((!g_pAIS->IsAISSuppressed()) && (!g_pAIS->IsAISAlertGeneral())) {
13139  g_nAIS_activity_timer = 5; // seconds
13140 
13141  wxString iconName = _T("AIS_Normal_Active");
13142  if (g_pAIS->IsAISAlertGeneral()) iconName = _T("AIS_AlertGeneral_Active");
13143  if (g_pAIS->IsAISSuppressed()) iconName = _T("AIS_Suppressed_Active");
13144  if (!m_bShowAIS) iconName = _T("AIS_Disabled");
13145 
13146  if (m_toolBar->m_tblastAISiconName != iconName) {
13147  if (m_toolBar->GetToolbar()) {
13148  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->SetToolNormalBitmapEx(
13149  m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool, iconName);
13150  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->Refresh();
13151  m_toolBar->m_tblastAISiconName = iconName;
13152  }
13153  }
13154  }
13155  }
13156 }
13157 
13158 void ChartCanvas::UpdateAISTBTool(void) {
13159  if (!g_pAIS) return;
13160  if (!m_toolBar) return;
13161 
13162  ocpnStyle::Style *style = g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle();
13163 
13164  wxString iconName;
13165 
13166  if (m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool) {
13167  bool b_update = false;
13168 
13169  iconName = _T("AIS");
13170  if (g_pAIS->IsAISSuppressed()) iconName = _T("AIS_Suppressed");
13171  if (g_pAIS->IsAISAlertGeneral()) iconName = _T("AIS_AlertGeneral");
13172  if (!m_bShowAIS) iconName = _T("AIS_Disabled");
13173 
13174  // Manage timeout for AIS activity indicator
13175  if (g_nAIS_activity_timer) {
13176  g_nAIS_activity_timer--;
13177 
13178  if (0 == g_nAIS_activity_timer)
13179  b_update = true;
13180  else {
13181  iconName = _T("AIS_Normal_Active");
13182  if (g_pAIS->IsAISSuppressed()) iconName = _T("AIS_Suppressed_Active");
13183  if (g_pAIS->IsAISAlertGeneral())
13184  iconName = _T("AIS_AlertGeneral_Active");
13185  if (!m_bShowAIS) iconName = _T("AIS_Disabled");
13186  }
13187  }
13188 
13189  if ((m_toolBar->m_tblastAISiconName != iconName)) b_update = true;
13190 
13191  if (b_update && m_toolBar->GetToolbar()) {
13192  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->SetToolNormalBitmapEx(m_toolBar->m_pTBAISTool,
13193  iconName);
13194  m_toolBar->GetToolbar()->Refresh();
13195  m_toolBar->m_tblastAISiconName = iconName;
13196  }
13197  }
13198 }
13199 
13200 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13201 //
13202 // Compass/GPS status icon support
13203 //
13204 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13205 
13206 void ChartCanvas::UpdateGPSCompassStatusBox(bool b_force_new) {
13207  // Look for change in overlap or positions
13208  bool b_update = false;
13209  int cc1_edge_comp = 2;
13210  wxRect rect = m_Compass->GetRect();
13211  wxSize parent_size = GetSize();
13212 
13213  parent_size *= m_displayScale;
13214 
13215  // check to see if it would overlap if it was in its home position (upper
13216  // right)
13217  wxPoint tentative_pt(parent_size.x - rect.width - cc1_edge_comp,
13218  g_StyleManager->GetCurrentStyle()->GetCompassYOffset());
13219  wxRect tentative_rect(tentative_pt, rect.GetSize());
13220 
13221  if (m_toolBar) {
13222  // If the toolbar location has changed, or the proposed compassDialog
13223  // location has changed
13224  if (m_toolBar->GetScreenRect() != m_mainlast_tb_rect || b_force_new) {
13225  wxRect tb_rect = m_toolBar->GetScreenRect();
13226  wxPoint tentative_pt_in_screen(ClientToScreen(tentative_pt));
13227  wxRect tentative_rect_in_screen(tentative_pt_in_screen.x,
13228  tentative_pt_in_screen.y, rect.width,
13229  rect.height);
13230 
13231  // if they would not intersect, go ahead and move it to the upper right
13232  // Else it has to be on lower right
13233  if (!tb_rect.Intersects(tentative_rect_in_screen))
13234  m_Compass->Move(tentative_pt);
13235  else
13236  m_Compass->Move(wxPoint(GetSize().x - rect.width - cc1_edge_comp,
13237  GetSize().y - (rect.height + cc1_edge_comp)));
13238 
13239  if (rect != m_Compass->GetRect()) {
13240  Refresh(true);
13241  m_brepaint_piano = true;
13242  b_update = true;
13243  }
13244  m_mainlast_tb_rect = tb_rect;
13245  }
13246  } else { // No toolbar, so just place compass in upper right.
13247  m_Compass->Move(tentative_pt);
13248  }
13249 
13250  if (m_Compass && m_Compass->IsShown())
13251  m_Compass->UpdateStatus(b_force_new | b_update);
13252 
13253  if (b_force_new | b_update) Refresh();
13254 }
13255 
13256 void ChartCanvas::SelectChartFromStack(int index, bool bDir,
13257  ChartTypeEnum New_Type,
13258  ChartFamilyEnum New_Family) {
13259  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13260  if (!ChartData) return;
13261 
13262  if (index < GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry) {
13263  // Open the new chart
13264  ChartBase *pTentative_Chart;
13265  pTentative_Chart = ChartData->OpenStackChartConditional(
13266  GetpCurrentStack(), index, bDir, New_Type, New_Family);
13267 
13268  if (pTentative_Chart) {
13269  if (m_singleChart) m_singleChart->Deactivate();
13270 
13271  m_singleChart = pTentative_Chart;
13272  m_singleChart->Activate();
13273 
13274  GetpCurrentStack()->CurrentStackEntry = ChartData->GetStackEntry(
13275  GetpCurrentStack(), m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
13276  }
13277 
13278  // Setup the view
13279  double zLat, zLon;
13280  if (m_bFollow) {
13281  zLat = gLat;
13282  zLon = gLon;
13283  } else {
13284  zLat = m_vLat;
13285  zLon = m_vLon;
13286  }
13287 
13288  double best_scale_ppm = GetBestVPScale(m_singleChart);
13289  double rotation = GetVPRotation();
13290  double oldskew = GetVPSkew();
13291  double newskew = m_singleChart->GetChartSkew() * PI / 180.0;
13292 
13293  if (!g_bskew_comp && (GetUpMode() == NORTH_UP_MODE)) {
13294  if (fabs(oldskew) > 0.0001) rotation = 0.0;
13295  if (fabs(newskew) > 0.0001) rotation = newskew;
13296  }
13297 
13298  SetViewPoint(zLat, zLon, best_scale_ppm, newskew, rotation);
13299 
13300  UpdateGPSCompassStatusBox(true); // Pick up the rotation
13301  }
13302 
13303  // refresh Piano
13304  int idx = GetpCurrentStack()->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex();
13305  if (idx < 0) return;
13306 
13307  std::vector<int> piano_active_chart_index_array;
13308  piano_active_chart_index_array.push_back(
13309  GetpCurrentStack()->GetCurrentEntrydbIndex());
13310  m_Piano->SetActiveKeyArray(piano_active_chart_index_array);
13311 }
13312 
13313 void ChartCanvas::SelectdbChart(int dbindex) {
13314  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13315  if (!ChartData) return;
13316 
13317  if (dbindex >= 0) {
13318  // Open the new chart
13319  ChartBase *pTentative_Chart;
13320  pTentative_Chart = ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(dbindex, FULL_INIT);
13321 
13322  if (pTentative_Chart) {
13323  if (m_singleChart) m_singleChart->Deactivate();
13324 
13325  m_singleChart = pTentative_Chart;
13326  m_singleChart->Activate();
13327 
13328  GetpCurrentStack()->CurrentStackEntry = ChartData->GetStackEntry(
13329  GetpCurrentStack(), m_singleChart->GetFullPath());
13330  }
13331 
13332  // Setup the view
13333  double zLat, zLon;
13334  if (m_bFollow) {
13335  zLat = gLat;
13336  zLon = gLon;
13337  } else {
13338  zLat = m_vLat;
13339  zLon = m_vLon;
13340  }
13341 
13342  double best_scale_ppm = GetBestVPScale(m_singleChart);
13343 
13344  if (m_singleChart)
13345  SetViewPoint(zLat, zLon, best_scale_ppm,
13346  m_singleChart->GetChartSkew() * PI / 180., GetVPRotation());
13347 
13348  // SetChartUpdatePeriod( );
13349 
13350  // UpdateGPSCompassStatusBox(); // Pick up the rotation
13351  }
13352 
13353  // TODO refresh_Piano();
13354 }
13355 
13356 void ChartCanvas::selectCanvasChartDisplay(int type, int family) {
13357  double target_scale = GetVP().view_scale_ppm;
13358 
13359  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
13360  if (GetpCurrentStack()) {
13361  int stack_index = -1;
13362  for (int i = 0; i < GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry; i++) {
13363  int check_dbIndex = GetpCurrentStack()->GetDBIndex(i);
13364  if (check_dbIndex < 0) continue;
13365  const ChartTableEntry &cte =
13366  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(check_dbIndex);
13367  if (type == cte.GetChartType()) {
13368  stack_index = i;
13369  break;
13370  } else if (family == cte.GetChartFamily()) {
13371  stack_index = i;
13372  break;
13373  }
13374  }
13375 
13376  if (stack_index >= 0) {
13377  SelectChartFromStack(stack_index);
13378  }
13379  }
13380  } else {
13381  int sel_dbIndex = -1;
13382  std::vector<int> piano_chart_index_array =
13383  GetQuiltExtendedStackdbIndexArray();
13384  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < piano_chart_index_array.size(); i++) {
13385  int check_dbIndex = piano_chart_index_array[i];
13386  const ChartTableEntry &cte = ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(check_dbIndex);
13387  if (type == cte.GetChartType()) {
13388  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(check_dbIndex)) {
13389  sel_dbIndex = check_dbIndex;
13390  break;
13391  }
13392  } else if (family == cte.GetChartFamily()) {
13393  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(check_dbIndex)) {
13394  sel_dbIndex = check_dbIndex;
13395  break;
13396  }
13397  }
13398  }
13399 
13400  if (sel_dbIndex >= 0) {
13401  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(sel_dbIndex, false); // no autoscale
13402  // Re-qualify the quilt reference chart selection
13403  AdjustQuiltRefChart();
13404  }
13405 
13406  // Now reset the scale to the target...
13407  SetVPScale(target_scale);
13408  }
13409 
13410  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
13411 
13412  ReloadVP();
13413 }
13414 
13415 bool ChartCanvas::IsTileOverlayIndexInYesShow(int index) {
13416  return std::find(m_tile_yesshow_index_array.begin(),
13417  m_tile_yesshow_index_array.end(),
13418  index) != m_tile_yesshow_index_array.end();
13419 }
13420 
13421 bool ChartCanvas::IsTileOverlayIndexInNoShow(int index) {
13422  return std::find(m_tile_noshow_index_array.begin(),
13423  m_tile_noshow_index_array.end(),
13424  index) != m_tile_noshow_index_array.end();
13425 }
13426 
13427 void ChartCanvas::AddTileOverlayIndexToNoShow(int index) {
13428  if (std::find(m_tile_noshow_index_array.begin(),
13429  m_tile_noshow_index_array.end(),
13430  index) == m_tile_noshow_index_array.end()) {
13431  m_tile_noshow_index_array.push_back(index);
13432  }
13433 }
13434 
13435 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13436 //
13437 // Piano support
13438 //
13439 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13440 
13441 void ChartCanvas::HandlePianoClick(int selected_index, int selected_dbIndex) {
13442  if (g_boptionsactive)
13443  return; // Piano might be invalid due to chartset updates.
13444  if (!m_pCurrentStack) return;
13445  if (!ChartData) return;
13446 
13447  // stop movement or on slow computer we may get something like :
13448  // zoom out with the wheel (timer is set)
13449  // quickly click and display a chart, which may zoom in
13450  // but the delayed timer fires first and it zooms out again!
13451  StopMovement();
13452 
13453  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
13454  if (m_bpersistent_quilt /* && g_bQuiltEnable*/) {
13455  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(selected_dbIndex)) {
13456  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
13457  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(selected_dbIndex);
13458  m_bpersistent_quilt = false;
13459  } else {
13460  SelectChartFromStack(selected_index);
13461  }
13462  } else {
13463  SelectChartFromStack(selected_index);
13464  g_sticky_chart = selected_dbIndex;
13465  }
13466 
13467  if (m_singleChart)
13468  GetVP().SetProjectionType(m_singleChart->GetChartProjectionType());
13469 
13470  } else {
13471  // Handle MBTiles overlays first
13472  // Left click simply toggles the noshow array index entry
13473  if (CHART_TYPE_MBTILES == ChartData->GetDBChartType(selected_dbIndex)) {
13474  bool bfound = false;
13475  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_tile_noshow_index_array.size(); i++) {
13476  if (m_tile_noshow_index_array[i] ==
13477  selected_dbIndex) { // chart is in the noshow list
13478  m_tile_noshow_index_array.erase(m_tile_noshow_index_array.begin() +
13479  i); // erase it
13480  bfound = true;
13481  break;
13482  }
13483  }
13484  if (!bfound) {
13485  m_tile_noshow_index_array.push_back(selected_dbIndex);
13486  }
13487 
13488  // If not already present, add this tileset to the "yes_show" array.
13489  if (!IsTileOverlayIndexInYesShow(selected_dbIndex))
13490  m_tile_yesshow_index_array.push_back(selected_dbIndex);
13491  }
13492 
13493  else {
13494  if (IsChartQuiltableRef(selected_dbIndex)) {
13495  // if( ChartData ) ChartData->PurgeCache();
13496 
13497  // If the chart is a vector chart, and of very large scale,
13498  // then we had better set the new scale directly to avoid excessive
13499  // underzoom on, eg, Inland ENCs
13500  bool set_scale = false;
13501  if (CHART_TYPE_S57 == ChartData->GetDBChartType(selected_dbIndex)) {
13502  if (ChartData->GetDBChartScale(selected_dbIndex) < 5000) {
13503  set_scale = true;
13504  }
13505  }
13506 
13507  if (!set_scale) {
13508  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(selected_dbIndex, true); // autoscale
13509  } else {
13510  SelectQuiltRefdbChart(selected_dbIndex, false); // no autoscale
13511 
13512  // Adjust scale so that the selected chart is underzoomed/overzoomed
13513  // by a controlled amount
13514  ChartBase *pc =
13515  ChartData->OpenChartFromDB(selected_dbIndex, FULL_INIT);
13516  if (pc) {
13517  double proposed_scale_onscreen =
13518  GetCanvasScaleFactor() / GetVPScale();
13519 
13520  if (g_bPreserveScaleOnX) {
13521  proposed_scale_onscreen =
13522  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen,
13523  100 * pc->GetNormalScaleMax(GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
13524  GetCanvasWidth()));
13525  } else {
13526  proposed_scale_onscreen =
13527  wxMin(proposed_scale_onscreen,
13528  20 * pc->GetNormalScaleMax(GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
13529  GetCanvasWidth()));
13530 
13531  proposed_scale_onscreen =
13532  wxMax(proposed_scale_onscreen,
13533  pc->GetNormalScaleMin(GetCanvasScaleFactor(),
13534  g_b_overzoom_x));
13535  }
13536 
13537  SetVPScale(GetCanvasScaleFactor() / proposed_scale_onscreen);
13538  }
13539  }
13540  } else {
13541  ToggleCanvasQuiltMode();
13542  SelectdbChart(selected_dbIndex);
13543  m_bpersistent_quilt = true;
13544  }
13545  }
13546  }
13547 
13548  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
13549  gFrame->UpdateGlobalMenuItems(); // update the state of the menu items
13550  // (checkmarks etc)
13551  HideChartInfoWindow();
13552  DoCanvasUpdate();
13553  ReloadVP(); // Pick up the new selections
13554 }
13555 
13556 void ChartCanvas::HandlePianoRClick(int x, int y, int selected_index,
13557  int selected_dbIndex) {
13558  if (g_boptionsactive)
13559  return; // Piano might be invalid due to chartset updates.
13560  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13561 
13562  PianoPopupMenu(x, y, selected_index, selected_dbIndex);
13563  UpdateCanvasControlBar();
13564 
13565  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
13566 }
13567 
13568 void ChartCanvas::HandlePianoRollover(int selected_index,
13569  int selected_dbIndex) {
13570  if (g_boptionsactive)
13571  return; // Piano might be invalid due to chartset updates.
13572  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13573  if (!ChartData) return;
13574 
13575  if (ChartData->IsBusy()) return;
13576 
13577  wxPoint key_location = m_Piano->GetKeyOrigin(selected_index);
13578 
13579  if (!GetQuiltMode()) {
13580  ShowChartInfoWindow(key_location.x, selected_dbIndex);
13581  } else {
13582  std::vector<int> piano_chart_index_array =
13583  GetQuiltExtendedStackdbIndexArray();
13584 
13585  if ((GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry > 1) ||
13586  (piano_chart_index_array.size() >= 1)) {
13587  ShowChartInfoWindow(key_location.x, selected_dbIndex);
13588  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(selected_dbIndex);
13589 
13590  ReloadVP(false); // no VP adjustment allowed
13591  } else if (GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry == 1) {
13592  const ChartTableEntry &cte =
13593  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(GetpCurrentStack()->GetDBIndex(0));
13594  if (CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP != cte.GetChartType()) {
13595  ShowChartInfoWindow(key_location.x, selected_dbIndex);
13596  ReloadVP(false);
13597  } else if ((-1 == selected_index) && (-1 == selected_dbIndex)) {
13598  ShowChartInfoWindow(key_location.x, selected_dbIndex);
13599  }
13600  }
13601  }
13602 }
13603 
13604 void ChartCanvas::UpdateCanvasControlBar(void) {
13605  if (m_pianoFrozen) return;
13606 
13607  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13608  if (!ChartData) return;
13609  if (!g_bShowChartBar) return;
13610 
13611  int sel_type = -1;
13612  int sel_family = -1;
13613 
13614  std::vector<int> piano_chart_index_array;
13615  std::vector<int> empty_piano_chart_index_array;
13616 
13617  wxString old_hash = m_Piano->GetStoredHash();
13618 
13619  if (GetQuiltMode()) {
13620  piano_chart_index_array = GetQuiltExtendedStackdbIndexArray();
13621  m_Piano->SetKeyArray(piano_chart_index_array);
13622 
13623  std::vector<int> piano_active_chart_index_array =
13624  GetQuiltCandidatedbIndexArray();
13625  m_Piano->SetActiveKeyArray(piano_active_chart_index_array);
13626 
13627  std::vector<int> piano_eclipsed_chart_index_array =
13628  GetQuiltEclipsedStackdbIndexArray();
13629  m_Piano->SetEclipsedIndexArray(piano_eclipsed_chart_index_array);
13630 
13631  m_Piano->SetNoshowIndexArray(m_quilt_noshow_index_array);
13632  m_Piano->AddNoshowIndexArray(m_tile_noshow_index_array);
13633 
13634  sel_type = ChartData->GetDBChartType(GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex());
13635  sel_family = ChartData->GetDBChartFamily(GetQuiltReferenceChartIndex());
13636  } else {
13637  piano_chart_index_array = ChartData->GetCSArray(GetpCurrentStack());
13638  m_Piano->SetKeyArray(piano_chart_index_array);
13639  // TODO refresh_Piano();
13640 
13641  if (m_singleChart) {
13642  sel_type = m_singleChart->GetChartType();
13643  sel_family = m_singleChart->GetChartFamily();
13644  }
13645  }
13646 
13647  // Set up the TMerc and Skew arrays
13648  std::vector<int> piano_skew_chart_index_array;
13649  std::vector<int> piano_tmerc_chart_index_array;
13650  std::vector<int> piano_poly_chart_index_array;
13651 
13652  for (unsigned int ino = 0; ino < piano_chart_index_array.size(); ino++) {
13653  const ChartTableEntry &ctei =
13654  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13655  double skew_norm = ctei.GetChartSkew();
13656  if (skew_norm > 180.) skew_norm -= 360.;
13657 
13658  if (ctei.GetChartProjectionType() == PROJECTION_TRANSVERSE_MERCATOR)
13659  piano_tmerc_chart_index_array.push_back(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13660 
13661  // Polyconic skewed charts should show as skewed
13662  else if (ctei.GetChartProjectionType() == PROJECTION_POLYCONIC) {
13663  if (fabs(skew_norm) > 1.)
13664  piano_skew_chart_index_array.push_back(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13665  else
13666  piano_poly_chart_index_array.push_back(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13667  } else if (fabs(skew_norm) > 1.)
13668  piano_skew_chart_index_array.push_back(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13669  }
13670  m_Piano->SetSkewIndexArray(piano_skew_chart_index_array);
13671  m_Piano->SetTmercIndexArray(piano_tmerc_chart_index_array);
13672  m_Piano->SetPolyIndexArray(piano_poly_chart_index_array);
13673 
13674  wxString new_hash = m_Piano->GenerateAndStoreNewHash();
13675  if (new_hash != old_hash) {
13676  m_Piano->FormatKeys();
13677  HideChartInfoWindow();
13678  m_Piano->ResetRollover();
13679  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
13680  m_brepaint_piano = true;
13681  }
13682 
13683  // Create a bitmask int that describes what Family/Type of charts are shown in
13684  // the bar, and notify the platform.
13685  int mask = 0;
13686  for (unsigned int ino = 0; ino < piano_chart_index_array.size(); ino++) {
13687  const ChartTableEntry &ctei =
13688  ChartData->GetChartTableEntry(piano_chart_index_array[ino]);
13689  ChartFamilyEnum e = (ChartFamilyEnum)ctei.GetChartFamily();
13690  ChartTypeEnum t = (ChartTypeEnum)ctei.GetChartType();
13691  if (e == CHART_FAMILY_RASTER) mask |= 1;
13692  if (e == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR) {
13693  if (t == CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP)
13694  mask |= 4;
13695  else
13696  mask |= 2;
13697  }
13698  }
13699 
13700  wxString s_indicated;
13701  if (sel_type == CHART_TYPE_CM93COMP)
13702  s_indicated = _T("cm93");
13703  else {
13704  if (sel_family == CHART_FAMILY_RASTER)
13705  s_indicated = _T("raster");
13706  else if (sel_family == CHART_FAMILY_VECTOR)
13707  s_indicated = _T("vector");
13708  }
13709 
13710  g_Platform->setChartTypeMaskSel(mask, s_indicated);
13711 }
13712 
13713 void ChartCanvas::FormatPianoKeys(void) { m_Piano->FormatKeys(); }
13714 
13715 void ChartCanvas::PianoPopupMenu(int x, int y, int selected_index,
13716  int selected_dbIndex) {
13717  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13718 
13719  // No context menu if quilting is disabled
13720  if (!GetQuiltMode()) return;
13721 
13722  menu_selected_dbIndex = selected_dbIndex;
13723  menu_selected_index = selected_index;
13724 
13725  m_piano_ctx_menu = new wxMenu();
13726 
13727  // Search the no-show array
13728  bool b_is_in_noshow = false;
13729  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_quilt_noshow_index_array.size(); i++) {
13730  if (m_quilt_noshow_index_array[i] ==
13731  selected_dbIndex) // chart is in the noshow list
13732  {
13733  b_is_in_noshow = true;
13734  break;
13735  }
13736  }
13737 
13738  if (b_is_in_noshow) {
13739  m_piano_ctx_menu->Append(ID_PIANO_ENABLE_QUILT_CHART, _("Show This Chart"));
13740  Connect(ID_PIANO_ENABLE_QUILT_CHART, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
13741  wxCommandEventHandler(ChartCanvas::OnPianoMenuEnableChart));
13742  } else if (GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry > 1) {
13743  m_piano_ctx_menu->Append(ID_PIANO_DISABLE_QUILT_CHART,
13744  _("Hide This Chart"));
13745  Connect(ID_PIANO_DISABLE_QUILT_CHART, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
13746  wxCommandEventHandler(ChartCanvas::OnPianoMenuDisableChart));
13747  }
13748 
13749  wxPoint pos = wxPoint(x, y - 30);
13750 
13751  // Invoke the drop-down menu
13752  if (m_piano_ctx_menu->GetMenuItems().GetCount())
13753  PopupMenu(m_piano_ctx_menu, pos);
13754 
13755  delete m_piano_ctx_menu;
13756  m_piano_ctx_menu = NULL;
13757 
13758  HideChartInfoWindow();
13759  m_Piano->ResetRollover();
13760 
13761  SetQuiltChartHiLiteIndex(-1);
13762 
13763  ReloadVP();
13764 }
13765 
13766 void ChartCanvas::OnPianoMenuEnableChart(wxCommandEvent &event) {
13767  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_quilt_noshow_index_array.size(); i++) {
13768  if (m_quilt_noshow_index_array[i] ==
13769  menu_selected_dbIndex) // chart is in the noshow list
13770  {
13771  m_quilt_noshow_index_array.erase(m_quilt_noshow_index_array.begin() + i);
13772  break;
13773  }
13774  }
13775 }
13776 
13777 void ChartCanvas::OnPianoMenuDisableChart(wxCommandEvent &event) {
13778  if (!GetpCurrentStack()) return;
13779  if (!ChartData) return;
13780 
13781  RemoveChartFromQuilt(menu_selected_dbIndex);
13782 
13783  // It could happen that the chart being disabled is the reference
13784  // chart....
13785  if (menu_selected_dbIndex == GetQuiltRefChartdbIndex()) {
13786  int type = ChartData->GetDBChartType(menu_selected_dbIndex);
13787 
13788  int i = menu_selected_index + 1; // select next smaller scale chart
13789  bool b_success = false;
13790  while (i < GetpCurrentStack()->nEntry - 1) {
13791  int dbIndex = GetpCurrentStack()->GetDBIndex(i);
13792  if (type == ChartData->GetDBChartType(dbIndex)) {
13793  SelectQuiltRefChart(i);
13794  b_success = true;
13795  break;
13796  }
13797  i++;
13798  }
13799 
13800  // If that did not work, try to select the next larger scale compatible
13801  // chart
13802  if (!b_success) {
13803  i = menu_selected_index - 1;
13804  while (i > 0) {
13805  int dbIndex = GetpCurrentStack()->GetDBIndex(i);
13806  if (type == ChartData->GetDBChartType(dbIndex)) {
13807  SelectQuiltRefChart(i);
13808  b_success = true;
13809  break;
13810  }
13811  i--;
13812  }
13813  }
13814  }
13815 }
13816 
13817 void ChartCanvas::RemoveChartFromQuilt(int dbIndex) {
13818  // Remove the item from the list (if it appears) to avoid multiple addition
13819  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_quilt_noshow_index_array.size(); i++) {
13820  if (m_quilt_noshow_index_array[i] ==
13821  dbIndex) // chart is already in the noshow list
13822  {
13823  m_quilt_noshow_index_array.erase(m_quilt_noshow_index_array.begin() + i);
13824  break;
13825  }
13826  }
13827 
13828  m_quilt_noshow_index_array.push_back(dbIndex);
13829 }
13830 
13831 bool ChartCanvas::UpdateS52State() {
13832  bool retval = false;
13833  // printf(" update %d\n", IsPrimaryCanvas());
13834 
13835  if (ps52plib) {
13836  ps52plib->SetShowS57Text(m_encShowText);
13837  ps52plib->SetDisplayCategory((DisCat)m_encDisplayCategory);
13838  ps52plib->m_bShowSoundg = m_encShowDepth;
13839  ps52plib->m_bShowAtonText = m_encShowBuoyLabels;
13840  ps52plib->m_bShowLdisText = m_encShowLightDesc;
13841 
13842  // Lights
13843  if (!m_encShowLights) // On, going off
13844  ps52plib->AddObjNoshow("LIGHTS");
13845  else // Off, going on
13846  ps52plib->RemoveObjNoshow("LIGHTS");
13847  ps52plib->SetLightsOff(!m_encShowLights);
13848  ps52plib->m_bExtendLightSectors = true;
13849 
13850  // TODO ps52plib->m_bShowAtons = m_encShowBuoys;
13851  ps52plib->SetAnchorOn(m_encShowAnchor);
13852  ps52plib->SetQualityOfData(m_encShowDataQual);
13853  }
13854 
13855  return retval;
13856 }
13857 
13858 void ChartCanvas::SetShowENCDataQual(bool show) {
13859  m_encShowDataQual = show;
13860  if (GetMUIBar() && GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions())
13861  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
13862 
13863  m_s52StateHash = 0; // Force a S52 PLIB re-configure
13864 }
13865

13869  GetMUIBar()->GetCanvasOptions()->RefreshControlValues();
13870 
13871  m_s52StateHash = 0; // Force a S52 PLIB re-configure
13872 }
13873 
13874 void ChartCanvas::SetENCDisplayCategory(int category) {
13875  m_encDisplayCategory = category;
13876  m_s52StateHash = 0; // Force a S52 PLIB re-configure
13877 }

13923 }
13924 
13925 void ChartCanvas::RenderAlertMessage(wxDC &dc, const ViewPort &vp) {
13926  if (!GetAlertString().IsEmpty()) {
13927  wxFont *pfont = wxTheFontList->FindOrCreateFont(
13928  10, wxFONTFAMILY_DEFAULT, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_NORMAL);
13929 
13930  dc.SetFont(*pfont);
13931  dc.SetPen(*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN);
13932 
13933  dc.SetBrush(wxColour(243, 229, 47));
13934  int w, h;
13935  dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(GetAlertString(), &w, &h);
13936  h += 2;
13937  // int yp = vp.pix_height - 20 - h;
13938 
13939  wxRect sbr = GetScaleBarRect();
13940  int xp = sbr.x + sbr.width + 10;
13941  int yp = (sbr.y + sbr.height) - h;
13942 
13943  int wdraw = w + 10;
13944  dc.DrawRectangle(xp, yp, wdraw, h);
13945  dc.DrawLabel(GetAlertString(), wxRect(xp, yp, wdraw, h),
13946  wxALIGN_CENTRE_HORIZONTAL | wxALIGN_CENTRE_VERTICAL);
13947  }
13948 }
13949 
13950 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13951 // Screen Brightness Control Support Routines
13952 //
13953 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13954 
13955 #ifdef __UNIX__
13956 #define BRIGHT_XCALIB
13957 #define __OPCPN_USEICC__
13958 #endif
13959 
13960 #ifdef __OPCPN_USEICC__
13961 int CreateSimpleICCProfileFile(const char *file_name, double co_red,
13962  double co_green, double co_blue);
13963 
13964 wxString temp_file_name;
13965 #endif
13966 
13967 #if 0
13968 class ocpnCurtain: public wxDialog
13969 {
13970  DECLARE_CLASS( ocpnCurtain )
13971  DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
13972 
13973 public:
13974  ocpnCurtain( wxWindow *parent, wxPoint position, wxSize size, long wstyle );
13975  ~ocpnCurtain( );
13976  bool ProcessEvent(wxEvent& event);
13977 
13978 };
13979 
13980 IMPLEMENT_CLASS ( ocpnCurtain, wxDialog )
13981

13983 END_EVENT_TABLE()
13984 
13985 ocpnCurtain::ocpnCurtain( wxWindow *parent, wxPoint position, wxSize size, long wstyle )
13986 {
13987  wxDialog::Create( parent, -1, _T("ocpnCurtain"), position, size, wxNO_BORDER | wxSTAY_ON_TOP );
13988 }
13989

13991 {

13993 
13994 bool ocpnCurtain::ProcessEvent(wxEvent& event)
13995 {
13996  GetParent()->GetEventHandler()->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(true);
13997  return GetParent()->GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(event);
13998 }
13999 #endif
14000 
14001 #ifdef _WIN32
14002 #include <windows.h>
14003 
14004 HMODULE hGDI32DLL;
14005 typedef BOOL(WINAPI *SetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)(HDC hDC, LPVOID lpRampTable);
14006 typedef BOOL(WINAPI *GetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)(HDC hDC, LPVOID lpRampTable);
14007 SetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type
14008  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp; // the API entry points in the dll
14009 GetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp;
14010 
14011 WORD *g_pSavedGammaMap;
14012 
14013 #endif
14014 
14015 int InitScreenBrightness(void) {
14016 #ifdef _WIN32
14017  if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas() && g_bopengl) {
14018  HDC hDC;
14019  BOOL bbr;
14020 
14021  if (NULL == hGDI32DLL) {
14022  hGDI32DLL = LoadLibrary(TEXT("gdi32.dll"));
14023 
14024  if (NULL != hGDI32DLL) {
14025  // Get the entry points of the required functions
14026  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp = (SetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)GetProcAddress(
14027  hGDI32DLL, "SetDeviceGammaRamp");
14028  g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp = (GetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)GetProcAddress(
14029  hGDI32DLL, "GetDeviceGammaRamp");
14030 
14031  // If the functions are not found, unload the DLL and return false
14032  if ((NULL == g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp) ||
14033  (NULL == g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp)) {
14034  FreeLibrary(hGDI32DLL);
14035  hGDI32DLL = NULL;
14036  return 0;
14037  }
14038  }
14039  }
14040 
14041  // Interface is ready, so....
14042  // Get some storage
14043  if (!g_pSavedGammaMap) {
14044  g_pSavedGammaMap = (WORD *)malloc(3 * 256 * sizeof(WORD));
14045 
14046  hDC = GetDC(NULL); // Get the full screen DC
14047  bbr = g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp(
14048  hDC, g_pSavedGammaMap); // Get the existing ramp table
14049  ReleaseDC(NULL, hDC); // Release the DC
14050  }
14051 
14052  // On Windows hosts, try to adjust the registry to allow full range
14053  // setting of Gamma table This is an undocumented Windows hack.....
14054  wxRegKey *pRegKey = new wxRegKey(
14055  _T("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows ")
14056  _T("NT\\CurrentVersion\\ICM"));
14057  if (!pRegKey->Exists()) pRegKey->Create();
14058  pRegKey->SetValue(_T("GdiIcmGammaRange"), 256);
14059 
14060  g_brightness_init = true;
14061  return 1;
14062  }
14063 
14064  else {
14065  if (NULL == g_pcurtain) {
14066  if (gFrame->CanSetTransparent()) {
14067  // Build the curtain window
14068  g_pcurtain = new wxDialog(gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas(), -1, _T(""),
14069  wxPoint(0, 0), ::wxGetDisplaySize(),
14070  wxNO_BORDER | wxTRANSPARENT_WINDOW |
14071  wxSTAY_ON_TOP | wxDIALOG_NO_PARENT);
14072 
14073  // g_pcurtain = new ocpnCurtain(gFrame,
14074  // wxPoint(0,0),::wxGetDisplaySize(),
14075  // wxNO_BORDER | wxTRANSPARENT_WINDOW
14076  // |wxSTAY_ON_TOP | wxDIALOG_NO_PARENT);
14077 
14078  g_pcurtain->Hide();
14079 
14080  HWND hWnd = GetHwndOf(g_pcurtain);
14081  SetWindowLong(hWnd, GWL_EXSTYLE,
14082  GetWindowLong(hWnd, GWL_EXSTYLE) | ~WS_EX_APPWINDOW);
14083  g_pcurtain->SetBackgroundColour(wxColour(0, 0, 0));
14084  g_pcurtain->SetTransparent(0);
14085 
14086  g_pcurtain->Maximize();
14087  g_pcurtain->Show();
14088 
14089  // All of this is obtuse, but necessary for Windows...
14090  g_pcurtain->Enable();
14091  g_pcurtain->Disable();
14092 
14093  gFrame->Disable();
14094  gFrame->Enable();
14095  // SetFocus();
14096  }
14097  }
14098  g_brightness_init = true;
14099 
14100  return 1;
14101  }
14102 #else
14103  // Look for "xcalib" application
14104  wxString cmd(_T ( "xcalib -version" ));
14105 
14106  wxArrayString output;
14107  long r = wxExecute(cmd, output);
14108  if (0 != r)
14109  wxLogMessage(
14110  _T(" External application \"xcalib\" not found. Screen brightness ")
14111  _T("not changed."));
14112 
14113  g_brightness_init = true;
14114  return 0;
14115 #endif
14116 }
14117 
14118 int RestoreScreenBrightness(void) {
14119 #ifdef _WIN32
14120 
14121  if (g_pSavedGammaMap) {
14122  HDC hDC = GetDC(NULL); // Get the full screen DC
14123  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp(hDC,
14124  g_pSavedGammaMap); // Restore the saved ramp table
14125  ReleaseDC(NULL, hDC); // Release the DC
14126 
14127  free(g_pSavedGammaMap);
14128  g_pSavedGammaMap = NULL;
14129  }
14130 
14131  if (g_pcurtain) {
14132  g_pcurtain->Close();
14133  g_pcurtain->Destroy();
14134  g_pcurtain = NULL;
14135  }
14136 
14137  g_brightness_init = false;
14138  return 1;
14139 
14140 #endif
14141 
14142 #ifdef BRIGHT_XCALIB
14143  if (g_brightness_init) {
14144  wxString cmd;
14145  cmd = _T("xcalib -clear");
14146  wxExecute(cmd, wxEXEC_ASYNC);
14147  g_brightness_init = false;
14148  }
14149 
14150  return 1;
14151 #endif
14152 
14153  return 0;
14154 }
14155 
14156 // Set brightness. [0..100]
14157 int SetScreenBrightness(int brightness) {
14158 #ifdef _WIN32
14159 
14160  // Under Windows, we use the SetDeviceGammaRamp function which exists in
14161  // some (most modern?) versions of gdi32.dll Load the required library dll,
14162  // if not already in place
14163  if (gFrame->GetPrimaryCanvas()->GetglCanvas() && g_bopengl) {
14164  if (g_pcurtain) {
14165  g_pcurtain->Close();
14166  g_pcurtain->Destroy();
14167  g_pcurtain = NULL;
14168  }
14169 
14170  InitScreenBrightness();
14171 
14172  if (NULL == hGDI32DLL) {
14173  // Unicode stuff.....
14174  wchar_t wdll_name[80];
14175  MultiByteToWideChar(0, 0, "gdi32.dll", -1, wdll_name, 80);
14176  LPCWSTR cstr = wdll_name;
14177 
14178  hGDI32DLL = LoadLibrary(cstr);
14179 
14180  if (NULL != hGDI32DLL) {
14181  // Get the entry points of the required functions
14182  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp = (SetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)GetProcAddress(
14183  hGDI32DLL, "SetDeviceGammaRamp");
14184  g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp = (GetDeviceGammaRamp_ptr_type)GetProcAddress(
14185  hGDI32DLL, "GetDeviceGammaRamp");
14186 
14187  // If the functions are not found, unload the DLL and return false
14188  if ((NULL == g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp) ||
14189  (NULL == g_pGetDeviceGammaRamp)) {
14190  FreeLibrary(hGDI32DLL);
14191  hGDI32DLL = NULL;
14192  return 0;
14193  }
14194  }
14195  }
14196 
14197  HDC hDC = GetDC(NULL); // Get the full screen DC
14198 
14199  /*
14200  int cmcap = GetDeviceCaps(hDC, COLORMGMTCAPS);
14201  if (cmcap != CM_GAMMA_RAMP)
14202  {
14203  wxLogMessage(_T(" Video hardware does not support brightness control by
14204  gamma ramp adjustment.")); return false;
14205  }
14206  */
14207 
14208  int increment = brightness * 256 / 100;
14209 
14210  // Build the Gamma Ramp table
14211  WORD GammaTable[3][256];
14212 
14213  int table_val = 0;
14214  for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
14215  GammaTable[0][i] = r_gamma_mult * (WORD)table_val;
14216  GammaTable[1][i] = g_gamma_mult * (WORD)table_val;
14217  GammaTable[2][i] = b_gamma_mult * (WORD)table_val;
14218 
14219  table_val += increment;
14220 
14221  if (table_val > 65535) table_val = 65535;
14222  }
14223 
14224  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp(hDC, GammaTable); // Set the ramp table
14225  ReleaseDC(NULL, hDC); // Release the DC
14226 
14227  return 1;
14228  } else {
14229  if (g_pSavedGammaMap) {
14230  HDC hDC = GetDC(NULL); // Get the full screen DC
14231  g_pSetDeviceGammaRamp(hDC,
14232  g_pSavedGammaMap); // Restore the saved ramp table
14233  ReleaseDC(NULL, hDC); // Release the DC
14234  }
14235 
14236  if (brightness < 100) {
14237  if (NULL == g_pcurtain) InitScreenBrightness();
14238 
14239  if (g_pcurtain) {
14240  int sbrite = wxMax(1, brightness);
14241  sbrite = wxMin(100, sbrite);
14242 
14243  g_pcurtain->SetTransparent((100 - sbrite) * 256 / 100);
14244  }
14245  } else {
14246  if (g_pcurtain) {
14247  g_pcurtain->Close();
14248  g_pcurtain->Destroy();
14249  g_pcurtain = NULL;
14250  }
14251  }
14252 
14253  return 1;
14254  }
14255 
14256 #endif
14257 
14258 #ifdef BRIGHT_XCALIB
14259 
14260  if (!g_brightness_init) {
14261  last_brightness = 100;
14262  g_brightness_init = true;
14263  temp_file_name = wxFileName::CreateTempFileName(_T(""));
14264  InitScreenBrightness();
14265  }
14266 
14267 #ifdef __OPCPN_USEICC__
14268  // Create a dead simple temporary ICC profile file, with gamma ramps set as
14269  // desired, and then activate this temporary profile using xcalib <filename>
14270  if (!CreateSimpleICCProfileFile(
14271  (const char *)temp_file_name.fn_str(), brightness * r_gamma_mult,
14272  brightness * g_gamma_mult, brightness * b_gamma_mult)) {
14273  wxString cmd(_T ( "xcalib " ));
14274  cmd += temp_file_name;
14275 
14276  wxExecute(cmd, wxEXEC_ASYNC);
14277  }
14278 
14279 #else
14280  // Or, use "xcalib -co" to set overall contrast value
14281  // This is not as nice, since the -co parameter wants to be a fraction of
14282  // the current contrast, and values greater than 100 are not allowed. As a
14283  // result, increases of contrast must do a "-clear" step first, which
14284  // produces objectionable flashing.
14285  if (brightness > last_brightness) {
14286  wxString cmd;
14287  cmd = _T("xcalib -clear");
14288  wxExecute(cmd, wxEXEC_ASYNC);
14289 
14290  ::wxMilliSleep(10);
14291 
14292  int brite_adj = wxMax(1, brightness);
14293  cmd.Printf(_T("xcalib -co %2d -a"), brite_adj);
14294  wxExecute(cmd, wxEXEC_ASYNC);
14295  } else {
14296  int brite_adj = wxMax(1, brightness);
14297  int factor = (brite_adj * 100) / last_brightness;
14298  factor = wxMax(1, factor);
14299  wxString cmd;
14300  cmd.Printf(_T("xcalib -co %2d -a"), factor);
14301  wxExecute(cmd, wxEXEC_ASYNC);
14302  }
14303 
14304 #endif
14305 
14306  last_brightness = brightness;
14307 
14308 #endif
14309 
14310  return 0;
14311 }
14312 
14313 #ifdef __OPCPN_USEICC__
14314 
14315 #define MLUT_TAG 0x6d4c5554L
14316 #define VCGT_TAG 0x76636774L
14317 
14318 int GetIntEndian(unsigned char *s) {
14319  int ret;
14320  unsigned char *p;
14321  int i;
14322 
14323  p = (unsigned char *)&ret;
14324 
14325  if (1)
14326  for (i = sizeof(int) - 1; i > -1; --i) *p++ = s[i];
14327  else
14328  for (i = 0; i < (int)sizeof(int); ++i) *p++ = s[i];
14329 
14330  return ret;
14331 }
14332 
14333 unsigned short GetShortEndian(unsigned char *s) {
14334  unsigned short ret;
14335  unsigned char *p;
14336  int i;
14337 
14338  p = (unsigned char *)&ret;
14339 
14340  if (1)
14341  for (i = sizeof(unsigned short) - 1; i > -1; --i) *p++ = s[i];
14342  else
14343  for (i = 0; i < (int)sizeof(unsigned short); ++i) *p++ = s[i];
14344 
14345  return ret;
14346 }
14347 
14348 // Create a very simple Gamma correction file readable by xcalib
14349 int CreateSimpleICCProfileFile(const char *file_name, double co_red,
14350  double co_green, double co_blue) {
14351  FILE *fp;
14352 
14353  if (file_name) {
14354  fp = fopen(file_name, "wb");
14355  if (!fp) return -1; /* file can not be created */
14356  } else
14357  return -1; /* filename char pointer not valid */
14358 
14359  // Write header
14360  char header[128];
14361  for (int i = 0; i < 128; i++) header[i] = 0;
14362 
14363  fwrite(header, 128, 1, fp);
14364 
14365  // Num tags
14366  int numTags0 = 1;
14367  int numTags = GetIntEndian((unsigned char *)&numTags0);
14368  fwrite(&numTags, 1, 4, fp);
14369 
14370  int tagName0 = VCGT_TAG;
14371  int tagName = GetIntEndian((unsigned char *)&tagName0);
14372  fwrite(&tagName, 1, 4, fp);
14373 
14374  int tagOffset0 = 128 + 4 * sizeof(int);
14375  int tagOffset = GetIntEndian((unsigned char *)&tagOffset0);
14376  fwrite(&tagOffset, 1, 4, fp);
14377 
14378  int tagSize0 = 1;
14379  int tagSize = GetIntEndian((unsigned char *)&tagSize0);
14380  fwrite(&tagSize, 1, 4, fp);
14381 
14382  fwrite(&tagName, 1, 4, fp); // another copy of tag
14383 
14384  fwrite(&tagName, 1, 4, fp); // dummy
14385 
14386  // Table type
14387 
14388  /* VideoCardGammaTable (The simplest type) */
14389  int gammatype0 = 0;
14390  int gammatype = GetIntEndian((unsigned char *)&gammatype0);
14391  fwrite(&gammatype, 1, 4, fp);
14392 
14393  int numChannels0 = 3;
14394  unsigned short numChannels = GetShortEndian((unsigned char *)&numChannels0);
14395  fwrite(&numChannels, 1, 2, fp);
14396 
14397  int numEntries0 = 256;
14398  unsigned short numEntries = GetShortEndian((unsigned char *)&numEntries0);
14399  fwrite(&numEntries, 1, 2, fp);
14400 
14401  int entrySize0 = 1;
14402  unsigned short entrySize = GetShortEndian((unsigned char *)&entrySize0);
14403  fwrite(&entrySize, 1, 2, fp);
14404 
14405  unsigned char ramp[256];
14406 
14407  // Red ramp
14408  for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) ramp[i] = i * co_red / 100.;
14409  fwrite(ramp, 256, 1, fp);
14410 
14411  // Green ramp
14412  for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) ramp[i] = i * co_green / 100.;
14413  fwrite(ramp, 256, 1, fp);
14414 
14415  // Blue ramp
14416  for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) ramp[i] = i * co_blue / 100.;
14417  fwrite(ramp, 256, 1, fp);
14418 
14419  fclose(fp);
14420 
14421  return 0;
14422 }
14423 #endif // __OPCPN_USEICC__
